name: Breakthrough
text: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.
flavor: The ideas came flooding in so fast that they couldn't all be contained.

name: Consecrated Sphinx
text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.
flavor: A curse is just another name for an unwanted blessing.

name: Deep Analysis
text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

name: Deranged Assistant
text: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."

name: Force of Negation
text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target noncreature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor: "Try, if you must."

name: Ingenious Skaab
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}: Ingenious Skaab gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Heads and shoulders above the rest.

name: Kasmina's Transmutation
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
—Kasmina

name: Makeshift Mauler
text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
flavor:
"It always amazes me what perfectly good things people throw away."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Mana Drain
text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.
flavor: Enthusiasm is no match for preparation.

name: Mana Leak
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Mistfire Adept
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "The quieter the skies, the calmer the mind."

name: Nephalia Smuggler
text: {3}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: "My drivers are trustworthy. I removed their tongues myself. Any other questions?"

name: Pull from Tomorrow
text: Draw X cards, then discard a card.
flavor:
"I do things in my own time."
—Etha, initiate of Rhet crop

name: Spell Pierce
text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor:
"There's a hole in your plan."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
flavor: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"

name: Thought Scour
text:
Target player mills two cards.
Draw a card.
flavor: He had glimpsed the truth of the Multiverse. Now if only he could remember it.

name: Venser, Shaper Savant
text:
Flash
When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

name: Wash Out
text: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"It's not the darkness I fear but dull and numbing shades of gray."
—Sydri, galvanic genius

name: Bitterblossom
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
flavor: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

name: Blood Artist
text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Vanya Falkenrath's paintings are astonishing. How does she manage to achieve such rich crimson hues?"
—Stefan, art critic

name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.
flavor:
"Death not for survival but for vanity and pleasure? This is the decadence I sought to curb."
—Sorin Markov

name: Carrier Thrall
text: When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor:
"Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Disfigure
text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

name: Eyeblight's Ending
text: Destroy target non-Elf creature.
flavor:
"Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."
—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

name: Go for the Throat
text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
flavor: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

name: Gravecrawler
text:
Gravecrawler can't block.
You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.
flavor:
"Innistrad's ghoulcallers are talented enough, but let me show you what someone with real power can create."
—Liliana Vess

name: Imperial Seal
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.
flavor:
"Your presence at the palace this evening is required."
—Letter from Queen Marchesa

name: Inquisition of Kozilek
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.
flavor: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.

name: Liliana's Elite
text: Liliana's Elite gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor:
"You have to admit, Gideon—he has great form."
—Liliana Vess

name: Necrotic Ooze
text: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor:
"To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Oona's Prowler
text:
Flying
Discard a card: Oona's Prowler gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: Deep in Glen Elendra blossoms Oona, queen of the faeries, nourished by secrets and pollinated by stolen dreams.

name: Seekers' Squire
text: When Seekers' Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: Dusk follows the light.

name: Severed Strands
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

name: Skeleton Archer
text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Skinrender
text: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.
flavor:
"Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Strands of Undeath
text:
Enchant creature
When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
{B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor:
"Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?"
—Czaric, Orzhov prelate

name: Supernatural Stamina
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor:
"All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Unearth
text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: No matter how deep you bury it, some evil refuses to stay dead.

name: Vampire Sovereign
text:
Flying
When Vampire Sovereign enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Your service shall be rewarded."
—Queen Lian

name: Vampiric Rites
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor: Scions of the Markov line take particular pleasure in the perversion of humans' holy rituals.

name: Yahenni, Undying Partisan
text:
Haste
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Yahenni, Undying Partisan.
Sacrifice another creature: Yahenni gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: "The time for subtlety is over, darling."

name: Anger of the Gods
text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: Hazoret's disappointment at initiates who fail their final trials can manifest in terrible ways.

name: Backdraft Hellkite
text:
Flying
Whenever Backdraft Hellkite attacks, each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
flavor: Memories burn with the brightest flames.

name: Dark-Dweller Oracle
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
flavor: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.

name: Dockside Extortionist
text: When Dockside Extortionist enters the battlefield, create X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments your opponents control. (Treasure tokens are artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "It's just business."

name: Dreamshaper Shaman
text: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a nonland permanent. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland permanent card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: Magic is the true artist's medium.

name: Fiery Fall
text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Goblin Banneret
text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
{1}{R}: Goblin Banneret gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The Boros banner stands tall even if its bearer doesn't.

name: Hero of the Games
text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of the Games, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Winners of the Iroan Games are forever remembered as heroes of their people.

name: Hissing Iguanar
text: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Viashino thrashes keep iguanars as hunting companions, giving them wounded captives as playthings.

name: Kruin Striker
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Kruin Striker gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Unhappy with the creation of the wolfir, Rorica broke with her order and led a crusade against the "reformed werewolves."

name: Labyrinth Champion
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Labyrinth Champion, Labyrinth Champion deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: "It used to be a lair. Now it's just a tunnel."

name: Lava Coil
text: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Commander, we caught the Dimir spy and took her ashes into custody."
—Kramm, Wojek security officer

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

name: Living Lightning
text: When Living Lightning dies, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Not all storms come from the sky.

name: Monastery Swiftspear
text:
Haste
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

name: Pirate's Pillage
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Goblins can carry their body weight in loot.

name: Sparkmage's Gambit
text: Sparkmage's Gambit deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor:
"A touch of lightning, and anyone can be taught to dance."
—Tobin, sparkmage

name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor:
"She's quick and fearless, and she's never missed a shot. That almost makes up for all the scorch marks she leaves behind."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Titan's Strength
text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: "One last push, and then my task is done."

name: Warrior's Oath
text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.
flavor: "I swear this before all gods old and new: I will fight to my last breath."

name: Young Pyromancer
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.
flavor: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

name: Ambuscade
text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "Spent a lifetime learning from predators. Picked up a few tricks."

name: Annoyed Altisaur
text:
Reach, trample
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
flavor: It pairs a long neck with a short temper.

name: Biogenic Upgrade
text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.
flavor:
"To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means."
—Vannifar

name: Bloom Tender
text: {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.
flavor: Beauty is a seed, waiting to blossom under her capable hands.

name: Brindle Shoat
text: When Brindle Shoat dies, create a 3/3 green Boar creature token.
flavor: Hunters lure the stripling boar into the open, hoping to trap greater prey.

name: Centaur Battlemaster
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Centaur Battlemaster, put three +1/+1 counters on Centaur Battlemaster.
flavor:
"A herd is only as strong as its weakest. Our weakest just killed his third minotaur raider—today."
—Braulios of Pheres Band

name: Concordant Crossroads
text: All creatures have haste.
flavor: The wolf closed in. But then a strange wind whispered through the leaves, and with a burst of speed, the deer surged forward out of reach.

name: Deadly Recluse
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

name: Devoted Druid
text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Devoted Druid: Untap Devoted Druid.
flavor: "Mana lurks in all things, even in the depths of one's own heart."

name: Eternal Witness
text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

name: Food Chain
text: Exile a creature you control: Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the exiled creature's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
flavor: Every predator is something else's prey.

name: Gnarlback Rhino
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Gnarlback Rhino, draw a card.
flavor:
"I think it's trying to tell us that the forest is angry."
—Vivien Reid

name: Grapple with the Past
text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.

name: Green Sun's Zenith
text: Search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

name: Hardened Scales
text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
flavor:
"Naga shed their scales. We wear ours with pride."
—Golran, dragonscale captain

name: Impervious Greatwurm
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Indestructible
flavor: The ultimate answer to intrigue and subtlety.

name: Might of Old Krosa
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
flavor:
"Krosa the great. Krosa the enduring. Look to the forest, and it will share its bounty."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

name: Rancor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.
flavor: Hatred outlives the hateful.

name: Rishkar, Peema Renegade
text:
When Rishkar, Peema Renegade enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Each creature you control with a counter on it has "{T}: Add {G}."
flavor: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

name: Summer Bloom
text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
flavor: "All the treasures of this world are grown, not made."

name: Thrive
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.
flavor: The most successful of Simic creations is cytoplasm, a living, symbiotic substance that feeds off genetic rhythms and strengthens its host in return.

name: Tuskguard Captain
text:
Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

name: Webweaver Changeling
text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Reach
When Webweaver Changeling enters the battlefield, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, you gain 5 life.
flavor: Eight legs carrying endless phobias.

name: Damnation
text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
flavor: Their bodies rotted, their bones splintered, and their souls frayed to tatters. Only then were they granted the mercy of death.

name: Chaos Warp
text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
flavor: Confused but undeterred, the butterflies charged into battle.

name: Alabaster Mage
text: {1}{W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor:
"We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons."
—Alabaster creed

name: Angel of the Dawn
text:
Flying
When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

name: Archangel of Thune
text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor: Even the wicked have nightmares.

name: Auriok Salvagers
text: {1}{W}: Return target artifact card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
text:
Flying, vigilance, indestructible
Other permanents you control have indestructible.
flavor: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

name: Blade Splicer
text:
When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control have first strike.
flavor: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."

name: Boon Reflection
text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
flavor: Twice brewed and twice blessed, the remedy restores both body and mind.

name: Council's Judgment
text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
flavor: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

name: Crusader of Odric
text: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

name: Ethersworn Canonist
text: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.
flavor: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

name: Fencing Ace
text: Double strike
flavor: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

name: Fortify
text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Glint-Sleeve Artisan
text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor: "Shine bright, bolts tight."

name: Kemba, Kha Regent
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.
flavor: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

name: Leonin Abunas
text: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

name: Master Splicer
text:
When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control get +1/+1.
flavor: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

name: Myrsmith
text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
flavor: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

name: Open the Vaults
text: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)
flavor: When the vaults are empty, everyone is rich.

name: Remember the Fallen
text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

name: Revoke Existence
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"The time has come for us to throw off the chains of tyrannical gods and antiquated superstitions."
—Tikaia, disciple of Uremides

name: Sanctum Gargoyle
text:
Flying
When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

name: Sanctum Spirit
text:
Lifelink
Discard a historic card: Sanctum Spirit gains indestructible until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor:
"When history becomes too mournful, even good souls may choose to forget."
—Shalai, voice of Plenty

name: Stonehewer Giant
text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, attach it to a creature you control, then shuffle.
flavor: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

name: Strength of Arms
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
flavor:
"We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Tempered Steel
text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor:
"Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve."
—Ghalma the Shaper

name: Thraben Inspector
text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

name: Topple the Statue
text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.
flavor: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

name: Valor in Akros
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

name: Valorous Stance
text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor:
"Every choice alters the path of fate."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Apprentice Wizard
flavor: Aspiring wizards must demonstrate basic levels of willpower and mental discipline to even be considered for an apprenticeship.

name: Arcum Dagsson
text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

name: Argivian Restoration
text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Braids, Conjurer Adept
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.

name: Brainstorm
text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Corridor Monitor
text: When Corridor Monitor enters the battlefield, untap target artifact or creature you control.
flavor: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.

name: Cyclonic Rift
text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

name: Deepglow Skate
text: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.
flavor: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

name: Esperzoa
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

name: Force of Will
text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
flavor: "I alone determine my destiny."

name: Frogify
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)
flavor: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

name: Hinder
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor:
"Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

name: Inkwell Leviathan
text:
Trample
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains."
—Esper fable

name: Master of Etherium
text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

name: Master Transmuter
text: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

name: Metallic Rebuke
text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor:
"Too little, too late. The machine is in motion."
—Tezzeret

name: Parasitic Strix
text:
Flying
When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

name: Pongify
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
flavor: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

name: Relic Runner
text: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

name: Reshape
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Today's paperweight, tomorrow's leveler."
—Bruenna, Neurok leader

name: Riddlesmith
text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

name: Rush of Knowledge
text: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor:
"Limitless power is glorious until you gain limitless understanding."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor

name: Serra Sphinx
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.

name: Steel Sabotage
text:
Choose one —
• Counter target artifact spell.
• Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."
—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

name: Thirst for Knowledge
text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
flavor: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

name: Thought Reflection
text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.
flavor: Only when two oracles speak in unison is an omen accepted as truth.

name: Vedalken Infuser
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.
flavor: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

name: Ad Nauseam
text: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value. You may repeat this process any number of times.
flavor: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.

name: Bone Picker
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.
Flying, deathtouch
flavor: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.

name: Cast Down
text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
flavor:
"Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."
—*Chainer's Torment*

name: Costly Plunder
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

name: Dark Confidant
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
flavor: Greatness, at any cost.

name: Death's Shadow
text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
flavor: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

name: Defiant Salvager
text: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
text: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

name: Disciple of Bolas
text: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.
flavor: "Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources."

name: Disciple of the Vault
text: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.
flavor: He stands in the shadow of his lord, Geth, drinking in the dark energies of the Vault.

name: Divest
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

name: Dread Return
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.

name: Driver of the Dead
text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

name: Drown in Sorrow
text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor:
"The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Executioner's Capsule
text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

name: Glaze Fiend
text:
Flying
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

name: Magus of the Abyss
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

name: Magus of the Will
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.
flavor: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."

name: Morkrut Banshee
text: Morbid — When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage."
—Hildin, priest of Avacyn

name: Ovalchase Daredevil
text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ovalchase Daredevil from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Let me guess. You thought I was dead."

name: Painsmith
text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

name: Skirsdag High Priest
text: Morbid — {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate only if a creature died this turn.
flavor: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."

name: Thoughtseize
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
flavor: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

name: Toxic Deluge
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
flavor:
"It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds."
—Esara, healer adept

name: Vampire Hexmage
text:
First strike
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.
flavor: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

name: Wound Reflection
text: At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life they lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor: The greater the suffering, the sweeter the taste.

name: Abrade
text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

name: Balduvian Rage
text:
Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks."
—Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Blasphemous Act
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
flavor:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Blood Moon
text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
flavor: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

name: Bloodshot Trainee
text: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.
flavor: "Just think how strong I'll be if my arms don't tear off!"

name: Brimstone Volley
text:
Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to any target.
Morbid — Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor: Peace had failed. War had failed. There was only one option left.

name: Cathartic Reunion
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.
flavor: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

name: Cragganwick Cremator
text: When Cragganwick Cremator enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, Cragganwick Cremator deals damage equal to that card's power to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Each night that his bowl fills, a village mourns.

name: Dismantle
text: Destroy target artifact. If that artifact had counters on it, put that many +1/+1 counters or charge counters on an artifact you control.
flavor:
"If only the living were so easily salvaged."
—Memnarch

name: Dualcaster Mage
text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

name: Galvanic Blast
text:
Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target.
Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage instead if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor: Mirrodin has little weather, but it certainly has lightning.

name: Goblin Gaveleer
text:
Trample
Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.
flavor:
"When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Goblin Guide
text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.
flavor: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

name: Grim Lavamancer
text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

name: Heat Shimmer
text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, exile this permanent."
flavor:
"Better to flare out than to gutter."
—Flamekin expression

name: Imperial Recruiter
text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: A passionate recruiter will win a war before the first arrow flies.

name: Ion Storm
text: {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter or a charge counter from a permanent you control: Ion Storm deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: When enough artifacts lie too long in the same place, their magical radiation weakens reality, opening rifts of unpredictable destructive power.

name: Kazuul's Toll Collector
text: {0}: Attach target Equipment you control to Kazuul's Toll Collector. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Travelers are advised to bring extra swords, preferably shiny ones.

name: Lightning Axe
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay {5}.
Lightning Axe deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor:
"A gargoyle's meat can be carved with an ordinary cleaver, but for its petrous hide . . ."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, *The Underworld Cookbook*

name: Mana Echoes
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may add an amount of {C} equal to the number of creatures you control that share a creature type with it.
flavor: When the ground is saturated with mana, even the lightest footstep can bring it to the surface.

name: Orcish Vandal
text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Vandal deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: Every ancient relic is a weapon if you throw it hard enough.

name: Rage Reflection
text: Creatures you control have double strike.
flavor: Make every blow count.

name: Rapacious Dragon
text:
Flying
When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor:
"Surely it won't notice if I take—"
—Theria the Sly, last words

name: Ravenous Intruder
text: Sacrifice an artifact: Ravenous Intruder gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I've made some fine acquisitions of late, so I'm planning to make commensurate improvements to my security systems. I have a consultant coming tomorrow."
—Kurna Majan, Luminary League

name: Rolling Earthquake
text: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.
flavor: An empire can take centuries to build but mere moments to destroy.

name: Salivating Gremlins
text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Salivating Gremlins gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: If an elf can dream it, a dwarf can build it, and a gremlin can eat it.

name: Skinbrand Goblin
text: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"These Gruul skin-runes—discern whether their patterns evoke streets, leylines, or both. You have four days."
—Niv-Mizzet, to his assistant

name: Trash for Treasure
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Goblins generally have two possessions: one per hand.

name: Tuktuk the Explorer
text:
Haste
When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create Tuktuk the Returned, a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token.
flavor: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.

name: Awakening Zone
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

name: Bloodbriar
text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.
flavor:
"There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back."
—Nissa Revane

name: Clear Shot
text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor:
"What worked to bring down angels will do the same for these horrors."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

name: Conclave Naturalists
text: When Conclave Naturalists enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Your swords and wards have no power here."

name: Crop Rotation
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: Zendikar's elves have developed innovative methods to mitigate the effects of the Roil.

name: Crushing Vines
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor:
"Your veil's curse won't stop me, deathmage. I have taken down countless night hunters. This dark plane is not big enough for you to hide."
—Garruk Wildspeaker, to Liliana Vess

name: Death-Hood Cobra
text:
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains reach until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor:
"Size alone does not guarantee survival."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Enlarge
text: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: For Mittens, it was just another day at the beach.

name: Exploration
text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
flavor:
"Only when we journey into the unknown can we find the impossible."
—Cyrul the Wanderer

name: Gelatinous Genesis
text: Create X X/X green Ooze creature tokens.
flavor: Even as the world was left cracked and gory by the marauding Eldrazi, new life began to drip from its wounds.

name: Greater Good
text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.
flavor:
"There's wisdom to be gained in death—whether it be one's own or someone else's."
—Jarad, Golgari Lich-Lord

name: Heartbeat of Spring
text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.
flavor:
"It is true that we monks hold the key to paradise, but most don't understand that the paradise we guard is the one within."
—Diary of Azusa

name: Kozilek's Predator
text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

name: Mana Reflection
text: If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces twice as much of that mana instead.
flavor: The greatest wonders of nature are found in the smallest saplings straining toward the canopy.

name: Might of the Masses
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
flavor: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

name: Reclamation Sage
text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

name: Shamanic Revelation
text:
Draw a card for each creature you control.
Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
flavor: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.

name: Thragtusk
text:
When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor:
"Always carry two spears."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

name: Vengevine
text:
Haste
Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

name: Whisperer of the Wilds
text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Ferocious — {T}: Add {G}{G}. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: She speaks only in whispers but can be heard over the fiercest storm.

name: Woodland Champion
text: Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Woodland Champion.
flavor: "Every footfall on the forest floor is a heartbeat sending strength into my veins."

name: Bosh, Iron Golem
text:
Trample
{3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value to any target.
flavor: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets of his past.

name: Pyrite Spellbomb
text:
{R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: It deals 2 damage to any target.
{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Melt that which was never frozen."
—Spellbomb inscription

name: Spellskite
text: {U/P}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
flavor:
"Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Academy Ruins
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: Its secrets once wrought the greatest artifice ever known. Now crabs loot the rubble to decorate their shells.

name: Sneak Attack
text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "Keep watch? Why? Nothing going to mess with us. We too big and scary."

name: Reconstruction
text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Tedious research made the Sages of the College of Lat-Nam adept in repairing broken artifacts.

name: Atog
text: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The bane of all artificers, the legendary Atogs devoured intricate tools to further their own twisted growth.

name: Dwarven Weaponsmith
text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only during your upkeep.
flavor: "Work with zeal as hammers peal! Melt, anneal, and pound the steel!" —Old Dwarvish forge-chant

name: Crumble
text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its mana value.
flavor: The spirits of Argoth grant new life to those who repent the folly of enslaving their labors to devices.

name: And They Shall Know No Fear
text: Choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor:
"They are my bulwark against the Terror. They are the Defenders of Humanity. They are my Space Marines."
—The Emperor of Mankind

name: For the Emperor!
text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: They all took up the cry, the missionaries, the pilgrims, the sisters of the Orders Militant. The forces of Chaos melted before the fire of their faith.

name: Grey Knight Paragon
text:
Flash
Rites of Banishment — When Grey Knight Paragon enters the battlefield, destroy target attacking creature. If that creature is a Demon, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Our will shall be our weapons, our faith shall be our armour."
—Canticle of Absolution

name: Space Marine Scout
text:
First strike, vigilance
Concealed Position — When Space Marine Scout enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Through blood and battle, scouts are forged from raw recruits into the Imperium's finest.

name: Thunderwolf Cavalry
text:
First strike
Crushing Teeth — Whenever Thunderwolf Cavalry deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor: The practice of tracking and training Thunderwolves is a sort of initiation ritual into the upper echelons of the Wolf Guard.

name: Vexilus Praetor
text:
Flash
Vigilance
Aegis of the Emperor — Commanders you control have protection from everything.
flavor: There is no greater bulwark than the Praetors of the Adeptus Custodes, the bodyguards of the Emperor of Mankind.

name: Genestealer Locus
text:
Neurotraumal Rod — Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Harrowing visions, paralyzing pain, and terrifying brain spasms await those who challenge the cult.

name: Lord of Change
text:
Flying, ward {3}
Architect of Deception — When Lord of Change enters the battlefield, draw three cards.
flavor: The Lords of Change are Tzeentch's greatest servants. The most powerful of them wield fragments of his power over destiny.

name: Anrakyr the Traveller
text: Lord of the Pyrrhian Legions — Whenever Anrakyr the Traveller attacks, you may cast an artifact spell from your hand or graveyard by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.
flavor: "Though it may take an eternity, I will see the myriad dynasties united once more."

name: Blight Grenade
text:
Destroy target creature.
All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Blight grenades—which induce horrendous effects on their victims—have no impact on the Death Guard, who gladly use the devices in extreme close quarters with the enemy.

name: Cryptek
text: {1}{B}, {T}: Choose another target artifact creature you control. When that creature dies this turn, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.
flavor: There are those who draw false comparisons between the tech-magi of the Adeptus Mechanicus and the xenotechnologists of the necron race. There can be no mercy for such heretics.

name: Flayed One
text:
Lifelink
Flesh Flayer — When Flayed One enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
flavor: Those suspected of carrying the flayer curse are summarily banished, lest the corruption spread to other Necrons.

name: Illuminor Szeras
text: Secrets of the Soul — {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value.
flavor: "Immortality is not quite the same as invulnerability, but it is close enough."

name: Lychguard
text: Guardian Patrols — {3}{B}, Sacrifice Lychguard: Return all legendary creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Only the deathless can truly comprehend the burden of unfailing loyalty."
—Vargard Obyron of the Sautekh Dynasty

name: Mandate of Abaddon
text: Choose target creature you control. Destroy all creatures with power less than that creature's power.
flavor:
"I am the Arch-fiend, the Despoiler of Worlds, and by my hands shall the false Emperor fall."
—Abaddon the Despoiler

name: Necron Overlord
text: Relentless March — {X}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Target opponent loses X life.
flavor: "This galaxy once knelt before us, and it will do so again."

name: Nurgle's Conscription
text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control, then exile that player's graveyard.
flavor:
"In the embrace of the great Nurgle, I am no longer afraid, for with His pestilential favour I have become that which I once most feared: Death."
—Kulvain Hestarius of the Death Guard

name: Nurgle's Rot
text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, return Nurgle's Rot to its owner's hand and you create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.
flavor: Each plaguebearer is formed from the blighted soul of a mortal slain by Nurgle's Rot.

name: Plague Drone
text:
Flying
Rot Fly — If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.
flavor: High-ranking plaguebearers of Nurgle's realm ride into realspace mounted upon Rot Flies—colossal daemonic insects whose appearance is so repugnant it scars the mind.

name: Plasmancer
text:
Flying
Dynastic Advisor — When Plasmancer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Masters of dimensional dissonance, singularity manipulation, and countless other technologies, plasmancers are terrifying to behold.

name: Poxwalkers
text:
Deathtouch
Curse of the Walking Pox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, return Poxwalkers from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Poxwalkers are victims of the Walking Pox, a cruel virulence which rots the infected to death while keeping them conscious.

name: Sanguinary Priest
text:
Lifelink
Blood Chalice — Whenever another creature you control dies, Sanguinary Priest deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: "Embrace the strength of your Primarch, but deny the Red Thirst, brothers! There is no return from that darkest of paths."

name: Sautekh Immortal
text:
Flash
Elite Troops — Sautekh Immortal enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.
flavor:
"Nothing clears a battlefield like a Deathstrike missile. Wait. Is something moving out there?"
—Commmander Zander At'lan, Tallarn 115th Armoured Regiment

name: Shard of the Nightbringer
text:
Flying
Drain Life — When Shard of the Nightbringer enters the battlefield, if you cast it, target opponent loses half their life, rounded up. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor:
"Aza'gorod, the Nightbringer. The embodiment of death. A killer of stars and of worlds."
—Illuminor Szeras

name: Skorpekh Destroyer
text:
Deathtouch
Hyperphase Threshers — Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Skorpekh Destroyer gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: Nothing can override the hard-wired desire to kill that empowers these rage-driven Necrons.

name: Technomancer
text: When Technomancer enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then return any number of artifact creature cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"Witchcraft or technology, it is blasphemous, and it must be stopped."
—Inquisitor Greyfax

name: Their Name Is Death
text: Destroy all nonartifact creatures.
flavor:
"When the Silent King saw what had been done, he knew at last the true nature of the C'tan, and the doom they had wrought in his name."
—*The Book of Mournful Night*

name: Trazyn the Infinite
text:
Deathtouch
Prismatic Gallery — As long as Trazyn the Infinite is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all artifact cards in your graveyard.
flavor: The Archaeovist of the Solemnace Galleries will not rest until every treasure in the galaxy is safely within his clutches.

name: Triarch Stalker
text:
Targeting Relay — At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent.
Creatures attacking the last chosen player have menace.
flavor:
"Scour this world of these impudent trespassers!"
—Lord Traedrekkh of the Sekemtar Dynasty

name: Acolyte Hybrid
text: Heavy Rock Cutter — Whenever Acolyte Hybrid attacks, destroy up to one target artifact. If an artifact is destroyed this way, its controller draws a card.
flavor: Too obviously xenos in form to blend into human society, the acolytes haunt the dark places beneath industrial sprawls.

name: Bloodcrusher of Khorne
text:
Trample
Devastating Charge — Other creatures you control have trample.
flavor: The Brazen Thunder, foremost of the bloodcrusher legions, are named for the sound they make as they ride into battle.

name: Chaos Terminator Lord
text: Lord of Chaos — At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Charge brothers! Death to the false Emperor!"

name: Herald of Slaanesh
text:
Locus of Slaanesh — Demon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
Other Demons you control have haste.
flavor:
"I can show you indulgence without regret, delight without boundaries, gratifications beyond count."
—Sha'ris, Deacon of Lust

name: Keeper of Secrets
text:
First strike, haste
Symphony of Pain — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Keeper of Secrets deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to target opponent.
flavor: To look upon one is to surrender every last shred of self-will.

name: Screamer-Killer
text:
Trample
Bio-Plasmic Scream — Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 5 or greater, Screamer-Killer deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor: Its shriek is unintelligible, but armored bulkheads seem to understand the intent well enough.

name: Seeker of Slaanesh
text:
Haste
Allure of Slaanesh — Each opponent must attack with at least one creature each combat if able.
flavor: War is a dance. And they're looking for partners.

name: Biophagus
text: Genomic Enhancement — {T}: Add one mana of any color. If this mana is spent to cast a creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor:
"We guarantee you that within a week, you will feel like a new man."
—Galaxos Klynesmith, biophagus

name: Bone Sabres
text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, put four +1/+1 counters on it.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor: Charged with psychic energy, the melee weapons of the Tyranid are far more than bone and chitin.

name: Clamavus
text: Proclamator Hailer — Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "The star-born approach! Their holy angels descend! Take up arms, my brothers and sisters, for the Day of Ascension is upon us!"

name: Nexos
text: Strategic Coordinator — Basic lands you control have "{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}."
flavor: The blessed union of gun, claw, and merciless intent is a force to be truly feared.

name: Toxicrene
text:
Reach, deathtouch
Hypertoxic Miasma — All lands have "{T}: Add one mana of any color" and lose all other abilities.
flavor: It emits a stinking cloud composed of millions of nascent microscopic organisms, each possessing a fragment of predatory sentience.

name: Tyranid Invasion
text: Create a number of 3/3 green Tyranid Warrior creature tokens with trample equal to the number of opponents you have.
flavor: By the time the Blood Angels descended from the heavens, Phodia was a city transformed. Miles of flesh-filled rivers fed into the central digestion pools and up into the hive fleet above.

name: Bastion Protector
text: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.
flavor: "By this oath, I pledge to stand by thee, against traitor, beast, or fiend, for only in death does duty end."

name: Deploy to the Front
text: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
flavor:
"When the door drops, give them a haste of the Emperor's fire!"
—Commissar Yarrick

name: Entrapment Maneuver
text: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. You create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is that creature's toughness.
flavor: "Now!"

name: Fell the Mighty
text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.
flavor: The battle began with an overwhelming wave of Tyranids and ended with Canoness Lucretia standing atop a huge pile of charred alien corpses.

name: Hour of Reckoning
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
flavor: The Battle of Baal was the bloodiest and most costly in the entire noble history of the Sons of Sanguinius.

name: Martial Coup
text: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
flavor:
"It is their duty to fight and die so that Humanity might be preserved."
—Lord Commissar Barron Reed

name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor:
"Hunger is no different from any other foe; defeat it in the Emperor's name, and save Humanity."
—Motto of the Argi-World Viridia IV

name: Aetherize
text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
flavor: No berzerker charge can stand against the psychic might of the Hive Mind.

name: Reconnaissance Mission
text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "We've reached the xenos HQ. Transmitting coordinates now."

name: Bile Blight
text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Hold your bitterness deep within, and there let it fester. Let it roil and squirm and churn, until you are filled with bile so poisonous that all you touch falls to ruin."
—Morarion, Daemon Primarch

name: Dark Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor:
"Praise Nurgle! For the plague to have progressed so quickly, truly his blessing must be upon us!"
—Ku'gath Plaguefather

name: Darkness
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor: By the physical laws of the universe, darkness is merely the absence of light. Necrons can harness the power of other dimensions, where darkness is tangible and moldable.

name: Defile
text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
flavor:
"Agresto, bring up the rear . . . Agresto?"
—Sergeant Dremark Eigen, last words

name: Mutilate
text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
flavor: "You mortals turn to dust in the blink of an eye. I only expedite your fate."

name: Reverberate
text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor:
"That which was, will be. That which will be, was."
—Kairos Fateweaver

name: Starstorm
text:
Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"They're beasts! What are they going to do, bomb us from orbit?"
—Platoon Commander Cyrus Jalili, Prandium Defense Auxilia

name: Warstorm Surge
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor: Khorne's sole desire is to drown the galaxy in a tide of slaughter. To conquer and kill every living thing, until there is nothing left but spilled blood and shattered bone.

name: Cultivate
text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: A single spore from a Tyranid Hive Ship can spell doom for a solar system.

name: Death's Presence
text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.
flavor: The Genestealer Cults rejoiced at the arrival of their gods . . . at first.

name: Explore
text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The Tyranids advanced inexorably across the galaxy in their living Hive Ships, with one singular goal: to consume all.

name: Farseek
text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: "Once we have claimed this planet, we will claim the stars."

name: Harrow
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: With each defeat, the hive learns. With each victory, it grows.

name: Inspiring Call
text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: The voice of a clamavus commands all who carry the genetic legacy of the Tyranids in their blood.

name: Cranial Plating
flavor: The flesh of the Necrontyr is a memory so distant as to be nearly mythical.

name: Barren Moor
text:
Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Millennia of constant warfare have left many planets with very little worth fighting over.

name: Desert of the Glorified
text:
Desert of the Glorified enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: On countless frontier worlds, below silica sand, blasted chalk, or bubbling marsh, slumbering Necrons await.

name: Forgotten Cave
text:
Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: In the hearts of mortals, in the pages of ancient lore, in the deep, forgotten places of the universe . . . Chaos awaits.

name: Polluted Mire
text:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: As the continent sank over the course of eons, the tomb complex slowly flooded. The sleeping Necrons, their stasis crypts corrupted, never awoke.

name: Vault of Whispers
text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor: Heretic cultures came to planet Sovereign in search of resources and precious artifacts. They found something else.

name: Alabaster Potion
text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains X life.
• Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor:
"Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity."
—D'Avenant proverb

name: Amrou Kithkin
text: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

name: Brainwash
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: "They're not your friends; they despise you. I'm the only one you can count on. Trust me."

name: Divine Transformation
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

name: Elder Land Wurm
text:
Defender, trample
When Elder Land Wurm blocks, it loses defender.
flavor: Sometimes it's best to let sleeping dragons lie.

name: Morale
text: Attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"After Lacjsi's speech, the Knights grew determined to crush their ancient enemies clan by clan."
—Tivadar of Thorn, *History of the Goblin Wars*

name: Piety
text: Blocking creatures get +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Whoever obeys God and His Prophet, fears God and does his duty to Him, will surely find success."
—*The Qur'an, 24:52*

name: Pikemen
text: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"As the cavalry bore down, we faced them with swords drawn and pikes hidden in the grass at our feet. 'Don't lift your pikes 'til I give the word,' I said."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Visions
text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. You may then have that player shuffle that library.
flavor:
"Visions of glory, spare my aching sight,
Ye unborn ages, crowd not on my soul!"
—Thomas Gray, "The Bard"

name: Flood
text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
—Vibekke Ragnild, *Witches and War*

name: Gaseous Form
text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor:
". . . [A]nd gives to airy nothing A local habitation and a name."
—William Shakespeare, *A Midsummer-Night's Dream*

name: Ghost Ship
text:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.
flavor:
"That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below."
—Mireille Gaetane, *The Valeriad*

name: Psionic Entity
text: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself.
flavor: Creatures of the Æther are notorious for neglecting their own well-being.

name: Segovian Leviathan
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor:
"Leviathan, too! Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?"
—Job 40:25

name: Zephyr Falcon
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.

name: Ashes to Ashes
text: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.
flavor:
"All rivers eventually run to the sea. My job is to sort out who goes first."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Bog Imp
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: On guard for larger dangers, we underestimated the power and speed of the Imp's muck-crusted claws.

name: Carrion Ants
text: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "War is no picnic," my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree.

name: Cosmic Horror
text:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Cosmic Horror unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If Cosmic Horror is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.
flavor: ". . . [S]creams of horror rend th' affrighted skies." —Alexander Pope, *The Rape of the Lock*

name: Cyclopean Mummy
text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.
flavor: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

name: Greed
text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
flavor:
"There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. . . . And there is no greater disaster than greed."
—*Tao Tê Ching 46*

name: Lost Soul
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor:
Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—
But those who go with her are never the same.

name: Marsh Gas
text: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Comes right outta th' ground. If ya can smell it, it's too late."
—Keevy Bogsbury

name: Murk Dwellers
text: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.
flavor: When Raganorn unsealed the catacombs, he found more than the dead and their treasures.

name: Pit Scorpion
text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
flavor: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

name: Rag Man
text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate only during your turn.
flavor: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

name: Uncle Istvan
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.
flavor: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

name: Vampire Bats
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor:
"For something is amiss or out of place When mice with wings can wear a human face."
—Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

name: Word of Binding
text: Tap X target creatures.
flavor:
"That was the worst experience of my days: standing there helpless as they killed my whole troop."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Ali Baba
text: {R}: Tap target Wall.
flavor:
"When he reached the entrance of the cavern, he pronounced the words, 'Open, Sesame!'"
—*The Arabian Nights*, Junior Classics trans.

name: Bird Maiden
text: Flying
flavor:
Four things that never meet do here unite
To shed my blood and to ravage my heart,
A radiant brow and tresses that beguile
And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile."
—*The Arabian Nights*, trans. Haddawy

name: Brothers of Fire
text: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
