text: Revolt — Greenwheel Liberator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor: "I will not rest until every vestige of the Consulate—every banner, flag, and standard—has fallen."

name: Heroic Intervention
text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor:
"Wherever the strong would harm the weak, I will be there."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Hidden Herbalists
text: Revolt — When Hidden Herbalists enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, add {G}{G}.
flavor: In the cellars beneath Narnam House, a strange and deadly garden grows.

name: Highspire Infusion
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
flavor:
"If nothing else, the Inventors' Fair taught us that we're only beginning to discover aether's true potential."
—Kershan Danil, Highspire artisan

name: Lifecraft Awakening
text: Put X +1/+1 counters on target artifact you control. If it isn't a creature or Vehicle, it becomes a 0/0 Construct artifact creature.
flavor: "It was made, yes, but that does not mean it cannot grow."

name: Lifecraft Cavalry
text:
Trample
Revolt — Lifecraft Cavalry enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor:
"I do not ask you to be tame. I only ask you to be true."
—Rishkar, Peema renegade

name: Lifecrafter's Gift
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: The best engineers recognize when a problem has already been solved.

name: Monstrous Onslaught
text: Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast this spell.
flavor:
"Regards from Peema."
—Rishkar

name: Narnam Renegade
text:
Deathtouch
Revolt — Narnam Renegade enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor: "I do not need to pierce your heart to still its beating."

name: Natural Obsolescence
text: Put target artifact on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor:
"It is folly to believe your precious inventions will endure. All things return to the soil."
—Nirav, Tirahar elder

name: Peema Aether-Seer
text:
When Peema Aether-Seer enters the battlefield, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
Pay {E}{E}{E}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
flavor: "The Great Conduit connects us all."

name: Prey Upon
text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: It is the nature of the strong to survive.

name: Ridgescale Tusker
text: When Ridgescale Tusker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor:
"Each creature holds a solution to a problem, a lesson to be learned."
—Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

name: Rishkar's Expertise
text:
Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor: "Control the Great Conduit? You might as well try to divert a river with your hands."

name: Scrounging Bandar
text:
Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.
flavor: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

name: Silkweaver Elite
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Revolt — When Silkweaver Elite enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, draw a card.
flavor: Elvish weavers use spidersilk to make everything from tapestries to rappelling ropes.

name: Unbridled Growth
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Sacrifice Unbridled Growth: Draw a card.
flavor:
"If the Consulate has abandoned restraint, so too shall the wilds."
—Surash, keeper of the Cowl

name: Aegis Automaton
text: {4}{W}: Return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: The streets of Ghirapur have become dangerous. It's good to have a dependable companion.

name: Augmenting Automaton
text: {1}{B}: Augmenting Automaton gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: When you have taught an automaton how to build others of its kind, it is a small step to make it build itself.

name: Implement of Combustion
text:
{R}, Sacrifice Implement of Combustion: It deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
When Implement of Combustion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: A dream of fire lies coiled inside, waiting for its glorious awakening.

name: Implement of Examination
text:
{U}, Sacrifice Implement of Examination: Draw a card.
When Implement of Examination is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: A tool to see the unseen.

name: Implement of Improvement
text:
{W}, Sacrifice Implement of Improvement: You gain 2 life.
When Implement of Improvement is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: A mystery in metal.

name: Lifecrafter's Bestiary
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"Inspiration is found by looking outward."
—Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

name: Merchant's Dockhand
text: {3}{U}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor:
"If you can build it, we can move it."
—Bes Tavani, Bomat merchant

name: Peacewalker Colossus
text:
{1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor:
"Peace? Its sole purpose is fear."
—Saheeli Rai

name: Verdant Automaton
text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Verdant Automaton.
flavor:
"A perfect fusion of nature and artifice."
—Irsi, Kujar gardener

name: Watchful Automaton
text: {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor:
"Before we can destroy our enemies, we must find them. We must peer into every wretched hovel and every teeming market."
—Baral, Chief of Compliance

name: Welder Automaton
text: {3}{R}: Welder Automaton deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: Most of the constructs the renegades used against the Consulate weren't originally intended for combat. But some didn't require much modification.

name: Inspiring Roar
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor:
"This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!"
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Ajani's Comrade
text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an Ajani planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Comrade.
flavor: "I will go where the lion-man leads."

name: Fey Steed
text:
Whenever Fey Steed attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
flavor: Ride into legend.

name: Holy Avenger
flavor: Divine light forged in steel.

name: Valiant Endeavor
text: Roll two d6 and choose one result. Destroy each creature with power greater than or equal to that result. Then create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the other result.
flavor: "Only victory shall stop our charge!"

name: Arcane Endeavor
text: Roll two d8 and choose one result. Draw cards equal to that result. Then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the other result from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor: Late at night, when dreams touch a studious mind, bouts of inspiration strike.

name: Netherese Puzzle-Ward
text:
Focus Beam — At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a d4. Scry X, where X is the result.
Perfect Illumination — Whenever you roll a die's highest natural result, draw a card.
flavor: Each configuration reveals a potential future.

name: Winged Boots
text:
Equipped creature has flying and ward {4}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)
Equip {1}
flavor: Get carried away.

name: Grave Endeavor
text: Roll two d10 and choose one result. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to that result. Then each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the other result.
flavor: Not alive, not dead, but definitely furious.

name: Hellish Rebuke
text: Until end of turn, permanents your opponents control gain "When this permanent deals damage to the player who cast Hellish Rebuke, sacrifice this permanent. You lose 2 life."
flavor: "Then we burn together!"

name: Fiendlash
flavor: A fiery scourge for both flesh and soul.

name: Maddening Hex
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player casts a noncreature spell, roll a d6. Maddening Hex deals damage to that player equal to the result. Then attach Maddening Hex to another one of your opponents chosen at random.
flavor: Much more painful than mere regret.

name: Reckless Endeavor
text: Roll two d12 and choose one result. Reckless Endeavor deals damage equal to that result to each creature. Then create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the other result.
flavor: Which burns more fiercely? Your ambition, or the flame?

name: Bag of Tricks
text: {4}{G}, {T}: Roll a d8. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card with mana value equal to the result. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: From fuzzy to ferocious in an instant.

name: Druid of Purification
text: When Druid of Purification enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player may choose an artifact or enchantment you don't control. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.
flavor: "Return to the earth and the wind."

name: Wild Endeavor
text: Roll two d4 and choose one result. Create a number of 3/3 green Beast creature tokens equal to that result. Then search your library for a number of basic land cards equal to the other result, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: The wilds consume, but they also create.

name: Angel of Finality
text:
Flying
When Angel of Finality enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.
flavor: "Better the dead depart utterly than be enslaved."

name: Angelic Gift
text:
Enchant creature
When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."

name: Ronom Unicorn
text: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

name: Sun Titan
text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.

name: Sunblast Angel
text:
Flying
When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.
flavor: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

name: Winds of Rath
text: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Curator of Mysteries
text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard another card, scry 1.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: To consult a sphinx is a test in patience. Perhaps that's the point.

name: Curse of Verbosity
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
flavor: Idle chatter beckons many an attentive ear.

name: Imprisoned in the Moon
text:
Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.
flavor: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.

name: Propaganda
text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
flavor:
"The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits."
—Nekusar, the Mindrazer

name: Riverwise Augur
text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."

name: Serum Visions
text: Draw a card. Scry 2.
flavor: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.

name: Hex
text: Destroy six target creatures.
flavor: When killing five just isn't enough.

name: Necromantic Selection
text: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.
flavor: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.

name: Ogre Slumlord
text:
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
Rats you control have deathtouch.
flavor:
"His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."
—Branko One-Ear

name: Piper of the Swarm
text:
Rats you control have menace.
{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.
flavor: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."

name: Plaguecrafter
text: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
flavor: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

name: Reassembling Skeleton
text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Victimize
text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Anger
text:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
flavor:
"Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Apex of Power
text:
Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.
If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.
flavor:
"As I desire, so it shall be."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Chain Reaction
text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
flavor:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Commune with Lava
text: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.

name: Demanding Dragon
text:
Flying
When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

name: Disrupt Decorum
text: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
flavor: Dinner and politics don't mix.

name: Dragonlord's Servant
text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Dragonmaster Outcast
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

name: Dream Pillager
text:
Flying
Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
flavor: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.

name: Etali, Primal Storm
text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
flavor: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Gratuitous Violence
text: If a creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor: What was supposed to be a quiet time in town turned into an adventure of its own.

name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
text:
Flying
{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's mana value.
flavor: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

name: Light Up the Stage
text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor:
"Places, everyone!"
—Judith

name: Loyal Apprentice
text:
Haste
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: Those with knowledge are wise to listen to those with imagination.

name: Magmaquake
text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.
flavor:
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
—Nicol Bolas

name: Rile
text:
Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

name: Taurean Mauler
text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.
flavor: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

name: Terror of Mount Velus
text:
Flying, double strike
When Terror of Mount Velus enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.
flavor: The forge of Purphoros burns in the heart of Mount Velus, attracting dragons with its blistering heat.

name: Thunderbreak Regent
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, Thunderbreak Regent deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor: Attracting a dragon's attention may be the last mistake you make.

name: Vandalblast
text:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.

name: Acidic Slime
text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
flavor: It fears no sword and leaves no bones behind.

name: Beast Within
text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Colossal Majesty
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
flavor:
"Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them."
—Inti, Sun Empire knight

name: Paradise Druid
text:
Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."

name: Return of the Wildspeaker
text:
Choose one —
• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control.
• Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "The curse is broken."

name: Return to Nature
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Thriving Grove
text:
Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.

name: Thriving Heath
text:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

name: Thriving Isle
text:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

name: Thriving Moor
text:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

name: +2 Mace
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor: The weight of this magic weapon falls heavy on the wicked.

name: Arborea Pegasus
text:
Flying
When Arborea Pegasus enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: The noble steeds of the elven gods can sometimes be persuaded to allow mere mortals on their backs.

name: Blink Dog
text:
Double strike
Teleport — {3}{W}: Blink Dog phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)
flavor: Blink dogs protect the wild places of the world, driving away evil influences.

name: Celestial Unicorn
text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Celestial Unicorn.
flavor: When all hope fails, its light remains.

name: Delver's Torch
text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor: "Not all of us have darkvision, okay?"

name: Devoted Paladin
text: Beacon of Hope — When Devoted Paladin enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: "I swore a sacred oath to protect the weak and punish those who threaten them. As long as I draw breath, I will protect you."

name: Divine Smite
text: Target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls phases out. If that permanent is black, exile it instead. (If it phases out, treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)
flavor: "When darkness closes in around us, my blade will light our path."

name: Dwarfhold Champion
text: As long as Dwarfhold Champion is equipped, it gets +0/+2.
flavor: Courage is neither a shield nor an axe, but the will to wield both in defense of the innocent.

name: Flumph
text:
Defender, flying
Whenever Flumph is dealt damage, you and target opponent each draw a card.
flavor: Flumphs siphon thoughts and energy from evil aberrations, and are often eager to share the dark knowledge they obtain with friendly adventurers.

name: Gloom Stalker
text: As long as you've completed a dungeon, Gloom Stalker has double strike.
flavor: "I'll make sure you never mistake a roper for a stalagmite again."

name: Half-Elf Monk
text:
Vigilance
Stunning Strike — {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: This fight was over the moment you picked up that clumsy cleaver of a sword.

name: Keen-Eared Sentry
text:
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Each opponent can't venture into the dungeon more than once each turn.
flavor: "You're not the first to underestimate me."

name: Loyal Warhound
text:
Vigilance
When Loyal Warhound enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: A paladin's steed is a celestial spirit in animal form.

name: Monk of the Open Hand
text: Flurry of Blows — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Monk of the Open Hand.
flavor: His mind is a tranquil meadow, his fists a raging storm.

name: Moon-Blessed Cleric
text: Divine Intervention — When Moon-Blessed Cleric enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor: Selûne guides her devotees with majestic wisdom and grace.

name: Oswald Fiddlebender
text: Magical Tinkering — {W}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed artifact's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "Can't see this airship crashing in the near future. Sturdy as a rock."

name: Planar Ally
text:
Flying
Whenever Planar Ally attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: Her light touches every corner and her wings brush either wall, leaving no place for evil to lurk.

name: Portable Hole
text: When Portable Hole enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less until Portable Hole leaves the battlefield.
flavor: "They fall for it every time."

name: Potion of Healing
text:
When Potion of Healing enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Healing: You gain 3 life.
flavor: Magic can knit the body back together, but the courage to fight on comes only from within.

name: Priest of Ancient Lore
text: When Priest of Ancient Lore enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor: "We are a product of our ancestors, the apotheosis of countless noble generations. Speak their names with reverence, and they will guide your path."

name: Rally Maneuver
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Up to one other target creature gets +0/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: "Don't give up! You are steel and fire, and victory is yours to seize."

name: Ranger's Hawk
text:
Flying
{3}, {T}, Tap another untapped creature you control: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: Swift eyes to scout the way ahead.

name: Steadfast Paladin
text: Lifelink
flavor: "When I made my oath to Moradin, I left selfishness and cowardice behind. Every battle, I make that commitment anew."

name: Teleportation Circle
text: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor:
"Hold on to your lunch!"
—Bartleby, gnome wizard

name: Veteran Dungeoneer
text: When Veteran Dungeoneer enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: Her tales of glory light a fire in the souls of the next generation of adventurers.

name: White Dragon
text:
Flying
Cold Breath — When White Dragon enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: White dragons are unparalleled hunters, keenly focused on slaughtering their enemies.

name: You're Ambushed on the Road
text:
Choose one —
• Make a Retreat — Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
• Stand and Fight — Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "Hand over your loot and no one gets hurt!"

name: Air-Cult Elemental
text:
Flying
Whirlwind — When Air-Cult Elemental enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: Elemental Evil distorts the natural elements, limiting them to aspects of destruction.

name: Bar the Gate
text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: "This path is closed to you!"

name: Clever Conjurer
text: Mage Hand — {T}: Untap target permanent not named Clever Conjurer. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "I'm always happy to lend a hand!"

name: Displacer Beast
text:
When Displacer Beast enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Displacement — {3}{U}: Return Displacer Beast to its owner's hand.
flavor: The only place you can be sure it's not is wherever it appears to be.

name: Feywild Trickster
text: Whenever you roll one or more dice, create a 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor: Unlike most warlocks, those who make pacts with archfey are drawn to pranks and whimsy moreso than death and darkness.

name: Grazilaxx, Illithid Scholar
text:
Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, you may return it to its owner's hand.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: "You studied hard. How delicious!"

name: Guild Thief
text:
Whenever Guild Thief deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Cunning Action — {3}{U}: Guild Thief can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: She puts some coin in the Guild's pocket and sends a message at the same time.

name: Mind Flayer
text: Dominate Monster — When Mind Flayer enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as you control Mind Flayer.
flavor: "Shed your thoughts and let my will flow through you."

name: Mordenkainen's Polymorph
text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying. (It loses all other creature types.)
flavor: "Your purpose may change along with your shape, but you will serve regardless."

name: Pixie Guide
text:
Flying
Grant an Advantage — If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.
flavor: Pixies are well known as pranksters, but some delight in more helpful magic.

name: Rimeshield Frost Giant
text: Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)
flavor: Frost giants carry the trophies of their greatest victories into battle, fashioned into armor of strength and savage beauty.

name: Secret Door
text:
Defender
{4}{U}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: The way opened before him, and the dust of centuries stirred in the air.

name: Shocking Grasp
text:
Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Metal armor? A poor choice."

name: Shortcut Seeker
text: Whenever Shortcut Seeker deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: "Ah, the old 'trap door under a rug' trick. This is almost too easy."

name: Silver Raven
text:
Flying
When Silver Raven enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Wings take flight on whispered wind.

name: Soulknife Spy
text: Whenever Soulknife Spy deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: "My psychic blade cuts the mind and severs thoughts. Even if you survive, you'll never remember I was here."

name: Split the Party
text: Choose target player. Return half the creatures they control to their owner's hand, rounded up.
flavor: Don't.

name: Sudden Insight
text: Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland cards in your graveyard.
flavor: A lucky draw from the Deck of Many Things gave Voltusk an inexplicable flash of understanding that he spent the rest of his life trying to repeat.

name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
text: Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until that player has exiled cards with total mana value 20 or more.
flavor: The raging behir reared back, opened its terrible maw . . . and collapsed in a fit of horrifying giggles.

name: Trickster's Talisman
text:
Invoke Duplicity — Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice Trickster's Talisman. If you do, create a token that's a copy of this creature."
Equip {2}
flavor: "Lady Luck, smile on me!"

name: True Polymorph
text: Target artifact or creature becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature.
flavor: Maybe a little *too* convincing.

name: You Find the Villains' Lair
text:
Choose one —
• Foil Their Scheme — Counter target spell.
• Learn Their Secrets — Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
flavor: "Give me just a moment! I almost have it."

name: You See a Guard Approach
text:
Choose one —
• Distract the Guard — Tap target creature.
• Hide — Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: "Looks like we've got company."

name: Yuan-Ti Malison
text:
Yuan-Ti Malison can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.
Whenever Yuan-Ti Malison deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: Silent. Slithering. Sinister.

name: Black Dragon
text:
Flying
Acid Breath — When Black Dragon enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Black dragons revel in the collapse of humanoid kingdoms.

name: Check for Traps
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. If an instant card or a card with flash is exiled this way, they lose 1 life. Otherwise, you lose 1 life.
flavor: "Relax. I'm a professional."

name: Clattering Skeletons
text: When Clattering Skeletons dies, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: Those who die in the dungeon become its guardians.

name: Deadly Dispute
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it."

name: Death-Priest of Myrkul
text:
Skeletons, Vampires, and Zombies you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
flavor: "The Reaper bids you rise!"

name: A-Death-Priest of Myrkul
text:
Skeletons, Vampires, and Zombies you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
flavor: "The Reaper bids you rise!"

name: Demogorgon's Clutches
text: Target opponent discards two cards, mills two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: The good will be corrupted, the kind will be devoured, and all will be dragged into the bottomless Abyss.

name: Devour Intellect
text: Target opponent discards a card. If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, instead that player reveals their hand, you choose a nonland card from it, then that player discards that card.
flavor:
"I'll know what you know soon enough."
—Nihiloor, Xanathar Guild spymaster

name: Drider
text:
Reach
Whenever Drider deals combat damage to a player, create a 2/1 black Spider creature token with menace and reach.
flavor: Though their forms embody Lolth's image, driders are those unfortunate drow who have failed the Spider Queen.

name: Dungeon Crawler
text:
Dungeon Crawler enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever you complete a dungeon, you may return Dungeon Crawler from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"I think of it as giving them another chance to achieve their potential."
—Nestus Wrasse, necromancer

name: Eyes of the Beholder
text: Target creature gets -11/-11 until end of turn.
flavor: In the end, there was nothing beautiful to be seen.

name: Fates' Reversal
text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: A doom denied—or, perhaps, delayed.

name: A-Fates' Reversal
text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: A doom denied—or, perhaps, delayed.

name: Feign Death
text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
flavor: A drastic measure for dangerous times.

name: Grim Bounty
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Freed from the need to pay tribute to the dragon, the villages gladly paid the dragon-slayers instead.

name: Grim Wanderer
text:
Flash
Tragic Backstory — Cast this spell only if a creature died this turn.
flavor: There is a stillness that walks with him, the quiet that follows great tragedy, when even the mourners are too exhausted to weep.

name: Hired Hexblade
text: When Hired Hexblade enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: "I'll take care of it. You just be sure to hold up your end of the deal."

name: Hoard Robber
text: Whenever Hoard Robber deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "And to think, a year ago I was picking pockets in Waterdeep."

name: Power Word Kill
text: Destroy target non-Angel, non-Demon, non-Devil, non-Dragon creature.
flavor: Aramil issued a long, heroic challenge, then the lich felled him with a single word.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
text: Target creature gets -4/-1 until end of turn. If that creature is white, it gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.
flavor: Erigan cried out in pain as a hideous weakness settled into his bones.

name: Sepulcher Ghoul
text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: Ghouls devour the dead and any living creatures unwary enough to fall into their grasp.

name: A-Sepulcher Ghoul
text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: Ghouls devour the dead and any living creatures unwary enough to fall into their grasp.

name: Skullport Merchant
text:
When Skullport Merchant enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or a Treasure: Draw a card.
flavor: "Buy something or get out."

name: Vampire Spawn
text: When Vampire Spawn enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: Unsuccessful vampire hunters often wind up as ravenous spawn.

name: Wight
text:
Wight enters the battlefield tapped.
Life Drain — Whenever a creature dealt damage by Wight this turn dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token and exile that card.
flavor: Wights want the world to resound with echoes of their own cruel hatred.

name: Yuan-Ti Fang-Blade
text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Yuan-Ti Fang-Blade deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: "The air is sweet with the taste of your fear."

name: Zombie Ogre
text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor:
"On the plus side, Throg no longer thinks he's clever."
—Xanathar

name: Armory Veteran
text: As long as Armory Veteran is equipped, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: "This one is for goblins, this one is for owlbears, this one is for toast, this one is for . . ."

name: Boots of Speed
text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor: Click your heels and become the wind.

name: Brazen Dwarf
text: Whenever you roll one or more dice, Brazen Dwarf deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: "My grandmother saved the life of a brass dragon, and in return she was given a glimpse of the fire in its heart—a glimpse she passed down to me."

name: Burning Hands
text: Burning Hands deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent is green, Burning Hands deals 6 damage instead.
flavor: A simple fire spell that grows in intensity along with its caster.

name: Critical Hit
text:
Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
When you roll a natural 20, return Critical Hit from your graveyard to your hand. (A natural 20 is a roll that displays 20 on the die.)
flavor: "How do you kill what's already dead? *That's* how."

name: Goblin Javelineer
text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Javelineer becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.
flavor: Hate gets you only so far. A pointy stick can close the rest of the distance.

name: Hobgoblin Bandit Lord
text:
Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.
{R}, {T}: Hobgoblin Bandit Lord deals damage equal to the number of Goblins that entered the battlefield under your control this turn to any target.
flavor: In a hobgoblin's view of the world, the weak owe tribute and fealty to the strong.

name: Hobgoblin Captain
text: Pack tactics — Whenever Hobgoblin Captain attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, Hobgoblin Captain gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: Hobgoblins do not fear death, for those who fall in battle have gained glory eternal.

name: Hulking Bugbear
text: Haste
flavor: Bugbears move with surprising speed for their size and bulk, a fact that has led to the demise of many unwary adventurers.

name: Improvised Weaponry
text: Improvised Weaponry deals 2 damage to any target. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Anything can be a weapon if you swing it hard enough.

name: Inferno of the Star Mounts
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying, haste
{R}: Inferno of the Star Mounts gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When its power becomes 20 this way, it deals 20 damage to any target.
flavor: The ancient dragon Imvaernarhro has earned his fiery nickname.

name: Jaded Sell-Sword
text: When Jaded Sell-Sword enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, it gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavor: "Today? That'll cost you extra."

name: Kick in the Door
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked by Walls this turn. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor:
"We tried your way. Now we do it my way!"
—Jym, barbarian of Baldur's Gate

name: Magic Missile
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Magic Missile deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor: A tried-and-true favorite of many wizards, whatever their school.

name: Meteor Swarm
text: Meteor Swarm deals 8 damage divided as you choose among X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
flavor: Sometimes one fireball isn't enough.

name: Price of Loyalty
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, that creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Most folks got mayhem in their hearts. Just gotta know their price."

name: Red Dragon
text:
Flying
Fire Breath — When Red Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each opponent.
flavor: Red dragons consider the world and every creature in it as theirs to command.

name: Rust Monster
text:
First strike
Sacrifice an artifact: Rust Monster gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"They don't seem scary, but then you're suddenly standing there in your underclothes without a weapon. Then everything looks like a threat."
—Jarro, battle master

name: Unexpected Windfall
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Fortune favors the fortunate.

name: Valor Singer
text: Combat Inspiration — At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "There is only one way forward: into legend."

name: Wish
text: You may play a card you own from outside the game this turn.
flavor:
"If you had just one wish, what would it be? Gold, or angel song? Finding a lost love, or finding your way back home? Let me sing a song about one wish that came true . . ."
—Ellywick Tumblestrum

name: Xorn
text: If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional Treasure token.
flavor: Xorns are native to the Elemental Plane of Earth, where gems and rare stones are plentiful. When summoned elsewhere they can be quite destructive in search of food.

name: You Come to the Gnoll Camp
text:
Choose one —
• Intimidate Them — Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
• Fend Them Off — Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Easy now, everyone. I'll take care of this."
—Nadaar

name: You See a Pair of Goblins
text:
Choose one —
• Charge Them — Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Befriend Them — Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor:
"I have the shot. Shall I take it?"
—Varis, Silverymoon ranger

name: Zalto, Fire Giant Duke
text:
Trample
Whenever Zalto, Fire Giant Duke is dealt damage, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: Fire giants love to fight on a large scale, and Duke Zalto is one of the greatest warmongers of his age.

name: Bulette
text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Bulette.
flavor: Capable of moving swiftly through even tightly-packed earth and leaping surprising distances above ground, bulettes are difficult to escape once they've caught scent of prey.

name: Bull's Strength
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor: As the iron bars of the portcullis parted like reeds, the defenders of the keep suddenly felt much less secure.

name: Choose Your Weapon
text:
Choose one —
• Two-Weapon Fighting — Double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
• Archery — This spell deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor:
"Move it, Varis, or I'll pick one for you!"
—Ellywick Tumblestrum

name: Circle of Dreams Druid
text: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.
flavor: The realms protected by druids of the Circle of Dreams are gleaming, fruitful places, where dream and reality blur together and the weary can find rest.

name: Circle of the Moon Druid
text: Bear Form — As long as it's your turn, Circle of the Moon Druid is a Bear with base power and toughness 4/2. (It loses all other creature types.)
flavor: Druids of the Circle of the Moon are fierce guardians of nature who haunt the deepest parts of the wilderness.

name: Compelled Duel
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor: "You might be four times my size, but I will not be ignored!"

name: Dire Wolf Prowler
text: {1}{G}: Dire Wolf Prowler gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: Large as horses, dire wolves must hunt often to satisfy thier ravenous hunger. A mere human does little more than blunt their appetite.

name: Elturgard Ranger
text:
Reach
When Elturgard Ranger enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor: Since the fall of Elturel, they've walked the Sword Coast from Tethyr to Icewind Dale, eyes always on their prey.

name: Gnoll Hunter
text: Pack tactics — Whenever Gnoll Hunter attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, put a +1/+1 counter on Gnoll Hunter.
flavor: Yipping and cackling, the hunters tore through the village, leaving nothing but snapped bones and burning homes in their wake.

name: Green Dragon
text:
Flying
Poison Breath — When Green Dragon enters the battlefield, until end of turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt damage, destroy it.
flavor: Green dragons take special pleasure in corrupting the good-hearted.

name: Hill Giant Herdgorger
text: When Hill Giant Herdgorger enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: A shepherd's crook is useful for cleaning bits of wool out of the teeth.

name: Inspiring Bard
text:
When Inspiring Bard enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Bardic Inspiration — Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Song of Rest — You gain 3 life.
flavor: "Wake up, my friends! There are deeds to be done and treasures to be won!"

name: Long Rest
text: Return X target cards with different mana values from your graveyard to your hand. If eight or more cards were returned to your hand this way, your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Exile Long Rest.
flavor: A job well done means a rest well earned.

name: Lurking Roper
text:
Lurking Roper doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap Lurking Roper.
flavor: "You see, stalac-*tites* grow down from the ceiling, while stalag-*mites* reach—AAHHHHHHHHH—"

name: Neverwinter Dryad
text: {2}, Sacrifice Neverwinter Dryad: Search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Its life force entwined with its tree, a dryad is an elusive and solitary being that wishes only to be left alone.

name: Old Gnawbone
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create that many Treasure tokens.
flavor: The ancient green dragon Claugiyliamatar is often seen with a mangled corpse dangling from her mouth.

name: Owlbear
text:
Trample
Keen Senses — When Owlbear enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Many people believe a misguided wizard created the first owlbear, but others insist that these creatures have always dwelled in the Feywild.

name: Purple Worm
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if a creature died this turn.
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavor: Underground civilizations maintain magical barriers around their settlements to deter these monsters.

name: Ranger's Longbow
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has reach.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor: With the right weapon, a fearsome beholder is nothing more than a big floating bullseye.

name: Scaled Herbalist
text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: "I could help you, or I could eat you for lunch. I haven't decided yet."

name: Spoils of the Hunt
text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each mana from a Treasure that was spent to cast this spell. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "Every coin helps rebuild the town they destroyed."

name: The Tarrasque
text:
The Tarrasque has haste and ward {10} as long as it was cast.
Whenever The Tarrasque attacks, it fights target creature defending player controls.
flavor: When it rises, nations fall.

name: Underdark Basilisk
text: Deathtouch
flavor:
"See how the statues all have chunks bitten out of them? We're dealing with a basilisk, or I'm a froghemoth."
—Larissa Kyriln, learned warlock

name: Wandering Troubadour
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor: "There's a new ballad waiting to be born around every corner."

name: Plains
flavor: You've traced the tensions in Ten-Towns to the dwindling reindeer populations ... but what has been hunting them?

name: Island
flavor: In crystal-studded waters far below the surface, you've discovered an incubating egg of mysterious origin.

name: Swamp
flavor: As a plague ravages the world above, you've made your way into the Underdark in search of a fungal panacea.

name: Mountain
flavor: You meant to simply rest in Hundelstone, but the miners have told you stories of whispers in the dark below.

name: Forest
flavor: As the sun reaches its zenith on the day of the solstice, a castle shimmers into view on the hilltop, just as the ancient text predicted.

name: Scorching Dragonfire
text: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: As the blaze raced towards her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.

name: Anointed Procession
text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
flavor:
"The gods here may walk among the people, but they are not with them."
—Gideon Jura

name: Aven Mindcensor
text:
Flash
Flying
If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.
flavor: "The only question we need to ask is how best to fulfill the will of the God-Pharaoh."

name: Binding Mummy
text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may tap target artifact or creature.
flavor: What the gods decree, the mummies enforce.

name: Compulsory Rest
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Enchanted creature has "{2}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 2 life."
flavor: The pain of death is nothing compared to the pain of failure.

name: Djeru's Resolve
text:
Untap target creature. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "When I wish to be strong, I train. When I wish to be wise, I study. When I wish to rest, I start again."

name: Fan Bearer
text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: Rest sometimes requires the right prompting.

name: Forsake the Worldly
text:
Exile target artifact or enchantment.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "Why cling to these trappings? They are but tools and affectations. True wealth can be possessed only in the afterlife."

name: Glory-Bound Initiate
text: You may exert Glory-Bound Initiate as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+3 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor:
"Fly as an arrow through the trials, and never waver in your course."
—Oketra, god of solidarity

name: Gust Walker
text: You may exert Gust Walker as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "I'm never unarmed."

name: Impeccable Timing
text: Impeccable Timing deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: To a trained warrior, there is scarcely a more potent weapon than patience.

name: In Oketra's Name
text: Zombies you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"A single grain of sand is insignificant, but a sandstorm can reduce pyramids to dust. Stand with your crop. Become the storm."
—Oketra, god of solidarity

name: Mighty Leap
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

name: Protection of the Hekma
text: If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
flavor: Part of the acolytes' training is to walk along the Hekma, staring out at the ravenous horrors kept at bay by the God-Pharaoh's barrier.

name: Regal Caracal
text:
Other Cats you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.
When Regal Caracal enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor: Oketra's closest viziers are known as her chosen, though others may have a better claim to that moniker.

name: Rhet-Crop Spearmaster
text: You may exert Rhet-Crop Spearmaster as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "In the afterlife, I'll have no need of sleep. And until then, I have no time for it!"

name: Seraph of the Suns
text:
Flying
Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)
flavor:
"Angels? My feelings remain unchanged."
—Liliana Vess

name: Sparring Mummy
text: When Sparring Mummy enters the battlefield, untap target creature.
flavor: Aspiring to earn their place in the afterlife, acolytes train every day against those who fell short of that glory.

name: Supply Caravan
text: When Supply Caravan enters the battlefield, if you control a tapped creature, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.
flavor:
"We each have a weight to carry on the road to the afterlife."
—Oketra, god of solidarity

name: Those Who Serve
flavor:
"The dead perform all the work here—farming, building, teaching, even embalming their fellow mummies. The living need do nothing but train. What system could be more perfect?"
—Temmet, vizier of Naktamun

name: Time to Reflect
text: Exile target creature that blocked or was blocked by a Zombie this turn.
flavor:
"Occasionally, there are those who refuse to appreciate all that the God-Pharaoh provides for us."
—Temmet, vizier of Naktamun

name: Trial of Solidarity
text:
When Trial of Solidarity enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Solidarity to its owner's hand.
flavor: "You will succeed as one or fail as many."

name: Vizier of Remedies
text: If one or more -1/-1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many -1/-1 counters minus one are put on it instead.
flavor: "You'll need all your strength for the trials to come."

name: Winged Shepherd
text:
Flying, vigilance
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"When the Hour of Promise arrives, the God-Pharaoh will tear down the Hekma, for its protection will be needed no longer."
—*The Accounting of Hours*

name: Ancient Crab
flavor: The banks of the Luxa River attract all manner of predator but only the most resilient of prey.

name: Angler Drake
text:
Flying
When Angler Drake enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: From the time they are hatchlings, river drakes are taught to pull the largest prey from the Luxa.

name: Cancel
text: Counter target spell.
flavor: "Let me try one of Kefnet's puzzles. This one was too easy."

name: Cartouche of Knowledge
text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Knowledge enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor: Cartouches chronicle the initiates' achievements in the trials.

name: Censor
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Why so many questions?"
—Temmet, vizier of Naktamun

name: Compelling Argument
text:
Target player mills five cards.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"How can there be doubt in the presence of such blessings?"
—Ukhat, vizier of initiation

name: Cryptic Serpent
text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
flavor: It slithers through the senses, constricting consciousness and poisoning perceptions.

name: Decision Paralysis
text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
flavor:
"Eyes see only what is possible. A trained mind can explore the impossible."
—Kefnet, god of knowledge

name: Drake Haven
text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
flavor:
"If you want to truly test your survival skills, walk the Obelisk Path when the drakes are feeding."
—Etha, initiate of Rhet crop

name: Essence Scatter
text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

name: Floodwaters
text:
Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"It usually appears placid, but don't be fooled. The Luxa River is a snake, and it can swallow you whole."
—Neponem, vizier of Kefnet

name: Galestrike
text:
Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor: Strong wings make strong winds.

name: Hekma Sentinels
text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Hekma Sentinels gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The God-Pharaoh created the Hekma to protect us from the horrors beyond and to surround us in his love."

name: Hieroglyphic Illumination
text:
Draw two cards.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "The answers are here. This is the way through the trial."

name: Illusory Wrappings
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/2.
flavor:
"No amount of strength can help you overcome my trial. You must be ready to forgo your body and favor your mind."
—Kefnet, god of knowledge

name: Lay Claim
text:
Enchant permanent
You control enchanted permanent.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Initiates need worry only about the trials. Everything else is in the hands of the gods.

name: Naga Oracle
text: When Naga Oracle enters the battlefield, surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor: "All questions will be answered during the Hour of Revelation."

name: New Perspectives
text:
When New Perspectives enters the battlefield, draw three cards.
As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, you may pay {0} rather than pay cycling costs.
flavor: Understanding is a matter of perspective.

name: Open into Wonder
text: X target creatures can't be blocked this turn. Until end of turn, those creatures gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."
flavor: The one thing the Gatewatch didn't expect to find on a plane ruled by Nicol Bolas was perfection.

name: River Serpent
text:
River Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more cards in your graveyard.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Though the Luxa River brings life to Naktamun, it's not without dangers.

name: Sacred Excavation
text: Return up to two target cards with cycling from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The anointed work the mines without pause, their cartouches instilling them with tireless purpose.

name: Scribe of the Mindful
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Scribe of the Mindful: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"The best answers solve more than one riddle."
—Kefnet, god of knowledge

name: Seeker of Insight
text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Activate only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.
flavor: The Trial of Knowledge challenges and broadens the minds of initiates.

name: Shimmerscale Drake
text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: They are drawn by the brilliant blue glint of the mineral lazotep from the mines below.

name: Slither Blade
text: Slither Blade can't be blocked.
flavor: Some naga initiates move as silently the suns' reflections on the water.

name: Tah-Crop Skirmisher
text: Embalm {3}{U} ({3}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie Naga Warrior with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)
flavor: Initiates live and train with their crop, the unit that begins the trials together.

name: Vizier of Tumbling Sands
text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Vizier of Tumbling Sands, untap target permanent.
flavor: "Time is like the Luxa River—though it flows in one direction, it can be diverted."

name: Winds of Rebuke
text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Each player mills two cards.
flavor: "I have foreseen that you will not pass my trial."

name: Zenith Seeker
text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Only from the sky can one fully understand the horrors of the wastes and the wonder of the Hekma's protection.

name: Baleful Ammit
text:
Lifelink
When Baleful Ammit enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor:
"Not all in our crop deserve the afterlife. We must leave the unworthy behind, Samut."
—Djeru, initiate of Tah crop

name: Blighted Bat
text:
Flying
{1}: Blighted Bat gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: Amonkhet's dual suns don't allow for the darkness of night, so bats are most active under the gloom of the frequent sandstorms.

name: Cruel Reality
text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If the player can't, they lose 5 life.
flavor: As Gideon watched the initiate murder his crop-mate, his admiration of the city of Naktamun gave way to horror.

name: Cursed Minotaur
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"Look! That is why we must never waver. That is what awaits us if we fail."
—Djeru, initiate of Tah crop

name: Doomed Dissenter
text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

name: Dune Beetle
flavor: The scouring sands of Shefet polish its carapace, and the ranks of the cursed fill its belly.

name: Faith of the Devoted
text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"The more I see of this place, the less I want to."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Festering Mummy
text: When Festering Mummy dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor: As its parched flesh withers away, its malignant hunger grows.

name: Final Reward
text: Exile target creature.
flavor: Those who earn a glorious death are given the highest honor. They are carried on funeral barges through the gate to the afterlife.

name: Grim Strider
text: Grim Strider gets -1/-1 for each card in your hand.
flavor:
"As a child I saw something walking in the distance, far beyond the Hekma—shadow-dark, and taller than the gods. Even now, it passes through my dreams."
—Pytamun, initiate of Nef crop

name: Lay Bare the Heart
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonlegendary, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor:
"True intentions lie not in the head but in the heart."
—Bontu, god of ambition

name: Liliana's Mastery
text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."

name: Lord of the Accursed
text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.
flavor: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

name: Miasmic Mummy
text: When Miasmic Mummy enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
flavor: Its breath doesn't assault the senses. It pollutes the mind.

name: Nest of Scarabs
text: Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, create that many 1/1 black Insect creature tokens.
flavor:
"They are small, but they always want more. Learn from them."
—Bontu, god of ambition

name: Painful Lesson
text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor:
"You wish to remember this lesson? I will write it down for you."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Ruthless Sniper
text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "You may feel a slight sting."

name: Scarab Feast
text:
Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"The face of mediocrity is wrapped in anointed linen. Aspire to a better end."
—Epnokep, vizier of Bontu

name: Shadow of the Grave
text: Return to your hand all cards in your graveyard that you cycled or discarded this turn.
flavor:
"Death has seeped into every part of this plane. I can feel it on my skin and taste it like sand in my mouth."
—Nissa Revane

name: Splendid Agony
text: Distribute two -1/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.
flavor:
"Wherever you are in the city, you can feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh. Take comfort in that."
—Ukhat, vizier of initiation

name: Trespasser's Curse
text:
Enchant player
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Even in the relative safety of the city, there are places best left undisturbed.

name: Unburden
text:
Target player discards two cards.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Ambition requires clarity. If you have any doubts, they must be abandoned."
—Bontu, god of ambition

name: Wander in Death
text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Forever restless. Forever growing in number.

name: Wasteland Scorpion
text:
Deathtouch
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: All but the gods fear the scorpion's sting.

name: Ahn-Crop Crasher
text:
Haste
You may exert Ahn-Crop Crasher as it attacks. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor:
"Hesitation breeds dissension. To be worthy of the next life, you must never look back."
—Anep, vizier of Hazoret

name: Blazing Volley
text: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
flavor: The arrows fell like fiery rain, and for a moment, the sky itself seemed to burn.

name: Bloodlust Inciter
text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Bloodrage Brawler
text: When Bloodrage Brawler enters the battlefield, discard a card.

name: Brute Strength
text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: "Oketra had our crop build an obelisk to prove the power of working together. But I am stronger without the weak."

name: By Force
text: Destroy X target artifacts.
flavor:
"Dissent? Your gods can't even begin to comprehend the dissent that's about to happen here!"
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Cartouche of Zeal
text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Zeal enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
flavor: The fifth cartouche is the final affirmation of glory, granted only to the worthy dead.

name: Consuming Fervor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on this creature."
flavor: Headlong is the only way to pass through the gate to the afterlife.

name: Desert Cerodon
text: Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The endless expanse of desert surrounding Naktamun sometimes yields threats that the gods themselves must answer.

name: Electrify
text: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."

name: Emberhorn Minotaur
text: You may exert Emberhorn Minotaur as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "My stride will break only against the twin points of Hazoret's spear."

name: Flameblade Adept
text:
Menace
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Flameblade Adept gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Allow zealous flames to light your path and the glory you seek will be revealed."
—Hazoret, god of zeal

name: Fling
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor: Never flinch. Never falter. Never fear.

name: Glorybringer
text:
Flying, haste
You may exert Glorybringer as it attacks. When you do, it deals 4 damage to target non-Dragon creature an opponent controls. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: What the initiates face in the final trial is completely at Hazoret's discretion.

name: Harsh Mentor
text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of an artifact, creature, or land on the battlefield, if it isn't a mana ability, Harsh Mentor deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: "Fight through it."

name: Hazoret's Favor
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Hazoret's gift is bestowed only once.

name: Hyena Pack
flavor: With carrion a rarity in the Broken Lands, the hyenas that stalk the deserts hunt in packs.

name: Limits of Solidarity
text:
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"When the time comes, only one of you will be honored by my spear."
—Hazoret, god of zeal

name: Magma Spray
text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Ashes can't be embalmed."
—Neheb, initiate of Ahn crop

name: Manticore of the Gauntlet
text: When Manticore of the Gauntlet enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control. Manticore of the Gauntlet deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor: In the training ground known as the Gauntlet, initiates are pushed to practice more destructive techniques.

name: Minotaur Sureshot
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{R}: Minotaur Sureshot gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Those wings are no advantage. I will pin them to the ceiling of the Hekma."

name: Nef-Crop Entangler
text:
Trample
You may exert Nef-Crop Entangler as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+2 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "If you do not feel the thrill of battle, alive like a flame, you will never triumph."

name: Nimble-Blade Khenra
text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor:
"In the Hour of Glory, the gods and the untested will prove their worth before the God-Pharaoh."
—*The Accounting of Hours*

name: Pathmaker Initiate
text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "The expected way through the trial is far too tedious."

name: Pursue Glory
text:
Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Combat is a form of worship, the clash of steel a solemn prayer."
—Pytamun, initiate of Nef crop

name: Sweltering Suns
text:
Sweltering Suns deals 3 damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The Hekma may repel storms and monsters, but nothing holds back the heat of the suns.

name: Tormenting Voice
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor: "You are undeserving of the afterlife. You will never feel the God-Pharaoh's embrace."

name: Trial of Zeal
text:
When Trial of Zeal enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Zeal to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Eternal glory awaits you, my child."

name: Trueheart Twins
text:
You may exert Trueheart Twins as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever you exert a creature, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Shoulder to shoulder until blade must turn against blade.

name: Violent Impact
text:
Destroy target artifact or land.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Initiates in the heat of combat must be able to adapt to changing conditions.

name: Warfire Javelineer
text: When Warfire Javelineer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

name: Benefaction of Rhonas
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or an enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

name: Bitterblade Warrior
text: You may exert Bitterblade Warrior as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
