name: Champion of Rhonas
text: You may exert Champion of Rhonas as it attacks. When you do, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: The only way to finish the Trial of Strength is with a basilisk scale in hand.

name: Colossapede
flavor:
"If it is bigger, you must be faster. If it is stronger, you must be sharper. Anything less, and you will never seize a place in our God-Pharaoh's perfect afterlife."
—Rhonas, god of strength

name: Crocodile of the Crossing
text:
Haste
When Crocodile of the Crossing enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor:
"Everything in the trial has teeth. You will overcome them, or you will feed them."
—Rhonas, god of strength

name: Dissenter's Deliverance
text:
Destroy target artifact.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"When all doubts have melted away, the worthy will meet the Hour of Eternity and earn a place at the God-Pharaoh's side."
—*The Accounting of Hours*

name: Exemplar of Strength
text:
When Exemplar of Strength enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature you control.
Whenever Exemplar of Strength attacks, remove a -1/-1 counter from it. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Greater Sandwurm
text:
Greater Sandwurm can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: A sandwurm can lie in wait beneath the sands for years until the slightest tremor alerts it to the presence of prey.

name: Hapatra's Mark

"If you fear poisons, it is because you are ignorant of them."
—Hapatra, vizier of poisons

name: Harvest Season
text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Haze of Pollen
text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

text:
Trample
Embalm {3}{G} ({3}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie Snake Hydra with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)
flavor: Even gods have pets.

text: You may exert Hooded Brawler as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

name: Initiate's Companion
text: Whenever Initiate's Companion deals combat damage to a player, untap target creature or land.

—Ixor, initiate of Rhet crop

name: Manglehorn
text:
When Manglehorn enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.

flavor:
"Rely too much on your weapons and watch your dreams shatter in your hands."
—Rhonas, god of strength

name: Naga Vitalist
text: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.

name: Oashra Cultivator
text: {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Oashra Cultivator: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Ornery Kudu
text: When Ornery Kudu enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control.

name: Pouncing Cheetah
text: Flash
flavor: Rhonas's monument is home to a wider variety of creatures than anywhere else in the city of Naktamun—a feature most initiates fail to appreciate.

name: Prowling Serpopard
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Creature spells you control can't be countered.
flavor: The viziers serving Rhonas, the god of strength, maintain the menagerie of animals employed during his trial.

name: Quarry Hauler
text: When Quarry Hauler enters the battlefield, for each kind of counter on target permanent, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it.

name: Sandwurm Convergence
text:
Creatures with flying can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
At the beginning of your end step, create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token.

name: Scaled Behemoth
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Shed Weakness
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may remove a -1/-1 counter from it.

name: Sixth Sense
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card."
flavor: Instinct yields the truest insight.

name: Spidery Grasp
text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: There are no safe paths through the Trial of Strength.

name: Stinging Shot
text:
Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature with flying.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Synchronized Strike
text: Untap up to two target creatures. They each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Trial of Strength
text:
When Trial of Strength enters the battlefield, create a 4/2 green Beast creature token.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Strength to its owner's hand.

name: Watchful Naga
text: You may exert Watchful Naga as it attacks. When you do, draw a card. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

name: Companion of the Trials
text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Untap target creature. Activate only if you control a Gideon planeswalker.
flavor:
"The fiercest loyalties are earned in battle."
—Gideon Jura

name: Graceful Cat
text: Whenever Graceful Cat attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Desiccated Naga
text: {3}{B}: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate only if you control a Liliana planeswalker.

"The nature of this plane makes it almost too easy for me to command the dead."
—Liliana Vess

name: Tattered Mummy
text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

name: Akrasan Squire
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Angel's Herald
text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a green creature, a white creature, and a blue creature: Search your library for a card named Empyrial Archangel, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Angelic Benediction
text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.
flavor:
"Even in single combat, I am never alone."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Angelsong
text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.

name: Cradle of Vitality

name: Dispeller's Capsule
text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself."
—Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean

name: Excommunicate
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

name: Guardians of Akrasa
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor:
"Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe."
—Elspeth

name: Gustrider Exuberant
text:
Flying
Sacrifice Gustrider Exuberant: Creatures you control with power 5 or greater gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: "The elves claim the canopy. The nacatl claim the mountains. I suppose you think we ought to stay on the jungle floor?"

name: Invincible Hymn
text: Count the number of cards in your library. Your life total becomes that number.
flavor: Bantians believe those who are born into the highest caste and live a life of discipline and virtue can ascend to become angels.

name: Knight of the White Orchid
text:
First strike
When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: Both guide and guard on open plain.

name: Knight-Captain of Eos
text:
When Knight-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
{W}, Sacrifice a Soldier: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor: The strength of Bant's caste system is the unfailing loyalty of its meekest members.

name: Marble Chalice
text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor: The cup was a gift from the sphinx Tameron, who hoped that those who drank from it would live long enough to decrypt the sphinxes' wisdom.

name: Metallurgeon
text: {W}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact.
flavor: "By the time I got there, the heart had stopped. Fortunately, I was able to replace it with something better."

name: Oblivion Ring
text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Ranger of Eos
text: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with mana value 1 or less, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

name: Scourglass
text: {T}, Sacrifice Scourglass: Destroy all permanents except for artifacts and lands. Activate only during your upkeep.
flavor:
"Soon I will sleep, eyes closing to a world tarnished with flesh, and then wake to a polished vision."
—Sharuum

name: Sigiled Paladin
text:
First strike
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: Each sigil marks the recognition of a great deed and signifies a duty owed to the one who granted it.

name: Soul's Grace
text: You gain life equal to target creature's power.
flavor: An avatar he sculpts of fellowship and light.

name: Sunseed Nurturer
text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may gain 2 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor: Sunseeders quest for areas of open sky. They train plowbeasts to beat back the dense jungle long enough to cultivate a crop.

name: Welkin Guide
text:
Flying
When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"Those talons really dig into your skin, but it's better than being dropped."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Yoked Plowbeast
text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"It is sacrilege to confine a gargantuan to the grinding of straight lines. I will pray that it remembers who is the master of this land."
—Syeena, elvish godtoucher

name: Call to Heel
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.
flavor: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

name: Cathartic Adept
text: {T}: Target player mills a card.
flavor: "Forget. Only then will there be space for hope between the pain and fear."

name: Coma Veil
text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: Etherium does not know sleep. Only magic can teach it the resting state of cold steel.

name: Courier's Capsule
text: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Capsule: Draw two cards.
flavor: In ages past, Esper couriers bore messages written on ornate scrolls. The medium has grown more sophisticated, but the principle remains the same.

name: Covenant of Minds
text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If they don't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.
flavor: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.

name: Etherium Sculptor
text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

name: Filigree Sages
text: {2}{U}: Untap target artifact.
flavor: "We of the Sanctum Arcanum have pondered every word on every page of the Filigree Texts. If you can't say the same, don't bother speaking."

name: Gather Specimens
text: If a creature would enter the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, it enters the battlefield under your control instead.
flavor:
"It's free to do whatever it wants. I've merely told it what that is."
—Xorin, Architect of Will

name: Jhessian Lookout
flavor: She stands ready, always watchful, knowing that weeks of peace and serenity can be overturned by a single distant sail.

name: Memory Erosion
text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player mills two cards.
flavor:
"The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Mindlock Orb
text: Players can't search libraries.
flavor: Rogue mechanists once rummaged through the wastes of the Tidehollow, constructing unauthorized golems to threaten the hegemony of the sphinxes. The orbs put a stop to that.

name: Outrider of Jhess
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: The island nation of Jhess is under constant siege from Valeron on the mainland. Riders traverse the coastline, always on the lookout for sails or aven.

name: Sharding Sphinx
text:
Flying
Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.

name: Spell Snip
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Magic cast through a hand of flesh is just as weak as the flesh itself."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Sphinx's Herald
text: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a white creature, a blue creature, and a black creature: Search your library for a card named Sphinx Sovereign, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: He calls a riddle through the gaps of cloven clouds, hoping for an answer.

name: Steelclad Serpent
text: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.
flavor:
"From the highest towers to the deepest sea, all life must be touched by etherium."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Tortoise Formation
text: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: At sea, the Jhessian fleet strikes swiftly and decisively. On land, facing the elite cavalry of Valeron, its marines must rely on more cautious strategies.

name: Archdemon of Unx
text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a non-Zombie creature, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: The necropolis at Unx was once a living city, its streets untrodden by death.

name: Banewasp Affliction
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller loses life equal to its toughness.
flavor: The consuming undeath of Grixis terrifies the survivors of Vithia, but its fauna is just as fearsome.

name: Blister Beetle
text: When Blister Beetle enters the battlefield, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Warriors of the Rip Clan wear their beetle-acid scars proudly, even modifying clothing and armor to better display the trophy.

name: Bone Splinters
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

name: Cunning Lethemancer
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.
flavor: "Give me your memories, and you will have release from the suffering they bring you."

name: Death Baron
text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
flavor: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

name: Deathgreeter
text: Whenever another creature dies, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: "The bones of allies grant wisdom. The bones of enemies grant strength. The bones of dragons grant life eternal."

name: Demon's Herald
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a blue creature, a black creature, and a red creature: Search your library for a card named Prince of Thralls, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: "May these deaths be the first of many."

name: Dreg Reaver
flavor:
"On our thirty-fourth day of digging, we unearthed a chamber that contained the intact remains of several species long extinct from Grixis. One in particular should make a fine siege engine . . . ."
—Last notes of Shungus Nod, fleshcrafter

name: Dregscape Zombie
text: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
flavor: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

name: Fleshbag Marauder
text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Infest
text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather."
—Rannon, Vithian holdout

name: Onyx Goblet
text: {T}: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor: The goblet was a gift from the sphinx Gorael, who hoped humans and vedalken would eventually destroy each other to acquire it, leaving all of Esper to her own kind.

name: Scavenger Drake
text:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.
flavor: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.

name: Shadowfeed
text: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 3 life.
flavor:
"The future is a snake, devouring your life backwards through time. And when you die, believe me, it doesn't stop feeding."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Skeletal Kathari
text:
Flying
{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Skeletal Kathari.
flavor: Undeath doesn't end the kathari's search for carrion; it only removes one corpse from the Dregscape.

name: Bloodpyre Elemental
text: Sacrifice Bloodpyre Elemental: It deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Elementals born of Jund are as cruel and unstable as the plane itself.

name: Bloodthorn Taunter
text:
Haste
{T}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: Naya's celebrants stoke the gargantuans into a rage, loosing a tide of muscle with the precision of an arrow.

name: Crucible of Fire
text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.
flavor:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Dragon Fodder
text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Dragon's Herald
text: {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a black creature, a red creature, and a green creature: Search your library for a card named Hellkite Overlord, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: The penultimate step of the ritual involves bathing in a delicious glaze.

name: Exuberant Firestoker
text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may have Exuberant Firestoker deal 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor: The artistry of Etlan's firedancers is more spectacular when behemoths join in.

name: Flameblast Dragon
text:
Flying
Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.
flavor: Dragon lords of Jund rule by edicts of flame.

name: Goblin Assault
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
Goblin creatures attack each combat if able.
flavor: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit—a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.

name: Incurable Ogre
flavor: Each mutation causes the incurables to look vastly different from one another. They are left with only one thing in common: their insatiable lust for the slaughter.

name: Lightning Talons
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor:
"This is going to hurt a lot, but on the bright side, you'll be dead soon."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Predator Dragon
text:
Flying, haste
Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor: Dragons make for spiteful gods.

name: Ridge Rannet
text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Only those with the strength to seize their destiny deserve to have one."
—Nacatl scratchforms

name: Rockslide Elemental
text:
First strike
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.
flavor: On Jund, even the landscape is a deadly hunter. Volcanoes, tar pits, and rock slides seem to prey upon the living.

name: Soul's Fire
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor: An avatar he sculpts of anger and flame.

name: Thunder-Thrash Elder
text: Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor: Viashino thrashes are led by elders who have survived countless challenges.

name: Vicious Shadows
text: Whenever a creature dies, you may have Vicious Shadows deal damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
flavor:
"Thrashes of the ancient past still linger in spirit and shadow, desperate to sink their claws into our souls."
—Rakka Mar

name: Volcanic Submersion
text:
Destroy target artifact or land.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: A dragon's death is almost as feared as its life. Old, dying dragons throw themselves into volcanoes, causing massive upheaval and widespread disaster.

name: Where Ancients Tread
text: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Where Ancients Tread deal 5 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Never subtle nor cryptic is the reckoning of the mighty."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Algae Gharial
text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Algae Gharial.
flavor: It lurks just under the surface, using the algae-choked tar pits of Jund as both home and hunting blind.

name: Behemoth's Herald
text: {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a red creature, a green creature, and a white creature: Search your library for a card named Godsire, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: "Mine is an insatiable god, with appetites as magnificent as the jungle itself."

name: Court Archers
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: The Sun-Dappled Court of Valeron stands secure behind a wall of steel-tipped arrows.

name: Cylian Elf
flavor: From her sunsail tent high above the forest floor, an elf harkener can hear the footfalls of a single creature through the cacophony of Naya's jungle sounds.

name: Drumhunter
text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor: "I feel the vine-rhythm as my friends drive the beast to me. I will not miss my mark."

name: Elvish Visionary
text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

name: Feral Hydra
text:
Feral Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Feral Hydra. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.

name: Jungle Weaver
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Weavers' webs wall off swaths of territory more effectively than any portcullis made of iron.

name: Keeper of Progenitus
text: Whenever a player taps a Mountain, Forest, or Plains for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.
flavor: He watches over the valley where Progenitus sleeps, culling signs from its steaming breaths.

name: Lush Growth
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Mountain, Forest, and Plains.
flavor: Naya's bounty spills over upon itself. Each leaf and flower struggles against the next with thrashing thorns, acidic pollen, and strangling roots.

name: Mighty Emergence
text: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may put two +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: Why settle for mere enormity?

name: Manaplasm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, Manaplasm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.
flavor: Urak froze when he heard it. That was his first mistake. He turned and cast a dramatic ward spell. That was his last.

name: Mosstodon
text: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Whether gargantuans are the manifested will of Progenitus or simply the result of overabundant resources is moot when a herd of them is thundering at you.

name: Ooze Garden
text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice a non-Ooze creature: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the sacrificed creature's power. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Jund has little necromancy. Instead, the flesh of its dead gives rise to algal fiends.

name: Rhox Charger
text:
Trample
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: "Momentum is a great ally."

name: Sacellum Godspeaker
text: {T}: Reveal any number of creature cards with power 5 or greater from your hand. Add {G} for each card revealed this way.
flavor: Her connection to the gargantuans puts her in line to become Anima, a sacred but daunting duty.

name: Soul's Might
text: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power.
flavor: An avatar he sculpts of instinct and force.

name: Spearbreaker Behemoth
text:
Indestructible
{1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: Few Nayans dare hunt the gargantuans. They're regarded not as animals but as forces of nature, like landslides or typhoons.

name: Topan Ascetic
text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Topan Ascetic gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Monks from Topa wander all of Bant, encouraging the Unbeholden to find their place in society through honorable combat.

name: Wild Nacatl
text:
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
flavor: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

name: Carrier Pigeons
text:
Flying
When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"Birds know no borders! Why, then, should we?"
—General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Errand of Duty
text: Create a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant!"
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Inheritance
text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"More than lessons may be gained from the past."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Juniper Order Advocate
text: As long as Juniper Order Advocate is untapped, green creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor:
"In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Kjeldoran Escort
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"We willingly trade with Kjeldor, but the peace we build must come from both our lands."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Martyrdom
text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
flavor:
"Martyrs are cheaper than mercenaries, and a far better investment."
—General Varchild

name: Noble Steeds
text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Reinforcements
text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor:
"We aided the Balduvians once before. They need but ask and we shall do so again."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Royal Herbalist
text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Seasoned Tactician
text: {3}, Exile the top four cards of your library: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor:
"The benefits of peace far outweigh the pride of Generals."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Sustaining Spirit
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
flavor:
"Faith is our greatest protector."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Unlikely Alliance
text: {1}{W}: Target nonattacking, nonblocking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Strange alliances are alliances still, and provide the same protection."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Wild Aesthir
text:
Flying, first strike
{W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor:
"High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Awesome Presence
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature they control that's blocking it.
flavor: "At the core of all power is raw passion." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Benthic Explorers
text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce.
flavor: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

name: False Demise
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor:
"Far too many of our missing 'dead' seem to be turning up in Varchild's ranks!"
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"Lat-Nam has bequeathed us its secrets. With them we shall attain true enlightenment."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Viscerid Armor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.
flavor: A fallen Viscerid's only tribute is to be worn by a comrade.

name: Viscerid Drone
text:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: Not all of Terisiare's flooding was natural . . . .

name: Casting of Bones
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor:
"Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Fatal Lore
text:
An opponent chooses one —
• You draw three cards.
• You destroy up to two target creatures that player controls. They can't be regenerated. That player draws up to three cards.
flavor:
"All knowledge has its price."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Feast or Famine
text:
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Fevered Strength
text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"The burst of strength brought on by this plague should not be mistaken for a sign of renewed health."
—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
flavor:
"The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Misinformation
text: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of their library in any order.
flavor:
"When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Phyrexian Boon
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
flavor:
"Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Ritual of the Machine
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
flavor:
"Rumors persist of dark deeds performed in the depths of Soldev. When will Dagsson heed the danger therein?"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Adnate
text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value.
flavor:
"People love to follow fools; they don't feel so alone then."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Stench of Decay
text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence."
—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Balduvian War-Makers
text:
Haste
Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor:
"Those mewling Barbarians will cower before my righteous steel!"
—General Varchild

name: Burnout
text:
Counter target instant spell if it's blue.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"GOTCHA!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Enslaved Scout
text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor:
"Her soldiers' hatred for the Goblins is tempered only by their need for what the Goblins alone hold: knowledge of their mountain home."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Gorilla Shaman
text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with mana value X.
flavor:
"Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Gorilla War Cry
text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"The only 'art' these beasts possess is the art of noise!"
—Jaya Ballard

name: Omen of Fire
text: Return all Islands to their owners' hands. Each player sacrifices a Plains or a white permanent for each white permanent they control.
flavor:
"Let Balduvia burn to warm Kjeldor's hearth!"
—General Varchild

name: Pyrokinesis
text:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
flavor:
"Anybody want some . . . *toast*?"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: {R}, {T}: Target player shuffles their library.
flavor:
"Loyalty to coin alone is loyalty nonetheless."
—General Varchild

name: Varchild's Crusader
text: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor:
"We could have peace, but Varchild would rather have the maps of the new Kjeldor drawn in Balduvian blood."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Varchild's War-Riders
text:
Cumulative upkeep—Have an opponent create a 1/1 red Survivor creature token. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Trample; rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor:
"What tries to crush our spirit only strengthens our resolve."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Veteran's Voice
text:
Enchant creature you control
Tap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate only if enchanted creature is untapped.
flavor:
"Good soldiers rely first upon their training, then upon their instincts."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Deadly Insect
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"Beautiful, indeed—but one sting could fell a Giant in a heartbeat."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor:
"No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Elvish Spirit Guide
text: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G}.
flavor:
"We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Fyndhorn Druid
text: When Fyndhorn Druid dies, if it was blocked this turn, you gain 4 life.
flavor:
"All struggles ultimately require sacrifice. It's just that some sacrifices are dearer than others."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Gorilla Berserkers
text:
Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
Gorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
flavor:
"Their fury is their greatest weapon."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Hail Storm
text: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.
flavor:
"If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Kaysa
text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but the Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

name: Taste of Paradise
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times.
You gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.
flavor:
"Any who drink of Freyalise's bounty drink the mead of rebirth."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Yavimaya Ancients
text: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Ancients teach us that if we can but last, we shall prevail."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Yavimaya Ants
text:
Trample, haste
Cumulative upkeep {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Coalition Honor Guard
text: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
flavor: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

name: Diversionary Tactics
text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
flavor: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know—I wrote it."

name: Divine Light
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
flavor:
"Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."
—Lord Windgrace

name: Helionaut
text:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

name: Shield of Duty and Reason
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.
flavor: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.

name: Standard Bearer
text: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
flavor: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

name: Coastal Drake
text:
Flying
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.
flavor: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

name: Evasive Action
text: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

name: Ice Cave
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
flavor: Even the oppressive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.

name: Jaded Response
text: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
flavor:
"Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."
—Sisay

name: Reef Shaman
text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

name: Shimmering Mirage
text:
Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Oh, is *that* all you need? Why didn't you just say so?"
—Reef shaman

name: Unnatural Selection
text: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor: What nature makes, magic can modify.

name: Vodalian Mystic
text: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
flavor:
"Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."
—Sisay

name: Whirlpool Rider
text: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
flavor: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.

name: Dead Ringers
text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
flavor: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

name: Foul Presence
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."
flavor: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

name: Planar Despair
text: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.

name: Urborg Uprising
text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
flavor: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

name: Zombie Boa
text: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.

name: Bloodfire Dwarf
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: It deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

name: Bloodfire Kavu
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: It deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

name: Dwarven Patrol
text:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.
flavor: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.

name: Tundra Kavu
text: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.
flavor: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

name: Bog Gnarr
text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

name: Glade Gnarr
text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

name: Kavu Mauler
text:
Trample
Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.
flavor: To the kavu, all Phyrexians are merely crunchy snacks.

name: Lay of the Land
text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

name: Penumbra Bobcat
text: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.
flavor: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

name: Penumbra Kavu
text: When Penumbra Kavu dies, create a 3/3 black Kavu creature token.
flavor:
"These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die."
—Tahngarth

name: Symbiotic Deployment
text:
Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
flavor:
"You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."
—Eladamri

name: Tranquil Path
text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.
flavor: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

name: Bog Witch
text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.

name: Cemetery Reaper
text:
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: Every grave cradles a recruit.

name: Incremental Blight
text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.
flavor: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

name: Infectious Horror
text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

name: Makeshift Mannequin
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mannequin counter on it. For as long as that creature has a mannequin counter on it, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
flavor:
"This vulgar mimicry will end now."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

name: Reanimate
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.
flavor:
"You will learn to earn death."
—Volrath

name: Sign in Blood
text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor:
"You know I accept only one currency here, and yet you have sought me out. Why now do you hesitate?"
—Xathrid demon

name: Urborg Syphon-Mage
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."

name: Zombie Infestation
text: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

name: Battering Craghorn
text:
First strike
Morph {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Their skeletons can be found all over Skirk Ridge, tangled in each other's horns.

name: Inferno Trap
text:
If you've been dealt damage by two or more creatures this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Inferno Trap deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: "Do you smell something burning?"

name: Volcanic Fallout
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor:
"How can we outrun the sky?"
—Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

name: Fog
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

name: Forgotten Ancient
text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
flavor: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

name: Harmonize
text: Draw three cards.
flavor: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

name: Kamahl, Fist of Krosa
text:
{G}: Target land becomes a 1/1 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
{2}{G}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: "My mind has changed. My strength has not."

name: Leaf Gilder
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Slain orochi warriors were buried with a tree sapling so they would become a part of the forest after death.

name: Wall of Roots
text:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

name: Wickerbough Elder
text:
Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

name: Yavimaya Dryad
text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
When Yavimaya Dryad enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped under target player's control, then shuffle.
flavor: The parched earth still shielded those few souls with the heart to call it home.

name: Aether Spellbomb
text:
{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Release that which was never caged."
—Spellbomb inscription

name: Memnarch
text:
{1}{U}{U}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
{3}{U}: Gain control of target artifact. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: In the blur between metal and flesh, Memnarch found madness.

name: Army of Allah
text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: On the day of victory no one is tired. —Arab proverb

name: Camel
text:
Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
As long as Camel is attacking, prevent all damage Deserts would deal to Camel and to creatures banded with Camel.
flavor: Everyone knew Walid was a pious man, for he had been blessed with many sons, many jewels, and a great many Camels.

name: King Suleiman
text: {T}: Destroy target Djinn or Efreet.
flavor:
"We made tempestuous winds obedient to Solomon . . . And many of the devils We also made obedient to him."
—The Qur'an, 21:81

name: Moorish Cavalry
text: Trample
flavor: Members of the elite Moorish Cavalry are very particular about their mounts, choosing only those whose bloodlines have been pure for generations.

name: War Elephant
text: Trample; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "When elephants fight it is the grass that suffers." —Kikuyu Proverb

name: Fishliver Oil
text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has islandwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor: Then the maiden bade him cast off his robes and cover his body with fishliver oil, that he might safely follow her into the sea.

name: Flying Men
text: Flying
flavor: Saffiyah clapped her hands and twenty flying men appeared at her side, each well trained in the art of combat.

name: Juzám Djinn
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzám Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: "Expect my visit when the darkness comes. The night I think is best for hiding all." —Ouallada

name: Stone-Throwing Devils
text: First strike
flavor: Sometimes those with the most sin cast the first stones.

name: Combat Medic
text: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor:
"Without Combat Medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did."
—*Sarpadian Empires*, vol. VI

name: Freewind Falcon
text: Flying, protection from red
flavor:
"That does it! I'm going back to hunting chickens!"
—Rhirhok, goblin archer

name: Pegasus Charger
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor:
"The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury."
—*Song of All*, canto 211

name: Sacred Mesa
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.
{1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.
flavor:
"Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves."
—"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

name: Goblin Grenade
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor:
"I don't suppose we could teach them to throw the cursed things?"
—Ivra Jursdotter

name: Goblin Offensive
text: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor: They certainly are.

name: Goblin Snowman
text:
Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn.
{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
flavor:
"Strength in numbers? Right."
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Goblin Tinkerer
text: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its mana value to Goblin Tinkerer.
flavor:
"Can they *do* that?"
—Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

name: Mogg Raider
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

name: Spectral Bears
text: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
flavor:
"I hear there are Bears—or spirits—that guard caravans passing through the forest."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Woolly Spider
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Argivian Archaeologist
text: {W}{W}, {T}: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Fascinated by the lore of ancient struggles, the Archaeologist searches incessantly for remnants of an earlier, more powerful era.

name: Argivian Blacksmith
text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.
flavor: Through years of study and training, the Blacksmiths of Argive became adept at reassembling the mangled remains of the strange, mechanical creatures abounding in their native land.

name: Damping Field
text: Players can't untap more than one artifact during their untap steps.
flavor: Eventually, mages learned to harness the power of natural damping fields and use it for their own ends.

name: Drafna's Restoration
text: Put any number of target artifact cards from target player's graveyard on top of their library in any order.
flavor: Drafna, founder of the College of Lat-Nam, could create a working model from even the smallest remnants of a newly unearthed artifact.

name: Artifact Possession
text:
Enchant artifact
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped or a player activates an ability of enchanted artifact without {T} in its activation cost, Artifact Possession deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor: Any black mage could coax a Thraxodemon to inhabit a magical device.

name: Gate to Phyrexia
text: Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact. Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.
flavor: "The warm rain of grease on my face immediately made it clear I had entered Phyrexia." —Jarsyl, *Diary*

name: Haunting Wind
text: Whenever an artifact becomes tapped or a player activates an artifact's ability without {T} in its activation cost, Haunting Wind deals 1 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor: These devices lured so many spirits that sometimes entire battlefields would become haunted at once.

name: Artifact Blast
text: Counter target artifact spell.
flavor: The first line of defense against Urza and Mishra, the Artifact Blast achieved widespread fame until an unlucky mage discovered it was useless on the devices the brothers had already created.

name: Argothian Pixies
text:
Argothian Pixies can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Pixies by artifact creatures.
flavor: After the rape of Argoth Forest during the rule of the artificers, the Pixies of Argoth bent their magic to more practical ends.

name: Argothian Treefolk
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Treefolk by artifact sources.
flavor: Haunting cries we hear in our dreams As the forest dies, a death from machines.

name: Citanul Druid
text: Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Citanul Druid.
flavor: Driven mad by the fall of Argoth, the Citanul Druids found peace only in battle.

name: Gaea's Avenger
text: Gaea's Avenger's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of artifacts your opponents control.
flavor: After the destruction of Argoth, Gaea was willing to instill a portion of her own powers into some of her more vengeful followers.

name: Powerleech
text: Whenever an artifact an opponent controls becomes tapped or an opponent activates an artifact's ability without {T} in its activation cost, you gain 1 life.
flavor: The Forest of Argoth has developed a resistance to mechanical intrusion.

name: Angel of Glory's Rise
text:
Flying
When Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."

name: Angel of Jubilation
text:
Flying
Other nonblack creatures you control get +1/+1.
Players can't pay life or sacrifice creatures to cast spells or activate abilities.
flavor: "Though Innistrad is not cleansed of evil, we finally have cause to rejoice."

name: Angel's Mercy
text: You gain 7 life.
flavor: "I understand your fears. I pity your doubts. I absolve you of both."

name: Builder's Blessing
text: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
flavor:
"Mix the mortar with holy wards, or blood will run in the streets."
—Vadvar, Thraben stonewright

name: Call to Serve
text:
Enchant nonblack creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2, has flying, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
flavor: Grace is a gift, never a reward.

name: Cathars' Crusade
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.

name: Cathedral Sanctifier
text: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: "Evil will soon be vanquished. What Innistrad most needs now is healing."

name: Commander's Authority
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Human creature token."
flavor: "Wear her symbol with honor, a sign of faith upheld and honest deeds bravely done."

name: Cursebreak
text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 2 life.
flavor: No longer the village pariah. No longer taunted and shamed. Sigrun was finally free.

name: Defang
text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor: Once vampires are disarmed, they're given wooden swords and forced to assist in the training of Midnight Duelists.

name: Defy Death
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: Gisela cornered the murderous demon among the graves of the dead villagers. "A fitting end," she murmured as she raised her sword.

name: Devout Chaplain
text: {T}, Tap two untapped Humans you control: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "By Avacyn's decree, we shall cleanse these relics of their demonic past."

name: Emancipation Angel
text:
Flying
When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: "You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."

name: Farbog Explorer
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: "I'd slog through a thousand swamps to help one soul find rest."

name: Goldnight Commander
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "One faith, but many hands in victory."

name: Goldnight Redeemer
text:
Flying
When Goldnight Redeemer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control.
flavor: The Host sings of Avacyn's return without a single verse about its own suffering.

name: Holy Justiciar
text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. If that creature is a Zombie, exile it.
flavor: Her eyes see through the rotting flesh and glimpse a soul in agony, begging for the Blessed Sleep.

name: Leap of Faith
text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.
flavor: The finest maneuvers take place in three dimensions.

name: Midnight Duelist
text: Protection from Vampires
flavor: Avacyn's return did not rid him of his desire for revenge.

name: Midvast Protector
text: When Midvast Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "I cultivated my faith in Avacyn despite meager returns. Now my faith is repaid."

name: Moonlight Geist
text:
Flying
{3}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Moonlight Geist this turn.
flavor: Wails and whispers are the only weapons she has left.

name: Moorland Inquisitor
text: {2}{W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

name: Righteous Blow
text: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor:
"Monsters will no longer find safety under the mists of Morkrut!"
—Bruna, Light of Alabaster

name: Seraph of Dawn
text: Flying, lifelink
flavor: She parts the clouds so sunlight can reach even the darkest lairs and duskiest tombs.

name: Thraben Valiant
text: Vigilance
flavor: "Once more into Devil's Breach, soldiers. I want another devil tail for my collection."

name: Voice of the Provinces
text:
Flying
When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

name: Zealous Strike
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."

name: Alchemist's Apprentice
text: Sacrifice Alchemist's Apprentice: Draw a card.
flavor: Side effects may include foul odors, scalding steam, and spontaneous nonexistence.

name: Amass the Components
text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
flavor: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"

name: Arcane Melee
text: Instant and sorcery spells cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: Debates between wizards are never purely academic.

name: Captain of the Mists
text:
Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, untap Captain of the Mists.
{1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor: "I am no mere ship's captain. The north wind is my accomplice. The tide is my first mate."

name: Crippling Chill
text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.
flavor: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.

name: Devastation Tide
text:
Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
flavor: It's hard to argue with a force made of divine will.

name: Dreadwaters
text: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.
flavor: Stray into the Morkrut and it may rise to claim you.

name: Favorable Winds
text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
flavor: Long thought to be extinct, flocks of gryffs reappeared with Avacyn's return.

name: Fettergeist
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Fettergeist unless you pay {1} for each other creature you control.
flavor: The choices of the living will tether them in death.

name: Fleeting Distraction
text:
Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

name: Geist Snatch
text: Counter target creature spell. Create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: Angels and demons aren't the only ones listening to your prayers.

name: Ghostform
text: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "There's no such thing as 'impenetrable.'"

name: Ghostly Flicker
text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

name: Ghostly Touch
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap or untap target permanent."
flavor: "Geists wish to make themselves known. I'm merely the vessel for their efforts."

name: Gryff Vanguard
text:
Flying
When Gryff Vanguard enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor:
"Ghouls smashed the door, but I heard the call of the gryffs and knew we were saved."
—Ekka, shopkeeper of Hanweir

name: Havengul Skaab
text: Whenever Havengul Skaab attacks, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: An abomination so violent that the other fiends tremble at the sight of it.

name: Into the Void
text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the 'diplomatic' approach."
—Terhold, archmage of Drunau

name: Latch Seeker
text: Latch Seeker can't be blocked.
flavor: It seeks a tomb that will hold it, a coffin that will give it rest.

name: Lunar Mystic
text: Whenever you cast an instant spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"I'm pleased this world has learned the moon affects more than the tides."
—Tamiyo, the Moon Sage

name: Mass Appeal
text: Draw a card for each Human you control.
flavor: "We have emerged triumphant from the darkness. Let our hard-won wisdom guide us to prosperity."

name: Mist Raven
text:
Flying
When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."
—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

name: Misthollow Griffin
text:
Flying
You may cast Misthollow Griffin from exile.
flavor: For some creatures, existing is only a whim.

name: Outwit
text: Counter target spell that targets a player.
flavor: The student asks how a spell is begun. The master ponders what ends it.

name: Peel from Reality
text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

name: Rotcrown Ghoul
text: When Rotcrown Ghoul dies, target player mills five cards.
flavor:
"Don't look into its eyes. It's thinking things no dead thing should think."
—Captain Eberhart

name: Scrapskin Drake
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.
flavor:
"The cathars killed my skaabs down below. Let's see how high their swords can reach."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Second Guess
text: Counter target spell that's the second spell cast this turn.
flavor:
"I see where you're going with that. I don't like it."
—Dierk, geistmage

name: Spirit Away
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor: The fear of slipping from the geist's tenuous grip overwhelmed Tolo's joy at his first flight.

name: Temporal Mastery
text:
Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Mastery.
Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
flavor: Time is a marvelous plaything.

name: Appetite for Brains
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with mana value 4 or greater and exile that card.
flavor: Just as with a peach, the first bite is always the juiciest.

name: Barter in Blood
text: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
flavor:
"We must all make sacrifices for the good of Innistrad."
—Sorin Markov

name: Butcher Ghoul
text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: Without a mind, it doesn't fear death. Without a soul, it doesn't mind killing.

name: Corpse Traders
text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Those without breath can't complain.

name: Crypt Creeper
text: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor:
"I guess what they say is true. What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Or at least stranger."
—Captain Eberhart

name: Dark Impostor
text:
{4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Impostor.
Dark Impostor has all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with it.
flavor: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."

name: Death Wind
text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
flavor: Leukin stared at the smoldering angel feathers. "Run!" he screamed to his patrol. "We don't stand a chance!"

name: Demonic Rising
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control exactly one creature, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.
flavor: Which is the greater folly, summoning the demon or expecting gratitude from it?

name: Demonic Taskmaster
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Demonic Taskmaster.
flavor: Subservience to greater power is the only law in the pit.

name: Descent into Madness
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a despair counter on Descent into Madness, then each player exiles X permanents they control and/or cards from their hand, where X is the number of despair counters on Descent into Madness.
flavor: The stairs lead down in both directions.

name: Dread Slaver
text: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Dread Slaver this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor: Half a brain rules the mindless.

name: Essence Harvest
text: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor: Captain Lewenheart uncovered evidence of a demon cult among the clergy. The Skirsdag never gave him a chance to prove his case.

name: Exquisite Blood
text: Whenever an opponent loses life, you gain that much life.
flavor: Even as humans regained the upper hand, some still willingly traded their lives for a chance at immortality.

name: Ghoulflesh
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor: The body dies in stages. First the skin, then the muscle. The brain is last, much to the victim's dismay.

name: Gloom Surgeon
text: If combat damage would be dealt to Gloom Surgeon, prevent that damage and exile that many cards from the top of your library.
flavor: He roams the streets of Havengul seeking the sick and delirious so that he may cure them of their lives.

name: Grave Exchange
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor:
"It's a cold, dark journey either way."
—Eruth of Lambholt

name: Griselbrand
text:
Flying, lifelink
Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.
flavor:
"Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Harvester of Souls
text:
Deathtouch
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.
flavor:
"He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all."
—Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

name: Homicidal Seclusion
text: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +3/+1 and has lifelink.
flavor:
"Damned crows and their endless squawking . . . blocks out the voices in my head . . ."
—Hermit of Hanne Hall

name: Human Frailty
text: Destroy target Human creature.
flavor:
"I have seen a hundred mortal families rise and fall. I shall outlast a thousand more."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Hunted Ghoul
text: Hunted Ghoul can't block Humans.
flavor: Even after Hanweir was saved, Gisa's lost ghouls would shamble through, still following the twisted orders of their imprisoned master.

name: Killing Wave
text: For each creature, its controller sacrifices it unless they pay X life.
flavor:
"I come looking for demons and I find a plane full of angels. I hate angels."
—Liliana Vess

name: Maalfeld Twins
text: When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor:
"Who am I to break up a family?"
—Gisa the Mad

name: Marrow Bats
text:
Flying
Pay 4 life: Regenerate Marrow Bats.
flavor:
"No matter how far we push into Stensia, undeath will always remain in these lands."
—Terhold, archmage of Drunau

name: Mental Agony
text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor: "His mind is feeble. Feed him to the bats."

name: Necrobite
text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: An undead snake doesn't bite in self-defense. It hungers as any zombie, never sated.

name: Polluted Dead
text: When Polluted Dead dies, destroy target land.
flavor: After the zombie attack, crops withered on the vine, and the thriving village became a ghost town almost overnight.

name: Renegade Demon
flavor:
"Have you ever cornered a wounded vampire? That's a walk in the cathedral garden in comparison."
—Tristen, Cathar Marshal

name: Searchlight Geist
text:
Flying
{3}{B}: Searchlight Geist gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: It rises with the fall of darkness, seeking souls to extinguish.

name: Soulcage Fiend
text: When Soulcage Fiend dies, each player loses 3 life.
flavor: Vowing to free the souls of her children, Kastinne followed the tormentors into the ghastly network of caves below Stensia.

name: Triumph of Cruelty
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power.
flavor:
"I've seen corpses prettier than you, beastmage."
—Liliana Vess

name: Undead Executioner
text: When Undead Executioner dies, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: Heartless killer in life, brainless killer in death.

name: Unhallowed Pact
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

name: Aggravate
text: Aggravate deals 1 damage to each creature target player controls. Each creature dealt damage this way attacks this turn if able.
flavor:
"Barbarians! They burned my favorite chair! We'll kill them all!"
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Archwing Dragon
text:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of the end step, return Archwing Dragon to its owner's hand.
flavor: Swifter than an angel, crueler than a demon, and relentless as a ghoul.

name: Banners Raised
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: After the destruction of the Helvault, fearful mobs soon became fearless battalions.

name: Battle Hymn
text: Add {R} for each creature you control.
flavor:
"A church is just wood and walls. A congregation is the faithful praising the angels."
—Kolman, elder of Gatstaf
