name: Dangerous Wager
text: Discard your hand, then draw two cards.
flavor:
"C'mon friend, take a turn tossing the knucklebones. What've you got to lose?"
—Tobias, trader of Erdwal

name: Dual Casting
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy."
flavor: Hours after the Helvault opened, his powers returned twice as strong as before.

name: Fervent Cathar
text:
Haste
When Fervent Cathar enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: "I'll put my sword down only to die. And I don't plan on doing that today."

name: Gang of Devils
text: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor:
"Well, how could I know they'd explode?"
—Gregel, township militia

name: Guise of Fire
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 and attacks each combat if able.
flavor:
"Fire will eventually destroy a zombie, but a fiery zombie destroys a lot of other things first."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

name: Havengul Vampire
text:
Whenever Havengul Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Havengul Vampire.
flavor: "That slowly decreasing pulse—that's the beat I waltz to."

name: Kessig Malcontents
text: When Kessig Malcontents enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Humans you control.
flavor: Discontent is a powerful weapon in the hands of a mob.

name: Lightning Prowess
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: "Undead flesh is dry and papery. A single spark and 'poof.' No more ghoul."

name: Mad Prophet
text:
Haste
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor: "There's no heron in the moon! It's a shrew, a five-legged shrew, with a voice like whispering thunder!"

name: Malicious Intent
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."
flavor: As peace returned to Thraben, some cathars made the mistake of letting down their guard.

name: Malignus
text:
Malignus's power and toughness are each equal to half the highest life total among your opponents, rounded up.
Damage that would be dealt by Malignus can't be prevented.
flavor: It descended on Estwald like a sudden storm. Moments later, only ashes and agony remained.

name: Pillar of Flame
text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

name: Raging Poltergeist
flavor: Some tried cremating their dead to stop the ghoulcallers. But the dead returned, furious about their fate.

name: Reforge the Soul
text:
Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
Miracle {1}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
flavor: In a wave of spells called the Cursemute, Avacyn cleansed the world with divine fire.

name: Riot Ringleader
text: Whenever Riot Ringleader attacks, Human creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "So the vampires like hot blood, do they? Let's see how they handle ours."

name: Rite of Ruin
text: Choose an order for artifacts, creatures, and lands. Each player sacrifices one permanent of the first type, sacrifices two of the second type, then sacrifices three of the third type.
flavor: Skirsdag cultists refused to quietly accept Avacyn's ascendancy.

name: Rush of Blood
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power.
flavor: Sometimes it's not for sustenance or to feed the dependence. Sometimes it's just to feel again.

name: Scalding Devil
text: {2}{R}: Scalding Devil deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Demons massacre. Devils annoy.

name: Somberwald Vigilante
text: Whenever Somberwald Vigilante becomes blocked by a creature, Somberwald Vigilante deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor: He has nothing left but his resentment.

name: Thatcher Revolt
text: Create three 1/1 red Human creature tokens with haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: The dark times left the peasantry ready to fight with whatever weapons were at hand.

name: Thunderbolt
text:
Choose one —
• Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor:
"My next aerial design will use less metal."
—Hadaken, alchemist of Nephalia

name: Uncanny Speed
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"To survive, we must embrace the savagery we knew in our race's infancy."
—Edgar Markov

name: Vexing Devil
text: When Vexing Devil enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 4 damage to them. If a player does, sacrifice Vexing Devil.
flavor: It's not any fun until someone loses an eye.

name: Vigilante Justice
text: Whenever a Human enters the battlefield under your control, Vigilante Justice deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: It begins as a whisper and ends with the red roar of fire.

name: Borderland Ranger
text: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

name: Bower Passage
text: Creatures with flying can't block creatures you control.
flavor: In the darkest hours, some denied Avacyn. Now the Kessig wilds are their only haven.

name: Craterhoof Behemoth
text:
Haste
When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
flavor: Its footsteps of today are the lakes of tomorrow.

name: Eaten by Spiders
text: Destroy target creature with flying and all Equipment attached to that creature.
flavor: After sampling many victims, the spider developed a preference for the undead and their accoutrements.

name: Flowering Lumberknot
text: Flowering Lumberknot can't attack or block unless it's paired with a creature with soulbond.
flavor:
"It used to eat us trappers. Now it follows us around like some kind of hound dog."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Gloomwidow
text:
Reach
Gloomwidow can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: The abandoned towns on the moors didn't stay empty for long.

name: Grounded
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses flying.
flavor:
"We've tracked Ludevic's monster across four provinces. When it lands, make sure it stays put."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig, to Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Joint Assault
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's paired with a creature, that creature also gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"By my power, werewolves shall become the wolfir, our allies in combat against darkness."
—Avacyn's Cursemute Decree

name: Lair Delve
text: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all creature and land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: "The fiends have fled. Well, good riddance. Nothing I like more than an empty lair."

name: Natural End
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor: The haunted blade shattered, and the geist drifted gratefully to the Blessed Sleep.

name: Nettle Swine
flavor:
"I killed one and found bricks and bones in its belly. It had eaten a whole cottage, thatch and all."
—Paulin, Somberwald trapper

name: Primal Surge
text: Exile the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you do, repeat this process.
flavor: With Avacyn's return, the flow of life became a tidal wave.

name: Rain of Thorns
text:
Choose one or more —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target land.
flavor: When the forests became havens for evil, the archmages devised new ways to cleanse the wilds.

name: Snare the Skies
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: A hunter's precision and a durkvine's strength are a potent combination.

name: Somberwald Sage
text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
flavor: "You can face any danger when all of nature is on your side."

name: Soul of the Harvest
text:
Trample
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
flavor: It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.

name: Terrifying Presence
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by creatures other than target creature this turn.
flavor: Elmut had slaughtered vampires, slain werewolves, and destroyed hordes of zombies. Sadly, he never got over his fear of spiders.

name: Timberland Guide
text: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "Can you build a fire? Track a deer? Identify killer trees? Then you'll never survive Kessig without me."

name: Triumph of Ferocity
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power.
flavor:
"Rid me of this curse, witch, or die with me."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Ulvenwald Tracker
text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.
flavor: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

name: Vorstclaw
flavor:
"Where'd the werewolves go? Maybe *that* got hungry."
—Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Wandering Wolf
text: Creatures with power less than Wandering Wolf's power can't block it.
flavor: Humans still feared wolves, though no connection between them and the curse of lycanthropy had ever been proved.

name: Wild Defiance
text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of an instant or sorcery spell, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"When civilization reaches out its greedy hand, take it off at the wrist."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Wildwood Geist
text: Wildwood Geist gets +2/+2 as long as it's your turn.
flavor: The geists that dwell in the deep forests of Kessig are as untamable as the woods themselves.

name: Wolfir Avenger
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Wolfir Avenger.
flavor: Released from a dark curse and bound to a higher calling.

name: Yew Spirit
text: {2}{G}{G}: Yew Spirit gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
flavor:
"I wonder what dwelled in the primordial forests before humans existed."
—Elder Rimheit

name: Proud Mentor
text:
Partner with Impetuous Protege (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Impetuous Protege into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: "Get ready, son."

name: Arena Rector
text: When Arena Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: "I see something special in you—a bright ember that yearns to dance among the stars."

name: Aurora Champion
text: Whenever Aurora Champion attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, tap target creature.
flavor: Many combatants at Valor's Reach wield glowing weapons to distract their enemies and delight the crowd.

name: Bring Down
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor:
"Big, wicked, and not too smart. Poor thing never stood a chance against us, dear."
—Regna, to Krav

name: Jubilant Mascot
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {3}{W}. If you do, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)
flavor: The competition is but one aspect of the spectacle.

name: Play of the Game
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
Exile all nonland permanents.
flavor: The most sensational plays send everyone home breathless.

name: Regna's Sanction
text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control. Each foe chooses one untapped creature they control, then taps the rest.
flavor:
"Show them the light, my love."
—Krav, the Unredeemed

name: Skystreamer
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {4} of this spell's cost.)
Flying
When Skystreamer enters the battlefield, target player gains 4 life.
flavor: Victories at Valor's Reach are broadcast via griffins in the sky above.

name: Fumble
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Gain control of all Auras and Equipment that were attached to it, then attach them to another creature.
flavor: A moment of distraction, a lifetime of regret.

name: Game Plan
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Game Plan.
flavor: Plan for victory, or prepare for defeat.

name: Huddle Up
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell's cost.)
Two target players each draw a card.
flavor: "Are you sure this is going to work?" asked Will. "No," said Rowan. "But if it does, it's going to be spectacular."

name: Out of Bounds
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
Counter target spell.
flavor: The wardens watch for illegal tactics and protect spectators from the occasional rogue fireball.

name: Saltwater Stalwart
text: Whenever Saltwater Stalwart deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.
flavor: Every attack is a test of your defenses. Every hit marks the map of your defeat.

name: Soaring Show-Off
text:
Flying
When Soaring Show-Off enters the battlefield, each player draws a card.
flavor: Some spectators love an underdog, but others are just as happy to support a proven winner.

name: Spellseeker
text: When Spellseeker enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.

name: Spellweaver Duo
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
When Spellweaver Duo enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: Synchronized spell weaving is a difficult but rewarding skill to master.

name: Zndrsplt's Judgment
text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Zndrsplt retired from officiating when she teamed up with Okaun, but she still knows the penalties better than anyone else.

name: Bloodborn Scoundrels
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
When Bloodborn Scoundrels enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: The ring plays host to some combatants that the spectators love to hate.

name: Fan Favorite
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
{2}: Fan Favorite gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: "Pathetic! I've heard more noise in a monastery. Let me hear you, Valor's Reach!"

name: Gang Up
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.)
Destroy target creature with power X or less.
flavor:
"Well, who do we have here, Gorm?"
"No one, Virtus. No one at all."

name: Mindblade Render
text: Whenever your opponents are dealt combat damage, if any of that damage was dealt by a Warrior, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: "There will be no secrets between us... like it or not."

name: Sickle Dancer
text: Whenever Sickle Dancer attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Sickle Dancer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "I lead, destruction follows."

name: Stunning Reversal
text:
The next time you would lose the game this turn, instead draw seven cards and your life total becomes 1.
Exile Stunning Reversal.
flavor: The line between victory and defeat can be as slim as a razor's edge.

name: Thrasher Brute
text: Whenever Thrasher Brute or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Some competitors fight for glory or money. Some just like hitting people.

name: Thrilling Encore
text: Put onto the battlefield under your control all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
flavor: "Welcome to the winning team."

name: Virtus's Maneuver
text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand. Each foe sacrifices a creature they control.
flavor: Brutality had never been so exquisite.

name: Azra Bladeseeker
text: When Azra Bladeseeker enters the battlefield, each player on your team may discard a card, then each player who discarded a card this way draws a card.
flavor: "Never get too attached to a weapon. You must allow a better one to find its way to you."

name: Bonus Round
text: Until end of turn, whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it and may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: When the twin-spell bonus round begins, the crowd rises to its feet in anticipation of incredible combinations.

name: Bull-Rush Bruiser
text: Whenever Bull-Rush Bruiser attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Bull-Rush Bruiser gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: There will always be a spot at Valor's Reach for headlong violence.

name: Cheering Fanatic
text: Whenever Cheering Fanatic attacks, choose a card name. Spells with the chosen name cost {1} less to cast this turn.
flavor: "Punch 'em, kick 'em, bite 'em, beat 'em! Burn 'em all and we'll defeat 'em!"

name: Magma Hellion
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
Trample, haste
flavor: The stadium is well-stocked with hazards to force the action if combatants show too much caution.

name: Stadium Vendors
text: When Stadium Vendors enters the battlefield, choose a player. That player adds two mana of any one color they choose.
flavor: "Potions! Mana potions, health potions, energy potions—get your potions here!"

name: Bramble Sovereign
text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
flavor: "Within this grove, you belong to me."

name: Charging Binox
text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.)
Trample
flavor: Arena beasts are bred for flashiness and foul temper. An extra head addresses both requirements.

name: Combo Attack
text: Two target creatures your team controls each deal damage equal to their power to target creature.
flavor: Success at Valor's Reach requires not only individual skill but also the ability to merge that skill with a partner's.

name: Decorated Champion
text: Whenever another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, put a +1/+1 counter on Decorated Champion.
flavor: The oddsmakers hate him because every fight is a foregone conclusion. The crowd loves him for exactly the same reason.

name: Jungle Wayfinder
text: When Jungle Wayfinder enters the battlefield, each player may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle.
flavor: She is adept at navigating the stadium's ever-changing landscape.

name: Angel of Retribution
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: Bitter vengeance never glowed so bright nor sang so sweet.

name: Battle Mastery
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor:
"There is elegance in all the Ojutai do—even their killing."
—Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

name: Champion of Arashin
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "The blood of Dromoka and the blood of my veins are the same."

name: Kor Spiritdancer
text:
Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.
flavor: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.

name: Lightwalker
text: Lightwalker has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor:
"The greatest gift Dromoka gives is the ability to fly without wings."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Long Road Home
text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: The person who finishes a journey is rarely the same as the one who starts it.

name: Loyal Pegasus
text:
Flying
Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.
flavor:
"Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground."
—Hypatia of the Winged Horse

name: Mangara of Corondor
text: {T}: Exile Mangara of Corondor and target permanent.
flavor: "I have been brought to this place and I cannot leave. I may be free of the amber, but I am still in prison."

name: Midnight Guard
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Midnight Guard.
flavor:
"When you're on watch, no noise is harmless and no shadow can be ignored."
—Olgard of the Skiltfolk

name: Raptor Companion
flavor: A raptor will follow any order as long as that order is "hunt," "kill," or "go for the guts."

name: Rebuke
text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor:
"No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Royal Trooper
text: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Loyalty guides me. Pride compels me. Anger sustains me. And the pay isn't bad."

name: Shoulder to Shoulder
text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight."
—Gideon Jura

name: Silverchase Fox
text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.
flavor:
"Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den."
—Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

name: Solemn Offering
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor:
"You will be reimbursed for your donation."
"The reimbursement is spiritual."
—Temple signs

name: Steppe Glider
text:
Flying, vigilance
{1}{W}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: It glides over the landscape. It also happens to be one.

name: Take Up Arms
text: Create three 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.
flavor:
"Many scales make the skin of a dragon."
—Abzan wisdom

name: Tandem Tactics
text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

name: Benthic Giant
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor:
"Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Claustrophobia
text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Fog Bank
text:
Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.
flavor:
"The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover."
—Talrand, sky summoner

name: Frost Lynx
text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

name: Impulse
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

name: Kitesail Corsair
text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.
flavor: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

name: Kraken Hatchling
flavor: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

name: Nimbus of the Isles
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: The people of the Sevick Isles have a unique understanding of the term "ominous clouds."

name: Omenspeaker
text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

name: Peregrine Drake
text:
Flying
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.
flavor:
"Always a welcome sight breaking through the clouds."
—Talrand, sky summoner

name: Reckless Scholar
text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
flavor: Progress comes at a price.

name: Sower of Temptation
text:
Flying
When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.
flavor: One glamer leads him far from home. The next washes away his memory that home was ever anywhere but at her side.

name: Spell Snare
text: Counter target spell with mana value 2.
flavor: With practice, the measurement of magic can lead to its mastery.

name: Switcheroo
text: Exchange control of two target creatures.
flavor: Say hello to your new friend.

name: Tidespout Tyrant
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: The stadium tests more than just fighting skill. For example, swimming ability.

name: Watercourser
text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow."
—Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

name: Assassin's Strike
text: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.
flavor: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

name: Daggerdrome Imp
text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

name: Eyeblight Assassin
text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

name: Hand of Silumgar
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Silumgar trains those whom he favors in his magic, granting them the ability to spread his disdain across the land.

name: Last Gasp
text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

name: Liturgy of Blood
text: Destroy target creature. Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor:
"You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Morbid Curiosity
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw cards equal to the mana value of the sacrificed permanent.
flavor: "Every creation carries a piece of its creators. Their knowledge, their dreams, their soul. That is the best part."

name: Nirkana Revenant
text:
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.
{B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which it is eternally sustained.

name: Noxious Dragon
text:
Flying
When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.
flavor: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

name: Nyxathid
text:
As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.
flavor: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.

name: Prakhata Club Security
flavor: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

name: Rotfeaster Maggot
text: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.
flavor: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

name: Screeching Buzzard
text:
Flying
When Screeching Buzzard dies, each opponent discards a card.
flavor:
"A shrill creature that delights in the misery of others—what's not to love?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Shambling Ghoul
text: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.

name: Slum Reaper
text: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.

name: Swarm of Bloodflies
text:
Flying
Swarm of Bloodflies enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of Bloodflies.
flavor: In the Gudul delta, bloodfly bites are indistinguishable from spear wounds.

name: Tavern Swindler
text: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.
flavor: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

name: Tenacious Dead
text: When Tenacious Dead dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.
flavor: Raising the bones of Hekjek the Mad proved far easier than getting them to lie back down.

name: Bathe in Dragonfire
text: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: The scent of cooked flesh lingers in the charred landscape of Tarkir.

name: Battle Rampart
text:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword."
—Yannash, outpost builder

name: Blood Feud
text: Target creature fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: Succession is a matter of blood, and by blood it is often decided.

name: Boldwyr Intimidator
text:
Cowards can't block Warriors.
{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.
flavor: "Now everyone knows what you are."

name: Borderland Marauder
text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

name: Dragon Hatchling
text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

name: Ember Beast
text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.
flavor: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

name: Expedite
text:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: "I run, and thunder follows."

name: Goblin Razerunners
text:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners.
At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Finding an unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

name: Magmatic Force
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, Magmatic Force deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: It's the pinnacle of utter destructiveness.

name: Reckless Reveler
text: {R}, Sacrifice Reckless Reveler: Destroy target artifact.
flavor:
"The gods of Theros are born of the expectations and beliefs of mortals. If I have found godhood, what does that say about their true desires?"
—Xenagos, god of revels

name: Thunder Strike
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

name: War's Toll
text:
Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls.
If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.
flavor: Razia, archangel of war, demands total commitment.

name: Wrap in Flames
text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Aim High
text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"A slayer gets by on wits and reflexes."
—Higa, slayer-captain of Gatstaf

name: Charging Rhino
text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: The knights of Troinir Keep took the rhino as their emblem due to its intense focus when charging down a perceived threat—a trait they discovered on a hunting excursion.

name: Cowl Prowler
flavor: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost—occasionally permanently—in the city's wildest greenbelt.

name: Daggerback Basilisk
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
"Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Karametra's Favor
text:
Enchant creature
When Karametra's Favor enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor: The harvest god's cornucopia contains the fruits of the fields, the forest, and beyond.

name: Kraul Warrior
text: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

name: Lead by Example
text: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
flavor: Gideon and Nissa carved a path through the Eldrazi swarm, and their Zendikari allies charged into the fray behind them.

name: Magus of the Candelabra
text: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.
flavor:
"What would Urza think, I wonder, if he could hear how the nature mages still snarl at his name, but venerate the work of his apprentice?"
—Teferi, to Jhoira

name: Plated Crusher
text:
Trample
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor:
"It might fight the Eldrazi, but don't mistake it for a companion, Gideon. It's not interested in your concept of strength through unity."
—Najiya, leader of the Tajuru

name: Primal Huntbeast
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor:
"To the unskilled, it appears as blurred patches of distorted light. Few have seen its true form."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Pulse of Murasa
text: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.
flavor: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."

name: Return to the Earth
text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor:
"Dragons are feared for their breath and their bite, but it is their wings that make them unconquerable. Bring them to earth, and they die like any other beast."
—Kassur, Sultai hunter

name: Saddleback Lagac
text: When Saddleback Lagac enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)
flavor:
"A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one … well, it's a tasty dinner."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Skyshroud Claim
text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

name: Angel of Renewal
text:
Flying
When Angel of Renewal enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor: "No more fear. No more failure. No more death. No more!"

name: Cliffside Lookout
text: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Though losses run high among the scouts of the Stone Havens, they never flinch from their duty.

name: Courier Griffin
text:
Flying
When Courier Griffin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"Sea Gate has fallen. Survivors are on the move. Will send another griffin when we find refuge. Stay hidden. Stay safe."
—Message from Tars Olan, kor world-gift

name: Expedition Envoy
flavor: The unofficial motto of every expedition house is "ready for anything," a phrase whose significance has been amplified since the emergence of the Eldrazi.

name: Felidar Cub
text: Sacrifice Felidar Cub: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.

name: Felidar Sovereign
text:
Vigilance, lifelink
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.
flavor: It surveys the withering landscape, waiting for a victory only it can see.

name: Fortified Rampart
text: Defender
flavor: The refuge's defenses allow new recruits to see lesser Eldrazi up close, steeling their stomachs for what's to come.

name: Ghostly Sentinel
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: Mystics of the Stone Havens call upon the spirits of fallen heroes to defend the refuges.

name: Gideon's Reproach
text: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor:
"Suddenly, Gideon was there with us, clearing the way so that we could escape."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Hero of Goma Fada
text: Rally — Whenever Hero of Goma Fada or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: "They seek to break us. Let us show them our strength!"

name: Inspired Charge
text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"For the lands you have lost and the beauty that remains, for freedom and the future, we must hold nothing back!"
—Gideon Jura

name: Kitesail Scout
text: Flying
flavor: "The wind in one's hair, the sun on one's back, the joy of open skies . . . the next generation of kor must know this kind of peace."

name: Kor Bladewhirl
text: Rally — Whenever Kor Bladewhirl or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor: The high-pitched whirl of a hook is the only battle cry she needs.

name: Kor Castigator
text: Kor Castigator can't be blocked by Eldrazi Scions.
flavor:
"He told us not to worry, and he walked into the cavern. The swirling mass of Eldrazi parted to admit him, then closed in his wake."
—Akiri, kor line-slinger

name: Kor Entanglers
text: Rally — Whenever Kor Entanglers or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "We came into this world together. We fight for this world together. We'll leave this world together."

name: Lantern Scout
text: Rally — Whenever Lantern Scout or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: Hedron lanterns fend off more than just the darkness.

name: Lithomancer's Focus
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn by colorless sources.
flavor:
"Even in the hands of amateurs, Nahiri's hedrons can harm the Eldrazi."
—Ugin

name: Makindi Patrol
text: Rally — Whenever Makindi Patrol or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: Working with his noble mount, he notices every form on the horizon, every scent in the air, every tremor in the earth.

name: Ondu Greathorn
text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Ondu Greathorn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"May your horns get lodged in an Eldrazi's bony face, ornery brute!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Roil's Retribution
text: Roil's Retribution deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures.
flavor:
"We can use their hunger to lead them into danger. If we're already prey, we may as well be bait!"
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Serene Steward
text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "I can give you strength, but you'll have to bring your own courage."

name: Shadow Glider
text: Flying
flavor: A few bands of kor sought refuge from the Eldrazi in Zendikar's vast cave networks, relying on their ability to survive in harsh vertical landscapes.

name: Smite the Monstrous
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: After watching the kor in battle, Gideon understood the difference between working together and working as one.

name: Stone Haven Medic
text: {W}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor: "These days, soldiers never stick around long enough for a proper healing. They just want me to knit them up so they can hurry back to the fight."

name: Unified Front
text: Converge — Create a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token for each color of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: The kor's pride in their independence has given way to a strong sense of community that embraces all of Zendikar.

name: Cryptic Cruiser
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{2}{U}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Tap target creature.
flavor:
"The seas are no less imperiled than the dry lands. This fight is mine as much as it is yours."
—Kiora, to Gideon Jura

name: Horribly Awry
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Counter target creature spell with mana value 4 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor:
"We are nothing but dust to them—our bodies, our actions, even our words."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Incubator Drone
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Incubator Drone enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: The touch of an Eldrazi brings life and death in turn.

name: Mist Intruder
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)
flavor: The wastes spread as quickly as the wind.

name: Murk Strider
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Murk Strider enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: If you can see it, it's too late.

name: Oracle of Dust
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{2}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: Whatever it is searching for, it will stop at nothing to find it.

name: Tide Drifter
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Other colorless creatures you control get +0/+1.
flavor: It didn't do much, but the residents of Sea Gate gave it a wide berth all the same.

name: Anticipate
text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

name: Brilliant Spectrum
text: Converge — Draw X cards, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell. Then discard two cards.
flavor: There are more sights on Zendikar than the eyes can see.

name: Cloud Manta
text: Flying
flavor: When Emeria's worshippers learned that she was no more than a twisted memory of Emrakul, they abandoned their temples to the god. The deserted shrines now serve as breeding grounds for the mantas.

name: Dampening Pulse
text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
flavor:
"Quiet now, you dreadful vermin."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage

name: Dispel
text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor:
"I said we should destroy the Eldrazi. Ugin wanted to return them to stasis. Ugin's arguments were . . . unconvincing."
—Jace Beleren

name: Exert Influence
text: Converge — Gain control of target creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: "I can't control its mind—I'm not even sure it has one. But I can dominate its will."

name: Halimar Tidecaller
text:
When Halimar Tidecaller enters the battlefield, you may return target card with awaken from your graveyard to your hand.
Land creatures you control have flying.
flavor: "Quiet the waves? Why would I want to do that?"

name: Roilmage's Trick
text:
Converge — Creatures your opponents control get -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
Draw a card.
flavor: Weather on Zendikar is unpredictable—unless you're the one telling it what to do.

name: Tightening Coils
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0 and loses flying.
flavor: Having gone to the trouble of stealing a bident from a god on another world, Kiora was eager to test its capabilities.

name: Ugin's Insight
text: Scry X, where X is the highest mana value among permanents you control, then draw three cards.
flavor:
"You speak to me of the threat of Ulamog. But do not forget: they came as three."
—Ugin, to Jace Beleren

name: Wave-Wing Elemental
text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Wave-Wing Elemental gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Do you see? All of Tazeem strains at its tether."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage

name: Complete Disregard
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor:
"We returned to the field and found poor Len, every detail of his final moment perfectly cast in that awful dust."
—Javad Nasrin, outrider captain

name: Culling Drone
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)
flavor: Silence rules Bala Ged, broken only by the skittering of Eldrazi.

name: Grip of Desolation
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature and target land.
flavor: As the hand closed, there was first terror, then numbness, and finally nothingness.

name: Mind Raker
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Mind Raker enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, each opponent discards a card.
flavor: It consumes any dreams of victory.

name: Silent Skimmer
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
Whenever Silent Skimmer attacks, defending player loses 2 life.
flavor:
"I watched it pass at a distance. When I looked back to my companions, Najet was dead."
—Akiri, kor line-slinger

name: Swarm Surge
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Colorless creatures you control also gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor: The Eldrazi rampaged across Zendikar in a tide of chittering, heaving flesh.

name: Transgress the Mind
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with mana value 3 or greater and exile that card.
flavor:
"Fear of the unknown can be a wonderfully innocent thing, relatively speaking."
—Anowon, the Ruin Sage

name: Altar's Reap
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor:
"I will secure my revenge on Zendikar one soul at a time."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Bloodbond Vampire
text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.
flavor:
"Let the vampires join us. In this war, we no longer have the luxury of choosing our comrades."
—General Tazri, allied commander

name: Defiant Bloodlord
text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
flavor:
"Despite their bravado, mortals are fragile. If Zendikar is to endure, its lords must save it."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Demon's Grasp
text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Drana, Liberator of Malakir
text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever Drana, Liberator of Malakir deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.
flavor: "I will not live as a slave. If you would be free, then fight alongside me."

name: Dutiful Return
text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: When Malakir's surgeons failed, its death-shamans took over.

name: Hagra Sharpshooter
text: {4}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "It's hard to find their weak points, but I very much enjoy the discovery process."

name: Kalastria Healer
text: Rally — Whenever Kalastria Healer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Time and again, I have demonstrated my skills as a healer. Why, then, are you so ill at ease?"

name: Kalastria Nightwatch
text: Whenever you gain life, Kalastria Nightwatch gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Malakir Familiar
text:
Flying, deathtouch
Whenever you gain life, Malakir Familiar gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"They are deadly, and they are loyal. We can spare them a little blood."
—Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

name: Nirkana Assassin
text: Whenever you gain life, Nirkana Assassin gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Nirkana assassins craft incurable concoctions by mixing basilisk marrow and deathwillow sap with the vital fluids of a dozen other poisonous species.

name: Painful Truths
text: Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.

name: Voracious Null
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on Voracious Null. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor:
"These days, there's no shortage of food for the nulls of Guul Draz."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Barrage Tyrant
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{2}{R}, Sacrifice another colorless creature: Barrage Tyrant deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor: Terrible fury. Excellent aim.

name: Kozilek's Sentinel
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Kozilek's Sentinel gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: It moves through the tunnels as slowly and surely as the shifting stones.

name: Molten Nursery
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Molten Nursery deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Some detours just aren't worth it."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Processor Assault
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard.
Processor Assault deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor: Ulamog's processors trail behind him, converting ruined matter into furious energy.

name: Touch of the Void
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Touch of the Void deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: Some wounds never heal.

name: Turn Against
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "No, don't! Nal, it's me—"

name: Vestige of Emrakul
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Trample
flavor: Emrakul has not been seen in months. Though her brood's numbers have dwindled in her absence, each drone is still a deadly threat.

name: Belligerent Whiptail
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"Whiptails can sense a traveler's footsteps from a great distance. Measuring that distance has been . . . difficult."
—Jalun, Affa sentry

name: Chasm Guide
text: Rally — Whenever Chasm Guide or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
flavor: With a single act of bravery, she went from expendable to indispensable.

name: Firemantle Mage
text: Rally — Whenever Firemantle Mage or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: "Come on, you twisted things! Don't you want to get acquainted?"

name: Goblin War Paint
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor:
"The Eldrazi may not be intimidated, but if it boosts the goblins' confidence, I see no reason to discourage it."
—Jalun, Affa sentry

name: Lavastep Raider
text: {2}{R}: Lavastep Raider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Goblins were first to see the potential of hedrons in the fight against the Eldrazi, for the magical stones came ready-made with pointy bits.

name: Makindi Sliderunner
text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Makindi Sliderunner gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: After a battle, it breaks the hillsides into manageable pieces to prepare for next time.

name: Ondu Champion
text: Rally — Whenever Ondu Champion or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Put a minotaur at the head of an army and suddenly all the soldiers act like they have horns."
—Gideon Jura

name: Outnumber
text: Outnumber deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor: Everyone who could still lift a weapon had a part in retaking Sea Gate.

name: Radiant Flames
text: Converge — Radiant Flames deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: The fires of Zendikar are always hungry, and there is much on which they can feed.

name: Reckless Cohort
text: Reckless Cohort attacks each combat if able unless you control another Ally.
flavor: "You have a family. Mine died at Sea Gate. You go to yours, and I'll go to mine."

name: Rolling Thunder
text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor:
"Zendikar is always angry, though I've never seen that anger so precisely directed."
—Nablus, North Hada trapper

name: Shatterskull Recruit
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: Saved from certain death by the kor, he considers himself bound to them by an unbreakable blood oath.

name: Stonefury
text: Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor: Akoum can make any intruder look small.

name: Sure Strike
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.

name: Tunneling Geopede
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Tunneling Geopede deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: As Ulamog's brood reduces the earth to dust, geopedes burst from their tunnels in search of solid ground.

name: Valakut Invoker
text: {8}: Valakut Invoker deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor:
"As long as we have walked this world, we have known it as a harsh and unforgiving place."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Valakut Predator
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Valakut Predator gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Whatever volcanoes dream of, it seems like they always wake up grumpy."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Volcanic Upheaval
text: Destroy target land.
flavor: Like a living organism, Zendikar rids itself of infection, and it does so abruptly and ruthlessly.

name: Blisterpod
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Blisterpod dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: A blisterpod's corpse is a scion's cradle.

name: Brood Monitor
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Brood Monitor enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: The tenderness of a mother. The pity of a mantis.

name: Call the Scions
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.

name: Eyeless Watcher
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Eyeless Watcher enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: Every Eldrazi in Ulamog's lineage is an extension of the titan's will.

name: Unnatural Aggression
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. If the creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: The battle served as a grim reminder of what a final victory for the Eldrazi would mean.

name: Void Attendant
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}{G}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: The Eldrazi don't merely extinguish life—they supplant it.

name: Beastcaller Savant
text:
Haste
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
flavor: "They come because I call. They stay because I listen."

name: Broodhunter Wurm
flavor: The native creatures of Zendikar have adapted to live under rocks and crawl through underbrush in order to avoid the most voracious predators. The Eldrazi have yet to make such adjustments.

name: Giant Mantis
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"I always thought the great insects of Tazeem were frightening until I saw the Eldrazi. Now I welcome the sight of mantises perched in the treetops."
—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout

name: Infuse with the Elements
text: Converge — Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Zendikar has given us the weapons to wage war on the appropriate scale."
—Najiya, leader of the Tajuru

name: Jaddi Offshoot
text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor: On Murasa, even the trees grow trees.

name: Lifespring Druid
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "The land is not dead, merely sick. I will nurse it back to health."

name: Murasa Ranger
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {3}{G}. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Murasa Ranger.
flavor: "If you're not prepared to fight, you'd best be prepared to die."

name: Natural Connection
text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: "Zendikar will not surrender, and neither can we."

name: Nissa's Renewal
text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. You gain 7 life.
flavor: Her connection to the plane restored, Nissa felt the power of Zendikar surge through her.

name: Oran-Rief Invoker
text: {8}: Oran-Rief Invoker gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"The world was not hostile to us—we were beneath its notice, and presented no danger."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Reclaiming Vines
text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
flavor:
"This world tires of its long occupation."
—Nissa Revane

name: Rot Shambler
text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rot Shambler.
flavor:
"If I die, feed me to a shambler. At least that way I'll be doing some good."
—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout

name: Scythe Leopard
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Scythe Leopard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Eldrazi are not the leopard's preferred prey, but they are better than no prey at all.

name: Seek the Wilds
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: "In my downtime I used to paint the vistas. Now the vistas disappear faster than my downtime."

name: Snapping Gnarlid
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Gnarlid gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: All of Zendikar's beings sense the upheaval that accompanies the Eldrazi.

name: Swell of Growth
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor:
"Nissa is not the only one with a deep connection to Zendikar's primal elements."
—Kiora

name: Tajuru Beastmaster
text: Rally — Whenever Tajuru Beastmaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "My mount needs neither reins nor bridle. We both share a common purpose."

name: Tajuru Stalwart
text: Converge — Tajuru Stalwart enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
flavor: "In its time of hardship, all of Zendikar cries out in pain. Are you listening?"

name: Tajuru Warcaller
text: Rally — Whenever Tajuru Warcaller or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Her rallying cry reaches far beyond the Tajuru elves, inspiring all those who hear it.

name: Territorial Baloth
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: It knows nothing of Eldrazi or Planeswalkers, just that there are new intruders in its territory.

name: Woodland Wanderer
text:
Vigilance, trample
Converge — Woodland Wanderer enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
flavor:
"The elements understand better than anyone that actions speak louder than words."
—Gideon Jura

name: Blighted Cataract
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.
flavor: Once, water ran here. Now only dust and ash fall from the clifftops.

name: Blighted Fen
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor:
"We came to a place where the skin of Zendikar was peeled back and its bones lay bare to the sky."
—Greenweaver Mina

name: Blighted Gorge
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Gorge: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: The land is dying, but it will not go peacefully.

name: Blighted Steppe
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Steppe: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
flavor:
"When a limb is gangrenous, you cut it off. This is no different."
—Greenweaver Mina

name: Akroan Skyguard
text:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Skyguard, put a +1/+1 counter on Akroan Skyguard.
flavor: "Trust me. When you have earned a god's favor, you'll know."

name: Archetype of Courage
text:
Creatures you control have first strike.
Creatures your opponents control lose first strike and can't have or gain first strike.
flavor:
"It has been my experience that soldiers most fervently follow generals who lead by example."
—Elspeth

name: Dawn to Dusk
text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: "The numbers of Nyxborn among us have swelled. Is this a sign of the gods' favor, or does it portend something else?"

name: Elite Skirmisher
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Elite Skirmisher, you may tap target creature.
flavor: Some adopted the tactics of the leonin to combat the ferocity of the minotaurs.

name: Ephara's Radiance
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 3 life."
flavor:
"Civilization is the sum of Ephara's gifts."
—Olexa of the Twelve

name: Excoriate
text: Exile target tapped creature.
flavor: The demon had flown past the reach of Erebos's whip but not the point of the sun god's spear.

name: Glimpse the Sun God
text: Tap X target creatures. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Better to be beneath Heliod's notice than beneath his heel.

name: God-Favored General
text: Inspired — Whenever God-Favored General becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, create two 1/1 white Soldier enchantment creature tokens.
flavor: Someone had to be first to attack, but he was not alone for long.

name: Great Hart
flavor:
The great hart stood like a statue, its hide painted gold by the dawn. The Champion laid down her weapons and stepped forward within an arm's length of the beast. The hart, sacred to Heliod and bathed in the god's own light, bowed to the Champion, marking her as the Chosen of the Sun God.
—*The Theriad*

name: Griffin Dreamfinder
text:
Flying
When Griffin Dreamfinder enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Some griffins are able to pluck mystic auras from the Æther that are hidden from other mortals.

name: Hero of Iroas
text:
Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Iroas, put a +1/+1 counter on Hero of Iroas.
flavor: "My left has felled a cyclops. My right has slain a giant. I bring both to every fight."

name: Hold at Bay
text: Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor: It was Daeron's bravery that brought him to Odunos. But it was the magic of Meletis that brought him home.

name: Mortal's Ardor
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor:
"Such deeds should be common fare for such as us."
—Anax, king of Akros

name: Nyxborn Shieldmate
text:
Bestow {2}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor: In Meletis, the walls have ears. In Akros, they have blades.

name: Oreskos Sun Guide
text: Inspired — Whenever Oreskos Sun Guide becomes untapped, you gain 2 life.
flavor: "Let the humans have their pantheon. We need no gods to thrive. Even a mortal such as I can capture a part of the sun's power."

name: Plea for Guidance
text: Search your library for up to two enchantment cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: On Theros, the dove is a symbol not of peace but of discovery. Quick wings herald the arrival of a revelation.

name: Silent Sentinel
text:
Flying
Whenever Silent Sentinel attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: It serves a justice higher than the whims of the gods.

name: Spirit of the Labyrinth
text: Each player can't draw more than one card each turn.
flavor: Students at the Dekatia Academy learn that being sent to study with her is a lesson in itself.

name: Sunbond
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."
flavor:
"I was not chosen for my faith in the gods. Sometimes the gods must put their faith in us."
—Elspeth

name: Vanguard of Brimaz
text:
Vigilance
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Vanguard of Brimaz, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance.
flavor: "The humans and their gods never blessed me. Only the pride deserves my allegiance."

name: Aerie Worshippers
text: Inspired — Whenever Aerie Worshippers becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature token with flying.
flavor: They can conjure stars from a clear sky.

name: Archetype of Imagination
text:
Creatures you control have flying.
Creatures your opponents control lose flying and can't have or gain flying.
flavor:
"Is it not the embodiment of our aspirations?"
—Prokopios, astronomer of Meletis

name: Crypsis
text: Target creature you control gains protection from creatures your opponents control until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor: Tritons borrow the camouflage of their oceanic prey to become predators on land.

name: Deepwater Hypnotist
text: Inspired — Whenever Deepwater Hypnotist becomes untapped, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Watch the waves too long, and you may never look away."
—Meletian proverb

name: Divination
text: Draw two cards.
flavor: "Ask of Keranos that you may understand the stars that mark your destiny. Implore Erebos that you may accept the fate thus divulged."

name: Evanescent Intellect
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{1}{U}, {T}: Target player mills three cards."
flavor: The mind is a vessel that may be emptied like any other.

name: Floodtide Serpent
text: Floodtide Serpent can't attack unless you return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
flavor:
"Pray to Thassa for *what*? A bigger monster to eat it? A wave that can wash it away? What then?"
—Lindos, merchant of Meletis

name: Kraken of the Straits
text: Creatures with power less than the number of Islands you control can't block Kraken of the Straits.
flavor: Thassa felt no need to punish the sailors for their folly in crossing the straits. The kraken would do it for her.

name: Nullify
text: Counter target creature or Aura spell.
flavor:
"Those who incur Thassa's anger will be swallowed whole by her waves, or torn asunder by her bident."
—Thrasios, triton hero

name: Nyxborn Triton
text:
Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+3.
flavor:
"He is Thassa's. I could not sway him."
—Kiora

name: Sphinx's Disciple
text:
Flying
Inspired — Whenever Sphinx's Disciple becomes untapped, draw a card.
flavor: Few dare to brave the Dakra Isles. Those who return are forever changed.

name: Sudden Storm
text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: No matter how big and strong you are, the sea is bigger and stronger.

name: Thassa's Rebuff
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)
flavor: To resist Thassa is to deny the rising tide.

name: Vortex Elemental
text:
{U}: Put Vortex Elemental and each creature blocking or blocked by it on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle.
{3}{U}{U}: Target creature blocks Vortex Elemental this turn if able.
flavor: The sea is always hungry.

name: Whelming Wave
text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.
flavor:
"I can see why this appeals to Thassa."
—Kiora

name: Archetype of Finality
text:
Creatures you control have deathtouch.
Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch.
flavor: She sees mortals not as they wish to be, but as what they will become.

name: Ashiok's Adept
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Ashiok's Adept, each opponent discards a card.
flavor:
"Every nightmare is a caged bird that yearns to be set free."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

name: Asphyxiate
text: Destroy target untapped creature.
flavor:
"Some poisons enter through the blood. Some are ingested. Some are inhaled. All ways through which mortals draw strength are paths for poison."
—Agathe, priest of Pharika

name: Black Oak of Odunos
text:
Defender
{B}, Tap another untapped creature you control: Black Oak of Odunos gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Phenax promised the newly dead souls they would be spared from Erebos. In this, he did not lie.

name: Claim of Erebos
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life."
flavor: Priests of Erebos give an occasional reminder to mortals who have forgotten their mortality.

name: Eater of Hope
text:
Flying
{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.
flavor: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .

name: Eye Gouge
text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If it's a Cyclops, destroy it.
flavor: One chance. One throw. One perfect hit.

name: Fate Unraveler
text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Fate Unraveler deals 1 damage to that player.
flavor:
"Never forget that the life you've built can be undone by a single loose thread."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Felhide Brawler
text: Felhide Brawler can't block unless you control another Minotaur.
flavor: Burial rites among the Felhide minotaurs involve devouring those who fell in battle, to remove their shame from memory and to fuel the survivors' revenge.

name: Forlorn Pseudamma
text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Inspired — Whenever Forlorn Pseudamma becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie enchantment creature token.
flavor:
"More children taken. This is an evil we will track without mercy."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: Forsaken Drifters
text: When Forsaken Drifters dies, mill four cards.
flavor: It is a terrible thing when the path of the Returned leads them back to the Underworld.

name: Gild
text: Exile target creature. Create a Gold token. (It's an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Merchants of the Underworld trade in coins of clay. Gold serves another purpose.

name: Marshmist Titan
text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
flavor: A favorite of Erebos, for it has sent many to the Underworld.

name: Nyxborn Eidolon
text:
Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor: A body Returned, a soul still lost.

name: Pain Seer
text: Inspired — Whenever Pain Seer becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.
flavor: Every twitching nerve and pulsing vein carries a message, discernible with the right tools.

name: Servant of Tymaret
text:
Inspired — Whenever Servant of Tymaret becomes untapped, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
{2}{B}: Regenerate Servant of Tymaret.
flavor: Life is most precious to those who have already lost it.

name: Weight of the Underworld
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-2.
flavor: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

name: Akroan Conscriptor
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Conscriptor, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "The time to serve is now."

name: Archetype of Aggression
text:
Creatures you control have trample.
Creatures your opponents control lose trample and can't have or gain trample.
flavor:
"Did Purphoros bless Maikal because of his rage? Or did Maikal's rage blossom after he'd been blessed? Only the gods know."
—Eocles, oracle of Purphoros

name: Bolt of Keranos
text: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: The breakthroughs granted by Keranos, god of epiphany, can be surprisingly literal.

name: Cyclops of One-Eyed Pass
flavor:
The Champion armed herself to face the cyclops, heedless of her companions' despair. "How will you defeat it with only one spear?" asked young Althemone. The Champion raised her weapon. "It has but one eye."
—*The Theriad*

name: Epiphany Storm
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."
flavor: In Meletis, certain oracles are trained to be divine lightning rods, receiving countless visions in an instant.

name: Fall of the Hammer
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.
flavor: It is unwise to insult the god of the forge. It is also unwise to stand near anyone else who has insulted him.

name: Fearsome Temper
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{2}{R}: Target creature can't block this creature this turn."
flavor: Purphoros is god of creation and destruction, which makes him the most creatively destructive god in the pantheon.

name: Forgestoker Dragon
text:
Flying
{1}{R}: Forgestoker Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this combat. Activate only if Forgestoker Dragon is attacking.
flavor: The Akroans fashion their helms to honor the dragons, not to protect against them, as that would be of little help.

name: Impetuous Sunchaser
text:
Flying, haste
Impetuous Sunchaser attacks each combat if able.
flavor: "I will soar higher than the walls of Akros! Higher than the clouds! Higher than Heliod himself!"

name: Kragma Butcher
text: Inspired — Whenever Kragma Butcher becomes untapped, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
