flavor: There is nothing more repulsive than a cockroach—except a cockroach and all its friends.

name: Famine
text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor:
"Better to starve to death than be bored to death."
—Liliana Vess

name: Hooded Horror
text: Hooded Horror can't be blocked as long as defending player controls the most creatures or is tied for the most.
flavor: Insidious fear can be the undoing of the greatest of armies.

name: Nightscape Familiar
text:
Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.
flavor: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

name: Ophiomancer
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.
flavor:
"There are dark, ancient arts that fascinate even me."
—Sorin Markov

name: Phyrexian Delver
text: When Phyrexian Delver enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.
flavor: Because the dead have no will to resist.

name: Phyrexian Reclamation
text: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Death is no excuse to stop working.

name: Reckless Spite
text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
flavor: "The end is justified in being mean. Or something like that."

name: Sanguine Bond
text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
flavor:
"Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed."
—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

name: Viscera Seer
text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

name: Wight of Precinct Six
text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.
flavor: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

name: Blood Rites
text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Blood Rites deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: In war, the best leaders are open to all tactics.

name: Capricious Efreet
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target nonland permanent you control and up to two target nonland permanents you don't control. Destroy one of them at random.
flavor: "You wish for great destruction? It is done, my master."

name: Curse of Chaos
text:
Enchant player
Whenever a player attacks enchanted player with one or more creatures, that attacking player may discard a card. If the player does, they draw a card.
flavor:
"Let them cry for mercy. The only one who can hear them is me."
—Siglind the Conqueror

name: Fissure Vent
text:
Choose one or both —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor:
"Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Furnace Celebration
text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {2}. If you do, Furnace Celebration deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: Nothing impresses goblins more than something that's bound to kill them.

name: Goblin Bombardment
text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

name: Guttersnipe
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

name: Magus of the Arena
text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice they control. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: The magus still hears the roar of the crowds. They're gone, but the will to compete remains.

name: Mass Mutiny
text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"What say you, my most trusted advisors? . . . Advisors?"
—Edra, merfolk sovereign

name: Spitebellows
text:
When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature.
Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
flavor: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

name: Stalking Vengeance
text:
Haste
Whenever another creature you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Something roams the killing places, sniffing the guilt of the slayers, stalking them on iron paws.

name: Sudden Demise
text: Choose a color. Sudden Demise deals X damage to each creature of the chosen color.
flavor: In the Skyfang Mountains, one misstep can mean the end of an entire clan.

name: Terra Ravager
text: Whenever Terra Ravager attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of lands defending player controls.
flavor: It lives in the mountaintops, feeds at the mountains' feet, and kills anything it finds on the path between.

name: Tooth and Claw
text: Sacrifice two creatures: Create a 3/1 red Beast creature token named Carnivore.
flavor:
"You deify nature as female—kind and gentle—yet you cringe at what is natural."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: War Cadence
text: {X}{R}: This turn, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {X} for each blocking creature they control.
flavor: The rhythm isn't a call to arms, but a signal that the goblins have made a new enemy.

name: Widespread Panic
text: Whenever a spell or ability causes its controller to shuffle their library, that player puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
flavor:
"How thin is the veneer of civilization! A modest measure of panic will wash it off completely."
—Guard Erdrud of An Karras

name: Wild Ricochet
text: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor:
"May your day never match your expectations."
—Scriptus Fleen, flectomancer

name: Witch Hunt
text:
Players can't gain life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Witch Hunt deals 4 damage to you.
At the beginning of your end step, target opponent chosen at random gains control of Witch Hunt.
flavor: The accusations spread like hungry flames.

name: Baloth Woodcrasher
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Its insatiable hunger quickly depletes a region of prey. It must migrate from place to place to feed its massive bulk.

name: Bane of Progress
text: When Bane of Progress enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on Bane of Progress for each permanent destroyed this way.
flavor: It sees shaped stone and carved wood as mutilations.

name: Brooding Saurian
text: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents they own.
flavor:
"I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Curse of Predation
text:
Enchant player
Whenever a creature attacks enchanted player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor:
"Hunters feed on the fear of their prey."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Elvish Skysweeper
text: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.

name: Farhaven Elf
text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

name: Grazing Gladehart
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.
flavor:
"Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Jade Mage
text: {2}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor:
"We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons."
—Jade creed

name: Krosan Grip
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

name: Krosan Warchief
text:
Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
flavor: It turns prey into predator.

name: Mold Shambler
text:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.
flavor: When civilization encroaches on nature, Zendikar encroaches back.

name: Night Soil
text: {1}, Exile two creature cards from a single graveyard: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor: Some said killing the thallids only encouraged them.

name: Rampaging Baloths
text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
flavor:
"When the land is angry, so are they."
—Nissa Revane

name: Ravenous Baloth
text: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.
flavor:
"All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive."
—Elvish refugee

name: Reincarnation
text: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, return a creature card from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under the control of that creature's owner.
flavor:
"You cannot imagine what eyes you may look through tomorrow."
—Aerona, elder druid

name: Restore
text: Put target land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor:
"See, the land itself raises an altar to the ascendancy of nature."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Slice in Twain
text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"The hypocrisy of these elves is thicker than steel—destroying 'unnatural metal' with their own enchanted swords."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Spawning Grounds
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Create a 5/5 green Beast creature token with trample."
flavor: It's the only water source in miles of desert, but the local tribes avoid it at all costs.

name: Kher Keep
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{R}, {T}: Create a 0/1 red Kobold creature token named Kobolds of Kher Keep.
flavor:
"They're still here?! The cockroach may have finally met its match."
—Teferi

name: Angel of the Dire Hour
text:
Flash
Flying
When Angel of the Dire Hour enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all attacking creatures.
flavor: She arrived like a meteorite, and the enemy fell in a shock wave of holy vengeance.

name: Angelic Field Marshal
text:
Flying
Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Angelic Field Marshal gets +2/+2 and creatures you control have vigilance.
flavor: Her presence on the battlefield can transform an unruly mob into a disciplined army.

name: Containment Priest
text:
Flash
If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
flavor: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

name: Jazal Goldmane
text:
First strike
{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor:
"As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Aether Gale
text: Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor: The militia formed up in the central plaza awaiting the onslaught, but the giants never quite made it.

name: Breaching Leviathan
text: When Breaching Leviathan enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, tap all nonblue creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
flavor: These waters remain uncharted, but not for lack of trying.

name: Dulcet Sirens
text:
{U}, {T}: Target creature attacks target opponent this turn if able.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: What are the orders of a king or the demands of a creed next to such melodies?

name: Stormsurge Kraken
text:
Hexproof
Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Stormsurge Kraken gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever Stormsurge Kraken becomes blocked, you may draw two cards."
flavor: Most see krakens as wantonly violent, failing to notice their meticulous attention to detail when dismantling a vessel.

name: Flesh Carver
text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on Flesh Carver.
When Flesh Carver dies, create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is Flesh Carver's power.
flavor: "Just a taste?"

name: Ghoulcaller Gisa
text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."

name: Malicious Affliction
text:
Morbid — When you cast this spell, if a creature died this turn, you may copy Malicious Affliction and may choose a new target for the copy.
Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor:
"Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."
—Byro, plague doctor

name: Spoils of Blood
text: Create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn.
flavor:
"There are always leftovers."
—Derecht, flesh carver

name: Feldon of the Third Path
text: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "She will come back to me."

name: Incite Rebellion
text: For each player, Incite Rebellion deals damage to that player and each creature that player controls equal to the number of creatures they control.
flavor: Nothing breaks the monotony like a good old-fashioned riot.

name: Scrap Mastery
text: Each player exiles all artifact cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all artifacts they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Where a lesser mind sees junk, I see infinite potential."

name: Tyrant's Familiar
text:
Flying, haste
Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Tyrant's Familiar gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever Tyrant's Familiar attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls."
flavor: Nothing escapes its gaze—or its breath.

name: Warmonger Hellkite
text:
Flying
All creatures attack each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Its wings beat to the howls of war and fan the fires of rage.

name: Creeperhulk
text:
Trample
{1}{G}: Until end of turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness 5/5 and gains trample.
flavor:
"I saw the devastation when the juggernauts crashed the walls of An Karras. Then I got to thinking."
—Janji, sylvan druid

name: Grave Sifter
text: When Grave Sifter enters the battlefield, each player chooses a creature type and returns any number of cards of that type from their graveyard to their hand.
flavor: It claws at the earth in a vain attempt to reclaim what it once was.

name: Lifeblood Hydra
text:
Trample
Lifeblood Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Lifeblood Hydra dies, you gain life and draw cards equal to its power.
flavor: Pharika has written her secrets on its bones so that only the worthy may discover them.

name: Siege Behemoth
text:
Hexproof
As long as Siege Behemoth is attacking, for each creature you control, you may have that creature assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor:
"Hold the line, hold the li—"
—General Srok, last words

name: Song of the Dryads
text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent is a colorless Forest land.
flavor: Few who encounter the strange, human-like grove leave once the lilting chorus of the dryads reaches their ears.

name: Thunderfoot Baloth
text:
Trample
Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Thunderfoot Baloth gets +2/+2 and other creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.
flavor: If you hear it, it's too late.

name: Wolfcaller's Howl
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens, where X is the number of your opponents with four or more cards in hand.
flavor:
"Knowledge is a stain that only instinct and ferocity can cleanse."
—Drarg, wolfcaller

name: Adarkar Valkyrie
text:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

name: Armistice
text: {3}{W}{W}: You draw a card and target opponent gains 3 life.
flavor:
We all must profit for peace to last.
—Mercadian saying

name: Brave the Elements
text: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
flavor:
"Trust me, your lost fingers and toes are nothing compared to the lost treasures of Sejiri."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

name: Grand Abolisher
text: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.
flavor: "Your superstitions and mumblings are useless chaff before my righteousness."

name: Kor Sanctifiers
text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

name: Midnight Haunting
text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
flavor: The path back to the world of the living is murky and bewildering. A geist may not even realize that it's terrifying its own loved ones.

name: Oblation
text: The owner of target nonland permanent shuffles it into their library, then draws two cards.
flavor: "A richer people could give more but they could never give as much."

name: Requiem Angel
text:
Flying
Whenever another non-Spirit creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: When angels despair, what hope can remain for mortals?

name: Return to Dust
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

name: Spectral Procession
text: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
flavor:
"The dead have it easy. They suffer no more. If breaking their rest helps the living, so be it."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

name: True Conviction
text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.
flavor: Dozens of spells known only to the Auriok elders were lost, but the next generation, galvanized by war, devised even more potent magic.

name: White Sun's Zenith
text: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

name: Azure Mage
text: {3}{U}: Draw a card.
flavor:
"We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."
—Azure creed

name: Call to Mind
text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"It's hard to say which is more satisfying: the search for that missing piece or fitting that piece into place."
—Evo Ragus

name: Compulsive Research
text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

name: Distorting Wake
text: Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor: Gerrard savored a grim smile as the Phyrexian portals disappeared behind the *Weatherlight*.

name: Into the Roil
text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
flavor: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
text: Whenever Lorthos, the Tidemaker attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
flavor: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.

name: Sea Gate Oracle
text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."

name: Sphinx of Magosi
text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.
flavor: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

name: Stroke of Genius
text: Target player draws X cards.
flavor: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

name: Turn to Frog
text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor: "Ribbit."

name: Abyssal Persecutor
text:
Flying, trample
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.
flavor: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

name: Aether Snap
text: Remove all counters from all permanents and exile all tokens.
flavor:
"May you wake to find you were only ever a dream."
—Mephidross curse

name: Black Sun's Zenith
text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor:
"Under the suns, Mirrodin kneels and begs us for perfection."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Bloodgift Demon
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
flavor: He relishes the devotion of his Skirsdag puppets and their belief that it will earn them immortality.

name: Butcher of Malakir
text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

name: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief
text:
Flying
{X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."

name: Grave Titan
text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor: Death in form and function.

name: Magus of the Coffers
text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} for each Swamp you control.
flavor: All that remains of the Cabal are the echoes in its deepest vault. Yet those who hear the echoes feel a power undiminished by the dust of ages.

name: Nantuko Shade
text: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: In life, the nantuko study nature by revering it. In death, they study nature by disemboweling it.

name: Pestilence Demon
text:
Flying
{B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

name: Read the Bones
text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Reaper from the Abyss
text:
Flying
Morbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, destroy target non-Demon creature.
flavor: "Avacyn has deserted you. I welcome your devotion in her stead."

name: Syphon Mind
text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Tendrils of Corruption
text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
flavor: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

name: Tragic Slip
text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

name: Beetleback Chief
text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

name: Faithless Looting
text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

name: Flametongue Kavu
text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay, captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Goblin Welder
text: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.
flavor: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look! I made you an ashtray."

name: Ingot Chewer
text:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
flavor: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

name: Whipflare
text: Whipflare deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.
flavor: The slag-workers wasted no time in creating their own flare pulses to cleanse the area of the *incompleat*.

name: Word of Seizing
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Untap target permanent and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "Obey!"

name: Desert Twister
text: Destroy target permanent.
flavor: Massive, mindless, and imbued with one terrible purpose.

name: Drove of Elves
text:
Hexproof
Drove of Elves's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green permanents you control.
flavor: "The light of beauty protects our journeys through darkness."

name: Elvish Archdruid
text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.
flavor: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

name: Elvish Mystic
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane

name: Essence Warden
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Ezuri, Renegade Leader
text:
{G}: Regenerate another target Elf.
{2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: The infamous Ezuri commands the highest bounty the vedalken have ever placed upon an outlaw.

name: Fresh Meat
text: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
flavor: A scavenger's favorite appetizer is death.

name: Grim Flowering
text: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Nothing in nature goes to waste, not even the rotting corpse of a good-for-nothing, blood-sucking vampire."
—Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Hunting Triad
text:
Create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.
Reinforce 3—{3}{G} ({3}{G}, Discard this card: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
flavor: "Eyeblights are easy to track. Just follow the imperfections."

name: Immaculate Magistrate
text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.
flavor: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures—sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.

name: Imperious Perfect
text:
Other Elves you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

name: Masked Admirers
text:
When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

name: Praetor's Counsel
text: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
flavor: As the Phyrexian contagion corroded Karn's body, the praetors whispered psalms to corrupt his mind.

name: Priest of Titania
text: {T}: Add {G} for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor: Titania rewards all who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

name: Primordial Sage
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card.
flavor: For each creature that arrives in its audience, the sage imparts another piece of ancient wisdom for all to hear.

name: Sylvan Ranger
text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Sylvan Safekeeper
text: Sacrifice a land: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"He has been to the heart of the wood. Did you truly expect to wield power over him?"
—Oakhide druid

name: Thornweald Archer
text: Reach, deathtouch
flavor: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

name: Timberwatch Elf
text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

name: Titania's Chosen
text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Titania's Chosen.
flavor:
"What do a hero and an arrow have in common? In times of war are many more made."
—Elvish riddle

name: Wellwisher
text: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

name: Whirlwind
text: Destroy all creatures with flying.
flavor: Urza tried to rule the air, but Gaea taught him that she controlled all the elements.

name: Aethersnatch
text: Gain control of target spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell becomes a permanent, it enters the battlefield under your control.)
flavor: "You were saying?"

name: Gigantoplasm
text: You may have Gigantoplasm enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{X}: This creature has base power and toughness X/X."
flavor:
"I appreciate things that exceed expectations."
—Mizzix

name: Illusory Ambusher
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever Illusory Ambusher is dealt damage, draw that many cards.
flavor:
"Violence is the food it craves. Feed it if you dare."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Synthetic Destiny
text: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.
flavor: To Jin-Gitaxias, perfection is not a goal, but a process.

name: Corpse Augur
text: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.
flavor: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

name: Daxos's Torment
text: Constellation — Whenever Daxos's Torment or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Daxos's Torment becomes a 5/5 Demon creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types until end of turn.
flavor: The terrors of the Underworld travel alongside those who return to the mortal realm.

name: Deadly Tempest
text: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
flavor: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

name: Dread Summons
text: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor:
"Did you have a nice nap?"
—Liliana Vess

name: Scourge of Nel Toth
text:
Flying
You may cast Scourge of Nel Toth from your graveyard by paying {B}{B} and sacrificing two creatures rather than paying its mana cost.
flavor:
"May all the cairns of Jund be toppled."
—Meren of Clan Nel Toth

name: Thief of Blood
text:
Flying
As Thief of Blood enters the battlefield, remove all counters from all permanents. Thief of Blood enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each counter removed this way.
flavor: Her hunger will not be denied.

name: Meteor Blast
text: Meteor Blast deals 4 damage to each of X targets.
flavor:
"Behold astronomy's contribution to war."
—Fennor Rhyl, starcaller

name: Arachnogenesis
text: Create X 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach, where X is the number of creatures attacking you. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Spider creatures.
flavor: Every movement is a summons—even your screams.

name: Ezuri's Predation
text: For each creature your opponents control, create a 4/4 green Phyrexian Beast creature token. Each of those tokens fights a different one of those creatures.
flavor: "Those who do not submit will be consumed."

name: Great Oak Guardian
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Reach
When Great Oak Guardian enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.
flavor: His roots reach deep and grip hard.

name: Pathbreaker Ibex
text: Whenever Pathbreaker Ibex attacks, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor:
"My skills are wasted here."
—Juruk, Kalonian tracker

name: Ajani's Chosen
text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.
flavor: "United, our roar will level mountains."

name: Arbiter of Knollridge
text:
Vigilance
When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.
flavor: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.

name: Celestial Ancient
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor:
"We thought the clouds had moved from the night sky. Then the night sky moved, and the horizon grew wings."
—Josuri

name: Dawnglare Invoker
text:
Flying
{8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.
flavor:
"What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Dictate of Heliod
text:
Flash
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor:
"In our war Heliod gave mortals some favor, yet other times he withheld aid. Are we still no more than game pieces to him?"
—Polyxene the Doubter

name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
text:
Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
{W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.

name: Mesa Enchantress
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
flavor: She shepherds mysteries and dust as others would a flock of sheep.

name: Monk Idealist
text: When Monk Idealist enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Belief is the strongest mortar."

name: Seal of Cleansing
text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

name: Victory's Herald
text:
Flying
Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.

name: Vow of Duty
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
flavor:
"I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must."
—Kaalia of the Vast

name: Blatant Thievery
text: For each opponent, gain control of target permanent that player controls.
flavor: "I'll leave subtlety to the rich."

name: Blustersquall
text:
Tap target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor: Weather is more predictable than the Izzet.

name: Dominate
text: Gain control of target creature with mana value X or less.
flavor:
"I've come to reclaim what is mine. And you, Greven, are mine."
—Volrath

name: Echoing Truth
text: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
flavor: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

name: Rapid Hybridization
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.
flavor:
"We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome."
—Speaker Trifon

name: Repeal
text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Sleep
text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
flavor:
"I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."
—Garild, merfolk mage

name: Blood Bairn
text: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road.

name: Doomwake Giant
text: Constellation — Whenever Doomwake Giant or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Crippling fear precedes it. A foul stench accompanies it. Death follows in its wake.

name: Grave Peril
text: When a nonblack creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Grave Peril. If you do, destroy that creature.
flavor:
"Sometimes the grave does not wait for death before relishing its feast of flesh and bones."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

name: Rise from the Grave
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor:
"Death is no excuse for disobedience."
—Liliana Vess

name: Seal of Doom
text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."
—Szadek

name: Underworld Connections
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."
flavor: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

name: Borderland Behemoth
text:
Trample
Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.
flavor: Giants share nothing but their fury.

name: Curse of the Nightly Hunt
text:
Enchant player
Creatures enchanted player controls attack each combat if able.
flavor: When the moon rises and the bloodlust takes hold, nothing matters but the kill.

name: Dragon Mage
text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor: "You'll bend to my will—with or without your precious sanity."

name: Earthquake
text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
flavor: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.

name: Hamletback Goliath
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.
flavor:
"If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear."
—Gaddock Teeg

name: Hammerfist Giant
text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
flavor:
"Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit."
—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

name: Hunted Dragon
text:
Flying, haste
When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.
flavor: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil
text: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

name: Sunrise Sovereign
text: Other Giant creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.
flavor: A hundred generations has he mentored, a hundred armies has he crushed beneath his feet, yet only a hundred words has he ever spoken, each more revered than a hundred books.

name: Thundercloud Shaman
text: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.
flavor: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.

name: Indrik Stomphowler
text: When Indrik Stomphowler enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot. The sound is mundane, but inaudible vibrations scatter and sunder magical contrivances."
—Simic research notes

name: Kessig Cagebreakers
text: Whenever Kessig Cagebreakers attacks, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token that's tapped and attacking for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor: "They put bars on these noble beasts and then wonder why werewolves target our towns."

name: Kodama's Reach
text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Loaming Shaman
text: When Loaming Shaman enters the battlefield, target player shuffles any number of target cards from their graveyard into their library.
flavor: His work determines who is remembered and who feeds the worms.

name: Mulch
text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: The land knows no difference between the graves of commoners and nobles.

name: Ohran Viper
text:
Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
flavor: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.

name: Stingerfling Spider
text:
Reach
When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.
flavor: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

name: Tribute to the Wild
text: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"You may enter, but leave those lifeless things of your world behind."
—Modruni, maro-sorcerer

name: Viridian Zealot
text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Viridian Zealot: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "I will fight only the way nature intended—and nature intended us to win."

name: Wall of Blossoms
text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

name: Duelist's Heritage
text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.
flavor: The best techniques outlive their creators.

name: Orzhov Advokist
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control until your next turn.
flavor: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

name: Sublime Exhalation
text:
Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
Destroy all creatures.
flavor: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.

name: Coastal Breach
text:
Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor: The sea filled the villagers' nets until the day it cast its own.

name: Grip of Phyresis
text: Gain control of target Equipment, then create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token and attach that Equipment to it.
flavor:
"Even your blade knows who will triumph here."
—Atraxa, Praetors' Voice

name: Curtains' Call
text:
Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
Destroy two target creatures.
flavor:
"We give the audience what they want."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Parting Thoughts
text: Destroy target creature. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of counters on that creature.
flavor:
"To spend your life seeking, only to find regret upon achieving . . . this is the most delicious irony of all."
—Leshrac, Walker of Night

name: Frenzied Fugue
text:
Enchant permanent
When Frenzied Fugue enters the battlefield or at the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of enchanted permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: Forever after, she lived in fear of the madness reclaiming her.

name: Goblin Spymaster
text:
First strike
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player creates a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with "Creatures you control attack each combat if able."
flavor:
"Infiltrate and infuriate!"
—Goblin Espionage League motto

name: Runehorn Hellkite
text:
Flying
{5}{R}, Exile Runehorn Hellkite from your graveyard: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor: Inscribed with runes that predate the dragon, its horns possess their own ancient magic.

name: Evolutionary Escalation
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control and three +1/+1 counters on target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: Survival is a constant competition from which both sides can benefit.

name: Primeval Protector
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature your opponents control.
When Primeval Protector enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor: The earth shook in support of their cause, offering a champion of its own.

name: Stonehoof Chieftain
text:
Trample, indestructible
Whenever another creature you control attacks, it gains trample and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: The pounding of his followers' hearts matched the beat of his hooves, and their voices echoed his bellows.

name: Blazing Archon
text:
Flying
Creatures can't attack you.
flavor:
"Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."
—Dravin, Gruul deserter

name: Blind Obedience
text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

name: Brave the Sands
text:
Creatures you control have vigilance.
Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor: Enduring the most desolate and dangerous conditions, Abzan sentries unfailingly guard the stronghold gates.

name: Ghostly Prison
text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
flavor:
"May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."
—Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

name: Hushwing Gryff
text:
Flash
Flying
Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
flavor: An overwhelming sense of calm accompanies the gryffs that wheel above the roofs of Gavony.

name: Reverse the Sands
text: Redistribute any number of players' life totals. (Each of those players gets one life total back.)
flavor: Worse than the years of aging was the burden of memory. The young monk lost his youth and gained a vicarious lifetime of hardship and woe.

name: Sphere of Safety
text: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
flavor: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.

name: Wave of Reckoning
text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
flavor: We shall suffer turmoil equal to that which we have wrought, whether in this life or the next.

name: Chief Engineer
text: Artifact spells you cast have convoke. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting an artifact spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
flavor: An eye for detail, a mind for numbers, a soul of clockwork.

name: Disdainful Stroke
text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
flavor: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

name: Read the Runes
text: Draw X cards. For each card drawn this way, discard a card unless you sacrifice a permanent.
flavor: "The world is a puzzle, and the mind is its key."

name: Swan Song
text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.
flavor:
"The most enlightened mages create beauty from violence."
—Medomai the Ageless

name: Treasure Cruise
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
flavor: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

name: Vedalken Engineer
text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
flavor: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

name: Festercreep
text:
Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

name: In Garruk's Wake
text: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.
flavor: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

name: Languish
text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor: Life is such a fragile thing.

name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, create a 3/3 red Ogre creature token unless that creature's controller pays {3}.
flavor: Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: It's a long way down.

name: Burgeoning
text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: The first vine shows the others where to grow.

name: Kalonian Hydra
text:
Trample
Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
flavor: Even baloths fear its feeding time.

name: Lurking Predators
text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put that card on the bottom of your library.
flavor: All are prey to the eyes of the wild.

name: Quirion Explorer
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
flavor:
Fight with a friend at your back, steel in your hands, and magic in your veins.
—Quirion creed

name: Rites of Flourishing
text:
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
Each player may play an additional land on each of their turns.
flavor: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

name: Scavenging Ooze
text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

name: Wild Beastmaster
text: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.
flavor: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."

name: Alms Collector
text:
Flash
If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.
flavor: "There is no justice when some profit and others go without."

name: Balan, Wandering Knight
text:
First strike
Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it.
{1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.
flavor: "What weapon will you bear against one who's mastered them all?"

name: Curse of Vitality
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you gain 2 life. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
flavor: Good health beckons many a vigorous follower.

name: Fortunate Few
text: Choose a nonland permanent you don't control, then each other player chooses a nonland permanent they don't control that hasn't been chosen this way. Destroy all other nonland permanents.
flavor: "... Is it over?"

name: Scalelord Reckoner
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.
flavor: The justice of dragons demands more than just an eye for an eye.

name: Galecaster Colossus
text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.

name: Kindred Discovery
text:
As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
flavor: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.

name: Magus of the Mind
text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mind: Shuffle your library, then exile the top X cards, where X is one plus the number of spells cast this turn. Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
flavor: "I'll show you what you truly desire."

name: Bloodline Necromancer
text:
Lifelink
When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."

name: Boneyard Scourge
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control dies while Boneyard Scourge is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return Boneyard Scourge from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Death arrives on tattered wings and stolen bones.

name: Curse of Disturbance
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
flavor: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.

name: Kindred Dominance
text: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
flavor: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.

name: New Blood
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Vampire you control.
Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.
flavor:
"Now isn't that better?"
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Vindictive Lich
text:
When Vindictive Lich dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Target opponent loses 5 life.
flavor: Heart, mind, soul—weapons all.

name: Bloodsworn Steward
text:
Flying
Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.
flavor: "My liege will lead and I will follow—to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."

name: Crimson Honor Guard
text:
Trample
At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.
flavor: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

name: Curse of Opulence
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

name: Kindred Charge
text: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: For goblins, quantity is quality.

name: Curse of Bounty
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.
flavor: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.

name: Qasali Slingers
text:
Reach
Whenever Qasali Slingers or another Cat enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: All things will crumble, whether by time or by force.

name: Traverse the Outlands
text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: With such great footsteps, everything is within walking distance.

name: Divine Reckoning
text:
Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest.
Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Survival of the purest.

name: Leonin Shikari
text: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.
flavor: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.

name: Rout
text:
You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"End this. What I seek is far greater."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Spirit of the Hearth
text:
Flying
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."

name: Sunscorch Regent
text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Sunspear Shikari
text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
flavor: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

name: Archaeomancer
text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

name: Clone Legion
text: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
flavor: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.

name: Polymorphist's Jest
text: Until end of turn, each creature target player controls loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor:
"The flies were bothering me."
—Jalira, master polymorphist

name: Serendib Sorcerer
text: {T}: Target creature other than Serendib Sorcerer has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Even a dragon is humble as a kitten if it thinks itself a slave."

name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.
flavor: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

name: Apprentice Necromancer
text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.
flavor: A mage willing to dedicate his life to his craft.

name: Crux of Fate
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
flavor: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

name: Damnable Pact
text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.
flavor:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Falkenrath Noble
text:
Flying
Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

name: Vampire Nighthawk
text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
flavor: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

name: Rakish Heir
text: Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "If you're not having fun, what's the point of living forever?"

name: Utvara Hellkite
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

name: Elemental Bond
text: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor:
"I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way."
—Nissa Revane

name: Jedit Ojanen of Efrava
text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
Whenever Jedit Ojanen of Efrava attacks or blocks, create a 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature token with forestwalk.
flavor: The cat warriors recognized this Jedit's face, but not his fierce loyalty to Efrava.

name: Relic Crush
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

name: Soul's Majesty
text: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.
flavor: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

name: Temur Sabertooth
text: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: The Temur see themselves as a pack, their bonds more primal than the Abzan's.

name: Empyrial Storm
text:
When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor: An inspiring and glorious ascent.

name: Echo Storm
text:
When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Create a token that's a copy of target artifact.
flavor: An organized and methodical reproduction.

name: Estrid's Invocation
text: You may have Estrid's Invocation enter the battlefield as a copy of an enchantment you control, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile this enchantment. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."
flavor: Enchanters add layer upon layer of complexity to the world around them.

name: Ever-Watching Threshold
text: Whenever an opponent attacks, if they attacked you and/or a planeswalker you control, draw a card.
flavor:
"You think they know we're here?"
—Orlo, goblin raider

name: Loyal Drake
text:
Flying
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, draw a card.
flavor:
"Doves and pigeons are too subtle. When I send a message, I want it to have some teeth."
—Aeschel, royal diplomat

name: Bloodtracker
text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker.
When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "Flee all you like. The further you run the more firmly I feel your heartbeat."

name: Loyal Subordinate
text:
Menace
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, each opponent loses 3 life.
flavor: Zombies work best when they're fed appropriately, so it's prudent to let them eat on the job.

name: Skull Storm
text:
When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Each opponent who can't loses half their life, rounded up.
flavor: A rapid and catastrophic decline.

name: Enchanter's Bane
text: At the beginning of your end step, target enchantment deals damage equal to its mana value to its controller unless that player sacrifices it.
flavor: Those who fail to respect power will soon be consumed by it.

name: Treasure Nabber
text: Whenever an opponent taps an artifact for mana, gain control of that artifact until the end of your next turn.
flavor: The Law of Givesies Backsies is respected by every noble pursuer of shiny things.

name: Crash of Rhino Beetles
text:
Trample
Crash of Rhino Beetles gets +10/+10 as long as you control ten or more lands.
flavor:
"When the herd moves, so should you."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Loyal Guardian
text:
Trample
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor: Each scar on its hide is a badge of honor.

name: Myth Unbound
text:
Your commander costs {1} less to cast for each time it's been cast from the command zone this game.
Whenever your commander is put into the command zone from anywhere, draw a card.
flavor: There are precious few names that echo throughout the Multiverse.

name: Nylea's Colossus
text: Constellation — Whenever Nylea's Colossus or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor:
"Those who seek my protection shall receive it."
—Nylea, god of the hunt

name: Ravenous Slime
text:
Ravenous Slime can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
If a creature an opponent controls would die, instead exile it and put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to that creature's power on Ravenous Slime.
flavor: Death eventually wiggles toward us all.

name: Turntimber Sower
text:
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
{G}, Sacrifice three creatures: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Zendikar's wounds can be healed."

name: Whiptongue Hydra
text:
Reach
When Whiptongue Hydra enters the battlefield, destroy all creatures with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on Whiptongue Hydra for each creature destroyed this way.
flavor:
"Where'd all the birds go?"
—Kaldrin, jungle sightseer

name: Soul Snare
text: {W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.
flavor:
"Body and spirit are sworn enemies. They will take any excuse to be rid of each other."
—Tariel, Reckoner of Souls

name: Unquestioned Authority
text:
Enchant creature
When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.
flavor: After Gideon cleansed the Ninth District, none of the ganglords challenged the Boros.

name: Dictate of Kruphix
text:
Flash
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
flavor: "Knowledge is cruel. It will break your heart and test your allegiances. Are you certain you want this curse?"

name: Ponder
text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

name: Saheeli's Artistry
text:
Choose one or both —
• Create a token that's a copy of target artifact.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.
flavor: "From the first touch, I know exactly what the metal wants to be."

name: Sigiled Starfish
text: {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Kruphix hid the most dire prophecies about humankind where humans would never find them and tritons wouldn't care to read them.

name: Treasure Hunt
text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
flavor:
"The longer the journey, the more one learns."
—Isanke, Halimar seastalker

name: Vow of Flight
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
flavor:
"Soaring is wasted on the winged."
—Edric, Spymaster of Trest

name: Whitewater Naiads
text: Constellation — Whenever Whitewater Naiads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Stand against the crash of the river's rapids and you will know the power of the naiads.

name: Moonlight Bargain
text: Look at the top five cards of your library. For each card, put that card into your graveyard unless you pay 2 life. Then put the rest into your hand.
flavor: At every fifth full moon, the Moon Market convenes to peddle Ravnica's most forbidden wares.

name: Aura Gnarlid
text:
Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it.
Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.
flavor: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

name: Eidolon of Blossoms
text: Constellation — Whenever Eidolon of Blossoms or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor: The emotional echoes of dryad gatherings attract lost souls.

name: Enchantress's Presence
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.
flavor: "The wise learn from successes as well as mistakes."

name: Epic Proportions
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and has trample.
flavor: From mite to mighty.

name: Explosive Vegetation
text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

name: Ground Seal
text:
When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
flavor:
"Let all we have buried be buried forever."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Herald of the Pantheon
text:
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor: The distinction of bearing the gods' banner is nothing compared to the glory of being closer to Nyx.

name: Hydra Omnivore
text: Whenever Hydra Omnivore deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.
flavor:
"We should learn from the hydra. It never plays favorites; it devours everyone equally."
—Thrass, elder druid

name: Kruphix's Insight
text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. Put up to three enchantment cards from among them into your hand and the rest of the revealed cards into your graveyard.
flavor: The horizon is tantalizing in both its uncertainty and its potential.

name: Moldgraf Monstrosity
text:
Trample
When Moldgraf Monstrosity dies, exile it, then return two creature cards at random from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: The border between life and death is as thin as a layer of topsoil.

name: Scute Mob
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.
flavor:
"Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs."
—Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

name: Vow of Wildness
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
flavor:
"Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath—or wishes it could."
—Karador, Ghost Chieftain

name: Cliffside Rescuer
text:
Vigilance
{T}, Sacrifice Cliffside Rescuer: Target permanent you control gains protection from each of your opponents until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything controlled by those players.)
flavor: "Keep going! I'll buy you time!"

name: Commander's Insignia
text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
flavor: At the general's triumphant return, renewed strength surged through the soldiers' ranks.

name: Doomed Artisan
text:
Sculptures you control can't attack or block.
At the beginning of your end step, create a colorless Sculpture artifact creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Sculptures you control."
flavor: "Remember me not as I am, but as I should have been."

name: Song of the Worldsoul
text: Whenever you cast a spell, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor: "Mat'Selesnya sings out, and life flourishes in answer."

name: Leadership Vacuum
text:
Target player returns each commander they control from the battlefield to the command zone.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"While they scramble to fill the sudden vacancy at the top, we strike."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Mass Diminish
text:
Until your next turn, creatures target player controls have base power and toughness 1/1.
Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Transformed from brute to cute.

name: Sudden Substitution
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Exchange control of target noncreature spell and target creature. Then the spell's controller may choose new targets for it.
flavor: "Bow before the might of—wait, what?"

name: Mire in Misery
text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or enchantment.
flavor: Misery loves company.

name: Ghired's Belligerence
text: Ghired's Belligerence deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Whenever a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor:
"Harmony is no longer an option."
—Ghired, Conclave exile

name: Hate Mirage
text: Choose up to two target creatures you don't control. For each of those creatures, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: A trick of the light, though momentary, can still be deadly.

name: Skyfire Phoenix
text:
Flying, haste
When you cast your commander, return Skyfire Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Its fury sets the clouds alight.

name: Tectonic Hellion
text:
Haste
Whenever Tectonic Hellion attacks, each player who controls the most lands sacrifices two lands.
flavor: Hellions measure their meals in mountains.

name: Wildfire Devils
text: When Wildfire Devils enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
flavor: Devils sow grief and harvest glee.

name: Apex Altisaur
text:
When Apex Altisaur enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
Enrage — Whenever Apex Altisaur is dealt damage, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
flavor: It brings belligerence to new heights.

name: Full Flowering
text: Populate X times. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control. Do this X times.)
flavor: A swirl of light, a whisper through the leaves, and all at once the forest came to life.

name: Ohran Frostfang
text:
Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: Silent as a snowdrift. Inexorable as an avalanche.

name: Selesnya Eulogist
text: {2}{G}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor: "Let the example of the fallen inspire us all to greater courage."

name: Voice of Many
text: When Voice of Many enters the battlefield, draw a card for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.
flavor: His words echo every roar, screech, and howl of the wilds.

name: Intangible Virtue
text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
