flavor: You see your next disguise in every stranger's smile.

name: Sword Coast Sailor
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, this creature can't be blocked this turn."
flavor: You were born at sea, and your legs are steadiest when the waves are rowdiest.

name: Tymora's Invoker
text: Sleight of Hand — {8}: Draw two cards.
flavor: "May Lady Luck smile upon you some other day, pal."

name: Winter Eladrin
text: Gust of Wind — When Winter Eladrin enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "If you want a warm welcome, you'll have to seek it elsewhere."

name: Young Blue Dragon // Sand Augury
text: Flying
flavor: "I see the far side of tomorrow and the lost memories of queens. What do you wish to learn?"

name: Agent of the Iron Throne
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever an artifact or creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life."
flavor: You give your clients what they want at a fair price. What happens after that is none of your concern.

name: Agent of the Shadow Thieves
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn."
flavor: Your skill, dexterity, and moral flexibility make you a valuable asset to your guild.

name: Armor of Shadows
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor:
"What's softer than silk, stronger than steel, and quieter than thought?"
—Warlock riddle

name: Arms of Hadar
text: Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: Burning slowly into annihilation, the elder evil Hadar grants fearsome powers to warlocks willing to help satiate its dark hunger.

name: Astarion's Thirst
text: Exile target creature. Put X +1/+1 counters on a commander creature you control, where X is the power of the creature exiled this way.
flavor:
"Stop bleeding. It's distracting."
—Astarion, the Decadent

name: Atrocious Experiment
text: Target player mills two cards, draws two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: There is no line Jon Irenicus would not cross to regain his lost immortality.

name: Blood Money
text: Destroy all creatures. For each nontoken creature destroyed this way, you create a tapped Treasure token.
flavor: For the patriar class, wealth is in the blood.

name: Bonecaller Cleric
text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice Bonecaller Cleric: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: The bell's unearthly chime slips into the ears of the dead, waking them rudely from their eternal slumber.

name: Call to the Void
text: Each player secretly chooses a creature they control and a creature they don't control. Then those choices are revealed. Destroy each creature chosen this way.
flavor: Bhaal's mortal children carried within them a darkness that, left unchecked, would devour them all.

name: Chain Devil
text: Animate Chains — When Chain Devil enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a nontoken creature.
flavor: To these fiends, there's no symphony more beautiful than the melodies of rattling chains and ripping flesh.

name: Cloudkill
text: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone.
flavor: As the acrid fumes drifted through the Lower City, even the vermin ceased to stir.

name: Criminal Past
text: Commander creatures you own have menace and "This creature gets +X/+0, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard." (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: You've never cared much for laws or authority, especially when they get in your way.

name: Cultist of the Absolute
text: Commander creatures you own get +3/+3 and have flying, deathtouch, "Ward—Pay 3 life," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."
flavor: You embrace power at any cost, and if it consumes you, so be it.

name: Eldritch Pact
text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of cards in their graveyard.
flavor: The Night Serpent tasted the warlock's ambition and savored the dark hunger in her soul.

name: Guildsworn Prowler
text:
Deathtouch
When Guildsworn Prowler dies, if it wasn't blocking, draw a card.
flavor: "Of course it's part of my plan. Who do you think started the bar fight?"

name: Mold Folk
text:
Lifelink
Mold Harvest — {1}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mold Folk.
flavor:
"Corpses of those slain by russet mold grow new moldies. Not the legacy most of us aspire to."
—Elminster

name: Myrkul's Invoker
text: Psychic Blades — {8}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: "Your death will make a fine tribute for the Lord of Bones."

name: Nefarious Imp
text:
Flying
Whenever one or more permanents you control leave the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: It listens to all of their plans and plots creative ways to turn them to ruin.

name: Passageway Seer
text:
Lifelink
When Passageway Seer enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have the initiative, put a +1/+1 counter on Passageway Seer.
flavor: "I'm certain there's a shortcut here . . ."

name: Scion of Halaster
text: Commander creatures you own have "The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard and the other back on top of your library. Then draw a card."
flavor: Most see the Mad Mage as a deranged menace, but you recognize the genius behind his paranoia.

name: Shadowheart, Dark Justiciar
text:
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
flavor: "Shar's will shall be done. As sure as night will fall."

name: Stirge
text:
Flying
Stirge can't block.
Blood Drain — {1}{B}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Stirge: Draw a card.
flavor:
"I will never complain about mosquitos again."
—Imoen

name: Summon Undead
text: You may mill three cards. Then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor: The air itself shuddered at the wizard's words, and from the dark beyond, her call was answered.

name: Topaz Dragon // Entropic Cloud
text: Flying, deathtouch
flavor: What its gaze doesn't wither, its breath surely will.

name: Underdark Explorer
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Underdark Explorer enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
flavor: "Keep your fancy magic. All I need is a hook and a sturdy length of rope."

name: Vrock
text:
Flying
Toxic Spores — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, each opponent loses 3 life.
flavor:
"Don't try to bribe them. They'll take your gold *and* your liver."
—Volo's field notes

name: Zhentarim Bandit
text: Whenever Zhentarim Bandit attacks, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor:
"The Zhentarim are ruthless, unscrupulous, and dishonest. But I must admit, they are effective."
—Commander Liara Portyr

name: Amethyst Dragon // Explosive Crystal
text: Flying, haste
flavor:
"At least it's a beautiful way to die."
—Erinis, gloom stalker

name: Bhaal's Invoker
text: Scorching Ray — {8}: Bhaal's Invoker deals 4 damage to each opponent.
flavor: "The Lord of Murder has freed me from the shackles of mortal laws and gifted me with fire to carry out his will."

name: Breath Weapon
text: Breath Weapon deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature.
flavor: "In the name of Tempus, Lord of Battles, you will die honorably in righteous fire."

name: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
text: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: The essence of red dragon burns within, always ready to rise with wrath.

name: Coronation of Chaos
text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Goad them. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
flavor: When Sarevok's deception was unmasked, the cheering crowd erupted into an outraged mob.

name: Dragon Cultist
text: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a source you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."
flavor: You know that mighty dracoliches will one day rule over this world. For you, that day can't come soon enough.

name: Earth Tremor
text: Earth Tremor deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor:
"Every cave-in is Moradin telling you to leave the earth where it is."
—Halgar, dwarven recluse

name: Elturel Survivors
text:
Trample, myriad
As long as Elturel Survivors is attacking, it gets +X/+0, where X is the number of lands defending player controls.
flavor: They fought with the desperate courage of those who have nothing left to lose.

name: Fang Dragon // Forktail Sweep
text: Flying
flavor:
"Watch out for its teeth, tail, claws, wings, back, and front."
—Olga, cavalier

name: Fireball
text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.
flavor: The orchard soon reeked of sulfur, smoke, and scorched bugbear, with just a hint of peach.

name: Guild Artisan
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, you create two Treasure tokens." (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Your discerning eye for value makes you nearly impossible to swindle.

name: Ingenious Artillerist
text: Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, Ingenious Artillerist deals that much damage to each opponent.
flavor: "Sure, you can help me calibrate the aiming mechanism. Stand over there."

name: Inspired Tinkering
text:
Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Create three Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "What do you mean 'Does it work?' What an insulting question."

name: Livaan, Cultist of Tiamat
text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
flavor: Her hunger for power consumes what the fire cannot.

name: Nemesis Phoenix
text:
Flying
{2}{R}: Return Nemesis Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking. Activate only during the declare attackers step and only if you're attacking two or more opponents.
flavor: A flame as bright and merciless as the sun.

name: Pack Attack
text:
Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of players being attacked.
Draw a card.
flavor: Kobold tactics rarely account for little things like diplomacy, mercy, or surrender.

name: Patron of the Arts
text: When Patron of the Arts enters the battlefield or dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "It's okay. My mother owns the museum."

name: Popular Entertainer
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor: The last thing anyone would describe you as is shy. You love the spotlight, and it loves you back.

name: Reckless Barbarian
text: Sacrifice Reckless Barbarian: Add {R}{R}.
flavor: The best defense is not even knowing what the word "defense" means.

name: Stirring Bard
text:
Defender
When Stirring Bard enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
Mantle of Inspiration — {T}: Target creature gains menace and haste until end of turn.
flavor: At the first sign of danger, she breaks out the power chords.

name: Storm King's Thunder
text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell X times. You may choose new targets for the copies.
flavor:
"I alone am worthy to decide where lighting strikes."
—Hekaton, storm giant king

name: Street Urchin
text: Commander creatures you own have "{1}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: Your harsh upbringing on the streets of the city left you crafty, resilient, and wise beyond your years.

name: Taunting Kobold
text:
Haste
Whenever Taunting Kobold attacks, goad target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor: Pozo's heart was full of courage, right up until it was full of elven steel.

name: Tavern Brawler
text: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's mana value. You may play that card this turn."
flavor: The only thing you love more than a good drink is a good fight. Luckily, one usually follows the other.

name: Warehouse Thief
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
flavor: Wealthy patriars make up the vast majority of both his victims and his customers.

name: Wrathful Red Dragon
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target that isn't a Dragon.
flavor: "We'll put it all back! The gems, the gold, the chalice that would've looked great on my mantle; we'll put everythi—"

name: Young Red Dragon // Bathe in Gold
text:
Flying
Young Red Dragon can't block.
flavor: For most, deadly. For a dragon, decadent.

name: Acolyte of Bahamut
text: Commander creatures you own have "The first Dragon spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast."
flavor: You were on a wayward path until Bahamut showed you that power and kindness can unite beneath the same banner.

name: Ambitious Dragonborn
text: Ambitious Dragonborn enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control and creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: The raging green dragon left destruction—and at least one admirer—in its wake.

name: Avenging Hunter
text:
Trample
When Avenging Hunter enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
flavor: "I will remember my friends. But you? You won't be remembered at all."

name: Band Together
text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.
flavor: "Boo, let's see how this miscreant handles a furry missile of justice!"

name: Barroom Brawl
text: Target creature you control fights target creature the opponent to your left controls. Then that player may copy this spell and may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: "I'll see your three dragons and raise you two fists!"

name: Carefree Swinemaster
text: Whenever Carefree Swinemaster attacks, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, create a 2/2 green Boar creature token that's tapped and attacking.
flavor: "C'mon, Boodigan, let's go see what kind of treasure this place has!"

name: Cloakwood Hermit
text: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create two tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens."
flavor: You've always preferred the company of animals to people.

name: Cloakwood Swarmkeeper
text: Gathered Swarm — Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Cloakwood Swarmkeeper.
flavor: When he's threatened, the forest buzzes and the air hums with dragonfly wings.

name: Colossal Badger // Dig Deep
text: When Colossal Badger enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: Rip through enough dirt and you'll eventually find something edible.

name: Draconic Muralists
text: When Draconic Muralists dies, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "We must never allow the deeds of our great ancestors to be forgotten."

name: Dread Linnorm // Scale Deflection
text: Dread Linnorm can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or less.
flavor: A serpent's cruelty, a dragon's appetite.

name: Druidic Ritual
text: You may mill three cards. Then return up to one creature card and up to one land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor: Bone, root, and seed—the past, the present, and future in one handful of earth.

name: Emerald Dragon // Dissonant Wave
text: Flying, trample
flavor: Emerald dragons hate prying eyes, and they have a host of ways to deter them.

name: Ettercap // Web Shot
text: Reach
flavor:
"Filthy, sticky, vile, noxious—and I haven't even started describing the webs."
—Erinis, gloom stalker

name: Explore the Underdark
text:
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
You take the initiative.
flavor:
"Careful near those pretty glowing plants. What do you think they feed on?"
—Talin, Underdark guide

name: Hardy Outlander
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power."
flavor: You're a born explorer, happiest forging your way through the untamed wilds.

name: Jaheira, Friend of the Forest
text:
Tokens you control have "{T}: Add {G}."
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
flavor: "The Harpers' movement grows, but it needs sunlight to blossom. We can be that light."

name: Lurking Green Dragon
text:
Flying
Lurking Green Dragon can't attack unless defending player controls a creature with flying.
flavor:
"Territorial. Scary. No further notes."
—Volo's field notes

name: Master Chef
text: Commander creatures you own have "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it" and "Other creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them."
flavor: You never thought "rations" was an appropriate term for the feasts you prepare for your party.

name: Monster Manual // Zoological Study
text: {1}{G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: The detail really makes the monsters jump off the page.

name: Myconid Spore Tender
text: Infesting Spores — When Myconid Spore Tender enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: Myconid colonies grow and expand at an aggressive rate, but they are friendly and peaceful unless provoked.

name: Owlbear Shepherd
text: At the beginning of your end step, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, draw a card.
flavor: When your pack is nowhere to be found, you form a new one.

name: Poison the Blade
text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Breath of basilisk, sting of scorpion, or medusa's tears? All may be distilled, for a price."

name: Raised by Giants
text: Commander creatures you own have base power and toughness 10/10 and are Giants in addition to their other types.
flavor: Your parents taught you that strength can be nurtured and honed, no matter one's size.

name: Saddle of the Cavalier
text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or less.
Equip {3}
flavor:
". . . and I will need an equally righteous but slightly smaller saddle for my space hamster companion."
—Minsc, beloved ranger

name: Scaled Nurturer
text: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, you gain 2 life.
flavor: "Life always starts small. Only time will tell what heights it may reach."

name: Silvanus's Invoker
text: Conjure Elemental — {8}: Untap target land you control. It becomes an 8/8 Elemental creature with trample and haste until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor: "Arise, friend, and seize the horizon in the name of the Oak Father."

name: Split the Spoils
text: Exile up to five target permanent cards from your graveyard and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. (Piles can be empty.)
flavor: "That half is yours. These halves are mine."

name: Undercellar Myconid
text:
Whenever Undercellar Myconid enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: Water, barley, yeast, darkness—the tavern cellar had everything a growing mold could need.

name: Charcoal Diamond
text:
Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
flavor: Every facet a portent of Kelemvor's inevitable judgment.

name: Fire Diamond
text:
Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
flavor: Every facet aglow like iron in Moradin's mighty forge.

name: Marble Diamond
text:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
flavor: Every facet a benediction of Lathander's light.

name: Moss Diamond
text:
Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor: Every facet a promise of Chauntea's bounty.

name: Sky Diamond
text:
Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
flavor: Every facet a window into Oghma's divine insight.

name: Black Dragon Gate
text:
Black Dragon Gate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Black Dragon Gate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: An imposing visage that looms over all who would rise above their station.

name: Citadel Gate
text:
Citadel Gate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Citadel Gate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: A beacon of order and safety, for those who can afford it.

name: Cliffgate
text:
Cliffgate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Cliffgate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: A partition between the hopeless living and the restless dead.

name: Manor Gate
text:
Manor Gate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Manor Gate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: A barrier that shields privileged eyes from the city's woes.

name: Sea Gate
text:
Sea Gate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Sea Gate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: An efficient route from a smuggler's ship to a patriar's manor.

name: Folk Hero
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever you cast a spell that shares a creature type with this creature, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn."
flavor: Tales of your great deeds follow you no matter how far you travel from your hometown.

name: Clan Crafter
text: Commander creatures you own have "{2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and draw a card."
flavor: Trained by a dwarven master, you see the potential in every scrap of metal.

name: Passionate Archaeologist
text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever you cast a spell from exile, this creature deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to target opponent."
flavor: You can't remember a time when you didn't feel the pull of forgotten stories and buried secrets.

name: Stick Together
text: Each player chooses a party from among creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest. (To choose a party, choose up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: Every veteran adventurer will tell you to stick with your party, because the ones who split up aren't around to give advice.

name: Irregular Cohort
text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
When Irregular Cohort enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.
flavor: Where fickle form meets lasting loyalty.

name: Mage's Attendant
text: When Mage's Attendant enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token with "{1}, Sacrifice this creature: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}."
flavor: Crime sometimes makes unlikely allies into lifelong friends.

name: Mother of Runes
text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "My family protects all families."

name: Order of Whiteclay
text: {1}{W}{W}, {Q}: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor: Made from the clay of burial mounds, the face paint of the priests is a sign of their respect for those whose rest they interrupt.

name: Rumor Gatherer
text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, draw a card instead.
flavor: "It's delightful, the things their owners reveal when they think no one is listening."

name: Selfless Spirit
text:
Flying
Sacrifice Selfless Spirit: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: "There is always more to give."

name: Angler Turtle
text:
Hexproof
Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
flavor: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.

name: Dissipation Field
text: Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Strike me once, shame on you. Strike me twice . . . Well, let's just see if you can."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Forgotten Creation
text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
flavor:
"My earliest work escapes me."
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Fractured Sanity
text:
Each opponent mills fourteen cards.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Fractured Sanity, each opponent mills four cards.
flavor: The body grows stronger under stress. The mind does not.

name: Keiga, the Tide Star
text:
Flying
When Keiga, the Tide Star dies, gain control of target creature.
flavor: The pull of the tide star holds eternal sway.

name: Reflections of Littjara
text:
As Reflections of Littjara enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, copy that spell. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
flavor: The masks float downstream toward the Mirrorlake, where faces arise to wear them.

name: Sludge Monster
text:
Whenever Sludge Monster enters the battlefield or attacks, put a slime counter on up to one other target creature.
Non-Horror creatures with slime counters on them lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 2/2.
flavor: Tracking it isn't the hard part.

name: Bloodsoaked Champion
text:
Bloodsoaked Champion can't block.
Raid — {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if you attacked this turn.
flavor: "Death is merely another foe the Mardu will overcome."

name: Calculating Lich
text:
Menace
Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.
flavor: "We share a common enemy. Does that not make us friends?"

name: Changeling Outcast
text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Changeling Outcast can't block and can't be blocked.
flavor: A mercurial face sows distrust. Distrust reaps a lonely life.

name: Crippling Fear
text: Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Panic spread like wildfire as the demons of Immersturm poured into Bretagard, slaughtering as they came.

name: Dire Fleet Ravager
text:
Menace, deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of their life, rounded up.
flavor: His fists fume with the decay of death, each strike a plague on the hearts of his enemies.

name: Malakir Blood-Priest
text: When Malakir Blood-Priest enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "From your veins to mine."

name: Nighthawk Scavenger
text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
Nighthawk Scavenger's power is equal to 1 plus the number of card types among cards in your opponents' graveyards. (Cards in graveyards have only the characteristics of their front face.)
flavor: Under Drana's leadership, vampires are finding new strength in unity.

name: Avatar of Slaughter
text: All creatures have double strike and attack each combat if able.
flavor:
"Diplomacy has solved nothing. Only bloodspill can end this now. Call forth the warbringer."
—Basandra, Battle Seraph

name: Bonecrusher Giant // Stomp
text: Whenever Bonecrusher Giant becomes the target of a spell, Bonecrusher Giant deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.
flavor: Not every tale ends in glory.

name: Brash Taunter
text:
Indestructible
Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.
flavor: "You hit like a kobold!"

name: Demon Bolt
text:
Demon Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor:
"Burn them from the sky."
—Varragoth

name: Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
text:
Flying
Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.
flavor:
"Spread out, you idiots! Spread out!"
—Marsden, party leader, last words

name: Embereth Shieldbreaker // Battle Display
flavor: "Courage is the only shield I need."

name: Geode Rager
text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
flavor: Its crystalline core refracts light into chaos.

name: Jeska's Will
text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.
• Add {R} for each card in target opponent's hand.
• Exile the top three cards of your library. You may play them this turn.
flavor:
"Gather your strength. Prepare yourself."
—Jeska, to Radha

name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
text:
Flying
When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: The course of the falling star always ends in ruin.

name: Thunder Dragon
text:
Flying
When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: Sometimes primitive cultures attributed natural phenomena to monsters. Sometimes they were right.

name: Urabrask the Hidden
text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor: When the Mirran resistance arrived, the furnace dwellers looked to Urabrask for guidance. His decree stunned the others: "Let them be."

name: Arasta of the Endless Web
text:
Reach
Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.
flavor: Her webs, spun from her own hair, reach from Nyx to the mortal world and even into the Underworld.

name: End-Raze Forerunners
text:
Vigilance, trample, haste
When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Smash this city to pieces."
—Domri Rade

name: Lovestruck Beast // Heart's Desire
text: Lovestruck Beast can't attack unless you control a 1/1 creature.
flavor: His mind chose solitude, but his heart disagreed.

name: Three Visits
text: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: Those who love the woods only wish to spread its majesty.

name: Castle Embereth
text:
Castle Embereth enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain.
{T}: Add {R}.
{1}{R}{R}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Without Embereth's courage, the realm would falter and fall.

name: Castle Locthwain
text:
Castle Locthwain enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp.
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}{B}, {T}: Draw a card, then you lose life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor: Without Locthwain's persistence, the realm would stagnate and die.

name: Castle Vantress
text:
Castle Vantress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island.
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Scry 2.
flavor: Without Vantress's knowledge, the realm would lose itself in darkness.

name: Rhystic Study
text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
flavor: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you *need* to know.

name: Riddlekeeper
text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller mills two cards.
flavor: Fools surrender their sanity to his riddles. Even greater fools try to solve them.

name: Slipstream Eel
text:
Slipstream Eel can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "It's a fine way to travel, if you don't mind the smell."

name: Buried Alive
text: Search your library for up to three creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.
flavor: The scrape of shovels and the tumble of cold dirt soon muffled their pleas.

name: Syphon Flesh
text: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.
flavor: Necromancers deal in commodities far more precious than gold and grain.

name: Brawn
text:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.
flavor:
"'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
—*Scroll of Beginnings*

name: Bathe in Light
text: Radiance — Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
flavor: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

name: Righteous Cause
text: Whenever a creature attacks, you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Until the world unites in vengeful fury and Phage is destroyed, I will not stay my hand."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Shattered Angel
text:
Flying
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may gain 3 life.
flavor: She preaches the blessings of the Machine Orthodoxy.

name: Dread Cacodemon
text: When Dread Cacodemon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all creatures your opponents control, then tap all other creatures you control.
flavor: Those who hear its roar perish. The lucky ones only feel its fetid breath.

name: Razorjaw Oni
text: Black creatures can't block.
flavor: It gnashed its teeth, and the battlefield filled with the screech of blade striking blade.

name: Cleansing Beam
text: Radiance — Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
flavor:
"Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty."
—Razia, Boros archangel

name: Death by Dragons
text: Each player other than target player creates a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor: Suddenly, Eldo felt very alone.

name: Oni of Wild Places
text:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purr from the rumbling depths of nightmare.

name: Stranglehold
text:
Your opponents can't search libraries.
If an opponent would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.
flavor: The correct answer to a barbarian's riddle is to choke on your cleverness and die.

name: Sulfurous Blast
text: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.
flavor: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.

name: Vow of Lightning
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
flavor:
"Ruhan would never agree to such terms."
—Ruhan of the Fomori

name: Celestial Force
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Wishing upon only one star seems like a failure of imagination."
—Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

name: False Prophet
text: When False Prophet dies, exile all creatures.
flavor: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"

name: Martyr's Bond
text: Whenever Martyr's Bond or another nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.
flavor:
"Our lives are connected by divine law. The truth of this will be made evident in time."
—Zedruu the Greathearted

name: Monk Realist
text: When Monk Realist enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor: "We plant the seeds of doubt to harvest the crop of wisdom."

name: Spurnmage Advocate
text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor: "Our unity humbles our foes."

name: Gomazoa
text:
Defender, flying
{T}: Put Gomazoa and each creature it's blocking on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle.
flavor: To explorers, "point man" is a polite way of saying "gomazoa fodder."

name: Murmurs from Beyond
text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.
flavor: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.

name: Perilous Research
text: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.
flavor: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

name: Repulse
text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor: "You aren't invited."

name: Vedalken Plotter
text: When Vedalken Plotter enters the battlefield, exchange control of target land you control and target land an opponent controls.
flavor: "Fair? At what point in our negotiations did you convince yourself my goal was to be fair?"

name: Attrition
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor:
"I will trade life for life with the insurgents. Our resources, unlike theirs, are limitless."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Doom Blade
text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

name: Footbottom Feast
text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavor: The scent of rot and vinegar fills the marsh, inviting boggarts from every warren to reunite and feast.

name: Vow of Malice
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has intimidate, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor:
"I grant you blades—on the condition that they are not pointed at me."
—Damia, Sage of Stone

name: Goblin Cadets
text: Whenever Goblin Cadets blocks or becomes blocked, target opponent gains control of it. (This removes Goblin Cadets from combat.)
flavor: "If you kids don't stop that racket, I'm turning this expedition around *right now!*"

name: Insurrection
text: Untap all creatures and gain control of them until end of turn. They gain haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"Maybe they wanted to be on the winning side for once."
—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Ruination
text: Destroy all nonbasic lands.
flavor:
"We have built a wall upon sand. The wall will vanish. The sand will remain."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Bestial Menace
text: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor:
"My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Fists of Ironwood
text:
Enchant creature
When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Enchanted creature has trample.
flavor: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

name: Magus of the Vineyard
text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, that player adds {G}{G}.
flavor: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

name: Spawnwrithe
text:
Trample
Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Spawnwrithe.
flavor: Its victims feel only an itchy, wriggling feeling just under their skin. By then, it's far too late.

name: Squallmonger
text: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: "Squall, gale, hurricane—it's all a matter of size . . . and price."

name: Symbiotic Wurm
text: When Symbiotic Wurm dies, create seven 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
flavor: The insects keep the wurm's hide free from parasites. In return, the wurm doesn't eat the insects.

name: Ardenn, Intrepid Archaeologist
text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may attach any number of Auras and Equipment you control to target permanent or player.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "With the right tools, even the sky is within reach."

name: Captain's Call
text: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor:
"Who among you has the courage to face certain death? Who will heed my call?"
—Rayel Vanger, Firstblade of Thune

name: Court of Grace
text:
When Court of Grace enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If you're the monarch, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying instead.
flavor: A righteous sovereign makes for a blessed realm.

name: Court Street Denizen
text: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "The Boros fight for justice. The Azorius fight for law. I hold the line between, and make sure the people are given both."

name: First Response
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
flavor:
"There's never a good time for a disaster or an attack. That's why we're here."
—Oren, militia captain

name: Iona's Judgment
text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

name: Keleth, Sunmane Familiar
text:
Whenever a commander you control attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: She chooses her riders carefully and bears them to glory in battle after battle.

name: Kor Cartographer
text: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

name: Make a Stand
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavor: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.

name: Ninth Bridge Patrol
text: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ninth Bridge Patrol.
flavor: The Consulate keeps watch at each of the eleven bridges to ensure that the market remains a haven for commerce, not for con artists.

name: Open the Armory
text: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "Once Avacyn returned, I hoped I'd never need these things again. I didn't think I'd be dusting them off to use against angels."

name: Palace Sentinels
text: When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor:
"One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Patron of the Valiant
text:
Flying
When Patron of the Valiant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "Bant's most gallant knights wear my sigil, and for that I am humbled."

name: Promise of Tomorrow
text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, exile it.
At the beginning of each end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice Promise of Tomorrow and return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: Death can wait.

name: Raise the Alarm
text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

name: Rebbec, Architect of Ascension
text:
Artifacts you control have protection from each mana value among artifacts you control.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor:
"She sees beyond technology to what it enables."
—Glacian, powerstone engineer

name: Seraphic Greatsword
flavor: Light as a feather. Sharp as an angel's wrath.

name: Skywhaler's Shot
text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

name: Slash the Ranks
text: Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers except for commanders.
flavor: The generals each surveyed their devastated forces. Then, slowly, they turned to each other and raised their swords.

name: Slith Ascendant
text:
Flying
Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.

name: Squad Captain
text:
Vigilance
Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.
flavor: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.

name: Triumphant Reckoning
text: Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: In a flash of a light and a burst of aether, despair turned to hope and defeat turned to victory.

name: Trusty Packbeast
text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Azure Fleet Admiral
text:
When Azure Fleet Admiral enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Azure Fleet Admiral can't be blocked by creatures the monarch controls.
flavor:
"Your concern for my safety is touching, but as long as your gunners remain reliably erratic, I see no reason to change course."
—Admiral Yelise, to Commodore Axurik

name: Flood of Recollection
text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.
flavor: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.

name: Court of Cunning
text:
When Court of Cunning enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, any number of target players each mill two cards. If you're the monarch, each of those players mills ten cards instead. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: A throne built on wisdom cannot be toppled.

name: Daring Saboteur
text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: "They'll never see me coming."

name: Eligeth, Crossroads Augur
text:
Flying
If you would scry a number of cards, draw that many cards instead.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "There's no better place to divine the future than at a nexus of branching presents."

name: Glacian, Powerstone Engineer
text:
{T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor:
"His energy is as boundless as the powerstones'."
—Rebbec, architect of ascension

name: Hullbreacher
text:
Flash
If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "I don't need a map to find riches."

name: Laboratory Drudge
text: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card if you've cast a spell from a graveyard or activated an ability of a card in a graveyard this turn.
flavor:
"Many hands make light work."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Merchant Raiders
text: Whenever Merchant Raiders or another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Merchant Raiders.
flavor: "Tell you what, you keep the rope."

name: Mnemonic Deluge
text: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Copy that card three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs. Exile Mnemonic Deluge.
flavor: Past, present, and future surged through the wizard's mind, bringing a flood of possibilities.

name: Prosperous Pirates
text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

name: Prying Eyes
text: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.
flavor: "Citizen! Your crime has been recorded. Cease movement and await arrest, or further penalties will be immediately imposed."

name: Sailor of Means
text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

name: Scholar of Stars
text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.
flavor: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."

name: Scholar of the Ages
text: When Scholar of the Ages enters the battlefield, return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "I study the past to find hope for the future."

name: Scrapdiver Serpent
text: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.
flavor: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

name: Siren Stormtamer
text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.
flavor: He's the calm that hides the coming storm.

name: Skaab Goliath
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards from your graveyard.
Trample
flavor: Three heads are better than one.

name: Sphinx of the Second Sun
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, there is an additional beginning phase after this phase. (The beginning phase includes the untap, upkeep, and draw steps.)
flavor: He watches in silence as the shadows shift, bringing Amonkhet ever nearer to the Hour of Revelation.

name: Spontaneous Mutation
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor: When the body turns, the mind soon follows.

name: Trove Tracker
text:
When Trove Tracker dies, draw a card.
Encore {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
flavor: The best treasures are the least shared.

name: Warden of Evos Isle
text:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

name: Wrong Turn
text: Target opponent gains control of target creature. (If an attacking or blocking creature changes controllers, it's removed from combat.)
flavor: Its bewildered bellow was met with a stern "shh."

name: Bitter Revelation
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
flavor:
"Here you lie then, Ugin. The corpses of worlds will join you in the tomb."
—Sorin Markov

name: Bladebrand
text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance."
—Judith

name: Corpse Churn
text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"The distraction of your life has ended. Now your service begins."
—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog

name: Court of Ambition
text:
When Court of Ambition enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card. If you're the monarch, instead each opponent loses 6 life unless they discard two cards.
flavor: Watch your step.

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"Well, this can't be a good sign."
—Old Rutstein

name: Cuombajj Witches
text: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.
flavor: All things are connected: light to dark, age to youth, blood to blood.

name: Demonic Lore
text:
When Demonic Lore enters the battlefield, draw three cards.
At the beginning of your end step, you lose 2 life for each card in your hand.
flavor:
"The greatest works of literature leave the reader forever altered."
—Nevinyrral, Urborg tyrant

name: Dhund Operative
text: As long as you control an artifact, Dhund Operative gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch.
flavor: Baral's spies always have the latest technology.

name: Elvish Doomsayer
text: When Elvish Doomsayer dies, each opponent discards a card.
flavor: "From a tiny doubt, the greatest fears grow and flourish. May the weeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

name: Eyeblight Cullers
text: When Eyeblight Cullers dies, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens, then mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"As long as eyeblights exist, the hunt will never end."
—Miara, Thorn of the Glade

name: Eyeblight Massacre
text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"
—Nissa Revane, to Dwynen

name: Falthis, Shadowcat Familiar
text:
Commanders you control have menace and deathtouch.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: She sticks to her chosen master closer than their own shadow.

name: Feast of Succession
text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. You become the monarch.
flavor:
"Beware the eager host."
—Eligeth, crossroads augur

name: Ghastly Demise
text: Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Anyone can snap her fingers and yank a soul. I prefer to kill creatively."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Keskit, the Flesh Sculptor
text:
{T}, Sacrifice three other artifacts and/or creatures: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "Perfection is elusive. Let us try again."

name: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
text:
Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "Approach from downwind. Tread with care. Aim for the heart."

name: Nadier's Nightblade
text: Whenever a token you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Checking around every corner doesn't help if you forget to look up.

name: Necrotic Hex
text: Each player sacrifices six creatures. You create six tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor:
"You foolish knights pound your breastplates and vow to fight until your last breath. As if that's when it ends."
—Tormod, the Desecrator

name: Nightshade Harvester
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Nightshade Harvester.
flavor: "Anywhere the moonlight touches—that's my garden."

name: Null Caller
text: {3}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: Zendikar's defenders include both healers and vampires. One way or another, the fallen will return to the fight.

name: Pride of the Perfect
text: Elves you control get +2/+0.
flavor: Like moonglove's flowers, the greatest beauty often masks the greatest dangers.

name: Profane Transfusion
text: Two target players exchange life totals. You create an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token, where X is the difference between those players' life totals.
flavor:
"Those that fall short of perfection can still contribute to the Great Work."
—Keskit, the Flesh Sculptor

name: Spark Harvest
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

name: Thorn of the Black Rose
text:
Deathtouch
When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of persuasion.

name: Tormod, the Desecrator
text:
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "Life is but the precursor to a long and successful death."

name: Vow of Torment
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has menace, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"Peace is a privilege you haven't earned."
—Tevesh Szat

name: Alena, Kessig Trapper
text:
First strike
{T}: Add an amount of {R} equal to the greatest power among creatures you control that entered the battlefield this turn.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "Halana and I have a bond that'll never be broken."

name: Brazen Freebooter
text: When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Finders, keepers.

name: Burning Anger
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target."
flavor: "With rage as your forge, your hammer can smite anything."

name: Champion of the Flame
text:
Trample
Champion of the Flame gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
flavor: Grand Warlord Radha's challengers are always defeated, but she rewards the most passionate with the Flame of Keld. After that, they burn for her.

name: Coercive Recruiter
text: Whenever Coercive Recruiter or another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gains haste and becomes a Pirate in addition to its other types.
flavor: "Choose, vampire: our hat on your head, or no hat, no head."

name: Court of Ire
text:
When Court of Ire enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Court of Ire deals 2 damage to any target. If you're the monarch, it deals 7 damage instead.
flavor: Hold your tongue, lest you burn it.

name: Crimson Fleet Commodore
text:
Trample
When Crimson Fleet Commodore enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor:
"Kindly steer your fleet clear of the waters west of Scrub Isle. It would be a shame to incinerate such exquisite maritime craftsmanship."
—Commodore Axurik, to Admiral Yelise

name: Dragon Egg
text:
Defender
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

name: Emberwilde Captain
text:
When Emberwilde Captain enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever an opponent attacks you while you're the monarch, Emberwilde Captain deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand.
flavor: "You are bold, challenger, but flammable."

name: Explosion of Riches
text: Draw a card, then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way, Explosion of Riches deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.
flavor: "You've got how much gold there?"

name: Fiery Cannonade
text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.
flavor: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort—just in time for the pirates to burn them down.

name: Frenzied Saddlebrute
text:
Haste
All creatures can attack your opponents and planeswalkers your opponents control as though those creatures had haste.
flavor: The drumbeats of the horde echo in every heart.

name: Goblin Trailblazer
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?"
—Daphne Vail, *Diremore* first mate

name: Hellkite Courser
text:
Flying
When Hellkite Courser enters the battlefield, you may put a commander you own from the command zone onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to the command zone at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: The charge was heralded not by horns, but by the dragon's echoing roar.

name: Kediss, Emberclaw Familiar
text:
Whenever a commander you control deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: Kediss loves molten metal, searing flames, and head scratches.

name: Krark, the Thumbless
text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return that spell to its owner's hand. If you win the flip, copy that spell, and you may choose new targets for the copy.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "Double or nothing."

name: Lightning-Rig Crew
text:
{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.
flavor: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.

name: Makeshift Munitions
text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."

name: Port Razer
text:
Whenever Port Razer deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Port Razer can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.
flavor: "Smash and grab, loot and burn, then it is the next town's turn!"

name: Renegade Tactics
text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Nothing against you. It's just that waiting for Consulate clearance was never really my thing."

name: Ripscale Predator
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: As Ravnica's wilds expanded, even advocates for nature had to confront fiercer natural threats.

name: Rograkh, Son of Rohgahh
text:
First strike, menace, trample
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: Strength is relative.

name: Rummaging Goblin
text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

name: Skyraker Giant
text: Reach
flavor: She will not be content until hers is the highest head in the sky.

name: Soulfire Eruption
text: Choose any number of target creatures, planeswalkers, and/or players. For each of them, exile the top card of your library, then Soulfire Eruption deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that permanent or player. You may play the exiled cards until the end of your next turn.
flavor: Forsake flesh. Choose fire.

name: Sparktongue Dragon
text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

name: Welding Sparks
text: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.
flavor:
"The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Wild Celebrants
text: When Wild Celebrants enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
flavor: "You can tell something's really valuable by the sound it makes when you slam your staff into it."

name: Ambush Viper
text:
Flash
Deathtouch
flavor:
"Living creatures seldom impress me. But I like this one."
—Uta Falkenrath

name: Ancient Animus
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if it's legendary. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: Multani's mind grasped for consciousness as rage itself rebuilt his body.

name: Armorcraft Judge
text: When Armorcraft Judge enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Were she not a judge, she'd win the division herself.

name: Biowaste Blob
text:
Oozes you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a commander, create a token that's a copy of Biowaste Blob.
flavor:
"The Simic will be fined for contaminating the waterways. In the meantime, seize that blob!"
—Arrester Polgar

name: Court of Bounty
text:
When Court of Bounty enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you're the monarch, instead you may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: To grow is to triumph.

name: Dawnglade Regent
text:
When Dawnglade Regent enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
As long as you're the monarch, permanents you control have hexproof.
flavor:
"Every creature in the glade paused and stared. Overcome, I bowed to the beast."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Entourage of Trest
text:
When Entourage of Trest enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Entourage of Trest can block an additional creature each combat as long as you're the monarch.
flavor:
"The dim resort to violence, for which the nimble prepare."
—Leovold, emissary of Trest

name: Fyndhorn Elves
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: "We could no more abandon the forest than the stars could abandon the night sky."

name: Gilanra, Caller of Wirewood
text:
{T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a spell with mana value 6 or greater, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: "Something mighty stirs in the forest. Can't you feel it?"

name: Ivy Lane Denizen
text: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

name: Magus of the Order
text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Order and another green creature: Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: "Life for life. The cost is always the same."

name: Molder Beast
text:
Trample
Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"A trail of scrap metal can lead it into an ambush. But take care not to overfeed it."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Numa, Joraga Chieftain
text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {X}{X}. When you do, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target Elves.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor: His blade carves a path for his people. His words guide them along it.

name: Reshape the Earth
text: Search your library for up to ten land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor:
"The land is not dead, merely dormant. It will awaken if you know how to ask."
—Gilanra, Caller of Wirewood

name: Sentinel Spider
text: Vigilance, reach
flavor:
"Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Sifter Wurm
text:
Trample
When Sifter Wurm enters the battlefield, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to that card's mana value.
flavor:
"Rhonas's monument belongs to the wurms now. Look elsewhere for refuge."
—Arnun, vizier of the menagerie

name: Silverback Shaman
text:
Trample
When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.
flavor: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.

name: Strength of the Pack
text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
flavor: The pack that ambushes, eviscerates, and devours together stays together.

name: Wildsize
text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Timely Ward
text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash if it targets a commander.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has indestructible.
flavor: Behind every general who leads from the front is a nervous mage with a spell at the ready.

name: Blazing Sunsteel
flavor: Wyleth emerged from the crater unscathed with the sun's fury trapped in his hands.

name: Stumpsquall Hydra
text: When Stumpsquall Hydra enters the battlefield, distribute X +1/+1 counters among it and any number of commanders.
flavor: In preparation to grow new heads, a hydra may rid itself of older ones.

name: Danitha Capashen, Paragon
text:
First strike, vigilance, lifelink
Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: "I will protect the less fortunate. I will love bravely. I will face despair and fight on. As a Capashen, I can do no less."

name: Generous Gift
text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor: The best presents are impossible to regift.

name: Ironclad Slayer
text: When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The best weapon is the one at hand.

name: On Serra's Wings
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1, and has flying, vigilance, and lifelink.
flavor:
"The spirit of Serra raised Brindri high and commanded her to keep the balance."
—*Song of All*, canto 524

name: Sigarda's Aid
text:
You may cast Aura and Equipment spells as though they had flash.
Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach it to target creature you control.
flavor: The Order of Saint Traft found new strength with Sigarda's support.

name: Spirit Mantle
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.
flavor: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.

name: Fists of Flame
text: Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +1/+0 for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor:
"Fire has always been my most faithful companion."
—Jared Carthalion

name: Jaya's Immolating Inferno
text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)
Jaya's Immolating Inferno deals X damage to each of up to three targets.
flavor: Centuries ago, a pyromancer's spark ignited a fiery conflagration.

name: Ramunap Excavator
text: You may play lands from your graveyard.
flavor: "This world was once so much more than the confines of Naktamun."

name: Sporemound
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Ballot Broker
text: While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
flavor:
"Merchants and politicians differ only in name."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Protector of the Crown
text:
When Protector of the Crown enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Protector of the Crown instead.
flavor: "I gladly offer my weapon and my life to the glory of my sovereign."

name: Recruiter of the Guard
text: When Recruiter of the Guard enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Before a cause can have supporters, it has to have a voice.

name: Sanctum Prelate
text:
As Sanctum Prelate enters the battlefield, choose a number.
Noncreature spells with mana value equal to the chosen number can't be cast.
flavor: "These halls are sacred. You *will* be silent."

name: Throne Warden
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on Throne Warden.
flavor: "Rulers come and go, but my allegiance belongs to the throne."

name: Wings of the Guard
text:
Flying
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
flavor: Within the city walls, Adriana's falcons hunt vermin of all kinds.

name: Canal Courier
text:
When Canal Courier enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever Canal Courier and another creature attack different players, Canal Courier can't be blocked this combat.
flavor: The most effective roadways in Paliano aren't roads at all.

name: Expropriate
text: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.
flavor: Few things are more valuable than time or money—and Leovold has plenty of both.

name: Illusion of Choice
text:
You choose how each player votes this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Please vote with a clear head and vigilant heart, knowing each voice is meaningful regardless of the outcome."
—Ottavio d'Oro, Electoral Committee Speaker of Paliano

name: Jeering Homunculus
text: When Jeering Homunculus enters the battlefield, you may goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

name: Keeper of Keys
text:
When Keeper of Keys enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: For the right price, he'll unlock your path to the throne.

name: Stunt Double
text:
Flash
You may have Stunt Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
flavor: No duelist is without equal in Paliano.

name: Capital Punishment
text: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for death or taxes. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each death vote and discards a card for each taxes vote.
flavor:
"I did offer them a choice . . ."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Custodi Lich
text:
When Custodi Lich enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever you become the monarch, target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor:
"Keeping order is a task too important to relinquish in death."
—Abrado, Custodi priest

name: Garrulous Sycophant
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Marchesa's poison is delivered by more than daggers."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Marchesa's Decree
text:
When Marchesa's Decree enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.
flavor:
"Those who seize power must have the means to hold it."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Regicide
text:
Reveal Regicide as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color.
Destroy target creature that's one or more of the colors chosen as you drafted cards named Regicide.
flavor: "You're done!"

name: Besmirch
text: Until end of turn, gain control of target creature and it gains haste. Untap and goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor: The whitest robes stain best.

name: Crown-Hunter Hireling
text:
When Crown-Hunter Hireling enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Crown-Hunter Hireling can't attack unless defending player is the monarch.
flavor: While most in Paliano seek fame through favor, he'll settle for infamy through blood.

name: Deputized Protester
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
