Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
flavor: Butcher's training, warrior's heart.

name: Goblin Racketeer
text: Whenever Goblin Racketeer attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor: "It, uh, fell off a cart?"

name: Grenzo, Havoc Raiser
text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• Goad target creature that player controls.
• Exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
flavor: "You burn. I'll pillage."

name: Subterranean Tremors
text: Subterranean Tremors deals X damage to each creature without flying. If X is 4 or more, destroy all artifacts. If X is 8 or more, create an 8/8 red Lizard creature token.
flavor: The market is now closed.

name: Domesticated Hydra
text:
{X}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Domesticated Hydra is monstrous, it has trample.
flavor: "Sit. Fetch. Devastate."

name: Menagerie Liberator
text:
Trample
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
flavor: "The wild are neither your thralls nor your amusement."

name: Orchard Elemental
text: Council's dilemma — When Orchard Elemental enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for sprout or harvest. Put two +1/+1 counters on Orchard Elemental for each sprout vote. You gain 3 life for each harvest vote.
flavor: Fruits for friends, fists for foes.

name: Affa Guard Hound
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

name: Faith's Reward
text: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
flavor:
"I thought the wind was ushering me to my final destination, but it lifted me to my feet and I fought on."
—Idrus, war priest of Thune

name: Hallowed Burial
text: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
flavor:
"I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows."
—Talara, elvish safewright

name: Hollowhenge Spirit
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Hollowhenge Spirit enters the battlefield, remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat.
flavor: Some spirits mourn. Others terrorize.

name: Kill Shot
text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor: Mardu archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They never miss their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

name: Windborne Charge
text: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.

name: Bonds of Quicksilver
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

name: Caller of Gales
text: {1}{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."

name: Cloaked Siren
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor:
"That is not the voice of the wind singing on the stones."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Followed Footsteps
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.
flavor: Æther can turn a footprint into a blueprint.

name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
flavor:
"He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick."
—Toshiro Umezawa

name: Merfolk Skyscout
text:
Flying
Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.
flavor: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."

name: Show and Tell
text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

name: Vaporkin
text:
Flying
Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.
flavor:
"Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds."
—Thrasios, triton hero

name: Blood-Toll Harpy
text:
Flying
When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.
flavor: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.

name: Child of Night
text: Lifelink
flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Farbog Boneflinger
text: When Farbog Boneflinger enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Here are some bones for you to choke on, dear brother!"
—Gisa, to Geralf

name: Festergloom
text: Nonblack creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: The death of a scout can be as informative as a safe return.

name: Mausoleum Turnkey
text: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

name: Public Execution
text: Destroy target creature an opponent controls. Each other creature that player controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: Though the executioner did not speak, the villagers got the message.

name: Shambling Goblin
text: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle."
—Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

name: Stromkirk Patrol
text: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

name: Burn Away
text: Burn Away deals 6 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, exile its controller's graveyard.
flavor:
"Your corruption will burn, serpent, until there is nothing left to defile."
—Asmala, bloodfire mystic

name: Burning Wish
text: You may reveal a sorcery card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.
flavor: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

name: Coordinated Assault
text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

name: Flame Slash
text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

name: Goblin Tunneler
text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "The best way over the mountain is through."

name: Ill-Tempered Cyclops
text:
Trample
{5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.

name: Kiln Fiend
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Ogre Sentry
text: Defender
flavor:
"You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?"
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Twin Bolt
text: Twin Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor: Kolaghan archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They utilize their dragonlord's lightning to strike their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

name: Birds of Paradise
text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor:
"The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur Forest

name: Brushstrider
text: Vigilance
flavor: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.

name: Copperhorn Scout
text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.
flavor: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

name: Fade into Antiquity
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?"
—Kleon the Iron-Booted

name: Irresistible Prey
text:
Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face—a runt meepling.

name: Lace with Moonglove
text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?"
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

name: Nessian Asp
text:
Reach
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.

name: Netcaster Spider
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

name: Ravenous Leucrocota
text:
Vigilance
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor: Hunger makes a leucrocota dangerous. A full belly makes it angry and dangerous.

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor:
"The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."
—Uros, Pendelhaven elder

name: Voyaging Satyr
text: {T}: Untap target land.
flavor: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."

name: Brago's Representative
text: While voting, you get an additional vote. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
flavor: On Fiora, no matter is settled until King Brago offers an opinion.

name: Rousing of Souls
text: Parley — Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Then each player draws a card.
flavor: "We remember. We rise."

name: Marchesa's Emissary
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: "The Black Rose doesn't tolerate weeds."

name: Marchesa's Infiltrator
text:
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever Marchesa's Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: "Secrets, like coins, are easy to steal."

name: Grudge Keeper
text: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 2 life.
flavor: "Your defiance is noted."

name: Enraged Revolutionary
text: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: When every right is voted away, only rage remains.

name: Grenzo's Cutthroat
text:
First strike
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: "Their guards are soft, ready to welcome a sharp dagger."

name: Treasonous Ogre
text:
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Pay 3 life: Add {R}.
flavor:
"Everything comes with a price. Especially revolution."
—Grenzo, dungeon warden

name: Predator's Howl
text:
Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
Morbid — Create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor:
"And Muzzio says my arguments have no teeth."
—Selvala, ranger of the Lowlands

name: Selvala's Charge
text: Parley — Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Then each player draws a card.
flavor: Selvala's arrival never goes unnoticed.

name: Ajani's Sunstriker
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

name: Courier Hawk
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

name: Kor Chant
text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor: Sacred rites repurposed to fight an ancient threat.

name: Moment of Heroism
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Pillarfield Ox
flavor:
"May starving fleas birth a thousand generations on your stubborn hide, cow!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Pride Guardian
text:
Defender
Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.
flavor: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

name: Soulcatcher
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.
flavor: "Their spirits walk the winds and fill my soul."

name: Stave Off
text: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor:
"Just a moment of perfect grace and sanctity is enough."
—Kal Lior, leonin elder

name: Valor Made Real
text: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.
flavor: "As my father taught, 'Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"

name: Wakestone Gargoyle
text:
Defender, flying
{1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.
flavor: Its pulsating cry shatters bonds of iron, granite, and servitude.

name: Aether Tradewinds
text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric

name: Air Servant
text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.
flavor:
"Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered."
—Jestus Dreya, *Of Elements and Eternity*

name: Grixis Illusionist
text: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
text:
Defender
Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
flavor: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

name: Plated Seastrider
flavor: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

name: Stasis Cell
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.
flavor: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

name: Stifle
text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor:
"Superior force meets woefully inadequate object. What paradox were you expecting?"
—Azguri, archmage of Evos Isle

name: Turn the Tide
text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius."
—Varil, Neurok partisan

name: Ill-Gotten Gains
text: Exile Ill-Gotten Gains. Each player discards their hand, then returns up to three cards from their graveyard to their hand.
flavor: Urza thought it a crusade. Xantcha knew it was a robbery.

name: Liliana's Specter
text:
Flying
When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor:
"The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."
—Liliana Vess

name: Magus of the Mirror
text: {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mirror: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate only during your upkeep.
flavor: "Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."

name: Plagued Rusalka
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."
—Savra

name: Skeletal Scrying
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X cards from your graveyard.
You draw X cards and you lose X life.
flavor: His family was a small price to pay for the dark gifts that called to him.

name: Smallpox
text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
flavor: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

name: Syphon Soul
text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

name: Typhoid Rats
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

name: Wakedancer
text: Morbid — When Wakedancer enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.

name: Zombie Goliath
flavor:
"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Barbed Shocker
text:
Trample, haste
Whenever Barbed Shocker deals damage to a player, that player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.
flavor: Fervid shamans willingly submit to shockers in hopes of glimpsing the fortunes of the future.

name: Flaring Flame-Kin
text: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: A flame-kin is always formidable, but feeding its fire with a sorcerous gift grants it the power to devastate armies.

name: Flowstone Blade
text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."
—Karn

name: Heckling Fiends
text: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
flavor: Their language may be a cacophonous agglomeration of chittering snorts and mad barking, but the message they send is all too clear.

name: Lizard Warrior
flavor: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

name: Orcish Cannonade
text:
Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Crispy! Scarback! Load another volcano-ball."
—Stumphobbler Thuj, orcish captain

name: Pitchburn Devils
text: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

name: Power of Fire
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.

name: Torch Fiend
text: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.
flavor: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

name: Vent Sentinel
text:
Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor:
"Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Elephant Guide
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor: Nature's strength outlives the strong.

name: Hunger of the Howlpack
text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Morbid — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor:
"Werewolves are an unholy mix of a predator's instinct and a human's hatred."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Nature's Claim
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor:
"The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."
—Sildark, artificer of Omu

name: Pelakka Wurm
text:
Trample
When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life.
When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.
flavor: It eats what it wants to eat—which is anything that moves.

name: Provoke
text:
Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Never start a fight you can't finish."
—Padril, council guardian

name: Respite
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
flavor: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

name: Sporecap Spider
text: Reach
flavor:
"They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Squirrel Nest
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token."
flavor: In the treetops, unseen by many, lurks chittering, skittering death.

name: Wrap in Vigor
text: Regenerate each creature you control.
flavor: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

name: Asha's Favor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.
flavor: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

name: Aven Squire
text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

name: Aven Trailblazer
text:
Flying
Domain — Aven Trailblazer's toughness is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor:
"The bird wore the form of a man, bereft of filigree. Why do the Texts not speak of it?"
—Belator of Esper

name: Celestial Purge
text: Exile target black or red permanent.
flavor:
"This new chaos confounds us. We must fling it into our winds, our storms. These we can control."
—Bezzit Plar, Esper stormcaller

name: Court Homunculus
text: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.
flavor: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

name: Lapse of Certainty
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor: Without a connection of mind and body, magic is just an idea stuck in the head, a word on the tip of a tongue.

name: Mark of Asylum
text: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.
flavor: A paragon of honor, Galo Aher fell to a blast of fire. The Order of the White Orchid was so saddened that they forged a new sigil in his likeness.

name: Mirror-Sigil Sergeant
text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue permanent, you may create a token that's a copy of Mirror-Sigil Sergeant.
flavor: "If I had many lives, I would give them all for Bant."

name: Rhox Meditant
text: When Rhox Meditant enters the battlefield, if you control a green permanent, draw a card.
flavor: The weight of her conviction balances on the harmony of her soul.

name: Scepter of Dominance
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target permanent.
flavor:
"Whether or not you will bow to me is not open to debate. The question is, will I ever let you rise?"
—Fridius, telemin master

name: Valiant Guard
flavor: As the outsiders invaded Bant, soldiers who once saw sigils as the highest marks of glory began to see the scars of battle as tokens of equal worth.

name: Constricting Tendrils
text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Priests of Bant protect their temples with traps more elaborate than any mosaic floor.

name: Controlled Instincts
text:
Enchant red or green creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: Togk Manytooth struggled helplessly as the kathari circled above him. For a warrior, immobilization is a fate worse than death.

name: Cumber Stone
text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
flavor:
"The stone is more potent than ever. The flesh that creeps into our land will become even more slovenly and weak."
—Niclavs, archmage of Esper

name: Frontline Sage
text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: The battle was won in the commander's head before the first weapon was drawn.

name: Scepter of Insight
text: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
flavor:
"The road to truth has many branches, and so must the cane with which I walk it."
—Voln the Elder

name: View from Above
text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. If you control a white permanent, return View from Above to its owner's hand.
flavor: "This air feels so heavy and thick. There are no winds to speak of. I fear the knowledge that comes from a place like this."

name: Worldly Counsel
text: Domain — Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: Every horizon hides a new possibility.

name: Corrupted Roots
text:
Enchant Forest or Plains
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
flavor: The bones of Jund's dead resurfaced in Naya, poisoning the jungle and killing the sunseeders' crops.

name: Drag Down
text: Domain — Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

name: Kederekt Parasite
text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control a red permanent, you may have Kederekt Parasite deal 1 damage to that player.
flavor: When the smell of passing thoughts piques its hunger, its maw becomes primed with acid and a taste for brains.

name: Salvage Slasher
text: Salvage Slasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact card in your graveyard.
flavor: Esper artificers never imagined that one day their scraps would be pressed against their soft and fragile throats.

name: Scepter of Fugue
text: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.
flavor: One goes to Tidehollow either to forget or to be forgotten. Either way, the scullers will oblige.

name: Sedraxis Alchemist
text: When Sedraxis Alchemist enters the battlefield, if you control a blue permanent, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: The problem with a liquid that can dissolve anything is finding something to carry it in.

name: Voices from the Void
text: Domain — Target player discards a card for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: As Grixis collided with the rest of Alara, the worlds began to hear the hateful whispers of the forgotten dead.

name: Wretched Banquet
text: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures on the battlefield.
flavor:
"The meek inherit nothing."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Yoke of the Damned
text:
Enchant creature
When a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.
flavor: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

name: Banefire
text:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
flavor: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

name: Bloodhall Ooze
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
flavor: A drop of blood spilled from the first dragon.

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor: On Jund, the deep canyons were the best places to hide. When the goblins wandered into Naya, they found that was not so true.

name: Dark Temper
text: Dark Temper deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy the creature instead.
flavor: When you've got the temperament of a dragon, every argument is one you'll win.

name: Ignite Disorder
text: Ignite Disorder deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target white and/or blue creatures.
flavor: "Bant is a world imprisoned by polished stone and tyrannical rule. It yearns to strike back against those who restrain it."

name: Molten Frame
text:
Destroy target artifact creature.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The metal filigree in his body glowed red-hot, and his flesh soon followed.

name: Rakka Mar
text:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste.
flavor:
"The finest pawns are those with pawns of their own."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Toxic Iguanar
text: Toxic Iguanar has deathtouch as long as you control a green permanent. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: There are no "weak" creatures on Jund. Even the smallest can strike a deadly blow.

name: Wandering Goblins
text: Domain — {3}: Wandering Goblins gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: Tired of waiting for a dragon to eat them, some hardy goblins struck out to become meals for the unknown.

name: Beacon Behemoth
text: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: When its smoky plumes light Naya's sky, every creature from the smallest pip fawn to the largest rannet heeds the warning.

name: Cliffrunner Behemoth
text:
Cliffrunner Behemoth has haste as long as you control a red permanent.
Cliffrunner Behemoth has lifelink as long as you control a white permanent.
flavor: It's revered for its power, celebrated for its grace, and feared for the avalanches triggered by its thunderous feet.

name: Filigree Fracture
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If that permanent was blue or black, draw a card.
flavor: The sphinx tyrannized Bant until a rhox mage tested the hardiness of her shiny parts.

name: Gluttonous Slime
text:
Flash
Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor: On Jund, everything eventually ends up in something else's stomach.

name: Matca Rioters
text: Domain — Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

name: Might of Alara
text: Domain — Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: The combined strength of all five planes spawned creations none had seen before.

name: Nacatl Savage
text: Protection from artifacts
flavor:
"Blades dull and armor dents. Marisi taught us that instinct is the only thing a true warrior needs."
—Ajani

name: Paleoloth
text: Whenever another creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Gods do not sleep soundly in the earth's embrace."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Scattershot Archer
text: {T}: Scattershot Archer deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor: To train her elves for war, Mayael would drop a sackful of acorns from the tree canopy. Each archer tried to split as many as possible before the acorns hit the forest floor below.

name: Shard Convergence
text: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Alara is broken no more.

name: Spore Burst
text: Domain — Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor: Seeds from Jund don't drift gently on the wind. They get up and stampede.

name: Sylvan Bounty
text:
Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

name: Tukatongue Thallid
text: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

name: Wild Leotau
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Wild Leotau unless you pay {G}.
flavor:
"Leotau that were born wild make the best mounts. It's like riding a thunderstorm."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Font of Fertility
text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Font of Fertility: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Drink deep, and know the path to the heart of the wilds.

name: Hero's Downfall
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.

name: Boreal Griffin
text:
Flying
{S}: Boreal Griffin gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor:
"More than snow falls from the Boreal skies."
—Arkin Egilsson, skycaptain

name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

name: Kjeldoran Outrider
text: {W}: Kjeldoran Outrider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "I listen to people. He sniffs the wind. And we both sense something big coming. Something very big."

name: Kjeldoran War Cry
text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.
flavor: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

name: Martyr of Sands
text: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.
flavor: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

name: Squall Drifter
text:
Flying
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor:
"The scouts claim the cold has malice, and a mind. I begin to believe them. Impassable drifts seem to appear before us at every turn."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Sun's Bounty
text:
You gain 4 life.
Recover {1}{W} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)
flavor: "Heidar has forced the sun into hiding, but it has not forgotten us."

name: Swift Maneuver
text:
Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.

name: White Shield Crusader
text:
Protection from black
{W}: White Shield Crusader gains flying until end of turn.
{W}{W}: White Shield Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Honor your steed and it will carry you to great deeds—and bring you home to tell of them."

name: Adarkar Windform
text:
Flying
{1}{S}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: Terisiare has only two kinds of weather: cold and weird.

name: Balduvian Frostwaker
text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
flavor: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

name: Drelnoch
text: Whenever Drelnoch becomes blocked, you may draw two cards.
flavor: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander—and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.

name: Frost Raptor
text:
Flying
{S}{S}: Frost Raptor gains shroud until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

name: Frozen Solid
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
flavor:
"Guard, fetch me a mallet."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Heidar, Rimewind Master
text: {2}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents.
flavor: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect!"

name: Krovikan Mist
text:
Flying
Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.
flavor: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

name: Martyr of Frost
text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor:
"Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Rimewind Cryomancer
text: {1}, {T}: Counter target activated ability. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."

name: Rimewind Taskmage
text: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents.
flavor: "Find solace in the sun? Burning, blinding, laying secrets bare? No, solace is found under the blanket of cold."

name: Ronom Serpent
text:
Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land.
When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent.
flavor: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

name: Rune Snag
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.
flavor:
"Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Chill to the Bone
text: Destroy target nonsnow creature.
flavor:
"Thick hides and layered armor won't help when I freeze you from the inside out."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Chilling Shade
text:
Flying
{S}: Chilling Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: Rimewind necromancers caught travelers in mystical blizzards then trapped their spirits in the mist of their final frozen breaths.

name: Disciple of Tevesh Szat
text:
{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Disciple of Tevesh Szat: Target creature gets -6/-6 until end of turn.
flavor: "You pray to Freyalise, but she cannot hear your pleas. It is Tevesh Szat who will claim your soul."

name: Feast of Flesh
text: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.
flavor:
"Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy."
—Garza Zol, plague queen

name: Gristle Grinner
text: Whenever a creature dies, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Gutless Ghoul
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.
flavor:
"Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone."
—Garza Zol, plague queen

name: Krovikan Scoundrel
flavor: The few surviving humans of Krov would have welcomed the return of winter and its sterilizing cold. They often peered northward, hoping that the snow's edge had reached their infested city-tomb.

name: Martyr of Bones
text: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor: Puppeteered by Heidar's icy hand, they were sacrificed to the Frost Marsh to raise Haakon's army.

name: Rime Transfusion
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{S}: This creature can't be blocked this turn except by snow creatures." ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

name: Rimebound Dead
text: {S}: Regenerate Rimebound Dead. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor:
"Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen."
—Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon

name: Stromgald Crusader
text:
Protection from white
{B}: Stromgald Crusader gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Stromgald Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The White-Shielders think their code justifies their actions. In truth it only binds their hands."

name: Tresserhorn Skyknight
text:
Flying
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Tresserhorn Skyknight by creatures with first strike.
flavor: Kjeldorans who fled battle were exiled to the wastes. Those who strayed near Tresserhorn were pressed into service in Haakon's army.

name: Zombie Musher
text:
Snow landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.)
{S}: Regenerate Zombie Musher. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: The World Spell thawed their icy graves, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But Heidar called them to duty for a twisted cause.

name: Braid of Fire
text: Cumulative upkeep—Add {R}. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."

name: Goblin Furrier
text: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.
flavor: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.

name: Goblin Rimerunner
text:
{T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{S}: Goblin Rimerunner gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

name: Greater Stone Spirit
text:
Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

name: Icefall
text:
Destroy target artifact or land.
Recover {R}{R} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)
flavor: As the Thaw met Terisiare, mountains shed their icy skins, crushing homes and hopes alike.

name: Karplusan Wolverine
text: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Lightning Serpent
text:
Trample, haste
Lightning Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Serpent.
flavor: Ice exploded into steam in its wake, hissing like a thousand serpents hailing their blazing master.

name: Lovisa Coldeyes
text: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor: "I lead my horde to the northwest. I won't return until the ice wizards fall and their fiendish contraptions are crushed!"

name: Martyr of Ashes
text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

name: Ohran Yeti
text: {2}{S}: Target snow creature gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: When a snowdrift shows you its eyes, it's already too late.

name: Orcish Bloodpainter
text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Orcish Bloodpainter deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: Blood calls to blood.

name: Rite of Flame
text: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.
flavor: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.

name: Skred
text: Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control.
flavor:
"This close to Rimewind Keep, no avalanche is nature's doing."
—Ukoten, centaur chieftain

name: Thermopod
text:
{S}: Thermopod gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
Sacrifice a creature: Add {R}.
flavor: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.

name: Boreal Centaur
text: {S}: Boreal Centaur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

name: Boreal Druid
text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

name: Bull Aurochs
text:
Trample
Whenever Bull Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
flavor: The aurochs herd is content to graze—until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.

name: Frostweb Spider
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Frostweb Spider blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on Frostweb Spider at end of combat.
flavor: Its white webs glitter, mimicking the frost on the tree's branches.

name: Into the North
text: Search your library for a snow land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Our border lands fall under the grip of Heidar's second winter. Go forth and reclaim them for Yavimaya."
—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Martyr of Spores
text: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Spores: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

name: Mystic Melting
text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: The sun-hot glow radiated from the druids, leaving scattered metal in steaming pools as it passed.

name: Panglacial Wurm
text:
Trample
While you're searching your library, you may cast Panglacial Wurm from your library.
flavor:
"Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge."
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Simian Brawler
text: Discard a land card: Simian Brawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"It's odd to see the apes rip down trees to arm themselves in defense of their forests."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Sound the Call
text: Create a 1/1 green Wolf creature token. It has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."
flavor:
"If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Kjeldoran Elite Guard
text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate only during combat.
flavor: The winged helms of the Guard are put on for pageants—but taken off for war.

name: Essence Flare
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.
flavor: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

name: Mistfolk
text: {U}: Counter target spell that targets Mistfolk.
flavor:
"Although my official log will state there is no evidence pointing to the existence of the mistfolk, my certainty is lessened by the cursed consistency of the expedition's eyewitness accounts."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Snow Devil
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Enchanted creature has first strike as long as it's blocking and you control a snow land.
flavor:
"Give me wings to fly and speed to strike. In return, the glory I earn shall be yours."
—Steinar Icefist, Balduvian shaman

name: Zuran Spellcaster
text: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Drift of the Dead
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.
flavor:
"Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Legions of Lim-Dûl
text: Snow swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Swamp.)
flavor:
"I have seen the faces of my dead friends among that grim band, and I can bear no more."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter,
leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Woolly Mammoths
text: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.
flavor:
"Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!"
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Ambitious Farmhand // Seasoned Cathar
text: Lifelink
flavor: "The cathars have taught me many things, but I will never forget the hard, honest work that first callused my hands."

name: Beloved Beggar // Generous Soul
text: Disturb {4}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: Charity is rare on Innistrad, but kindness is always repaid.

name: Bereaved Survivor // Dauntless Avenger
text: When another creature you control dies, transform Bereaved Survivor.
flavor: "With Avacyn gone, I no longer knew who to pray to. Alone, I wept for a sister who would never return."

name: Blessed Defiance
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: "If I'm going, I'm taking you with me!"

name: Borrowed Time
text: When Borrowed Time enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Borrowed Time leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Teferi stepped calmly into the fray. Suddenly the sun paused in the sky and the werewolves' snarls froze on their faces.

name: Candlegrove Witch
text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Candlegrove Witch gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Like a thousand candles fighting back the darkness, we are strongest when we stand together."

name: Cathar Commando
text:
Flash
{1}, Sacrifice Cathar Commando: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Honorable tactics are for honorable foes. These werewolves are preying on innocent travelers. I'll stab them in the back while they sleep if I have to."

name: Cathar's Call
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance and "At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Human creature token."
flavor: Some cathars succumbed to despair at Avacyn's unmaking. The rest redoubled their efforts to carry out her work.

name: Clarion Cathars
text: When Clarion Cathars enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor: The sound of the trumpet is both warning and comfort: it tells of approaching danger but also reminds the village folk that someone is there to stand against it.

name: Duelcraft Trainer
text:
First strike
Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor: "It's all in the follow-through."

name: Fateful Absence
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller investigates. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: Sensing a plot, Sorin raced to his grandfather's resting-crypt. But someone else had gotten there first.

name: Flare of Faith
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Human, instead it gets +3/+3 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: "I fell to my knees. I called out to Sigarda. And then I saw my tormentors blaze with blessed sunlight."

name: Gavony Silversmith
text: When Gavony Silversmith enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
flavor: More than heat and the strength of his arm, it was his faith that gave the blade its unyielding edge.

name: Gavony Trapper
text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: The elite cathars of the Parish-Blades train in all manner of techniques designed to delay and frustrate the beasts that hunt the crossways.

name: Hedgewitch's Mask
text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equipped creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor: In Kessig, even celebration wears a fearsome face.

name: Homestead Courage
text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
Flashback {W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "C'mon, fiend. I'll carve you up like a Harvesttide ham."

name: Loyal Gryff
text:
Flash
Flying
When Loyal Gryff enters the battlefield, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Silverstreak had lost her rider, but not her instinct to help humankind.

name: Lunarch Veteran // Luminous Phantom
text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
Disturb {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: "Even in our darkest times, Avacyn's light still guides us."

name: Mourning Patrol // Morning Apparition
text:
Vigilance
Disturb {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: "It's creepy out here, isn't it, boy? I always feel like someone's watching us."

name: Odric's Outrider
text: Whenever Odric's Outrider or another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: Terms like "safe route" and "cleared district" are a source of dark humor to the cathars who patrol the ruins of Thraben.

name: Ritual Guardian
text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Ritual Guardian gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: "By ancient magics, by angels' grace, we will survive this night."

name: Ritual of Hope
text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Coven — If you control three or more creatures with different powers, creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.
flavor: "Tonight, we can be anything."

name: Search Party Captain
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.
When Search Party Captain enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "Werewolves leave messy trails. Easy to follow. Hard to forget."

name: Sigardian Savior
text:
Flying
When Sigardian Savior enters the battlefield, if you cast it, return up to two target creature cards with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Begone, moon-cursed! These folk are no prey of yours."

name: Soul-Guide Gryff
text:
Flying
When Soul-Guide Gryff enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
flavor: It conducts the souls of the righteous to their blessed rest and the spirits of the evil to justice.

name: Sungold Barrage
text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor: Heida allowed herself a moment of satisfaction as she watched the beast fall, then turned to seek another foe. It would be a long, long night.

name: Thraben Exorcism
text: Exile target Spirit, creature with disturb, or enchantment.
flavor: Chandra, Teferi, and Arlinn sought clues to the Moonsilver Key's whereabouts while Kaya dispatched the spirits obstructing their path.

name: Unruly Mob
text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.
flavor: "We survived the Travails! Killer angels! Horrors from beyond the moon! Now some big werewolves think they can scare us? Let 'em try."

name: Vanquish the Horde
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Destroy all creatures.
flavor: Odric took no joy in violence but neither did he mourn for the twisted things he dispatched. All that mattered were the lives he had saved.

name: Baithook Angler // Hook-Haunt Drifter
text: Disturb {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: Geor was determined to stay out until he got a bite from something big.

name: Component Collector
text:
If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Component Collector enters the battlefield.
Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.
flavor: "Keep master busy with new bits or else maybe she wonders if I'm made of bits too."

name: Consider
text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.
flavor: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

name: Curse of Surveillance
text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, any number of target players other than that player each draw cards equal to the number of Curses attached to that player.
flavor: For every eye gouged out, two blinked open.

name: Delver of Secrets // Insectile Aberration
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.
flavor: "If my hypothesis is correct . . ."

name: Devious Cover-Up
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Widow Weber's new scarecrow seemed to attract more crows than it scared off.

name: Dissipate
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor:
"Morning light, morning light,
Chase away the fears of night."
—Gavony children's rhyme

name: Drownyard Amalgam
text:
When Drownyard Amalgam enters the battlefield, target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
{2}{U}: Drownyard Amalgam can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: When human corpses are in short supply, stitchers get creative.

name: Fading Hope
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 3 or less, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: "At least I won't become one of . . . those things."

name: Falcon Abomination
text:
Flying
When Falcon Abomination enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor: The foulest of fowl.

name: Firmament Sage
text:
If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Firmament Sage enters the battlefield.
Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, draw a card.
flavor: The cause remained unclear, but the fact was undeniable: nights were lengthening faster than in any autumn past.

name: Flip the Switch
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor:
"Works every time! Well, every time they don't explode, anyway."
—Barton, stitcher

name: Galedrifter // Waildrifter
text:
Flying
Disturb {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor:
"If you're lost in a storm, follow a gryff. They always know which way calmer waters lie."
—Geor, Havengul fisher

name: Geistwave
text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you controlled that permanent, draw a card.
flavor: Necro-alchemists gained popular support during the Travails, when geist-fueled weapons helped defend towns against mad cultists and Eldrazi monstrosities.

name: Grafted Identity
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
flavor: Autonomy is only skin deep.

name: Larder Zombie
text:
Defender
Tap three untapped creatures you control: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor: The cathars arrived at the abandoned lab to find many of the unfinished projects gnawing on one another.

name: Lier, Disciple of the Drowned
text:
Spells can't be countered.
Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost.
flavor: Beneath the waves, lost gods stir in their slumber.

name: Locked in the Cemetery
text:
Enchant creature
When Locked in the Cemetery enters the battlefield, if there are five or more cards in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: "Help! I'm not a zombie! Let me out!"

name: Malevolent Hermit // Benevolent Geist
text:
Flying
Noncreature spells you control can't be countered.
If Benevolent Geist would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
flavor: All his old grudges suddenly seemed laughably petty. So he laughed.

name: Mysterious Tome // Chilling Chronicle
text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Transform Mysterious Tome.
flavor: The villagers pored through the old storybook, hoping that one of the tales within might hold some clue to saving the fading sun.

name: Ominous Roost
text: When Ominous Roost enters the battlefield or whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying and "This creature can block only creatures with flying."
flavor:
"One raven is a bad omen. Two are a curse. I don't know what this is, but it can't be good."
—Verna, priest of Sigarda

name: Organ Hoarder
text: When Organ Hoarder enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: The stitcher died years ago, but her dutiful assistant still keeps the laboratory well stocked.

name: Overwhelmed Archivist // Archive Haunt
text:
When Overwhelmed Archivist enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Disturb {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: "Bah! As if I had time to preserve everything."

name: Patrician Geist
text:
Flying
Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.
Spells you cast from your graveyard cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: He rides in agitated circles, snapping orders at servants who've long since found their peace.

name: Phantom Carriage
text:
Flying
When Phantom Carriage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card with flashback or disturb, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.
flavor: Passage to the abyss is free, but the return trip will cost you.

name: Poppet Stitcher // Poppet Factory
text:
Creature tokens you control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 3/3.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may transform Poppet Factory.
flavor: It may have been a mistake to give them minds of their own.

name: Revenge of the Drowned
text: Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor: A heavy net doesn't always mean a good catch.

name: Secrets of the Key
text:
Investigate. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, investigate twice instead. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Flashback {3}{U}
flavor: As Sigarda and Sorin battled, Arlinn and Teferi recovered the key from the Markov catacombs.

name: Shipwreck Sifters
text:
When Shipwreck Sifters enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you discard a Spirit card or a card with disturb, put a +1/+1 counter on Shipwreck Sifters.
flavor: A loyal crew sticks together, even after death.

name: Skaab Wrangler
text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
flavor: After Uda's hat boutique in Selhoff was destroyed by werewolves, she relocated outside of town and took up a new type of sewing.

name: Stormrider Spirit
text:
Flash
Flying
flavor: The weary travelers mistook the flickering lights for a candleguilde pointing the way to Harvesttide. Their relief turned to terror as lightning lit the sky.

name: Triskaidekaphile
text:
You have no maximum hand size.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly thirteen cards in your hand, you win the game.
{3}{U}: Draw a card.
flavor: She's always willing to lend a hand. It just won't be her own.

name: Unblinking Observer
text: {T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to pay a disturb cost or cast an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor:
"Day 77: The homunculus within the crystal continues to mimic my every movement. I wonder what they are writing?"
—Laboratory notes of Yzlkpk

name: Vivisection
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.
flavor: Though their work is widely reviled, stitchers see themselves as being on the cutting edge of science.

name: Arrogant Outlaw
text: When Arrogant Outlaw enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: The debased remnants of the Falkenrath bloodline prowl the passes near their ruined castles.

name: Baneblade Scoundrel // Baneclaw Marauder
text:
Whenever Baneblade Scoundrel becomes blocked, each creature blocking it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "I was a mere cutpurse until I learned the going rate for fresh corpses."

name: Bat Whisperer
text: When Bat Whisperer enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
flavor: "My little winged friends tell me which of these townsfolk are worth tasting for myself."

name: Blood Pact
text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor: Griselbrand's defeat did not mark the end of the Skirsdag cult. They simply turned their worship to the next demon to emerge from the shadows bearing offers of power.

name: Bloodline Culling
text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
• Creature tokens get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Forget your human ancestors. You're part of my family now."

name: Bloodtithe Collector
text:
Flying
When Bloodtithe Collector enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, each opponent discards a card.
flavor: For the more refined vampire, breaking a victim's will is far more satisfying than simply taking their blood.

name: Champion of the Perished
text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Perished.
flavor: He rose from the graf for every cobbler, tanner, and fool who'd been slaughtered in the parish—and they rose and shambled after him.

name: Covert Cutpurse // Covetous Geist
text:
Flying, deathtouch
If Covetous Geist would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
flavor:
"It has no need of wealth in the afterlife. It steals and kills purely for its own spiteful amusement."
—Kaya

name: Curse of Leeches // Leeching Lurker
text:
Lifelink
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
flavor: First darkness falls. Then it burrows in.

name: Defenestrate
text: Destroy target creature without flying.
flavor: The chaplain would perhaps have found some small comfort had he known that the replacement window would be named in his honor.

name: Dreadhound
text:
When Dreadhound enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Whenever a creature dies or a creature card is put into a graveyard from a library, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor: It herds souls toward eternal torment.

name: Eaten Alive
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
flavor:
"If you hear a groaning noise in the cellar, don't investigate. Don't split up. Just lock the door and barricade it."
—Emili, guard captain

name: Ecstatic Awakener // Awoken Demon
text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card, then transform Ecstatic Awakener. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: "Great Ormendahl, I kneel before you, a fragment of your will, a servant of your tyrrany. I beg you, release the strength within me!"

name: Foul Play
text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: The evidence was overwhelming. Tovolar's howlpack was getting bolder, smarter, and stronger.

name: Ghoulish Procession
text: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures die, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. This ability triggers only once each turn. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor: It was a family reunion to die for.

name: Heirloom Mirror // Inherited Fiend
text: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life, Discard a card: Draw a card, mill a card, then put a ritual counter on Heirloom Mirror. Then if it has three or more ritual counters on it, remove them and transform it. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "Speak my name thrice, and be rewarded."

name: Hobbling Zombie
text:
Deathtouch
When Hobbling Zombie dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor:
"I see someone tried to stop you, my pet. How delightful."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Infernal Grasp
text: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.
flavor: Ancient evils dwell within the burning chasm called the Ashmouth, ever ready to devour those foolish enough to travel alone.

name: Jadar, Ghoulcaller of Nephalia
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no creatures with decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor: "Rise, my pretty thing. Why rot in the river when you can serve at my bidding?"

name: Jerren, Corrupted Bishop // Ormendahl, the Corrupter
text:
Flying, trample, lifelink
Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card.
flavor: "Ah, Jerren. You've been such a faithful, useful insect."

name: Mask of Griselbrand
flavor: The legacy of evil lives on.

name: Morbid Opportunist
text: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor: On Innistrad, one person's windfall usually starts with another person lying face down in the mud.

name: Morkrut Behemoth
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {1}{B}.
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"Let's see my brother's stitched-up little toys compete with this."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: No Way Out
text: Target opponent discards two cards. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor: In the maze-like passages of the Erdwal, a wrong turn can be fatal.

name: Novice Occultist
text: When Novice Occultist dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: All across Gavony, in shuttered bedrooms and locked barns, young people seek the answers their elders failed to provide.

name: Olivia's Midnight Ambush
text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it's night, that creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead.
flavor: "And you were almost finished with that ritual, weren't you, darling? How very rude of me. To make it up to you, I'll send you an invitation to my wedding."

name: Rotten Reunion
text:
Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Aunt and Uncle Greyfield loved dinner guests.

name: Shady Traveler // Stalking Predator
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: The stranger spoke to no one, and the townspeople gladly returned the favor.

name: Siege Zombie
text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor: A barricade only buys time. So the wealthy buy more barricades.

name: Slaughter Specialist
text:
When Slaughter Specialist enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Slaughter Specialist.
flavor: From every kill, a gruesome trophy.

name: Stromkirk Bloodthief
text: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.
flavor: With House Voldaren ascendant, some members of the Stromkirk line took it upon themselves to "borrow" from the blood tithes.

name: Vampire Interloper
text:
Flying
Vampire Interloper can't block.
flavor: The Voldaren have begun demanding blood offerings from the villagers in their territory. Their agents arrive from the sky to collect the ceremonial bowls in eerie silence.

name: Vengeful Strangler // Strangling Grasp
text:
Vengeful Strangler can't block.
When Vengeful Strangler dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control attached to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
flavor: As the flames consumed the killer, his eyes remained fixed on the executioner's face, his hands twitching like angry spiders.

name: Abandon the Post
text:
Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: You don't have to outrun the werewolf; you only have to outrun your fellow guard.

name: Ardent Elementalist
text: When Ardent Elementalist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: While the Dawnhart witches focus their magic on nature and community, other covens consort with devils and twist the elements to their will.

name: Burn the Accursed
text: Burn the Accursed deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: Nothing remained but a few drifting embers and the smell of smoldering hair.

name: Cathartic Pyre
text:
Choose one —
• Cathartic Pyre deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
flavor: "Leave behind this sorrow of this body. Be blessed, being of light."

name: Curse of Shaken Faith
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player casts a spell other than the first spell they cast each turn or copies a spell, Curse of Shaken Faith deals 2 damage to them.
flavor: Even within the chapel's hallowed halls, the devils' laughter pierced his prayers.

name: Falkenrath Perforator
text: Whenever Falkenrath Perforator attacks, it deals 1 damage to defending player.
flavor: "Lady Anje sends her regards. I'll carve the rest of her message into your skin."

name: Falkenrath Pit Fighter
text: {1}{R}, Discard a card, Sacrifice a Vampire: Draw two cards. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn.
flavor: In the arena, vampires set aside all pretense of honor or civilization and fight like the predators they know themselves to be.

name: Famished Foragers
text:
