When Famished Foragers enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, add {R}{R}{R}.
{2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor: Furious to find the workshop empty, the starving vampires flew into a frenzy.

name: Fangblade Brigand // Fangblade Eviscerator
text:
{1}{R}: Fangblade Brigand gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: As long as the sun is up, you'll only lose your purse.

name: Festival Crasher
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Festival Crasher gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: So many candles. So many flammables. So little time.

name: Flame Channeler // Embodiment of Flame
text: When a spell you control deals damage, transform Flame Channeler.
flavor: At the edge of night, on the cusp of winter, the allure of fire grows ever stronger.

name: Harvesttide Infiltrator // Harvesttide Assailant
text:
Trample
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: He was one masked stranger among many. Blending in was child's play.

name: Immolation
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.
flavor: Nothing is funnier to a devil than setting someone—anyone—on fire.

name: Lambholt Harrier
text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor:
"This Tovolar is no brainless brute. He sends his howling minions to terrorize a village for months. Sleepless nights and fear take their toll. Only then, when morale is at its worst, does he strike."
—Barnes, village watch

name: Lunar Frenzy
text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 and gains first strike and trample until end of turn.
flavor: In the adrenaline-fueled chaos, she hadn't even felt the bite.

name: Moonrager's Slash
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's night.
Moonrager's Slash deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: The cathars fell like leaves as Tovolar himself joined the fray.

name: Mounted Dreadknight
text:
Trample
Mounted Dreadknight enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if an opponent lost life this turn.
flavor: Markov vampires cultivate an image of such decadent elegance that it can be easy to forget they can field a deadly fighting force.

name: Neonate's Rush
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Vampire.
Neonate's Rush deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to its controller. Draw a card.
flavor:
"We spend our entire existence pursuing the joy of our first night's feast."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Obsessive Astronomer
text:
If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Obsessive Astronomer enters the battlefield.
Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
flavor: "Sleep? I can sleep when I'm dead!"

name: Pack's Betrayal
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If you control a Wolf or Werewolf, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: Tovolar's howl of command was too much to resist, even for Arlinn's own loyal pack.

name: Play with Fire
text: Play with Fire deals 2 damage to any target. If a player is dealt damage this way, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Devils find human dwellings to be oppressively cold, dark, and unburnt.

name: Raze the Effigy
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The folk of Kessig build up their courage by burning effigies of the things they fear.

name: Smoldering Egg // Ashmouth Dragon
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Ashmouth Dragon deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: A dragon is born. A province burns.

name: Stolen Vitality
text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. If it's your turn, that creature gains trample until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "There's nothing like a good meal to really lift the spirit."

name: Tavern Ruffian // Tavern Smasher
text: Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: She dispatched every challenger with a sickening snap of bone.

name: Thermo-Alchemist
text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.
flavor: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

name: Village Watch // Village Reavers
text:
Haste
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "You have my word. You'll see no wolf attacks while we're around!"

name: Voldaren Ambusher
text: When Voldaren Ambusher enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, it deals X damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
flavor: "Gotcha."

name: Voldaren Stinger
text:
Voldaren Stinger has first strike as long as it's attacking.
{2}{R}: Voldaren Stinger gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: A duel to first blood means something very different when a vampire is involved.

name: Bird Admirer // Wing Shredder
text:
Reach
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: She won't rest until she's collected specimens of every bird on Innistrad.

name: Bounding Wolf
text:
Flash
Reach
flavor: With their usual prey scared off by werewolves, the wolves of the Ulvenwald adopted inventive new hunting techniques.

name: Brood Weaver
text:
Reach
When Brood Weaver dies, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.
flavor: Travelers in the Somberwald scan the ground for werewolves and other threats, unaware of what lurks above.

name: Candlelit Cavalry
text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Candlelit Cavalry gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: "On this night, the dark will fear us."

name: Contortionist Troupe
text:
Contortionist Troupe enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Coven — At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: "Welcome to the greatest show in Kessig!"

name: Dawnhart Rejuvenator
text:
When Dawnhart Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "Wherever there is life, there is power for one who knows the old ways."

name: Deathbonnet Sprout // Deathbonnet Hulk
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Deathbonnet Hulk.
flavor: They grow up so fast.

name: Defend the Celestus
text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.
flavor: Witch, werewolf, and cathar stood shoulder to shoulder around the Sungold Lock at the center of the ritual, ready to stop Tovolar's assault—or die trying.

name: Dryad's Revival
text:
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "Pleased to meet you, Seven."

name: Eccentric Farmer
text: When Eccentric Farmer enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor: "Careful now. Don't want to get the seeds stuck to your feelers like last time."

name: Harvesttide Sentry
text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Harvesttide Sentry can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
flavor: She patrols the darkness so that others can forget their worries for one bright evening.

name: Hound Tamer // Untamed Pup
text:
Trample
{3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "You and me, we're not built for captivity."

name: Might of the Old Ways
text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Coven — Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
flavor: Brimming with power from their disrupted ritual, the Dawnhart witches lashed out at the werewolf intruders.

name: Outland Liberator // Frenzied Trapbreaker
text:
{1}, Sacrifice Outland Liberator: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "Just hold still. I'll help you."

name: Pestilent Wolf
text: {2}{G}: Pestilent Wolf gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor: Wolves that feast on zombie flesh and survive carry the foul diseases of the dead wherever they roam.

name: Shadowbeast Sighting
text:
Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
Flashback {6}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor:
"Werewolves leave tracks. Vampires leave wrung-out corpses. This is something else."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

name: Snarling Wolf
text: {1}{G}: Snarling Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor:
"Oh, thank the angels. It's not a werewolf, just a regular wo—"
—Bruno, Ulvenwald guide, last words

name: Tireless Hauler // Dire-Strain Brawler
text:
Vigilance
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: The new hire proved more than enough to replace the three farmhands who disappeared the week before.

name: Tovolar's Huntmaster // Tovolar's Packleader
text:
When Tovolar's Huntmaster enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "Do you smell that, friends? Fear and despair."

name: Unnatural Growth
text: At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.
flavor: With the cycles of day and night unspooled, the twisted sway of the moon only grew. And grew.

name: Willow Geist
text:
Trample
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Willow Geist.
When Willow Geist dies, you gain life equal to its power.
flavor: Die beneath a tree, wake up a part of it.

name: Adamant Will
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: "I refuse to die before I see the sun rise again."

name: Angelic Quartermaster
text:
Flying
When Angelic Quartermaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.
flavor: "Stand strong. We will reclaim the dawn."

name: Arm the Cathars
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3, up to one other target creature gets +2/+2, and up to one other target creature gets +1/+1. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: Faith is a cathar's greatest weapon, but a sword of blessed silver is a close second.

name: By Invitation Only
text: Choose a number between 0 and 13. Each player sacrifices that many creatures.
flavor: The red envelopes guarantee safe passage through the Lurenbraum barrier. Olivia left strict instructions: no invitation, no entry, no exceptions.

name: Dawnhart Geist
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 2 life.
flavor: "Our bodies may lie slain, but perhaps we can still complete the ritual. I'd rather not spend my afterlife in this wretched eternal night."

name: Distracting Geist // Clever Distraction
text:
Whenever Distracting Geist attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
Disturb {4}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: "I never did enjoy studying."

name: Drogskol Infantry // Drogskol Armaments
text: Disturb {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: He swore to protect the Moorlands. A little thing like death was no excuse to break his oath.

name: Estwald Shieldbasher
text: Whenever Estwald Shieldbasher attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: The door to her home survived the fires of the Malignus. Now it's her greatest weapon.

name: Fierce Retribution
text:
Cleave {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Destroy target [attacking] creature.
flavor: "It won't bring them back, but it will bring me peace."

name: Gryff Rider
text:
Flying
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor:
"Keep your heels down and bend at the hips as your mount takes flight. She'll do the rest."
—Anders, cathar drillmaster

name: Kindly Ancestor // Ancestor's Embrace
text:
Lifelink
Disturb {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: "You look cold, dearie."

name: Militia Rallier
text:
Militia Rallier can't attack alone.
Whenever Militia Rallier attacks, untap target creature.
flavor: "We can wait like helpless children for a hero, or we can gather our courage and *be* the heroes. Who's with me?"

name: Nebelgast Beguiler
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: A moment of distraction, an hour off course.

name: Ollenbock Escort
text:
Vigilance
Sacrifice Ollenbock Escort: Target creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: "Stay in the light. I don't know what lurks in those shadows, and I'd like to keep it that way."

name: Parish-Blade Trainee
text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Parish-Blade Trainee dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor: The recruits trained in eternal night, fueled by the hope that they might one day see the sun again.

name: Piercing Light
text: Piercing Light deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor:
"Creatures of the night dissolve like shadows in the light of faith."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Radiant Grace // Radiant Restraints
text:
Enchant player
Creatures enchanted player controls enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"Even in times of brutal darkness, never mistake beauty and delicacy for weakness."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Resistance Squad
text: When Resistance Squad enters the battlefield, if you control another Human, draw a card.
flavor:
"It's not that I didn't expect some defiance, but I did hope it wouldn't be so heavily armed."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Sanctify
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Olivia Voldaren has faith only in herself. We answer to a higher calling."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Sigarda's Summons
text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have base power and toughness 4/4, have flying, and are Angels in addition to their other types.
flavor: With Olivia distracted, Sigarda tore free from her bindings and summoned her Host of Herons.

name: Traveling Minister
text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. You gain 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Priests of the Sigardian Sect travel to the farthest reaches to spread hope and healing, even in the darkest times.

name: Twinblade Geist // Twinblade Invocation
text:
Double strike
Disturb {2}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: She faced down a howlpack alone, saving her town at the cost of her life.

name: Unholy Officiant
text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Unholy Officiant.
flavor:
"Is this twisted ceremony simply a mockery of the human rite, or has Olivia fallen for her own charade?"
—Sorin Markov

name: Vampire Slayer
text: Whenever Vampire Slayer deals damage to a Vampire, destroy that creature.
flavor: When Kaya saved her village, Berit realized even vampires could be killed. When she brought one down herself, she realized she had found her calling.

name: Wedding Announcement // Wedding Festivity
text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: Vampires from every bloodline mingled together, all swelling with pride to be seen at the event of the century.

name: Welcoming Vampire
text:
Flying
Whenever one or more other creatures with power 2 or less enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor: From the moment they arrived, wedding guests were met with a pageant of wealth and excess.

name: Alchemist's Retrieval
text:
Cleave {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Return target nonland permanent [you control] to its owner's hand.
flavor: To most, a terrifying apparition. To a necro-alchemist, a potent fuel source.

name: Biolume Egg // Biolume Serpent
text:
Defender
When Biolume Egg enters the battlefield, scry 2.
When you sacrifice Biolume Egg, return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Serpents leave their eggs in the cold and inky depths...

name: Chill of the Grave
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Zombie.
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.
flavor: Frozen is frozen, whether it's with cold, terror, or both.

name: Cobbled Lancer
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
{3}{U}, Exile Cobbled Lancer from your graveyard: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Don't worry everyone—I hear hoofbeats! The Gavony Riders are coming to save us!"
—Adin, Moorland villager

name: Consuming Tide
text: Each player chooses a nonland permanent they control. Return all nonland permanents not chosen this way to their owners' hands. Then you draw a card for each opponent who has more cards in their hand than you.
flavor: Nephalia's tides obey an unforgiving moon.

name: Cruel Witness
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"I escaped, so why do I still feel like I'm being watched?"
—Gregel, militia leader

name: Diver Skaab
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Diver Skaab exploits a creature, target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor: It doesn't need to breathe, but the suit does help keep the parts together.

name: Geistlight Snare
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Spirit. It also costs {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: Tamil had always wanted a closer look at a geist's lantern. Now he had an eternity to study one.

name: Geralf, Visionary Stitcher
text:
Zombies you control have flying.
{U}, {T}, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.
flavor: "Do you like it, Sister? Its dreadful visage was inspired by your own."

name: Gutter Skulker // Gutter Shortcut
text:
Gutter Skulker can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.
Disturb {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: Geists have a knack for showing up wherever they're least expected.

name: Inspired Idea
text:
Cleave {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Draw three cards. [Your maximum hand size is reduced by three for the rest of the game.]
flavor: Stitching is an ever-evolving field, with each new advancement reaching a new height of horror.

name: Jacob Hauken, Inspector // Hauken's Insight
text: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may pay {4}{U}{U}. If you do, transform Jacob Hauken, Inspector.
flavor: "Our world may be dark, but there's still plenty to see."

name: Lantern Bearer // Lanterns' Lift
text:
Flying
Disturb {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor: Val didn't know what the silent geist was offering . . .

name: Mischievous Catgeist // Catlike Curiosity
text:
Whenever Mischievous Catgeist deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Disturb {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
flavor:
"I never get any knitting done, but I don't entirely mind."
—Lorn, Lambholt innkeeper

name: Necroduality
text: Whenever a nontoken Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
flavor:
"Geralf's prowess continues to grow. He can now replicate my own creations with near-perfect accuracy."
—Ludevic's laboratory notes

name: Repository Skaab
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Repository Skaab exploits a creature, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Created to capture the spark of genius for later use.

name: Scattered Thoughts
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: Stitchers delegate the most important tasks to assistants with a good eye for detail.

name: Selhoff Entomber
text: {T}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card.
flavor: It knows one fundamental truth: bodies belong in graves.

name: Serpentine Ambush
text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 5/5.
flavor: The merchant did guarantee the new bait would bring in something big.

name: Skywarp Skaab
text:
Flying
When Skywarp Skaab enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"If I wanted all the parts to match, I wouldn't have become a stitcher."
—Barton, stitcher

name: Soulcipher Board // Cipherbound Spirit
text:
Flying
Cipherbound Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
{3}{U}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor: Rather than consort with demons, the Quietus Cult seeks wisdom from the dead.

name: Steelclad Spirit
text:
Defender
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Steelclad Spirit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor: Some geists imitate the lives they left behind. Others follow the dreams they never realized.

name: Stormchaser Drake
text:
Flying
Whenever Stormchaser Drake becomes the target of a spell you control, draw a card.
flavor:
"Blasted drake's interfering with the conductivity again. Garl! Go chase it away."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Syncopate
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor: "Fool! Can't you see the tide has turned against you?"

name: Syphon Essence
text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: The third step in creating a skaab requires draining the body of blood and replacing it with *viscus vitae*, a mixture of angel's blood and lamp oil.

name: Thirst for Discovery
text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a basic land card.
flavor:
"This is your only warning, alchemist. The secrets of the sea are not yours to behold. Lord Krothuss will not be so merciful next time."
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Wanderlight Spirit
text:
Flying
Wanderlight Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: The towers and catwalks of the Voldaren fortress are lit by the lanterns of geists endlessly seeking a way out.

name: Wash Away
text:
Cleave {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Counter target spell [that wasn't cast from its owner's hand].
flavor:
"May the ocean take it"
—Nephalia expression meaning
"good riddance"

name: Whispering Wizard
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor: Ivold was aghast when his device revealed the full scope of the geist infestation.

name: Wretched Throng
text: When Wretched Throng dies, you may search your library for a card named Wretched Throng, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Oh no. Oh no. Oh no. Oh no, again!"
—Beltstad, cathar recruit, last words

name: Aim for the Head
text:
Choose one —
• Exile target Zombie.
• Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
flavor:
"Works every time."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

name: Bleed Dry
text: Target creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Wipe your chin, child. We can't have Olivia thinking we're uncivilized."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Catapult Fodder // Catapult Captain
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures that each have toughness greater than their power, transform Catapult Fodder.
flavor: These days, ghouls are the only abundant resource in Thraben.

name: Concealing Curtains // Revealing Eye
text:
Defender
{2}{B}: Transform Concealing Curtains. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Specifics were kept secret, but word quickly spread that the show was a must-see.

name: Courier Bat
text:
Flying
When Courier Bat enters the battlefield, if you gained life this turn, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Swarms of bats poured from Lurenbraum Fortress carrying wedding invitations to vampires of every bloodline.

name: Demonic Bargain
text: Exile the top thirteen cards of your library, then search your library for a card. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Do not try to negotiate with me, human. You want power? This is the price."
—Ormendahl

name: Desperate Farmer // Depraved Harvester
text:
Lifelink
When another creature you control dies, transform Desperate Farmer.
flavor: A tragic moment pushed him to a blasphemous act.

name: Diregraf Scavenger
text:
Deathtouch
When Diregraf Scavenger enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: It can barely feel the sword anymore.

name: Dreadfeast Demon
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a non-Demon creature. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Dreadfeast Demon.
flavor: By the sixth day of darkness, the lake was more blood than water.

name: Dying to Serve
text: Whenever you discard one or more cards, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor:
"I used to have hired hands, but I discovered they make better waitstaff with the rest of the body attached."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Edgar's Awakening
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
When you discard Edgar's Awakening, you may pay {B}. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Here you go. Can't have you sleeping through your own wedding day."

name: Gift of Fangs
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Vampire. Otherwise, it gets -2/-2.
flavor:
"You are one of the few to whom we offer our blessing. What fool would reject immortality?"
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Grisly Ritual
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor:
"You can always tell who's new from the screaming."
—Tinua, Skirsdag cultist

name: Headless Rider
text: Whenever Headless Rider or another nontoken Zombie you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: He wanders the Moorlands hoping to one day chop off a head worthy of replacing his own.

name: Henrika Domnathi // Henrika, Infernal Seer
text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
{1}{B}{B}: Each creature you control with flying, deathtouch, and/or lifelink gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Once you've tasted demon blood, you'll wonder why you ever settled for human."

name: Innocent Traveler // Malicious Invader
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If no one does, transform Innocent Traveler.
flavor: "Aren't you going to invite me in?"

name: Mindleech Ghoul
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Mindleech Ghoul exploits a creature, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
flavor:
"This still doesn't make you the brains of the operation."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Parasitic Grasp
text:
Cleave {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Parasitic Grasp deals 3 damage to target [Human] creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor: Some wicked souls linger only to consume the warmth of life.

name: Persistent Specimen
text: {2}{B}: Return Persistent Specimen from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"The jaw bone's connected to the skull bone. The skull bone's connected to the . . . uh . . . hook thingy."
—Garl, sticher's assistant

name: Pointed Discussion
text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: Small talk is a dying art.

name: Ragged Recluse // Odious Witch
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you discarded a card this turn, transform Ragged Recluse.
flavor: "Forgive my manners. It's been so long since I had a guest for dinner."

name: Rot-Tide Gargantua
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rot-Tide Gargantua exploits a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor: Now that it doesn't need to breathe, its hunting ground extends well beyond the sea.

name: Skulking Killer
text: When Skulking Killer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn if that opponent controls no other creatures.
flavor: Olivia set a few villagers loose in the hedge maze as part of the evening's "entertainment."

name: Undying Malice
text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
flavor: Few take kindly to being put in their place, especially if their place is the grave.

name: Unhallowed Phalanx
text: Unhallowed Phalanx enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"In case any of you new recruits were wondering, this is why we don't use mass graves anymore."
—Kerren of the Mausoleum Guards

name: Vampire's Kiss
text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: Young vampires gorge themselves at every meal, but their elders have learned to savor the smallest bite.

name: Voldaren Bloodcaster // Bloodbat Summoner
text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target Blood token you control becomes a 2/2 black Bat creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types.
flavor: "Humans throw rice and release doves at their weddings? How quaint."

name: Wedding Security
text: Whenever Wedding Security attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Wedding Security and draw a card.
flavor: In lieu of payment, he was granted permission to devour any unauthorized visitors.

name: Alluring Suitor // Deadly Dancer
text: When you attack with exactly two creatures, transform Alluring Suitor.
flavor: "May I have this dance?"

name: Ancestral Anger
text:
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Ancestral Anger in your graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor: "One vampire for every family member I've lost."

name: Ballista Watcher // Ballista Wielder
text:
{2}{R}, {T}: Ballista Watcher deals 1 damage to any target.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "Careful, this thing's dangerous. Wouldn't want anyone getting hurt."

name: Blood Hypnotist
text:
Blood Hypnotist can't block.
Whenever you sacrifice one or more Blood tokens, target creature can't block this turn. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor: Arvon was ecstatic to offer his blood to such a captivating creature.

name: Change of Fortune
text: Discard your hand, then draw a card for each card you've discarded this turn.
flavor:
"We cannot escape change, but with faith and fortitude, we can mold it to our liking."
—Marel, Dawnhart witch

name: Daybreak Combatants
text:
Haste
When Daybreak Combatants enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: After weeks of unending darkness, a glimpse of dawn was all the people of Stensia needed to rekindle their will to fight.

name: Dominating Vampire
text: When Dominating Vampire enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of Vampires you control until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "You can join me or feed me. Choose fast."

name: End the Festivities
text: End the Festivities deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.
flavor: When the defenses around Lurenbraum Fortress faltered, the Crimson Ballroom received some unexpected guests.

name: Fearful Villager // Fearsome Werewolf
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: When Harold ran from the wolves, the others called him a coward.

name: Flame-Blessed Bolt
text: Flame-Blessed Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"I noticed you were short on party favors, so I brought my own."
—Higa, slayer-captain of Gatstaf

name: Frenzied Devils
text:
Haste
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Frenzied Devils gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Devils need no reason to stir up chaos. The chaos itself is their reward."
—Rem Karolus, Fiendslayer

name: Honeymoon Hearse
text:
Trample
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Honeymoon Hearse becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
flavor: A carriage crafted from the finest materials. Horses bred from the finest stock. Skulls taken from the finest foes.

name: Hungry Ridgewolf
text: As long as you control another Wolf or Werewolf, Hungry Ridgewolf gets +1/+0 and has trample.
flavor: Even vampires know to travel faster when they hear howling in the Geier Reach passes.

name: Into the Night
text: It becomes night. Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards plus one.
flavor:
"When lost souls wander into the woods, the wilds have a way of showing them who they really are."
—Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

name: Kessig Flamebreather
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Kessig Flamebreather deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: "Hunter's fire" was meant for slaying monsters in the Ulvenwald, but that never stopped Ralen from showing it off.

name: Kessig Wolfrider
text:
Menace
{2}{R}, {T}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Create a 3/2 red Wolf creature token.
flavor: "It's a perfect partnership. My village is safe from wolf attacks, and she gets to eat any vampires we catch."

name: Lightning Wolf
text: {1}{R}: Lightning Wolf gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: These thick-furred wolves have adapted to Stensia's storms, channeling their energy into bursts of supernatural speed.

name: Pyre Spawn
text: When Pyre Spawn dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Memories of the Harvesttide tragedy festered until they grew into an incarnate rage that set the world ablaze.

name: Reckless Impulse
text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor: A stitcher looks at their creation and sees the result of years of study and hours of toil. A devil sees a new plaything.

name: Rending Flame
text: Rending Flame deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent is a Spirit, Rending Flame also deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
flavor:
"It is our duty to bring the Blessed Sleep to the dead, even if they resist that gift."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Runebound Wolf
text: {3}{R}, {T}: Runebound Wolf deals damage equal to the number of Wolves and Werewolves you control to target opponent.
flavor: The wolf's captor hid his fear, but he knew someday the runes would fail, the collar would break, and the wolf would remember his face.

name: Stensia Uprising
text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 red Human creature token. Then if you control exactly thirteen permanents, you may sacrifice Stensia Uprising. When you do, it deals 7 damage to any target.
flavor: "Vampires have done nothing but take from us. Tonight, we reclaim what's ours!"

name: Vampires' Vengeance
text: Vampires' Vengeance deals 2 damage to each non-Vampire creature. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: Olivia was quick to make an example of any village that refused to pay her blood tithe.

name: Voldaren Epicure
text: When Voldaren Epicure enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: "If you're not refining your tastes, what's the point of living forever?"

name: Voltaic Visionary // Volt-Charged Berserker
text:
{T}: Voltaic Visionary deals 2 damage to you. Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
When you play a card exiled with Voltaic Visionary, transform Voltaic Visionary.
flavor: She spent many years trying to harness chaos.

name: Weary Prisoner // Wrathful Jailbreaker
text:
Defender
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: "Your guard attacked me. He got what was coming to him."

name: Apprentice Sharpshooter
text:
Reach
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor: Innistrad's best archers are trained by the Quiver of Kessig, an order of cathars who specialize in ranged combat.

name: Cartographer's Survey
text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to two land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: She monitors the roads in every province, mapping safe routes through hunting grounds and haunting grounds alike.

name: Crushing Canopy
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor:
"The forests of this world are unafraid to assert themselves."
—Wrenn

name: Dawnhart Disciple
text: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, Dawnhart Disciple gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Our coven finds strength in nature and purpose in serving our communities."

name: Dormant Grove // Gnarled Grovestrider
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if that creature has toughness 6 or greater, transform Dormant Grove.
flavor: As the natural cycle of day and night grew twisted, old powers stirred deep in the Ulvenwald.

name: Flourishing Hunter
text: When Flourishing Hunter enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to the greatest toughness among other creatures you control.
flavor:
"I would welcome her into my pack with honor."
—Arlinn Kord

name: Hookhand Mariner // Riphook Raider
text: Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: The local gossips swore Nesmith lost his hands in a fight with a werewolf.

name: Infestation Expert // Infested Werewolf
text:
Whenever Infestation Expert enters the battlefield or attacks, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: There's only so many times she can take being asked . . .

name: Laid to Rest
text:
Whenever a Human you control dies, draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"We are not here to mourn their loss. We are here to celebrate their lives."
—Vesna, Dawnhart witch

name: Massive Might
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Run! It's coming for us! Eventually!"
—Yaster, Havengul shopkeeper

name: Moldgraf Millipede
text: When Moldgraf Millipede enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on Moldgraf Millipede for each creature card in your graveyard. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor: Between stitchers, cultists, and scavengers, corpses are in high demand.

name: Oakshade Stalker // Moonlit Ambusher
text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: He blends seamlessly into the forest, waiting silently for his prey.

name: Packsong Pup
text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another Wolf or Werewolf, put a +1/+1 counter on Packsong Pup.
When Packsong Pup dies, you gain life equal to its power.
flavor: A wolf pup is always dangerous, because a wolf pup is never alone.

name: Reclusive Taxidermist
text:
Reclusive Taxidermist gets +3/+2 as long as there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: All druids seek to preserve nature, but some go about it in rather unusual ways.

name: Retrieve
text: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Retrieve.
flavor: The roots preserved the armor for a hundred years, safeguarding it for a traveler in need.

name: Rural Recruit
text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Rural Recruit enters the battlefield, create a 3/1 green Boar creature token.
flavor: The Dawnhart survivors welcome recruits of all shapes and sizes.

name: Sheltering Boughs
text:
Enchant creature
When Sheltering Boughs enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
flavor:
"We're not at odds with the woods. How could we be, when we share so many enemies?"
—Marel, Dawnhart witch

name: Splendid Reclamation
text: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"These seeds waited faithfully for the sun to rise again. Now, their patience is rewarded."
—Wrenn

name: Spore Crawler
text: When Spore Crawler dies, draw a card.
flavor:
"Remember to come back in a few years when that fungus has died off. Then we'll see what's in the chest."
—Old Rutstein

name: Sporeback Wolf
text: As long as it's your turn, Sporeback Wolf gets +0/+2.
flavor: The mushrooms growing in the wolves' fur possess curative properties incredible enough to tempt many alchemists into risking their lives to track one down.

name: Toxic Scorpion
text:
Deathtouch
When Toxic Scorpion enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor:
"You want that venom? Collect it yourself! I'm not losing another pair of dragonhide gloves."
—Old Rutstein

name: Ulvenwald Oddity // Ulvenwald Behemoth
text:
Trample, haste
{5}{G}{G}: Transform Ulvenwald Oddity.
flavor:
"Obviously it's dangerous, but I've never seen anything like it. This could be an entirely new species! I say we follow it."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

name: Weaver of Blossoms // Blossom-Clad Werewolf
text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: Living in harmony with nature . . .

name: Witch's Web
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor: Ever since the ritual, Ryla didn't have an appetite at the dinner table, but her long walks in the forest always seemed to satiate her hunger.

name: Wolf Strike
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn if it's night. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor: Tovolar's howlpack had scattered, but the Dire-Strain survivors were still on the hunt.

name: Wolfkin Outcast // Wedding Crasher
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wolf or Werewolf.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
flavor: The villagers feared him. The cathars scorned him. Only in the wilds did he find a family that accepted him.

name: Endless Ranks of the Dead
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.
flavor: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

name: Elvish Eulogist
text: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
flavor: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

name: Heedless One
text:
Trample
Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: "Channel your vitality through me."

name: Stonewood Invoker
text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

name: Voice of the Woods
text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Create a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample.
flavor: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

name: Wirewood Herald
text: When Wirewood Herald dies, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

name: Wirewood Symbiote
text: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: It drinks fatigue.

name: Elvish Promenade
text: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.
flavor: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

name: Clickslither
text:
Haste
Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

name: Emberwilde Augur
text: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: It deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. Activate only during your upkeep.
flavor: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

name: Goblin Matron
text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: There's always room for one more.

name: Goblin Sledder
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Let's play 'sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

name: Goblin Warchief
text:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblins you control have haste.
flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

name: Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician
text:
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.
Sacrifice two Mountains: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor: "Everybody but me—CHARGE!"

name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

name: Reckless One
text:
Haste
Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
flavor: "Release chaos with me!"

name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: "I order you to volunteer."

name: Skirk Fire Marshal
text:
Protection from red
Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: He's boss because he's smart enough to get out of the way.

name: Skirk Prospector
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R}.
flavor:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Skirk Shaman
text: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
flavor: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

name: Tar Pitcher
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Boggart Shenanigans
text: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

name: Tarfire
text: Tarfire deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Waterspout Djinn
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Fly us higher, out of its storm."
—Sisay, captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.
flavor: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

name: Gush
text:
You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Draw two cards.
flavor: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

name: Flamekin Brawler
text: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: When he hits people, they stay hit.

name: Fireslinger
text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
flavor:
"Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Pyre Charger
text:
Haste
{R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

name: Slith Firewalker
text:
Haste
Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

name: Firebolt
text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Reach out and torch someone.

name: Seal of Fire
text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: After the fourth time Chandra left a place engulfed in flames, she decided to just go ahead and make it her thing.

name: Flame Javelin
text:
({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

name: Fireblast
text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

name: Charging Paladin
text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

name: Angelic Protector
text:
Flying
Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."
—Crovax

name: Luminous Angel
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: "The spread of evil's destruction shall always be matched by the rise of the noble fallen."

name: Serra's Boon
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Otherwise, it gets -2/-1.
flavor:
"The light of an angel's glance is warm, but her fixed stare blinds and burns."
—Calexis, deacon of the New Order of Serra

name: Lord of the Pit
text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.
flavor: "My summoning begins your debt, planeswalker."

name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
text: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor:
"There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Daggerclaw Imp
text:
Flying
Daggerclaw Imp can't block.
flavor: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

name: Overeager Apprentice
text: Discard a card, Sacrifice Overeager Apprentice: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor: Slow and steady may not always win the race, but at least it doesn't end up splattered on the walls.

name: Soot Imp
text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a nonblack spell, that player loses 1 life.
flavor:
"If one gets in your chimney, you're going to need a long wick and a barrel of bangstuff to get it out."
—Hob Heddil

name: Demon's Jester
text:
Flying
Hellbent — Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.
flavor: They knock 'em dead, with or without the punch line.

name: Souldrinker
text: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Souldrinker.
flavor: Don't drink and thrive.

name: Demonic Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Liliana learned the secrets she sought, but at a price that was etched on her fate.

name: Wild Mongrel
text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: It teaches *you* to play dead.

name: Wirewood Savage
text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.
flavor:
"She is truly Wirewood's child now."
—Elvish refugee

name: Plated Slagwurm
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: Beneath the Tangle, the wurm tunnels stretch . . . wide as a stone's throw, long as forever, deep as you dare.

name: Lignify
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a Treefolk with base power and toughness 0/4 and loses all abilities.
flavor: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his *feet* be so thirsty?

name: Windstorm
text: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.
flavor:
"We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Faerie Macabre
text:
Flying
Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
flavor: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

name: Howling Banshee
text:
Flying
When Howling Banshee enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.
flavor: Villagers cloaked the town in magical silence, but their ears still bled.

name: Keening Banshee
text:
Flying
When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

name: Hideous End
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

name: Snuff Out
text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "The bigger they are, the faster they rot."

name: Phyrexian Negator
text:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.
flavor: They exist to cease.

name: Carrion Feeder
text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

name: Phyrexian Battleflies
text:
Flying
{B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

name: Phyrexian Denouncer
text: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Priest of Gix
text: When Priest of Gix enters the battlefield, add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor:
"Gix doesn't want a people to rule but puppets to entertain his madness."
—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

name: Phyrexian Broodlings
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
flavor: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

name: Sanguine Guard
text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
flavor:
"Father of Machines! Your filigree gaze carves us, and the scars dance upon our grateful flesh."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

name: Phyrexian Debaser
text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Phyrexian Defiler
text: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Nomadic Elf
text: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

name: Tribal Flames
text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor:
"Fire is the universal language."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Narrow Escape
text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
flavor: He could find no strength left to budge, no power left to fight, no will left to live. Luckily, they could find him.

name: Exotic Curse
text:
Enchant creature
Domain — Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor:
Fouler than a necromancer's kiss.
—Jamuraan expression

name: Allied Strategies
text: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands they control.
flavor: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.

name: Elite Vanguard
flavor: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

name: Goldmeadow Harrier
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor:
"It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

name: Mosquito Guard
text:
First strike
Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
flavor: His aim is as sure as a mosquito's sting, but with none of the warning.

name: Kor Skyfisher
text:
Flying
When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

name: Temple Acolyte
text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

name: Burrenton Bombardier
text:
Flying
Reinforce 2—{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
flavor: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

name: Kor Hookmaster
text: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

name: Kemba's Skyguard
text:
Flying
When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . 'strange.' Regent's orders."
—Ranya, skyhunter captain

name: Catapult Master
text: Tap five untapped Soldiers you control: Exile target creature.
flavor: "There's no 'I' in 'team,' but there's a 'we' in 'weapon.'"

name: Conclave Equenaut
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
flavor: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

name: Sunlance
text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.
flavor:
"It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."
—Orim, Samite inquisitor

name: Razor Barrier
text: Target permanent you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "We protect our homelands. Why should they not protect us?"

name: Crusade
text: White creatures get +1/+1.
flavor:
"Finally, I understand. Home isn't where you rest. It's what you fight for."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Abolish
text:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

name: Saltblast
text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
flavor: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

name: Swell of Courage
text:
Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Reinforce X—{X}{W}{W} ({X}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
flavor: "Tideshaping is more than creating a few new puddles."

name: Silver Myr
text: {T}: Add {U}.
flavor: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

name: Lionheart Maverick
text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

name: Knight of Meadowgrain
text:
First strike
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

name: Silver Knight
text: First strike, protection from red
flavor: "Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."

name: Zhalfirin Commander
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Knight Exemplar
text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavor: "If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
text: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
flavor: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

name: Alaborn Cavalier
text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor:
"Course he ran! *I* wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"
—Alaborn soldier

name: Plover Knights
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

name: Harm's Way
text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.
flavor: Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.

name: Edge of Autumn
text:
If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

name: Test of Faith
text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

name: Spidersilk Armor
text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

name: Bloodmark Mentor
text: Red creatures you control have first strike.
flavor: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

name: Fire-Belly Changeling
text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor:
"My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."
—Auntie Wort

name: Bogardan Rager
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Captive Flame
text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

name: Ghostfire
text:
Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

name: Seismic Strike
text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor:
"Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."
—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

name: Claws of Valakut
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
flavor: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

name: Jaws of Stone
text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast this spell.
flavor: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

name: Loam Lion
text: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
flavor: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

name: Ajani's Mantra
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor:
"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

name: Recumbent Bliss
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: Kithkin somnomancers enjoy the peaceful dreams wafting from their victims.

name: Surveilling Sprite
text:
Flying
When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.
flavor: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

name: Slavering Nulls
text: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.
flavor: Having lost their minds, they now want yours.

name: Hellfire Mongrel
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: There is no fondness between the hound and its master. There is only a common appreciation of the hunt.

name: Vapor Snag
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor:
"This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Scroll Thief
text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

name: Neurok Invisimancer
text:
Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked.
When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

name: Slith Strider
text:
Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card.
Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.

name: Clone
text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
flavor: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

name: Primal Plasma
text: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.
flavor: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

name: Cache Raiders
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: What the current doesn't take, they do.

name: Jedit's Dragoons
text:
Vigilance
When Jedit's Dragoons enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor: After Efrava was destroyed, the cat warriors scattered across Dominaria. Those who followed Jedit's example were strong enough to survive the ravages of apocalypse.

name: Sigil of Sleep
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

name: Safe Passage
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
flavor: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

name: Plated Geopede
text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: It prefers a cooked meal, so it will eat you now and lava-bask later.

name: Fiery Hellhound
text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."
—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

name: Cosi's Ravager
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor:
"Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding."
—Zakken, Enclave cleric

name: Vulshok Berserker
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.

name: Geyser Glider
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

name: Lithophage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.
flavor: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

name: Earth Servant
text: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.
flavor:
"Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child."
—Jestus Dreya, *Of Elements and Eternity*

name: Spire Barrage
text: Spire Barrage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

name: Galvanoth
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

name: Train of Thought
text:
Replicate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)
Draw a card.
flavor: "But then . . . oh, but . . . which means . . . which would lead to . . . exactly!"

name: Thunderheads
text:
Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)
Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

name: Overwhelming Intellect
text: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's mana value.
flavor: "My brain hurts."

name: Boneyard Wurm
text: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

name: Greater Mossdog
text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)
flavor: Man's best fungus.

name: Sadistic Hypnotist
text: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "Victory in the pits is almost as rewarding as the methods I use to achieve it."

name: Ghoul's Feast
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Mercadians not wealthy enough to buy a tomb are thrown into a bog called "the Ghoul's Larder."

name: Twilight's Call
text:
You may cast Twilight's Call as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
Twilight falls. We rise.
—Necropolis inscription

name: Duskhunter Bat
text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Flying
flavor: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

name: Bloodrage Vampire
text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

name: Mausoleum Guard
text: When Mausoleum Guard dies, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
flavor: "Ghoulcallers trying to get in, geists trying to get out . . . . This duty is never dull."

name: Phantom General
text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
flavor: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.

name: Decompose
text: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor:
"Sheesh! How am I supposed to make a decent living around here?"
—Cabal grave robber

name: Sorin's Thirst
text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

name: Mark of the Vampire
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
flavor:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
—Sorin Markov

name: Goblin Arsonist
text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

name: Scorched Rusalka
text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

name: Ashmouth Hound
text: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

name: Coal Stoker
text: When Coal Stoker enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor:
"The day is mine! I sent three such creatures against my foe, then watched as my magefire popped her soldiers like overripe spleenfruits."
—Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

name: Hellrider
text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
flavor:
"Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

name: Skirsdag Cultist
text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

name: Blazing Salvo
text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.
flavor: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

name: Geistflame
text:
Geistflame deals 1 damage to any target.
