Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature. Exile that token at end of combat.
flavor: Who you are constantly runs toward who you will be.

name: Mystic Meditation
text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a creature card.
flavor:
"Still the mind and quiet the heart. Only then will you hear the Multiverse's great truths."
—Narset

name: Ojutai Interceptor
text:
Flying
Megamorph {3}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: "Though I may soar, I could never fly as high as the dragons."

name: Palace Familiar
text:
Flying
When Palace Familiar dies, draw a card.
flavor:
"The most profound secrets lie in the darkest places of the world. It can be prudent to make use of another set of eyes."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

name: Reduce in Stature
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/2.
flavor: A dragon learns humility only in the moments before its death.

name: Sidisi's Faithful
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Sidisi's Faithful exploits a creature, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I tire of your prattle, and your face."

name: Skywise Teachings
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.
flavor: Ojutai's words must be translated from Draconic before his students can benefit from their wisdom.

name: Updraft Elemental
text: Flying
flavor:
"It slips through the smallest cracks in the mountain, emerging whole and unfettered. There is nowhere it cannot go, for what can hold back the air itself?"
—Chanyi, Ojutai monk

name: Youthful Scholar
text: When Youthful Scholar dies, draw two cards.
flavor:
"Too dumb, and you end up a sibsig. Too smart, and you end up a meal. Mediocrity is the key to a long life."
—Mogai, Silumgar noble

name: Zephyr Scribe
text:
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Zephyr Scribe.
flavor:
"Ojutai's rule has allowed Tarkir's monks to learn from the truly enlightened."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Blood-Chin Fanatic
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another Warrior creature: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor: "We are as brutal as our dragonlord. We strike like wild lightning and feast on human flesh."

name: Blood-Chin Rager
text: Whenever Blood-Chin Rager attacks, Warrior creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: Kolaghan blades rarely stay clean for long.

name: Butcher's Glee
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

name: Coat with Venom
text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
"Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord."
—Xathi the Infallible

name: Corpseweft
text: {1}{B}, Exile one or more creature cards from your graveyard: Create a tapped X/X black Zombie Horror creature token, where X is twice the number of cards exiled this way.
flavor: Sidisi hated to limit her options.

name: Deadly Wanderings
text: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch and lifelink.
flavor:
"Seclusion is only an option for the strong."
—Sorin Markov

name: Defeat
text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
flavor:
"Wars are decided one life at a time."
—Gvar Barzeel, Kolaghan warrior

name: Dutiful Attendant
text: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The dragon who eats the last head in the basket is entitled to the servant's.

name: Flatten
text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor: Like their dragonlord, the Kolaghan take no trophies. They find true fulfillment only in the battle itself, in clash of steel and thunder of hooves.

name: Foul Renewal
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the toughness of the card returned this way.
flavor: The cycle of life and death is rarely pretty.

name: Foul-Tongue Shriek
text: Target opponent loses 1 life for each attacking creature you control. You gain that much life.
flavor: Foul-Tongue shamans draw their powers from a dark twisting of the Draconic language.

name: Kolaghan Skirmisher
text: Dash {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
flavor: Kolaghan's army rushes from kill to kill, desperate to avoid the dragon's wrath.

name: Marang River Skeleton
text:
{B}: Regenerate Marang River Skeleton.
Megamorph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: The gurgling of the Marang conceals both footsteps and screams.

name: Marsh Hulk
text: Megamorph {6}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: Now vengeance is his sole purpose.

name: Minister of Pain
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Minister of Pain exploits a creature, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Draconic words need not be shouted. A whisper will suffice.

name: Qarsi Sadist
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Qarsi Sadist exploits a creature, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: Dying for the greater good still hurts.

name: Rakshasa Gravecaller
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rakshasa Gravecaller exploits a creature, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor: Debts to rakshasa linger beyond death.

name: Self-Inflicted Wound
text: Target opponent sacrifices a green or white creature. If that player does, they lose 2 life.
flavor:
"Worse than watching the cruelest deed is watching it done by your own hand."
—Baihir, Dromoka mage

name: Sibsig Icebreakers
text: When Sibsig Icebreakers enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
flavor:
"I almost envy them. They can't get frostbite."
—Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

name: Silumgar Butcher
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Silumgar Butcher exploits a creature, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Silumgar takes pride in the diversity of his sibsig.

name: Ukud Cobra
text: Deathtouch
flavor:
"The Silumgar hide behind the deadly wildlife of their swamps. They'd rather scheme in their jungle palaces than face us."
—Khibat, Kolaghan warrior

name: Ultimate Price
text: Destroy target monocolored creature.
flavor:
"The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

name: Virulent Plague
text: Creature tokens get -2/-2.
flavor:
"This pestilence robs us of glorious death in battle. We starve to death with full bellies and drown trying to slake our unnatural thirst."
—Kerai Hatesinger, Kolaghan warrior

name: Wandering Tombshell
flavor: The crumbling temples on the tortoise's back are monuments to the decadence of the ancient Sultai. Though it harkens back to the era of the khans, Silumgar allows it to walk his territory as a warning to those who would oppose him.

name: Berserkers' Onslaught
text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
flavor:
"Atarka's people starve while she feasts upon the bounty of their hunts. They must conquer ever more lands just for the sake of their own subsistence."
—Arel, Unseen Whisperer

name: Descent of the Dragons
text: Destroy any number of target creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor: Dragons emerge from tempests fully formed and terribly hungry.

name: Hardened Berserker
text: Whenever Hardened Berserker attacks, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.
flavor:
"Just let him loose and follow the charge."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Impact Tremors
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor:
"If their ears are to the ground, we will make them bleed!"
—Taklai, Kolaghan warrior

name: Kindled Fury
text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"It is most honorable to use every part of the animals we kill . . . especially if we use them to annihilate our enemies."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Kolaghan Aspirant
text: Whenever Kolaghan Aspirant becomes blocked by a creature, Kolaghan Aspirant deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor: She answers the call of the Crave, the desire for battle sated only by bloodshed.

name: Lose Calm
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste and menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: A lifetime of discipline forsaken in a moment of rage.

name: Magmatic Chasm
text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Our shamans assert their mastery over the land, thwarting the lesser clans' attempts to stand in the way of our dragonlord."
—Allek, Atarka hunter

name: Qal Sisma Behemoth
text: Qal Sisma Behemoth can't attack or block unless you pay {2}.
flavor:
"It hunts grand game for Atarka, and when the time comes, it will become a mighty feast."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Rending Volley
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.
flavor: The sky offers few hiding places.

name: Roast
text: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
flavor:
"Intruders in the lands of Atarka have but two choices: be consumed by fire, or be consumed by maw."
—Ulnok, Atarka shaman

name: Sarkhan's Rage
text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.
flavor: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

name: Sarkhan's Triumph
text: Search your library for a Dragon creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Sarkhan gazed on the world around him, the dragons sweeping through its skies, and joy kindled like a fire in his soul.

name: Screamreach Brawler
text: Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
flavor: "My dragonlord's lightning will dance upon your bones!"

name: Seismic Rupture
text: Seismic Rupture deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: The shaman opened the earth beneath their feet, trapping the survivors within the crevices of Ayagor for Atarka to devour at her leisure.

name: Stormcrag Elemental
text:
Trample
Megamorph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: The storms of Tarkir awaken more than dragons.

name: Summit Prowler
flavor:
"Do you not hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? Their meat is as tender as a bear's and their blood as warming as fire. They are prey that will please Atarka."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Tail Slash
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor:
"Kneel before a dragon and you will be spared when it turns to leave."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Vandalize
text:
Choose one or both —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.
flavor:
"As we have learned from Kolaghan, to ruin is to rule."
—Shensu, Kolaghan rider

name: Volcanic Rush
text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"The bravest warriors take the shortest path to victory, whatever that path may be."
—Sakta, Atarka hunter

name: Ainok Artillerist
text: Ainok Artillerist has reach as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"In the Tarkir I once knew, the Abzan revered their ancestor trees. Now, as Dromoka, they cut their finest groves to make weapons."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Atarka Beastbreaker
text: Formidable — {4}{G}: Atarka Beastbreaker gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor: He scorns the heavy winter garb of lesser warriors, trusting his anger to keep him warm.

name: Avatar of the Resolute
text:
Reach, trample
Avatar of the Resolute enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: It exemplifies the ideals of the Dromoka: strength, unity, and honor.

name: Circle of Elders
text:
Vigilance
Formidable — {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor: They whisper of an ancient hero who saved the dragons of their world.

name: Collected Company
text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: Many can stand where one would fall.

name: Colossodon Yearling
flavor: The colossodon's hard outer shell stops many predators, but with a gentle flip from a dragon, it quickly becomes a meal in a bowl.

name: Conifer Strider
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: Atarka's presence thaws the glaciers of Qal Sisma, forcing its elementals to migrate or adapt.

name: Dragon-Scarred Bear
text: Formidable — {1}{G}: Regenerate Dragon-Scarred Bear. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor: Bears are a delicacy for the Atarka. The few that remain are the toughest of their species.

name: Dromoka's Gift
text: Bolster 4. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor: The simplest gift from a dragon can be a revered accolade for a human warrior.

name: Lurking Arynx
text: Formidable — {2}{G}: Target creature blocks Lurking Arynx this turn if able. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor: Once it has your scent, it will hunt you from the Gurmag Swamp to Ayagor.

name: Pinion Feast
text: Destroy target creature with flying. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor:
"Even paradise is not without tragedies."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Press the Advantage
text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Show your enemies as much mercy as they would show you."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Revealing Wind
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You may look at each face-down creature that's attacking or blocking.
flavor:
"The sands obscure the vision of others, but clarify ours."
—Faiso, Dromoka commander

name: Sandsteppe Scavenger
text: When Sandsteppe Scavenger enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor: "Sad what passes for a dragon among the Silumgar."

name: Segmented Krotiq
text: Megamorph {6}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: The list of things a krotiq eats is as long as the krotiq itself.

name: Shape the Sands
text: Target creature gets +0/+5 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"Dragons in flight seldom expect company."
—Kadri, Dromoka warrior

name: Sheltered Aerie
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."
flavor: Dromoka's scalelords patrol the skies over Arashin, offering her people safety from the harsh world.

name: Sight of the Scalelords
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control with toughness 4 or greater get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Silumgar creep around our borders and infiltrate our aeries. We must remain ever watchful."
—Golran, Dromoka captain

name: Stampeding Elk Herd
text: Formidable — Whenever Stampeding Elk Herd attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: The Atarka use them not just for food, but also to clear away snow, trees, and enemy forces.

name: Surrak, the Hunt Caller
text: Formidable — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "The greatest honor is to feed Atarka."

name: Tread Upon
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Boasting impenetrable defenses only draws the most tenacious of attackers."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Anointer of Champions
text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Arise. You have been anointed by the light. Go forth and fight without fear, for you shall be victorious."

name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

name: Grasp of the Hieromancer
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."
flavor:
"There is power in abandon, but far more in control."
—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

name: Windrider Eel
text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The best spot to hook one is right behind the gills."
—Rana Cloudwake, kor skyfisher

name: Archfiend of Depravity
text:
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.
flavor: "Why would I kill you all? Who then would be left to worship me?"

name: Searing Spear
text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

name: Stormblood Berserker
text:
Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: Blood is holy to those whose god is War.

name: Veteran's Reflexes
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor: "Assume everything wants to kill you. At the very least, assume everything wants what's in your pack."

name: Time Warp
text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
flavor: Just when you thought you'd survived the first wave.

name: Vampire Noble
flavor:
"No emergency is so dire that it cannot be dealt with elegantly."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Rush of Adrenaline
text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Scarecrows only go so far in sending the message to stay away.

name: Rally the Ancestors
text: Return each creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile those creatures at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rally the Ancestors.
flavor:
"The family is a tree, and in times of need, every branch can be a weapon."
—Daghatar the Adamant

name: Ensoul Artifact
text:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types.
flavor: Too often, some self-described genius comes up with a "labor-saving device" that ends up creating far more work.

name: All That Glitters
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.
flavor: A faerie's glee at her trove quickly fades to contentment, then to boredom, then to an urge to steal more.

name: Ardenvale Paladin
text: Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, Ardenvale Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "Even when hope is but a small flame fighting the night, I will serve the absent king."

name: Ardenvale Tactician // Dizzying Swoop
text: Flying
flavor: In a castle that prizes loyalty above all, the bond between knight and griffin is unmatched.

name: Bartered Cow
text: When Bartered Cow dies or when you discard it, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: At the market, no one heeded Hilda's frantic mooing. The fae curse was turning out even worse than she had feared.

name: Beloved Princess
text:
Lifelink
Beloved Princess can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor: Sometimes a gentle slipper can travel where an armored boot's been denied.

name: Deafening Silence
text: Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.
flavor:
"They have forsaken their vows. The edict of the Circle demands their voices be silenced."
—Syr Tasdale, knight of Ardenvale

name: Faerie Guidemother // Gift of the Fae
text: Flying
flavor: No one is so lost that a faerie can't find them.

name: Flutterfox
text: As long as you control an artifact or enchantment, Flutterfox has flying.
flavor:
"The white fox grinned. 'How about a bet, dragon? If I win, the skies are mine.' After he stopped laughing, the dragon agreed."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Fortifying Provisions
text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
When Fortifying Provisions enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: "To the king, to the Circle, and to the realm! And to not dying."

name: Giant Killer // Chop Down
text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: "What size advantage? They never even see me coming."

name: Glass Casket
text: When Glass Casket enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until Glass Casket leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Fate will decide whether it's a bed or a tomb.

name: Harmonious Archon
text:
Flying
Non-Archon creatures have base power and toughness 3/3.
When Harmonious Archon enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
flavor: First among equals.

name: Hushbringer
text:
Flying, lifelink
Creatures entering the battlefield or dying don't cause abilities to trigger.
flavor: "Let's begin this conversation again, and this time you will only listen."

name: Knight of the Keep
flavor: "What good is loyalty to the crown if we are not also in service to those less fortunate? I fight for all of us."

name: Linden, the Steadfast Queen
text:
Vigilance
Whenever a white creature you control attacks, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Until my last breath, I will defend the realm."

name: Mysterious Pathlighter
text:
Flying
Each creature you control that has an Adventure enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)
flavor: For good or ill, most fae can't resist meddling in the adventures of any knight they meet.

name: Outflank
text: Outflank deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor:
"With the drum of hooves and a flash of blades, the monster's terrifying roar changed to a cry of fear."
—*Legend of the Gilded Knights*

name: Prized Griffin
text: Flying
flavor:
"I wrote these tales with a quill made from a griffin's feather. And the winning of that feather is quite a tale itself."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales

name: Rally for the Throne
text:
Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor:
"If you're as loyal as you claim, now is the time to show it."
—Queen Linden of Ardenvale

name: Shepherd of the Flock // Usher to Safety
flavor: Not all heroes carry swords.

name: Silverflame Ritual
text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: Tempered by fire and united in virtue, the knights of Ardenvale fight with a single, unbreakable will.

name: Silverflame Squire // On Alert
flavor: Beacons along the borderlands are lit at any incursion from the wilds.

name: Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
text:
First strike
Whenever Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The realm must never yield to the chaos of the wilds."

name: Trapped in the Tower
text:
Enchant creature without flying
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor: "At least up here I have some peace and quiet."

name: True Love's Kiss
text:
Exile target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Be careful, dear. Some people deserve their curses."
—Marawen, barrow witch

name: Venerable Knight
text: When Venerable Knight dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Knight you control.
flavor: "May this blade guide you on your great journey, as it did me on mine."

name: Worthy Knight
text: Whenever you cast a Knight spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor: Every Ardenvale aspirant must step through the flame. Their honor determines whether they burn or shine.

name: Animating Faerie // Bring to Life
text: Flying
flavor: A true puppet master has no need for strings.

name: Didn't Say Please
text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.
flavor: "If you're in our home, we expect you to mind your manners."

name: Faerie Vandal
text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.
flavor: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.

name: Gadwick, the Wizened
text:
When Gadwick, the Wizened enters the battlefield, draw X cards.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
flavor: His name is spoken only in whispers—but he hears just the same.

name: Into the Story
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if an opponent has seven or more cards in their graveyard.
Draw four cards.
flavor: The boundary between real and imaginary is as thin as the page, and just as easily torn.

name: Merfolk Secretkeeper // Venture Deeper
flavor: Merfolk curiosity usually has dire consequences, but rarely for the merfolk.

name: Mirrormade
text: You may have Mirrormade enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or enchantment on the battlefield.
flavor:
"Share your darkest secret and the Mirror will reveal your soul's essence."
—Ceri, royal mirrorkeeper

name: Mistford River Turtle
text: Whenever Mistford River Turtle attacks, another target attacking non-Human creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: The fae raised the turtle from a tiny hatchling. They taught it whom to ferry—and whom to drown.

name: Moonlit Scavengers
text: When Moonlit Scavengers enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact or enchantment, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: They comb the shallows of Lochmere for relics of a bygone era. And if they happen upon a lone traveler, all the better.

name: Mystical Dispute
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: "Poor, lost mage. Your feet are on land, yet you're in over your head, aren't you?"

name: Sage of the Falls
text: Whenever Sage of the Falls or another non-Human creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: Ask a merfolk even a simple question and the answer is a journey far beyond the known.

name: So Tiny
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0. It gets -6/-0 instead as long as its controller has seven or more cards in their graveyard.
flavor: His sword sounded like a silver chime on the glass jar, and the sprite laughed with delight.

name: Steelgaze Griffin
text:
Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Steelgaze Griffin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"If we didn't guard our secrets, they wouldn't remain secrets for long."
—Gadwick, the Wizened

name: Stolen by the Fae
text: Return target creature with mana value X to its owner's hand. You create X 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying.
flavor: Denizens of the wilds don't always seek to harm intruders. Sometimes they simply misplace them.

name: Tome Raider
text:
Flying
When Tome Raider enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "Humans are so forgetful. Every page I steal becomes a secret they can't remember."

name: Unexplained Vision
text:
Draw three cards.
Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, scry 3.
flavor: Rowan and Will exchanged a baffled glance. Could the stag in the vision lead them to their father?

name: Vantress Paladin
text:
Flying
Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, Vantress Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "Someone knows where the king is. They can't expect to keep it a secret from us."

name: Wishful Merfolk
text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Wishful Merfolk loses defender and becomes a Human until end of turn.
flavor: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.

name: Witching Well
text:
When Witching Well enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{3}{U}, Sacrifice Witching Well: Draw two cards.
flavor: It was built by the Witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.

name: Ayara, First of Locthwain
text:
Whenever Ayara, First of Locthwain or another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{T}, Sacrifice another black creature: Draw a card.
flavor: Mourning shifts seamlessly to celebration as she chooses her next suitor.

name: Bake into a Pie
text: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."

name: Barrow Witches
text: When Barrow Witches enters the battlefield, return target Knight card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Taste the sweetness, breath for breath. Keep the balance, death for death."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Belle of the Brawl
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Belle of the Brawl attacks, other Knights you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Locthwain knights take pride in being the last ones standing in a fight or on a dance floor.

name: Blacklance Paragon
text:
Flash
When Blacklance Paragon enters the battlefield, target Knight gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: The Blacklances travel deep into the wilds, sometimes for years at a time, in search of the lost Cauldron of Eternity.

name: Bog Naughty
text:
Flying
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The faerie plucked an acorn off the ground. One knight's quest was about to come to a bitter end."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Cauldron Familiar
text:
When Cauldron Familiar enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sacrifice a Food: Return Cauldron Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Every day the cat returns to kill the same mouse, which sinks again into the cauldron's brew.

name: Epic Downfall
text: Exile target creature with mana value 3 or greater.
flavor: The dragon had a lot of things going through his mind that day. He didn't expect a sword to be one of them.

name: Eye Collector
text:
Flying
Whenever Eye Collector deals combat damage to a player, each player mills a card.
flavor: "Lord Rankle will see you now—all he asks is a small token of tribute."

name: Festive Funeral
text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Even as we mourn the last, we look to the next with joy. Hopefully, my new suitor will bring the Cauldron home."
—Ayara, First of Locthwain

name: Forever Young
text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavor: Those who say you only live once have never been touched by the Cauldron of Eternity.

name: Lash of Thorns
text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor:
"Another angry mob? When will they learn to leave me be?"
—Terryn, Edgewall outcast

name: Locthwain Paladin
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Adamant — If at least three black mana was spent to cast this spell, Locthwain Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "I will find the king if I have to ride from summer to winter and back again."

name: Lost Legion
text: When Lost Legion enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: Even death cannot diminish the persistence of the knights of Locthwain.

name: Malevolent Noble
text: {2}, Sacrifice an artifact or another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Malevolent Noble.
flavor: He has slain a dozen witches, luring each with a promise of fresh children's bones.

name: Memory Theft
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.
flavor: In the wilds, the ravens steal far more than baubles.

name: Reave Soul
text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor:
"Into amethyst, I pour
Envy's shadow, sorrow's gleam.
Lure the one whose scorn I bore
That I may hear one final scream."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Revenge of Ravens
text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Syr Tasdale declared that he never wanted to see the witch Ygretta again. Her familiars quickly granted his request.

name: Smitten Swordmaster // Curry Favor
text: Lifelink
flavor: "My quest? Why, to marry Ayara. Or die trying."

name: Specter's Shriek
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player exiles that card. If a nonblack card is exiled this way, exile a card from your hand.
flavor:
"Imagine having your skeleton extracted through your ear, one bone at a time."
—Corliss the Wanderer

name: Tempting Witch
text:
When Tempting Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 3 life.
flavor:
"Murder clad in crimson beauty,
An end to life and love and duty."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Wicked Guardian
text: When Wicked Guardian enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 2 damage to another creature you control. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."

name: Witch's Vengeance
text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: The hex swept through the village, its citizens falling one by one.

name: Barge In
text: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each attacking non-Human creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The giant had heard of locks, but he had yet to discover a door he couldn't open.

name: Bloodhaze Wolverine
text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Bloodhaze Wolverine gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"Build a moat. If we're lucky, it can't swim."
—Syr Branigan, knight of Ardenvale

name: Blow Your House Down
text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Destroy any of them that are Walls.
flavor:
"You think these walls will protect you?
My, you have a dim view of the power of the wilds."
—Marawen, barrow witch

name: Burning-Yard Trainer
text:
Trample, haste
When Burning-Yard Trainer enters the battlefield, another target Knight you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.
flavor: "For every scar I've received, I've given ten back."

name: Claim the Firstborn
text: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"The deal was struck and the favor had been done. And so, under the cover of night, the debt was paid."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Crystal Slipper
text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor:
"After the death of her mother, Cassia found that things that appear fragile can be very strong indeed."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

name: Embereth Paladin
text:
Haste
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, Embereth Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "The king would die for the realm. I would not hesitate to do the same for him."

name: Ferocity of the Wilds
text: Attacking non-Human creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.
flavor: Knights who excel in tournaments sometimes underestimate threats beyond the realm.

name: Fervent Champion
text:
First strike, haste
Whenever Fervent Champion attacks, another target attacking Knight you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Equip abilities you activate that target Fervent Champion cost {3} less to activate.
flavor: 2018 World Champion Javier Domínguez

name: Fires of Invention
text:
You can cast spells only during your turn and you can cast no more than two spells each turn.
You may cast spells with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control without paying their mana costs.
flavor: "Just tell us how many you want and get out of the way."

name: A-Fires of Invention
text:
You can cast spells only during your turn and you can cast no more than two spells each turn.
You may cast spells with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control without paying their mana costs.
flavor: "Just tell us how many you want and get out of the way."

name: Irencrag Feat
text: Add seven {R}. You can cast only one more spell this turn.
flavor: The greatest challenge isn't the stifling heat but the crushing weight of those who failed before.

name: Irencrag Pyromancer
text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Irencrag Pyromancer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: "Fear of fire is a sensible instinct. If I were you, I'd be terrified."

name: Joust
text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn if it's a Knight. Then those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor:
"Life is a tournament that rewards the bold."
—Syr Layne, knight of Embereth

name: Mad Ratter
text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens.
flavor: "Gather round and tell me all from the courts and castles."

name: Merchant of the Vale // Haggle
text: {2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor: "Buying old, worn-out junk. Selling marvels of real value."

name: Ogre Errant
text: Whenever Ogre Errant attacks, another target attacking Knight gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: Knights kept returning from Ogre's Pass wearing nothing but bruises, so they decided to just pretend it was on their side.

name: Raging Redcap
text: Double strike
flavor: Many tales of redcap terror begin with two simple things: bloodlust and stolen steel.

name: Redcap Melee
text: Redcap Melee deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If a nonred permanent is dealt damage this way, you sacrifice a land.
flavor: At first, Syr Fenwick scoffed when he saw his opponents for the final match.

name: Redcap Raiders
text: Whenever Redcap Raiders attacks, you may tap an untapped non-Human creature you control. If you do, Redcap Raiders gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"I admire their courage as much as I despise their savagery."
—Syr Carah, the Bold

name: Searing Barrage
text:
Searing Barrage deals 5 damage to target creature.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, Searing Barrage deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: It emerged from the coldest depths of Lochmere only to face the fires of Irencrag.

name: Seven Dwarves
text:
Seven Dwarves gets +1/+1 for each other creature named Seven Dwarves you control.
A deck can have up to seven cards named Seven Dwarves.
flavor:
"The gleam of rubies and my brothers and sisters by my side . . . what more could I want?"
—Brognold the Third

name: Skullknocker Ogre
text: Whenever Skullknocker Ogre deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random. If the player does, they draw a card.
flavor: The ogre crashed through the massive door. The winged folios scattered like frightened birds.

name: Slaying Fire
text:
Slaying Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, it deals 4 damage instead.
flavor: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.

name: Syr Carah, the Bold
text:
Whenever Syr Carah, the Bold or an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
{T}: Syr Carah deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: "Duty and honor are reasons enough, but beating you will also be a pleasure."

name: Torbran, Thane of Red Fell
text: If a red source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead.
flavor: A dwarf's grudge runs deeper than the mountains' roots.

name: Weaselback Redcap
text: {1}{R}: Weaselback Redcap gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I would rather cast myself into the abyss than let my blood stain the cap of those monsters."
—Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw

name: Curious Pair // Treats to Share
flavor: "It's gingerbread, like Mother makes. What is there to be afraid of?"

name: Edgewall Innkeeper
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell that has an Adventure, draw a card. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)
flavor: "Warmth. Safety. A fully-stocked larder. You'll find nothing like Edgewall Keep in the wilds, I promise you that!"

name: Fell the Pheasant
text: Fell the Pheasant deals 5 damage to target creature with flying. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor:
"A keen eye and steady hand are essential for defeating most foes, including hunger."
—Syr Grenphire, knight of Garenbrig

name: Fierce Witchstalker
text:
Trample
When Fierce Witchstalker enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: While the realm has laws, in the wilds there are other ways of balancing power.

name: Flaxen Intruder // Welcome Home
text: Whenever Flaxen Intruder deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: The middle blade was just right.

name: Garenbrig Carver // Shield's Might
flavor: Countless knights of Garenbrig owe their lives to his peerless craftsmanship.

name: Garenbrig Squire
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell that has an Adventure, Garenbrig Squire gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)
flavor:
"Find him a weapon as big as his dreams."
—Yorvo, lord of Garenbrig

name: Giant Opportunity
text: You may sacrifice two Foods. If you do, create a 7/7 green Giant creature token. Otherwise, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: They look tasty, but best to plant them.

name: Insatiable Appetite
text: You may sacrifice a Food. If you do, target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn. Otherwise, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: He ate them out of house and home and shed and barn and flock and herd.

name: Keeper of Fables
text: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor:
"Only the lion knows more stories than I do."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales

name: Maraleaf Rider
text: Sacrifice a Food: Target creature blocks Maraleaf Rider this turn if able.
flavor: They both hunger for battle.

name: Oakhame Adversary
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: The elves remember every secret path from the days when they ruled the realm.

name: Rosethorn Acolyte // Seasonal Ritual
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "Old battlefields make great gardens. So rich from the blood of the fallen."

name: Syr Faren, the Hengehammer
text: Whenever Syr Faren, the Hengehammer attacks, another target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Syr Faren's power.
flavor: "Words are pointless. It's what you do with your hammer that counts."

name: Tall as a Beanstalk
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has reach, and is a Giant in addition to its other types.
flavor: He realized a bit late that he was supposed to *plant* the magic beans.

name: Tuinvale Treefolk // Oaken Boon
flavor: "Right now you are a feeble stick, but I will help you grow some rings."

name: Wildwood Tracker
text: Whenever Wildwood Tracker attacks or blocks, if you control another non-Human creature, Wildwood Tracker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "This one was wearing shoes made of glass. She'll be no ordinary prey."

name: Wolf's Quarry
text: Create three 1/1 green Boar creature tokens with "When this creature dies, create a Food token." (A Food token is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor:
"The monster was gaining on them. Twice it had found them. There was only one place left to hide."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Castle Ardenvale
text:
Castle Ardenvale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains.
{T}: Add {W}.
{2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor: Without Ardenvale's loyalty, the realm would greedily devour itself.

name: Castle Garenbrig
text:
Castle Garenbrig enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest.
{T}: Add {G}.
{2}{G}{G}, {T}: Add six {G}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells or activate abilities of creatures.
flavor: Without Garenbrig's strength, the realm would succumb to the wilds.

name: Idyllic Grange
text:
({T}: Add {W}.)
Idyllic Grange enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Plains.
When Idyllic Grange enters the battlefield untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: Every hero's journey starts somewhere.

name: Garrison Griffin
text:
Flying
Whenever Garrison Griffin attacks, target Knight you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: The keen-eyed guardians of Ardenvale are ever on alert.

name: Rowan's Battleguard
text:
First strike
As long as you control a Rowan planeswalker, Rowan's Battleguard gets +3/+0.
flavor: "This sword is Sunrise. The other is Dawn. They mark the beginning of my days but the end of yours."

name: Oko's Accomplices
text: Flying
flavor: They function as everything from assassins to jesters in the name of their fae king.

name: Bramblefort Fink
text: {8}: Bramblefort Fink has base power and toughness 10/10 until end of turn. Activate only if you control an Oko planeswalker.
flavor: No matter the cruelty of Oko's jokes, he's always guaranteed the sycophant's laughter.

name: Faerie Formation
text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. Draw a card.
flavor: The throng flitted from castle to castle, leaving a trail of star-crossed love, damaging rumors, and missing heirlooms in their wake.

name: Workshop Elders
text:
Artifact creatures you control have flying.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target noncreature artifact you control become a 0/0 artifact creature. If you do, put four +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor:
"Fear not what's under the bed. The toys are watching."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

name: Embereth Skyblazer
text:
As long as it's your turn, Embereth Skyblazer has flying.
Whenever Embereth Skyblazer attacks, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of opponents you have.
flavor: "We fight with valor in our hearts and fire in our veins!"

name: Steelbane Hydra
text:
Steelbane Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Steelbane Hydra: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: Many an ancient treasure has been reduced to jagged caltrops by its snapping jaws.

name: Thorn Mammoth
text:
Trample
Whenever Thorn Mammoth or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Thorn Mammoth fights up to one target creature you don't control.
flavor: It will come to the defense of all wild things, from the shivering wren to the towering giant.

name: Ballynock Cohort
text:
First strike
Ballynock Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.
flavor: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.

name: Benevolent Bodyguard
text: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

name: Humble
text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.
flavor: Through failure we learn our finest lessons in humility.

name: Second Thoughts
text:
Exile target attacking creature.
Draw a card.
flavor: It suddenly dawned on Jorin that farming was quite a noble profession.

name: Shelter
text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: Good strategists seize opportunities. Great strategists make their own.

name: War Priest of Thune
text: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
flavor: "Let nothing take away from the purity of swords clashing or of arrows taking flight toward the breast of evil."

name: Giant Tortoise
text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.
flavor: In the coastal states of Jhess and Valeron, "tortoise" is a synonym for "stubborn."

name: Quiet Speculation
text: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles.
flavor:
"The best foresight is hindsight."
—Empress Llawan

name: Serendib Efreet
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

name: Silent Departure
text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

name: Sprite Noble
text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1.
{T}: Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "By thorn and by stone, we will fight to see the day when beauty returns to this world."

name: Stupefying Touch
text:
Enchant creature
When Stupefying Touch enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor: "A warrior without wit is simply meat."

name: Braids, Cabal Minion
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.
flavor: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."

name: Deadbridge Shaman
text: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.
flavor: Ending her life won't end the infestation.

name: Havoc Demon
text:
Flying
When Havoc Demon dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.

name: Hymn to Tourach
text: Target player discards two cards at random.
flavor: The priests plead for your anguish and pray for your despair.

name: Lys Alana Scarblade
text: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.
flavor: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.

name: Plague Witch
text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "I can ail what cures you."

name: Prowling Pangolin
text: When Prowling Pangolin enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice Prowling Pangolin.
flavor: "Wait, are *we* the decoys?"

name: Sinkhole
text: Destroy target land.
flavor: High walls, a sturdy keep, a strong garrison . . . they made no difference. In a matter of moments, the city was lost.

name: Skulking Ghost
text:
Flying
When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor:
"They exist only so long as the living take no notice."
—Kifimbo, Shadow guildmage

name: Visara the Dreadful
text:
Flying
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "My eyes are my strongest feature."

name: Wake of Vultures
text:
Flying
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.
flavor:
"So the vulture said to the griffin, 'You gonna eat that?'"
—Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

name: Carbonize
text: Carbonize deals 3 damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"There's no coming back from that."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Flame Jab
text:
Flame Jab deals 1 damage to any target.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor:
"Fire's out. Should be safe now."
—Gnarltrunk

name: Orcish Oriflamme
text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor: The orcs' banner sends a clear message: "Stand against us and meet the same fate as the goblins."

name: Price of Progress
text: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
flavor: Enthusiasm can be tempered in the furnace of the earth.

name: Rorix Bladewing
text: Flying, haste
flavor: In an attempt to restore pride to Shiv and to forge an undying legacy, Rorix traveled far to compete for glory in Otaria's Grand Coliseum.

name: Seismic Stomp
text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor:
"It is not in me to tread lightly."
—Ryda, geomancer

name: Ancestral Mask
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.
flavor: "I pass to you all we have ever been. Go forth and become all we never could."

name: Commune with the Gods
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.

name: Heritage Druid
text: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G}.
flavor:
"Study the great spirits of our age and those of the past. Prune secrets from the branching traceries of our lineage."
—Twila, Gilt-Leaf archdruid

name: Natural Order
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: . . . but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.

name: Nimble Mongoose
text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Threshold — Nimble Mongoose gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: One thread connected all the travelers' stories: the ferocity of the mongoose.

name: Seal of Strength
text: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: When does majestic become ominous?

name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
text:
Trample
{G}: Regenerate Silvos, Rogue Elemental.
flavor: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

name: Xantid Swarm
text:
Flying
Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't cast spells this turn.
flavor: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.

name: Bruna, the Fading Light // Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
text:
When you cast this spell, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flying, vigilance
(Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)
flavor: She now sees only Emrakul's visions.

name: Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
Your opponents can't cast spells with mana value 3 or less.
flavor: Upon discovering what had become of her sisters, Sigarda could only weep.

name: Courageous Outrider
text: When Courageous Outrider enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor: One silvery blast signaled that she wouldn't be arriving at Thraben alone.

name: Dawn Gryff
text: Flying
flavor: After facing so many horrors, the survivors of Videns parish couldn't comprehend the hope that the gryff represented.

name: Deploy the Gatewatch
text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to two planeswalker cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: Gideon and Liliana may not have seen eye to eye, but that did not stop them from fighting side by side.

name: Drogskol Shieldmate
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Drogskol Shieldmate enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "I will join you so that you will not yet join me."

name: Extricator of Sin // Extricator of Flesh
text:
Eldrazi you control have vigilance.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a non-Eldrazi creature: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
flavor: After the end, a new beginning.

name: Faithbearer Paladin
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor:
"I've seen cathars riding to battle without a hint of fear. Perhaps that is its own sort of madness."
—Esler, Havengul mercenary

name: Fiend Binder
text: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

name: Geist of the Lonely Vigil
text:
Defender, flying
Delirium — Geist of the Lonely Vigil can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor: The flicker of candlelight and the echo of hymns told the villagers that the monastery wasn't truly abandoned.

name: Gisela, the Broken Blade // Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
text:
Flying, first strike, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if you both own and control Gisela, the Broken Blade and a creature named Bruna, the Fading Light, exile them, then meld them into Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.
flavor: She now hears only Emrakul's murmurs.

name: Give No Ground
text: Target creature gets +2/+6 until end of turn and can block any number of creatures this turn.
flavor: "Get behind me!"

name: Guardian of Pilgrims
text: When Guardian of Pilgrims enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Immune to the physical warping caused by Emrakul, geists proved to be some of humanity's most important allies.

name: Ironwright's Cleansing
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Impurities must be pounded out."

name: Lone Rider // It That Rides as One
text:
First strike, lifelink
At the beginning of the end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, transform Lone Rider.
flavor:
"Horse and rider are often of one mind."
—Ulda, Gavony Rider

name: Providence
text:
You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, your life total becomes 26.
Your life total becomes 26.
flavor: There is power in prayer, regardless of who is listening.

name: Repel the Abominable
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Human sources.
flavor:
"Fight for a better future, even if you may not live to see it."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Sigardian Priest
text: {1}, {T}: Tap target non-Human creature.
flavor: Many whose faith was destroyed by Avacyn turned to the only angel who remained true to humanity.

name: Spectral Reserves
text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor:
"My predecessors taught me of duty and commitment. It seems they have more to teach."
—Wendin, veteran cathar

name: Steadfast Cathar
text: Whenever Steadfast Cathar attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The most resolute soldiers will press forward in the face of overwhelming odds."
—Gideon Jura

name: Subjugator Angel
text:
Flying
When Subjugator Angel enters the battlefield, tap all creatures your opponents control.
flavor: The remnants of Innistrad's corrupted angelic hosts collapsed to form the Flight of Nightmares.

name: Thalia, Heretic Cathar
text:
First strike
Creatures and nonbasic lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "Salvation will not be granted by the Lunarch Council. It must be earned—at the edge of a sword, if necessary."

name: Thalia's Lancers
text:
First strike
When Thalia's Lancers enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a legendary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "Let the points of our lances lead the way."

name: Thraben Standard Bearer
text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
flavor: The uncorrupted rallied under Thalia's leadership and Sigarda's banner.

name: Coax from the Blind Eternities
text: You may reveal an Eldrazi card you own from outside the game or choose a face-up Eldrazi card you own in exile. Put that card into your hand.
flavor: At Nahiri's call, Emrakul traversed the vast emptiness between the planes and arrived on Innistrad.

name: Contingency Plan
text: Surveil 5. (Look at the top five cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor:
"Improvisation is for those who failed to prepare."
—Jace Beleren

name: Convolute
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor:
"There's no sense arguing with insanity."
—Levana, Midnight Duelist

name: Curious Homunculus // Voracious Reader
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: Good books make you savor each word.

name: Displace
text: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
flavor: "I'll see you soon, Subjects 25 and 26. I've got a good feeling this time!"

name: Docent of Perfection // Final Iteration
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature token. Then if you control three or more Wizards, transform Docent of Perfection.
flavor: The time had come for him to share his findings.

name: Drag Under
text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.

name: Enlightened Maniac
text: When Enlightened Maniac enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
flavor: "At last! Proof that it's not all in my head!"

name: Exultant Cultist
text: When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.
flavor: Amid the gibbering chorus that rose from the drownyard temple, Jace recognized a single word: "Emrakul."

name: Fortune's Favor
text: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
flavor: Uncertainty has its own allure.

name: Geist of the Archives
text:
Defender
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: After reading the final words, it turns back to the first page and begins again.

name: Grizzled Angler // Grisly Anglerfish
text: {T}: Mill two cards. Then if there is a colorless creature card in your graveyard, transform Grizzled Angler.
flavor: "There's no question that these waters are treacherous, but if there's one thing I've learned in all my years of sailing . . ."

name: Laboratory Brute
text: When Laboratory Brute enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
flavor: It keeps intruders out and experiments in.

name: Lunar Force
text: When an opponent casts a spell, sacrifice Lunar Force and counter that spell.
flavor: "Moonlight offers sublime warmth that brings me a comfort sunlight cannot provide."

name: Mind's Dilation
text: Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
flavor: Infinite wisdom cannot be contained within a single mind.

name: Scour the Laboratory
text:
Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Draw three cards.
flavor: "The answer's in here somewhere!"

name: Summary Dismissal
text: Exile all other spells and counter all abilities.
flavor: "Let's start fresh, shall we?"

name: Take Inventory
text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Take Inventory in your graveyard.
flavor: A place for everything, and everything in its place.

name: Tattered Haunter
text:
Flying
Tattered Haunter can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: When the Nebelgast recedes, there are often stragglers.

name: Turn Aside
text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor:
"There are tides beyond those in the sea that are driven by Innistrad's silver moon. If you learn their patterns, you can channel them in fascinating ways."
—Tamiyo

name: Unsubstantiate
text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts."
—Liliana Vess

name: Boon of Emrakul
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.
flavor: All around Emrakul, life re-formed in her image.

name: Cemetery Recruitment
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.
flavor: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."

name: Certain Death
text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.

name: Dark Salvation
text: Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.
flavor: Countless ghouls surged through Thraben's streets, and with them came the city's salvation.

name: Dusk Feaster
text:
Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Flying
flavor: The Voldaren lands remained well protected when Olivia's army marched from Lurenbraum Fortress.

name: Gavony Unhallowed
text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.
flavor:
"We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Markov Crusader
text:
Lifelink
Markov Crusader has haste as long as you control another Vampire.
flavor: The surviving members of the Markov bloodline drove through a crush of horrors to reclaim their ancestral home.

name: Oath of Liliana
text:
When Oath of Liliana enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
At the beginning of each end step, if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: "I'll keep watch. Happy now?"

name: Olivia's Dragoon
text: Discard a card: Olivia's Dragoon gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Displays of Voldaren bloodlust are not restricted to glamorous banquets and lavish parties.

name: Prying Questions
text: Target opponent loses 3 life and puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
flavor: What remained of the Lunarch Inquisition found new ways to extract confessions.

name: Ruthless Disposal
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card and sacrifice a creature.
Two target creatures each get -13/-13 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Do try to pull your weight, Geralf. I feel like I'm doing everything."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Skirsdag Supplicant
text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each player loses 2 life.
flavor:
"I can no longer stand by as these Skirsdag infiltrators rot the church from within. Even the Lunarch Council is compromised. What a fool I've been."
—Odric

name: Stromkirk Condemned
text: Discard a card: Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor:
"Blood from the vein is the finest vintage to accompany a feast of the mind."
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Succumb to Temptation
text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
flavor: "Restraint is for the meek."

name: Thraben Foulbloods
text: Delirium — Thraben Foulbloods gets +1/+1 and has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: The famed hunting hounds of House Cecani continue to prove the quality of their pedigree.

name: Tree of Perdition
text:
Defender
{T}: Exchange target opponent's life total with Tree of Perdition's toughness.
flavor: There will be no absolution.

name: Vampire Cutthroat
text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: Not all monsters have tentacles.

name: Voldaren Pariah // Abolisher of Bloodlines
text:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Abolisher of Bloodlines, target opponent sacrifices three creatures.
flavor: Even if the rain turned to blood, her thirst would not be slaked.

name: Wailing Ghoul
text: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, mill two cards.
flavor:
"Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Weirded Vampire
text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"Emrakul makes apparent those whom she has favored."
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Whispers of Emrakul
text:
Target opponent discards a card at random.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, that player discards two cards at random instead.
flavor: Your thoughts are no longer your own.

name: Assembled Alphas
text: Whenever Assembled Alphas blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Assembled Alphas deals 3 damage to that creature and 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: There is always a toll to pay for passage.

name: Blood Mist
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Some claim that rage is a cloud that obscures thought and vision. But I can assure you—I've never seen with greater clarity."

name: Bold Impaler
text: {2}{R}: Bold Impaler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Burning with hatred for Nahiri, the Voldaren and Markov forces assaulted the warped Markov Manor with a collective fury not seen in centuries.

name: Brazen Wolves
text: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.

name: Conduit of Storms // Conduit of Emrakul
text:
Whenever Conduit of Storms attacks, add {R} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn.
{3}{R}{R}: Transform Conduit of Storms.
flavor: It strikes with the fury of a tempest.

name: Deranged Whelp
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"When you confront a wolf scorned by its pack, extra caution is the order of the day."
—Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

name: Falkenrath Reaver
flavor:
"Each day there are new reports of homes along Getander Pass and Hofsaddel falling to vampires of a more savage nature. I've even heard tell that Anje Falkenrath has returned. Please send whatever help you can."
—Sterin Gorn, letter to Thalia

name: Furyblade Vampire
text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, Furyblade Vampire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Writhe all you want, filth. It will do you no good."

name: Galvanic Bombardment
text: Galvanic Bombardment deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Galvanic Bombardment in your graveyard.
flavor: Geist-powered devices have no shortage of fuel.

name: Hanweir Garrison // Hanweir, the Writhing Township
text:
Whenever Hanweir Garrison attacks, create two 1/1 red Human creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.
(Melds with Hanweir Battlements.)
flavor: "We're ready for anything!"

name: Harmless Offering
text: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.
flavor: "Such an adorable face!"

name: Incendiary Flow
text: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"What's your plan?" Gideon asked.
"Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

name: Insatiable Gorgers
text:
Insatiable Gorgers attacks each combat if able.
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"Drink deeply, for there is no tomorrow!"
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Make Mischief
text: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.

name: Nahiri's Wrath
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Nahiri's Wrath deals damage equal to the total mana value of the discarded cards to each of up to X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
flavor: "You brought this upon yourself, Sorin!"

name: Otherworldly Outburst
text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
flavor: A tiny crack is enough to open the mind to Emrakul.

name: Prophetic Ravings
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."
flavor: "Keep your herons and shrews! You will find nothing in the moon, for the moon is a lie! It has told me so!"

name: Shreds of Sanity
text: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card. Exile Shreds of Sanity.
flavor: A few gnawing thoughts can eat at the mind until nothing else remains.

name: Smoldering Werewolf // Erupting Dreadwolf
text:
When Smoldering Werewolf enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
{4}{R}{R}: Transform Smoldering Werewolf.
flavor:
"Never thought I'd see the day I'd be wishing to see just a plain old werewolf."
—Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

name: Spreading Flames
text: Spreading Flames deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
flavor:
"Hang on. I'm just tidying up."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Stensia Banquet
text:
Stensia Banquet deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of Vampires you control.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"We can't win a war on an empty stomach, can we?"
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Stensia Innkeeper
text: When Stensia Innkeeper enters the battlefield, tap target land an opponent controls. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: "The perils of the road, you say? Don't worry. You won't have to face those again."

name: Vildin-Pack Outcast // Dronepack Kindred
text:
Trample
{1}: Dronepack Kindred gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: These new terrors will not recede with the setting of the moon.

name: Weaver of Lightning
text:
Reach
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Weaver of Lightning deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "Lightning in a bottle? That's not where I need it."

name: Backwoods Survivalists
text: Delirium — Backwoods Survivalists gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything—and anyone—that travels through their woods.

name: Crossroads Consecrator
text: {G}, {T}: Target attacking Human gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "May the steel of your blade match the steel in your soul."

name: Emrakul's Evangel
text: {T}, Sacrifice Emrakul's Evangel and any number of other non-Eldrazi creatures: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.
flavor:
"In times like these, be particularly wary of those who claim they can save your soul."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Emrakul's Influence
text: Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with mana value 7 or greater, draw two cards.
flavor: Hordes of Eldrazi and cultists swarmed over Thraben's defenses, and the members of the Gatewatch found themselves overrun.

name: Gnarlwood Dryad
text:
Deathtouch
Delirium — Gnarlwood Dryad gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
