flavor: Rakdos cultists hanged her for sport in the township square. Her ghost now stands vigil at what has become known as the Tree of Weeping.

name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
text:
Deathtouch
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

name: Splatter Thug
text:
First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

name: Wasteland Viper
text:
Deathtouch
Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Gruul embrace all things poisonous and living in the cracks of society."
—Teysa Karlov

name: Wurmweaver Coil
text:
Enchant green creature
Enchanted creature gets +6/+6.
{G}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Wurmweaver Coil: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.
flavor: Some use magic to spy through walls. Others use it to crush them.

name: Miming Slime
text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor:
"We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Highcliff Felidar
text:
Vigilance
When Highcliff Felidar enters the battlefield, for each opponent, choose a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. Destroy those creatures.
flavor: Once the felidar has marked you as prey, there's no point in running.

name: Sphinx of Enlightenment
text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, target opponent draws a card and you draw three cards.
flavor: "I would be a fool if I taught you everything I know."

name: Fiendish Duo
text:
First strike
If a source would deal damage to an opponent, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
flavor: Half the size, double the mayhem.

name: Earthshaker Giant
text:
Trample
When Earthshaker Giant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: "Come, my wild children. Let's give the interlopers a woodland welcome."

name: Kytheon's Irregulars
text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
{W}{W}: Tap target creature.
flavor: Kytheon and his irregulars worked outside the law to bring justice to the streets of Akros.

name: Take Vengeance
text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

name: Topan Freeblade
text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

name: Aven Wind Mage
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

name: Dramatic Reversal
text: Untap all nonland permanents you control.
flavor:
"Nobody asked you to butt in, Jace. But thanks."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: River's Rebuke
text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.
flavor: Carefully following the thaumatic compass Bolas had given her, Vraska blundered straight into the River Heralds' trap.

name: Salvager of Secrets
text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.

name: Carrion Screecher
text: Flying
flavor: The banished have come home to roost.

name: Grasp of Darkness
text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I welcome the use of even the foulest magic if it will rid us of the monstrosities that plague our world."
—Munda, ambush leader

name: Kargan Dragonrider
text: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

name: Voldaren Duelist
text:
Haste
When Voldaren Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: "I have yet to find my equal."

name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
text: {4}{R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.

name: Crested Herdcaller
text:
Trample
When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
flavor:
"Our survival, like theirs, depends on our ability to work together."
—Huatli, to Tishana

name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample
flavor: The earth walks, strongest of all.

name: Grazing Whiptail
text: Reach
flavor: Often found browsing on the upper canopies of Ixalan's jungles, whiptails are known to absently bat away anything foolish enough to interrupt their meal.

name: Ranging Raptors
text: Enrage — Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: They cover their territory like a tide of teeth and claws.

name: Ripjaw Raptor
text: Enrage — Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.
flavor: Raptors are clever enough to tear away a hard metal shell to get at the tasty morsel inside.

name: Thunderherd Migration
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: The herds follow as new growth arises.

name: Thundering Spineback
text:
Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1.
{5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
flavor:
"It appears that nature has risen against us."
—Captain Brinely Rage

name: Zamriel, Seraph of Steel
text:
Flying
As long as it's your turn, equipped creatures you control have indestructible.
flavor: Armored in courage and armed with searing light, her legion stands unflinching against the forces of darkness.

name: Maeve, Insidious Singer
text: {2}{U}: Goad target creature. Whenever that creature attacks one of your opponents this turn, you draw a card. (A goaded creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able, until your next turn.)
flavor: Her haunting tune drowns out the percussion of snapping masts.

name: Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant
text:
Menace
Whenever another creature dies during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant.
When Vogar dies, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: A despot in life. A monster in death.

name: Nogi, Draco-Zealot
text:
Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever Nogi, Draco-Zealot attacks, if you control three or more Dragons, until end of turn, Nogi becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.
flavor: "Glory to the Burning Ones! May their mighty fangs devour all foes!"

name: Imaryll, Elfhame Elite
text:
Whenever Imaryll, Elfhame Elite attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of other Elves you control.
You may have Imaryll assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor: The elvish kingdoms of Llanowar are united in their distrust of outsiders.

name: Forbidding Spirit
text: When Forbidding Spirit enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.
flavor: "You will respect the dead."

name: Kitesail Apprentice
text: As long as Kitesail Apprentice is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor: Carving lines through the sky, kite sailors map trails for the pilgrims below to follow.

name: Kor Duelist
text: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

name: Kor Outfitter
text: When Kor Outfitter enters the battlefield, you may attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
flavor: "We take only what we need to survive. Believe me, you will need this."

name: Brineborn Cutthroat
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.
flavor: "I always attack from where their spyglasses can't see."

name: Precognitive Perception
text:
Draw three cards.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead scry 3, then draw three cards.
flavor: "To control the present we must master the future."

name: Talrand's Invocation
text: Create two 2/2 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.
flavor: After Talrand conquered the depths of Shandalar, his ambitions drove him skyward, joined by servants whose drive and curiosity equaled his own.

name: Bloodsoaked Altar
text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Discard a card, Sacrifice a creature: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: Blood seeps into the stone, and darkness emerges.

name: Bushmeat Poacher
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Draw a card.
flavor: "If you've never feasted on Zagoth terror-pig, I got the best price you'll find."

name: Demon of Loathing
text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Demon of Loathing deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: Hatred is a potent ally, but an insatiable master.

name: Gravewaker
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{5}{B}{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor: It glides on silent wings across the midnight sky, and a dread host rises to follow.

name: Vilis, Broker of Blood
text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 2 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever you lose life, draw that many cards. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor: "You can sign, or you can spend your life imagining what might have been yours."

name: Village Rites
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor: The Skelle raise scorn poles in conquered villages—cursed totems of wood and bone that sap survivors of physical strength and the will to fight back.

name: Ancient Hellkite
text:
Flying
{R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.
flavor: When a dragon attacks, there are no bystanders.

name: Goblin Motivator
text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor: Small words stoke large flames.

name: Knollspine Dragon
text:
Flying
When Knollspine Dragon enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.
flavor: It woke to find a vast world in need of a master.

name: Seize the Spoils
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "Grab what you want and burn the rest. Leave nothing behind."

name: Elven Ambush
text: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.
flavor:
"No elf can match a Tuskeri in combat. Why not charge?"
—Knorjolvin, Tuskeri raider

name: Joraga Visionary
text: When Joraga Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "If you only follow where the paths lead, you merely go where others have gone before you."

name: Llanowar Tribe
text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.
flavor: "Llanowar remembers the Ice Age, the Phyrexian Invasion, and the Rift Era. So long as we draw breath, we will ensure such disasters never threaten our world again."

name: Rabid Bite
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor: A healthy felidar is voracious yet regal. A rabid felidar is nothing more than appetite lashed to frothing jaws.

name: Ram Through
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
flavor:
"Need a medic! And some stonemasons!"
—Wyllon, Drannith merchant

name: Taunting Elf
text: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
flavor: The safety of the village depends on the beast thinking with its stomach.

name: Wirewood Pride
text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: "Though you may leave this haven we have found, may our strength never leave you."

name: Always Watching
text: Nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
flavor:
"We pray to Avacyn on high.
On snow-white wings fearless you fly.
Keep safe our souls. Keep safe our lives.
May angels watch us from the skies."
—Children's prayer

name: Bright Reprisal
text:
Destroy target attacking creature.
Draw a card.
flavor: Vampires know blood and the systems that carry it. And they know exactly where to strike to set it free.

name: Everdawn Champion
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Everdawn Champion.
flavor:
"Undefeated in battle, she is the shining future our empire deserves."
—Huatli

name: Inspiring Captain
text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Our enemies will soon discover that we are not as meek as they had believed."

name: Hydrolash
text:
Attacking creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"I don't need your mage-rings or your mana equations. I call, and the sea answers."
—Keyta, rebel hydromancer

name: Soulblade Djinn
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: He grants endless wishes, as long as you always wish for a blade.

name: Cruel Revival
text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: On Innistrad, Liliana embraced necromancy, honing her powers by practicing on scores of undead—and sometimes the living.

name: Gruesome Fate
text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor:
"You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?"
—Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock

name: Bombard
text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor:
"Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Seismic Elemental
text: When Seismic Elemental enters the battlefield, creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Trying to stop it would be foolish. If you feel it coming—run!"
—Sergeant Ryda

name: Jungle Delver
text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Delver.
flavor: "There is no power too great to be used in the defense of our ancestral lands."

name: Nissa's Revelation
text: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

name: Overcome
text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)
flavor:
"Forward! Until the horizon is ours!"
—Khemses, charioteer

name: Thrashing Brontodon
text: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.

name: Droning Bureaucrats
text: {X}, {T}: Each creature with mana value X can't attack or block this turn.
flavor: " . . . and you must also apply for an application license, file documents 136(iv) and 22-C and -D in triplicate, pay all requisite fees, request a . . ."

name: Ghostway
text: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor:
"I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl."
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

name: Guardian's Magemark
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.
flavor: The soldier moved with fluid poise, his awareness extending far beyond five senses.

name: Harrier Griffin
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, tap target creature.
flavor: Moon Market merchants sell a bottled scent to cutpurses and other criminals. Those doused in the liquid become "griffin bait."

name: Leyline of the Meek
text:
If Leyline of the Meek is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Creature tokens get +1/+1.
flavor: Where strength and humility converge.

name: Order of the Stars
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
As Order of the Stars enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Order of the Stars has protection from the chosen color.
flavor: As stoic as the marble halls, as unblinking as the stars upon their shields.

name: Sinstriker's Will
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature."
flavor: "Steel rusts. Arrows break. But righteousness is always strong, always sharp."

name: Skyrider Trainee
text: Skyrider Trainee has flying as long as it's enchanted.
flavor: "Of course I plan on going up. Kang here is the most trusted 'fin on the squad. Afraid? Me? No, I'm just . . . waiting for the right wind conditions."

name: To Arms!
text:
Untap all creatures you control.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"The call came, spell-borne through mortar and stone to the ear of every soldier. The call came, and the advantage was ours."
—Lodusz, captain of the watch

name: Withstand
text:
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Defense is as much a part of war as offense, the shield as important a tool as the sword."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Aetherplasm
text: Whenever Aetherplasm blocks a creature, you may return Aetherplasm to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield blocking that creature.
flavor: Its fickle form holds hints of a thousand former identities.

name: Crystal Seer
text:
When Crystal Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{4}{U}: Return Crystal Seer to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Surprise is a useless, untidy emotion—the plaything of goblins and fools."

name: Drowned Rusalka
text: {U}, Sacrifice a creature: Discard a card, then draw a card.
flavor: Lurking below the current, she thirsts until others come to drink.

name: Frazzle
text: Counter target nonblue spell.
flavor: The chant was interrupted, the components cooked, and Zok worried that it was his brain he smelled smoking.

name: Hatching Plans
text: When Hatching Plans is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw three cards.
flavor: So wondrous to behold, so delicate and finely crafted—and yet, such a pleasure to smash.

name: Infiltrator's Magemark
text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.
flavor:
"In secrecy is strength. None can oppose one who cannot be found."
—Szadek

name: Leyline of Singularity
text:
If Leyline of Singularity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
All nonland permanents are legendary.
flavor: Where renown and solitude converge.

name: Runeboggle
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Ever try to count hyperactive schoolchildren while someone shouts random numbers in your ear? It's like that."
—Geetra, frustrated mage

name: Sky Swallower
text:
Flying
When Sky Swallower enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of all other permanents you control.
flavor: Would you trade the world for such a pet?

name: Stratozeppelid
text:
Flying
Stratozeppelid can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: The "Days of Darkness" mark the stratozeppelids' annual migration, when for five days they blot out the sun and trumpet their passing.

name: Abyssal Nocturnus
text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Abyssal Nocturnus gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor:
"I fear to keep an open mind, for there are those who would use it as a door to my soul."
—Voka Schlak, Mauzam Asylum inmate, diary

name: Caustic Rain
text: Exile target land.
flavor:
"Looking out the great windows of Vitu-Ghazi at the foundry stacks belching their smoke to the sky, I wonder when the sky will take its vengeance."
—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

name: Cremate
text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor: Cremation of the dead is not a religious ritual in Ravnica. It's a business designed to keep the Golgari from growing in numbers.

name: Cryptwailing
text: {1}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor:
"Piece the tragic notes together and is it not a melody?"
—Teysa

name: Hissing Miasma
text: Whenever a creature attacks you, its controller loses 1 life.
flavor: All that remains when the fog finishes are neat piles of polished bones, like acid-etched glass. Orzhov servants collect them to make altar chimes.

name: Leyline of the Void
text:
If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
flavor: Where treachery and oblivion converge.

name: Poisonbelly Ogre
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller loses 1 life.
flavor: Some claim it's a failed Simic experiment, others say a Golgari creation. Both guilds deny all responsibility, while secretly studying its strange virulence.

name: Restless Bones
text:
{3}{B}, {T}: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Restless Bones.
flavor:
"We mourn our dead. We shroud our dead. We bury our dead. Too often, it seems, we must kill our dead again."
—Grazda, veteran armorer

name: Sanguine Praetor
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy each creature with the same mana value as the sacrificed creature.
flavor:
"Our fealty to guilds dooms us. The old gods shall resurface. Our skins will wave upon the guild-masts over emptied streets, and our bones will clatter in the wind."
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

name: Smogsteed Rider
text: Whenever Smogsteed Rider attacks, each other attacking creature gains fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor:
"An entire order of mages who draw their power from Ravnica's smog? Yet another indicator of our world's decay."
—Dravash, dowsing shaman

name: Bloodscale Prowler
text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: It tracks its victims by the scent of their breath, preferring to dine on those who recently ate well.

name: Fencer's Magemark
text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and have first strike.
flavor:
"The first blow is the most important. It often negates the need for a second."
—Agrus Kos

name: Leyline of Lightning
text:
If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Where storm and spellcraft converge.

name: Parallectric Feedback
text: Parallectric Feedback deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's mana value.
flavor: "You can't have so many people living so close together, all practicing so much magic, and not expect some feedback."

name: Crash Landing
text: Target creature with flying loses flying until end of turn. Crash Landing deals damage to that creature equal to the number of Forests you control.
flavor:
"The other guilds think they're untouchable. It's time we brought them back down to earth."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

name: Dryad Sophisticate
text: Nonbasic landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)
flavor: From Tin Street to the Outcast Mansions, she walks unbidden and unbound, her graceful silence never shaken by the riot of city life around her.

name: Earth Surge
text: Each land gets +2/+2 as long as it's a creature.
flavor:
"Some gardeners sing to plants. I tell them stories—stories of how they once ruled the world, of the mortals who destroyed their kind, and of revenge."
—Bougrat, druid of the Cult of Yore

name: Gatherer of Graces
text:
Gatherer of Graces gets +1/+1 for each Aura attached to it.
Sacrifice an Aura: Regenerate Gatherer of Graces.
flavor: "Garb is for common folk. I prefer to wear insight and zeal, ambition and flame."

name: Gristleback
text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Sacrifice Gristleback: You gain life equal to Gristleback's power.
flavor: Loyal in battle, hearty in stew.

name: Leyline of Lifeforce
text:
If Leyline of Lifeforce is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Creature spells can't be countered.
flavor: Where sovereignty and flesh converge.

name: Predatory Focus
text: You may have creatures you control assign their combat damage this turn as though they weren't blocked.
flavor: Instinct blood-tinted his world until he could see only one thing clearly: his prey.

name: Primeval Light
text: Destroy all enchantments target player controls.
flavor:
"Look to the old tomes, those bound in hides and written in yarberry ink. They hold the spells that can free us of the clutter of modern magecraft."
—Dravash, dowsing shaman

name: Silhana Ledgewalker
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Silhana Ledgewalker can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor: Street folk call them "spire mice," but behind the mockery is an unspoken envy of the ledgewalkers' skill at avoiding harm.

name: Silhana Starfletcher
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
As Silhana Starfletcher enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: In light he finds both gift and weapon.

name: Starved Rusalka
text: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.
flavor:
"No more wretched fate is there than to waste away. If you are slain, your ghost may at least avenge itself upon your killer. But what release is there for one slain by Time?"
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

name: Blade Instructor
text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

name: Candlelight Vigil
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has vigilance.
flavor: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the Conclave can.

name: Collar the Culprit
text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor:
"Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Crush Contraband
text:
Choose one or both —
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target enchantment.
flavor: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

name: Dawn of Hope
text:
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
—Emmara

name: Demotion
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.

name: Flight of Equenauts
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
flavor: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."

name: Gird for Battle
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
flavor:
"You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."
—Aurelia

name: Haazda Marshal
text: Whenever Haazda Marshal and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.

name: Healer's Hawk
text: Flying, lifelink
flavor: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

name: Hunted Witness
text: When Hunted Witness dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

name: Inspiring Unicorn
text: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

name: Intrusive Packbeast
text:
Vigilance
When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.
flavor: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

name: Ledev Guardian
text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
flavor: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

name: Luminous Bonds
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor:
"Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate."
—*Azorius Arrester Procedure*, Appendix B

name: Parhelion Patrol
text:
Flying, vigilance
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

name: Roc Charger
text:
Flying
Whenever Roc Charger attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

name: Skyline Scout
text: Whenever Skyline Scout attacks, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, 'You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

name: Sunhome Stalwart
text:
First strike
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

name: Sworn Companions
text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor:
"The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."
—Karlov of the Ghost Council

name: Take Heart
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.
flavor: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

name: Tenth District Guard
text: When Tenth District Guard enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

name: Citywatch Sphinx
text:
Flying
When Citywatch Sphinx dies, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.

name: Dimir Informant
text: When Dimir Informant enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

name: Drowned Secrets
text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target player mills two cards.
flavor: Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns and waterways, then terrors and nightmares.

name: Enhanced Surveillance
text:
You may look at an additional two cards each time you surveil.
Exile Enhanced Surveillance: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
flavor:
"Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone."
—Lazav

name: Guild Summit
text:
When Guild Summit enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped Gates you control. Draw a card for each Gate tapped this way.
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.

name: Leapfrog
text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

name: Muse Drake
text:
Flying
When Muse Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.

name: Nightveil Sprite
text:
Flying
Whenever Nightveil Sprite attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in."
—Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

name: Omnispell Adept
text: {2}{U}, {T}: You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

name: Passwall Adept
text: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

name: Quasiduplicate
text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor: "My greatest creation—me!"

name: Radical Idea
text:
Draw a card.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

name: Selective Snare
text: Return X target creatures of the creature type of your choice to their owner's hand.
flavor:
"How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications."
—Nefara, Dimir agent

name: Sinister Sabotage
text:
Counter target spell.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."
—Lazav

name: Unexplained Disappearance
text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

name: Vedalken Mesmerist
text: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

name: Wall of Mist
text: Defender
flavor: Fog haunts the streets, rendering the familiar as otherworldly, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

name: Wishcoin Crab
flavor:
"What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."
—Omik, superintendent of waterworks

name: Barrier of Bones
text:
Defender
When Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.

name: Bartizan Bats
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor:
"Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."
—Izoni

name: Burglar Rat
text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

name: Dead Weight
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.

name: Doom Whisperer
text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

name: Douser of Lights
flavor: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out—and the screaming began.

name: Gruesome Menagerie
text: Choose a creature card with mana value 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with mana value 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.
flavor:
"Variety is also the spice of death."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Hired Poisoner
text: Deathtouch
flavor: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

name: Kraul Swarm
text:
Flying
{2}{B}, Discard a creature card: Return Kraul Swarm from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member ever died, and to whom it owes the grudge.

name: Lotleth Giant
text: Undergrowth — When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor:
"I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Mephitic Vapors
text:
All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

name: Midnight Reaper
text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
flavor: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

name: Necrotic Wound
text: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: The assassins of the Ochran distill toxins from the remains of their previous victims.

name: Never Happened
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it.
flavor: Dimir assassins have the precision to slay a single memory.

name: Ritual of Soot
text: Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
flavor: Only the patrol's armor was found, so tainted with the acrid smell of sudden death that it could never be worn again.

name: Spinal Centipede
text: When Spinal Centipede dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: The Golgari adorn themselves with the exoskeletons of iridescent insects. It's only fair the insects do likewise.

name: Undercity Necrolisk
text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: In its territory, living is an affront.

name: Veiled Shade
text: {1}{B}: Veiled Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I sang songs of sorrow for my lost love. Imagine my horror when, one night, they were answered."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Vicious Rumors
text: Vicious Rumors deals 1 damage to each opponent. Each opponent discards a card, then mills a card. You gain 1 life.
flavor:
"The alliances were already frayed. All we do is find the loose threads and pluck."
—Lazav

name: Whispering Snitch
text: Whenever you surveil for the first time each turn, Whispering Snitch deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Sure, I hear things. I hear plenty. But how am I to talk with this parched throat?"

name: Arclight Phoenix
text:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Some storms never blow over.

name: Barging Sergeant
text:
Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

name: Book Devourer
text:
Trample
Whenever Book Devourer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
flavor: "Not my first edition of *The Advokist and the Urchin*!"

name: Command the Storm
text: Command the Storm deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor: In the wake of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral found himself leading the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but couldn't help feeling like a pawn in someone else's game.

name: Cosmotronic Wave
text: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.
flavor: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

name: Electrostatic Field
text:
Defender
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Electrostatic Field deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor:
"It's both an ingress-denial mechanism and an attractive hallway light!"
—Daxiver, Izzet electromancer

name: Experimental Frenzy
text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.
You can't play lands or cast spells from your hand.
{3}{R}: Destroy Experimental Frenzy.
flavor: Turns out coffee is the weird aunt of invention.

name: Fearless Halberdier
flavor: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."

name: Fire Urchin
text:
Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

name: Goblin Locksmith
text: Whenever Goblin Locksmith attacks, creatures with defender can't block this turn.
flavor:
"He's got more finesse than most goblins. He smashes windows with his fist rather than his forehead."
—Arrester Polgar

name: Hellkite Whelp
text:
Flying
Whenever Hellkite Whelp attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.
flavor:
"They play by spitting fire at each other. Don't be offended if one gives you a love-scorch."
—Esfir, Rakdos dragon wrangler

name: Inescapable Blaze
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Inescapable Blaze deals 6 damage to any target.
flavor:
"The Izzet are blamed for every little disaster, which is unfair because we only cause most of them."
—Mizzix of the Izmagnus

name: Ornery Goblin
text: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."

name: Rubblebelt Boar
text: When Rubblebelt Boar enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Some Gruul druids believe that boars are spawn of the great Ilharg, the mighty Raze-Boar who will one day rise and level the city.

name: Smelt-Ward Minotaur
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Don't arrest him—enlist him!"
—Commander Yaszen

name: Street Riot
text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.
flavor:
"They said obey and you'll be happy. They said you'll be safe. But we're not safe. We're not happy. And we will not obey."
—Domri Rade

name: Torch Courier
text:
Haste
Sacrifice Torch Courier: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "Light a torch and deliver this letter" were his instructions, which he unfortunately reversed.

name: Wojek Bodyguard
text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.
flavor: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."

name: Affectionate Indrik
text: When Affectionate Indrik enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.

name: Bounty of Might
text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I am the very soul of battle, but even I would never advise open war with the Conclave."
—Aurelia

name: Circuitous Route
text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor:
"The shortest path between two points is not always the safest."
—Tamina, district guide

name: Devkarin Dissident
text: {4}{G}: Devkarin Dissident gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "This is Mileva, in the Tenth. We've got an elf in the plaza with a chip on her shoulder. Actually, it's more of a morningstar."

name: District Guide
text: When District Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "The route is direct but challenging. Incidentally, how are you with heights?"

name: Generous Stray
text: When Generous Stray enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Cats place their gifts with care, so that a bare foot will step on them in the middle of the night.

name: Golgari Raiders
text:
Haste
Undergrowth — Golgari Raiders enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor: What the Golgari can't claim through patient undercity expansion, they seize in brazen topside sorties.

name: Grappling Sundew
text:
Defender, reach
{4}{G}: Grappling Sundew gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.)
flavor: Some rooftop gardens attract bees; others capture dragons.

name: Hitchclaw Recluse
text: Reach
flavor: Nearly invisible strands of web reach far beyond its lair to alert it of the approach of prey.

name: Ironshell Beetle
text: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor:
"Please don't feed the beetles."
—Promenade warning sign

name: Kraul Foragers
text: Undergrowth — When Kraul Foragers enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor:
Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever.
—Kraul saying

name: Pack's Favor
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: Selesnya grows its ranks in more ways than one.

name: Portcullis Vine
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Draw a card.
flavor: Nature's way of saying "take the long way home."

name: Siege Wurm
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample
flavor: Suddenly, all the haggling didn't seem so important.

name: Urban Utopia
text:
Enchant land
When Urban Utopia enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor: Ravnica's diversity produces blossoms of opinion in a rich soil of perspectives.

name: Vivid Revival
text: Return up to three target multicolored cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Vivid Revival.
flavor: Golgari crops bloom in strange soils, touched only by long-traveled light.

name: Wary Okapi
text: Vigilance
flavor:
"Be like the grazers of the Saruli. Keep your herd close, and stay alert for encroaching danger."
—Lalia, Selesnya dryad

name: Wild Ceratok
flavor: Once part of a wealthy merchant's private zoo, the herd roams feral throughout the Tenth, where it will remain until the guilds can agree to relocate, cull, or befriend it.

name: Precision Bolt
text: Precision Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Ral had wielded lightning all his life but had never harnessed the power of an entire guild.

name: Kraul Raider
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: The kraul once skulked in the outskirts of Golgari society, but with Vraska's rise, they became valued forces of the Swarm.

name: Colorful Feiyi Sparrow
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: These nimble sparrows, not often seen, delight in tricking the pangolins that wander the forest.

name: Purple-Crystal Crab
text: When Purple-Crystal Crab dies, draw a card.
flavor: A precious shell without, a delicious taste within.

name: Vivid Flying Fish
text: Vivid Flying Fish has flying as long as it's attacking. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: The rainbow seen above the Great Lake of Cloud Dream just after the rain is nothing but the vivid-colored flying fishes' ritual dance.

name: Welkin Tern
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: It stops flying only as its life comes to an end.

name: Heavenly Qilin
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Heavenly Qilin attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: It strides through the universe as though stepping on the stars, crossing freely between the celestial and earthly worlds.

name: Armored Whirl Turtle
flavor: Not all enormous beasts are quick to anger.

name: Nine-Tail White Fox
text: Whenever Nine-Tail White Fox deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: It has waited a millennium just for you, and for a millennium will it watch over your descendants.

name: Earth-Origin Yak
text: When Earth-Origin Yak enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Deep in the Northern Mountains, the yaks linger silently, channeling the powers of the earth.

name: Moon-Eating Dog
text: As long as you control a Yanling planeswalker, Moon-Eating Dog has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: The most nimble of creatures, it chases the most sacred luminence.

name: Stormcloud Spirit
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: The spirits of all the rivers and oceans came together as an unstoppable force, unleashing their fury as lightning and thunder.

name: Ancestor Dragon
text:
Flying
Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
flavor: It is said that Yinglong gave birth to the qilin and the phoenix, and after them, all of the hairy and winged beings in the world. Thus it is known as the Ancestor Dragon.

name: Cloak of Mists
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
flavor: Mystery lies beneath the haunting mists. Never stay where obscurity deepens.

name: Qilin's Blessing
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Interesting . . . This mortal being seems to have been blessed with Qilin's essence."
—Mu Yanling's journal

name: Drown in Shapelessness
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "From the swallows, I learned how to ride the winds to anywhere, and from my tears, I mastered how to harness the water."

name: Dragon's Presence
text: Dragon's Presence deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor:
"The Ancestor Dragon appeared atop the clouds, amid shattering mountains and sundering earth."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Leopard-Spotted Jiao
flavor: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.

name: Feiyi Snake
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Two bodies, twice the malice.

name: Sacred White Deer
text: {3}{G}, {T}: You gain 4 life. Activate only if you control a Yanggu planeswalker.
flavor: The pale deer are believed to have lived a thousand years, the pure white five hundred more. Those who seek them would gladly wander the wilds forever for the merest glimpse of these sacred beings.

name: Reckless Pangolin
text: Whenever Reckless Pangolin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"A pangolin's power grows with its speed. Strike when you have the chance!"
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Ferocious Zheng
flavor: Known for their glowing horn and stone-rattling roar, zheng are the fiercest predators in the forest. Few survived before Jiang Yanggu came.

name: Fire-Omen Crane
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Fire-Omen Crane attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: If you can see it clearly, you're already on fire.

name: Screeching Phoenix
text:
Flying
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Its wings are a heavenly inferno that sets the world ablaze.

name: Earthshaking Si
text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor:
"For reasons unknown to me, herds in the Arrow Bamboo Forest have become more and more agitated."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Hardened-Scale Armor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor: A pangolin's scales are resistant to all sorts of damage and weaponry. Desire for them threatens to drive the pangolin to extinction.

name: Breath of Fire
text: Breath of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor: Fire leads to more fire.

name: Aggressive Instinct
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor:
"Mowu was wary that day, as though he sensed the danger ahead."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Confidence from Strength
text: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor:
"Prepare for battle!"
—Jiang Yanggu

name: Journey for the Elixir
text: Search your library and graveyard for a basic land card and a card named Jiang Yanggu, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "As my hands touched it, I realized that I had not found it—it had been leading me here."

name: Cleansing Screech
text: Cleansing Screech deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.

name: Aerial Maneuver
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"When you put all of yourself into an attack, without fear or hesitation, in that instant you may attain greatness."
—Predak, Gateless freemage

name: Angelic Edict
text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

name: Angelic Skirmisher
text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, choose first strike, vigilance, or lifelink. Creatures you control gain that ability until end of turn.
flavor: "A keen mind wields an army as a deft hand wields a sword."

name: Assault Griffin
text: Flying
flavor:
"The Simic offer a prize to any biomancer who can breed a krasis to match a griffin in the air. It's never been claimed."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Basilica Guards
text:
Defender
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor: "None may pass . . . for free."

name: Debtor's Pulpit
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Tap target creature."
flavor:
"You may not be able to pay. But you can still kneel."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Guildscorn Ward
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.
flavor:
"The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall."
—Ninth District graffiti

name: Hold the Gates
text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 for each Gate you control and have vigilance.
flavor: "We grew up on these streets. We know them better than any Boros grunt from Zelzo."

name: Holy Mantle
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from creatures.
flavor:
"The guilds promise to provide safety. I prefer to make my own."
—Briska, Ninth District freemage

name: Knight of Obligation
text:
Vigilance
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor: He can calculate interest to six decimal places even in the midst of a deadly duel.

name: Knight Watch
text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
flavor:
"We lost respect after the battle for Barbu Rooftop. Send the troops to mingle respectfully with the citizens."
—Commander Yaszen of Boros

name: Murder Investigation
text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.
flavor: "Every death has a web of consequences. Our job is to find the spider."

name: Nav Squad Commandos
text: Battalion — Whenever Nav Squad Commandos and at least two other creatures attack, Nav Squad Commandos gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor: Funded by the Azorius to keep current maps of the undercity, the Boros nav squads survey even the most unsavory areas.

name: Righteous Charge
text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "In the name of peace, moderation, and decency—wipe them all out!"

name: Shielded Passage
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor: Izzet delved into the depths of Ravnica's past, and Selesnya followed without fear.

name: Smite
text: Destroy target blocked creature.
flavor:
"Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!"
—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

name: Syndic of Tithes
text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor:
"Entrance is free. Donations are required."
—Notice outside Vizkopa Bank

name: Zarichi Tiger
text: {1}{W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
flavor:
"The taming and consecration of these creatures is evidence of our faith."
—Resimir, Zarichi Temple priest

name: Enter the Infinite
text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.
flavor:
"Don't just have an idea—have all of them."
—Niv-Mizzet

name: Gridlock
text: Tap X target nonland permanents.
flavor:
"One tiny peg pulled from a single wagon wheel, and an entire district grinds to a halt."
—Lazav

name: Incursion Specialist
text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Incursion Specialist gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "Work for the Dimir again? That depends. Tell me more about this maze."

name: Keymaster Rogue
text:
Keymaster Rogue can't be blocked.
When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: "This one opens the grate outside Zelzo Base. This one is for Ismeri Library. This one is for an invisible door . . . No, I've said too much."

name: Metropolis Sprite
text:
Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

name: Mindeye Drake
text:
Flying
When Mindeye Drake dies, target player mills five cards.
flavor: They can map both the cityscape and the minds of its architects.

name: Realmwright
text:
As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.
flavor: There is not a single inch of Ravnica that hasn't been altered at one point or another to fit someone's whims.

name: Sage's Row Denizen
text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
flavor: "I offer you wisdom untainted by false loyalty, learning free of any guild's agenda."

name: Sapphire Drake
text:
Flying
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
flavor: Sapphire drakes can communicate over great distances, their calls resonating in the gems fixed in their skulls.

name: Scatter Arc
text:
Counter target noncreature spell.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Should your chosen emissary be able to fluctuate triharmonic pentodes, however unlikely, I shall shunt excess negavolt radicals."

name: Skygames
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery."
flavor: Both Boros and Azorius scout the games in hopes of recruiting the finest athletes.

name: Spell Rupture
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor:
"Like water, mana will drain from an inferior vessel."
—Jalan Tosk, Simic forcemage

name: Way of the Thief
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature can't be blocked as long as you control a Gate.
flavor: A true shortcut isn't a way other people don't know; it's a way other people can't go.

name: Basilica Screecher
text:
Flying
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

name: Contaminated Ground
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
flavor:
"No one cares about pollution until they can see it."
—Gurras, Golgari rot farmer

name: Corpse Blockade
text:
Defender
Sacrifice another creature: Corpse Blockade gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor: There are laws against it, but the dead have no one to complain to and the living are too frightened to investigate.

name: Death's Approach
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.
flavor:
"It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?"
—Strava, Dimir mage

name: Devour Flesh
text: Target player sacrifices a creature, then gains life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor: His twisted mind concluded that if he was what he ate, and he wanted to stay human, . . .

name: Dying Wish
text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.
flavor: "I wish I could rewrite my every deed and kill you with my first breath instead of my last."

name: Gateway Shade
text:
{B}: Gateway Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Tap an untapped Gate you control: Gateway Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Tireless and merciless, shades are harnessed as spies by the Dimir.

name: Gutter Skulk
flavor: Upon finding his warehouse infested, Gaven didn't know whether to get an exterminator or an exorcist.

name: Illness in the Ranks
text: Creature tokens get -1/-1.
flavor:
"Selesnya denied us tribute. Let's show them the error of their ways."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Killing Glare
text: Destroy target creature with power X or less.
flavor: A casual glance into a dark corner may be your last.

name: Smog Elemental
text:
Flying
Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-1.
flavor:
"The skies used to be my refuge, a place of peace away from the chaos below. Now, with every flight, death seems to follow me like a shadow."
—Writings of Cica, Skyjek scout

name: Syndicate Enforcer
text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor: Even the darkest corners of Ravnica still lie in the shadow of the Church.

name: Thrull Parasite
text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
{T}, Pay 2 life: Remove a counter from target nonland permanent.
flavor: The hunger of a vampire and the subtlety of a tax collector.

name: Undercity Informer
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.
flavor: "Scandal and slander are never welcome news. That's why I'm never the messenger."

name: Cinder Elemental
text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: It deals X damage to any target.
flavor:
"The old gods awoke and sent fingers of fire to see what was left of the old ways under the endless city."
—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

name: Crackling Perimeter
text: Tap an untapped Gate you control: Crackling Perimeter deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: As the path he sought came into focus, Niv-Mizzet took steps to prevent others from approaching it.

name: Firefist Striker
text: Battalion — Whenever Firefist Striker and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: The flaming fist of Boros holds the promise of both protection and destruction in its grasp.

name: Furious Resistance
text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"At least the Gateless rebels have ideals. Rakdos just mocks, defiles, and kills all we hold dear."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Homing Lightning
text: Homing Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.
flavor:
"I see countless worlds. What makes them think I can't find them in just one?"
—Ral Zarek

name: Madcap Skills
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.
flavor: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

name: Mark for Death
text: Target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn if able. Untap that creature. Other creatures that player controls can't block this turn.
flavor: Everyone roots for the little guy, but nobody bets on him.

name: Massive Raid
text: Massive Raid deals damage to any target equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor:
"The Boros lack vision. Give them a convenient scapegoat and they'll be blind to the true threats."
—Lazav

name: Mugging
text: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
flavor: Scream: muffled. Pockets: emptied. Neck function: never the same again.

name: Scorchwalker
text: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{R}, Discard Scorchwalker: Target attacking creature gets +5/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Borborygmos's elemental launched an assault, but the Izzet wards held and experiments continue."
—Skyknight report on the Rubblebelt

name: Skullcrack
text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: The lawmage's argument was clever and well reasoned, but Blunk's response proved irrefutable.

name: Structural Collapse
text: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: The Gruul holiday of Rauck-Chauv always ends the same way.

name: Tin Street Market
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."
flavor:
"Sometimes I stroll along Tin Street and watch citizens busy with their daily lives. It reminds me why I do my job."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Viashino Shanktail
text:
First strike
Bloodrush — {2}{R}, Discard Viashino Shanktail: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: The Slizt Clan's battle cry is an impressive display of fury, defiance, and spit.

name: Warmind Infantry
text: Battalion — Whenever Warmind Infantry and at least two other creatures attack, Warmind Infantry gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Before Aurelia denounced Niv-Mizzet, the two guilds had collaborated on the Warmind Initiative in pursuit of the ultimate soldier.

name: Wrecking Ogre
text:
Double strike
Bloodrush — {3}{R}{R}, Discard Wrecking Ogre: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor: If no opponent can be found, ogres of the Bolrac Clan will often pick fights with buildings.

name: Adaptive Snapjaw
text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor:
"Eh, needs more toad."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

name: Alpha Authority
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has hexproof and can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: Even the bitterest enemies of the Burning-Tree Clan respect the strength of Borborygmos's rule.

name: Burst of Strength
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.
flavor:
"Our fight is not about territory or revenge. It is about freedom, plain and simple."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

name: Forced Adaptation
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor:
"We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

name: Greenside Watcher
text: {T}: Untap target Gate.
flavor: "The Izzet may incite war, but my duty is here. I will not abandon the wild."

name: Hindervines
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.
flavor:
"Woodlands and laws. Both grow faster than the Azorius's ability to manage them."
—Suniel the Woodwise

name: Predator's Rapport
text: Choose target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's power plus its toughness.
flavor:
"Other guilds say the Gruul are savages, no better than the beasts we live with. I say we've found friends who won't stab us in the back."
—Domri Rade

name: Rust Scarab
text: Whenever Rust Scarab becomes blocked, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls.
flavor:
"Behold nature's answer to the problem of society."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Scab-Clan Charger
text: Bloodrush — {1}{G}, Discard Scab-Clan Charger: Target attacking creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
flavor: "The only roads I wish to see are those beaten flat by wild hooves."

name: Serene Remembrance
text: Shuffle Serene Remembrance and up to three target cards from a single graveyard into their owners' libraries.
flavor: While Lazav schemed and Niv-Mizzet researched, Trostani sought the future in the whispers of the past.

name: Skarrg Goliath
text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Slaughterhorn
text: Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

name: Spire Tracer
text: Spire Tracer can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
flavor: Cartographers on Ravnica chart not just the horizontal, but also the vertical.

name: Tower Defense
text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.
flavor:
"The drakes are practice. We may one day need to bring down a sky swallower, or maybe even Rakdos himself."
—Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter

name: Wildwood Rebirth
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: In Ravnica, there are maladies far more difficult to treat than death.

name: Winged Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have flying.
flavor:
"Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Clot Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Heart Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have haste.
flavor: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.

name: Gemhide Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor:
"The land is weary. Even Skyshroud is depleted. We must find another source of mana—one that is growing despite our withering world."
—Freyalise

name: Quick Sliver
text:
Flash
Any player may cast Sliver spells as though they had flash.
flavor: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

name: Armor Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."
flavor:
Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other."
Mirri: "After they've done trying to kill us, all right?"

name: Spectral Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor:
"Sure, I've seen agents of the Cabal here and there. Well, not here, and certainly not in any of the sliver labs. Oh dear, I've said too much."
—Apprentice researcher

name: Barbed Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the *Weatherlight*.

name: Fungus Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it." (It must survive the damage to get the counter.)
flavor:
"When a sliver of this breed enters the hive, the others claw each other in frenzied fits, thereby ensuring their rapid growth."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Brood Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.
flavor: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.

name: Might Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +2/+2.
flavor:
"The colossal thing rumbled over the ridge, tree husks crumbling before it. The ones we were already fighting howled as it came, their muscles suddenly surging, and we knew it was time to flee."
—Llanach, Skyshroud ranger

name: Fury Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have double strike.
flavor:
"A rift opened, and our arrows were abruptly stilled. To move was to push the world. But the sliver's claw still twitched, red wounds appeared in Thed's chest, and ribbons of blood hung in the air."
—Adom Capashen, Benalish hero

name: Distant Melody
text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Aphetto Dredging
text: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Phage became both executioner and savior, helping others to the same rebirth she had found.

name: Giver of Runes
text: {T}: Another target creature you control gains protection from colorless or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: She provides marks of protection to those she chooses as family.

name: King of the Pride
text: Other Cats you control get +2/+1.
flavor:
"Glorious, to walk again across the savannah with my beloved."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Faerie Seer
text:
Flying
When Faerie Seer enters the battlefield, scry 2.
flavor: "The patterns of crossing ripples reveal the future to those who know how to read them."

name: Plague Engineer
text:
Deathtouch
As Plague Engineer enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type your opponents control get -1/-1.
flavor:
"The lasting effects are invariably fatal."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Undead Augur
text: Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor:
"To see past the veil of death, cross it."
—*The Red Book of Mezdrithalik*

name: Magmatic Sinkhole
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Magmatic Sinkhole deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: Opening like the maw of a hellion, the earth swallowed the traveler whole.

name: Shenanigans
text:
Destroy target artifact.
Dredge 1 (If you would draw a card, you may mill a card instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)
flavor: Pricey baubles are no match for cheap tricks.

name: Ayula, Queen Among Bears
text:
Whenever another Bear enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target Bear.
• Target Bear you control fights target creature you don't control.
flavor: Born from the oldest red cedar, nursed on the sap of the tallest spruce, coronated under the mightiest pine.

name: Force of Vigor
text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments.
flavor: The vines overgrew the construct, snapping gears and soaking up aether.

name: Weather the Storm
text:
You gain 3 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
flavor: "Quell your ego and anywhere can be as calm as a hurricane's eye."

name: Hall of Heliod's Generosity
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{W}, {T}: Put target enchantment card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: The stronghold of Theros's light.

name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
