text: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.
flavor: Hidetsugu never relinquished a grudge. He let it burn within him, gathering ever greater intensity until the final moment of vengeance.

name: Waste Not
text:
Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Whenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B}.
Whenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.
flavor: Designed by the Magic community

name: Vault Skirge
text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.

name: Voracious Greatshark
text:
Flash
When Voracious Greatshark enters the battlefield, counter target artifact or creature spell.
flavor: There is no boat big enough.

name: Fruitcake Elemental
text:
Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible.
At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you.
{3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.
flavor: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.

name: Gifts Given
text: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles their library.
flavor: "Thanks! You shouldn't have."

name: Evil Presents
text: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.
flavor: 'Tis better to give than to receive.

name: Season's Beatings
text: Family gathering — Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.
flavor: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.

name: Snow Mercy
text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it.
{T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.
flavor: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.

name: Goblin Sleigh Ride
text: Target creature you control climbs into Goblin Sleigh Ride. You slide them on their merry way. If the creature stayed on, it deals damage equal to its toughness to each other creature touched during the slide.
flavor: "What fun it is to ride and sing a slaying song tonight!"

name: Thopter Pie Network
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're eating, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Use food to represent the token.
Whenever a creature token you control dies, if it's represented by food, eat it.
flavor: They all thought her dream was just pie in the sky.

name: Some Disassembly Required
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Distribute the sacrificed creature's keyword abilities among any number of other target creatures until end of turn. If it's December, you gain 1 life for each of those keywords.
flavor: Now all they needed was a jolly, happy soul.

name: Abbey Matron
text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Matrons are kindly souls, but don't ask one for an ale."
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

name: Aysen Crusader
text: Aysen Crusader's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Soldiers and Warriors you control.
flavor:
"A renegade rallying the rabble does not a true Crusader make."
—Irini Sengir

name: Aysen Highway
text: White creatures have plainswalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
flavor:
"Tread the roads of righteousness, Murat, lest you lose your way and be consumed."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

name: Hazduhr the Abbot
text: {X}, {T}: The next X damage that would be dealt this turn to target white creature you control is dealt to Hazduhr the Abbot instead.
flavor:
"Soon, Serra will return and choose the Abbot's successor, else we are lost."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Leeches
text: Target player loses all poison counters. Leeches deals that much damage to that player.
flavor:
"Where our potions and powders fail, perhaps nature will succeed."
—Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Rashka the Slayer
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Rashka the Slayer blocks one or more black creatures, Rashka gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Rarely be the prey so haughty as to hunt the hunter."
—Baron Sengir

name: Samite Alchemist
text: {W}{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control. Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
flavor:
"Powders and potions are nothing compared to faith."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

name: Serra Aviary
text: Creatures with flying get +1/+1.
flavor:
"Serra, like Feroz, is long since dead. But remember, Daria: her spirit shall survive so long as the Homelands do."
—Taysir

name: Soraya the Falconer
text:
Bird creatures get +1/+1.
{1}{W}: Target Bird creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"Soraya speaks with the hunters of the air, as do all of her family line."
—Autumn Willow

name: Baki's Curse
text: Baki's Curse deals 2 damage to each creature for each Aura attached to that creature.
flavor:
"Those who fling spells too quickly should have reason to regret it."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Chain Stasis
text: You may tap or untap target creature. Then that creature's controller may pay {2}{U}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.
flavor:
"Here we go again."
—Kakra, Sea Troll

name: Jinx
text:
Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"What wizards upset, the land soon rights."
—Gemma, Willow Priestess

name: Mystic Decree
text: All creatures lose flying and islandwalk.
flavor:
"Curse Reveka, and curse her coddled conjurers. Their sorcerers' school shall yet be ours."
—Irini Sengir

name: Narwhal
text: First strike, protection from red
flavor:
"Who needs a spear? Ya break off the horn, and ya stab the fish with it. Easy!"
—Kakra, Sea Troll

name: Reveka, Wizard Savant
text: {T}: Reveka, Wizard Savant deals 2 damage to any target and doesn't untap during your next untap step.
flavor:
"It's nice to see a sister Dwarf in a position of such power, but why'd it have to be one of those seafaring muleheads?"
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

name: Sea Troll
text: {U}: Regenerate Sea Troll. Activate only if Sea Troll blocked or was blocked by a blue creature this turn.
flavor:
"I've seen those Trolls devour a drowning sailor faster than his lungs could fill with water."
—Zeki, Reef Pirate

name: Wall of Kelp
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}{U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Plant Wall creature token with defender named Kelp.
flavor:
"Ya can eat it or ya can weave it, but ya can't fight in it."
—Zeki, Reef Pirate

name: Baron Sengir
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Baron Sengir this turn dies, put a +2/+2 counter on Baron Sengir.
{T}: Regenerate another target Vampire.
flavor:
"Beast. Defiler. The source of all my pain."
—Ihsan's Shade

name: Black Carriage
text:
Trample
Black Carriage doesn't untap during your untap step.
Sacrifice a creature: Untap Black Carriage. Activate only during your upkeep.
flavor:
"The Baron's drivers are also driven."
—Chandler

name: Cemetery Gate
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from black
flavor:
"It keeps some out, yes. It also keeps others in!"
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Grandmother Sengir
text: {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Rarely have power and madness been so delightfully wed as they have in our dear Grandmother."
—Baron Sengir

name: Headstone
text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"Your headstone is the last page in the book of your life."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Irini Sengir
text: Green enchantment spells and white enchantment spells cost {2} more to cast.
flavor:
"That cruel being brings shame to all her fellow Dwarves and misery to all the land. She is Sengir's daughter in spirit if not in blood."
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Sengir Bats
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Bats this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Bats.
flavor:
"They are the eyes of the Baron, and they know your fears."
—Ihsan's Shade

name: Veldrane of Sengir
text: {1}{B}{B}: Veldrane of Sengir gets -3/-0 and gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor:
"Poor, foolish Veldrane. He goes wherever the Baron wills him. One day, he'll go to die."
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

name: Aliban's Tower
text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain."
—Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Ambush
text: Blocking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"Don't these goons have anything better to do?"
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: An-Zerrin Ruins
text:
As An-Zerrin Ruins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor:
"The An-Zerrins have served me well, ever since I first killed them."
—Baron Sengir

name: Anaba Ancestor
text: {T}: Another target Minotaur creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt."
—Taysir

name: Anaba Spirit Crafter
text: Minotaur creatures get +1/+0.
flavor:
"The Spirit Crafters sing of all our people. They sing of those lost, of those found, and of those who are yet to be."
—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

name: Chandler
text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact creature.
flavor:
"Never brag about the latest wonder you've created, students. Chandler might be listening."
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Dwarven Pony
text: {1}{R}, {T}: Target Dwarf creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor:
"I hear Halina's got a pony that can count to six—and likes to eat meat."
—Chandler

name: Dwarven Sea Clan
text: {T}: Choose target attacking or blocking creature whose controller controls an Island. Dwarven Sea Clan deals 2 damage to that creature at end of combat. Activate only before the end of combat step.
flavor:
"No dwarf alive can best one of my crew dead."
—Zeki, Reef Pirate

name: Dwarven Trader
flavor:
"Their definition of 'fair profit' is certainly novel."
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Eron the Relentless
text:
Haste
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.
flavor:
"Eron would be much less of a hassle if only he were mortal."
—Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Evaporate
text: Evaporate deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature.
flavor:
"The body is a temple with a foundation of sand."
—Autumn Willow

name: Joven
text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
flavor:
"Joven, you're almost as good a thief as I. But Eron hates you even more."
—Chandler

name: An-Havva Inn
text: You gain X plus 1 life, where X is the number of green creatures on the battlefield.
flavor:
"The Inn was ever a steady source of good cheer and kindness. Greatly do I miss it, now that I am gone."
—Ihsan's Shade

name: Autumn Willow
text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{G}: Until end of turn, Autumn Willow can be the target of spells and abilities controlled by target player as though it didn't have shroud.
flavor:
"We must shake her limbs and rattle her brains."
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Faerie Noble
text:
Flying
Other Faerie creatures you control get +0/+1.
{T}: Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Faeries talk all in riddles and tricky bits, 'cept the Nobles. Now, *there's* some straight talkers."
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Folk of An-Havva
text: Whenever Folk of An-Havva blocks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"This town's only for good folk. The rest can go to the city."
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Leaping Lizard
text: {1}{G}: Leaping Lizard gets -0/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"I never question the Autumn Willow about her motives, not even when she turns people into Lizards. It's her way."
—Devin, Faerie Noble

name: Root Spider
text: Whenever Root Spider blocks, it gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"They're not half as fierce if they don't see you coming."
—Devin, Faerie Noble

name: Roots
text:
Enchant creature without flying
When Roots enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor:
"That which nourishes can also bind."
—Gemma, Willow Priestess

name: Willow Faerie
text: Flying
flavor:
"The Autumn Willow cannot be everywhere at once—that's what her grandchildren are for."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Willow Priestess
text:
{T}: You may put a Faerie permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
{2}{G}: Target green creature gains protection from black until end of turn.
flavor:
"Those of faith are those of strength."
—Autumn Willow

name: Fabricate
text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."

name: Keep Watch
text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
flavor: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

name: Beseech the Queen
text:
({2/B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's mana value is 6.)
Search your library for a card with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

name: Cadaverous Knight
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.
flavor:
Grieve for the soul in death dishonored.
—Shadow Guild saying

name: Helldozer
text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.
flavor: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

name: Nefashu
text: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.

name: Noxious Ghoul
text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

name: Shepherd of Rot
text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
flavor:
"My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Soulless One
text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.
flavor: "Surrender your soul to me."

name: Smokebraider
text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
flavor: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

name: Beast Hunt
text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor:
"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

name: Ivy Elemental
text: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

name: Living Hive
text:
Trample
Whenever Living Hive deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
flavor: In its center is a single red ant, a queen that regulates the hive's movements.

name: Tribal Unity
text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

name: Copper Myr
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

name: Gold Myr
text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

name: Leaden Myr
text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor: The Moriok saw the myr as fellow scavengers, never knowing just who the myr were scavenging for.

name: Skeleton Shard
text: {3}, {T} or {B}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Metal permeates the marrow of every bone in Mephidross—except one.

name: Wizard Replica
text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Wizard Replica: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor: It responds with unnatural precision.

name: Tree of Tales
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: Tel-Jilad, sanctum of the ancient trolls, keepers of the secret of Mirrodin's origin.

name: Angel of the God-Pharaoh
text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The angels did not deceive. From the start, they were clear their allegiance was to the God-Pharaoh and to him alone.

name: Aven of Enduring Hope
text:
Flying
When Aven of Enduring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: "This storm will calm. We must believe that."

name: Crested Sunmare
text:
Other Horses you control have indestructible.
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 5/5 white Horse creature token.
flavor:
"It is evidence that some pure corner of the world must still exist."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Dauntless Aven
text:
Flying
Whenever Dauntless Aven attacks, untap target creature you control.
flavor: In the chaos brought by the new gods, swift-winged aven served as pathfinders, leading the last of the people away from the ruins of Naktamun.

name: Disposal Mummy
text: When Disposal Mummy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor: Without the viziers to oversee their actions, some anointed went to extreme lengths to fulfill their directives.

name: Djeru's Renunciation
text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"I was promised an afterlife, not this. Samut was right. The God-Pharaoh lied."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Dutiful Servants
flavor: Buildings crumbled and monuments fell. The river bled and the sky wept tears of fire. All the while, servants silently continued their work, oblivious to it all.

name: Gideon's Defeat
text: Exile target white creature that's attacking or blocking. If it was a Gideon planeswalker, you gain 5 life.
flavor:
"Gideon, how easy it must be to play the protector when you think yourself untouchable. How wrong you are."
—Nicol Bolas

name: God-Pharaoh's Faithful
text: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "This is the final trial! Rejoice, for the God-Pharaoh soars among us!"

name: Hour of Revelation
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield.
Destroy all nonland permanents.
flavor: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.

name: Mummy Paramount
text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, Mummy Paramount gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"It appears some mummies have begun to observe a hierarchy all their own."
—Elekh, vizier of embalming

name: Oketra's Avenger
text: You may exert Oketra's Avenger as it attacks. When you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "Oketra's arrow is my spear, and her love my shield."

name: Oketra's Last Mercy
text: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.
flavor: To the end, all Oketra did was for others.

name: Solemnity
text:
Players can't get counters.
Counters can't be put on artifacts, creatures, enchantments, or lands.
flavor: The arrival of the God-Pharaoh marked a betrayal of both gods and mortals.

name: Solitary Camel
text: Solitary Camel has lifelink as long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: Deserts are inhospitable, not uninhabitable.

name: Steward of Solidarity
text: {T}, Exert Steward of Solidarity: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: In the midst of disaster, heroic acts became almost ordinary, and ordinary warriors became heroes.

name: Vizier of the True
text:
You may exert Vizier of the True as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever you exert a creature, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: Outnumbered, but not outmatched.

name: Aerial Guide
text:
Flying
Whenever Aerial Guide attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"Kefnet taught us to turn obstacles into advantages."
—Neponem, vizier of Kefnet

name: Aven Reedstalker
text:
Flash
Flying
flavor: "Our best chance against the Eternals will be tactics they've never seen and styles they've never trained in."

name: Countervailing Winds
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The Eternals had long since mastered every technique taught during the trials.

name: Cunning Survivor
text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Cunning Survivor gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Initiates who had been through the Trial of Knowledge learned to see everything as pieces of a larger puzzle.

name: Eternal of Harsh Truths
text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
Whenever Eternal of Harsh Truths attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.
flavor:
"If creating the Eternals was Bolas's plan here, what is his plan for the Eternals?"
—Jace Beleren

name: Fraying Sanity
text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.
flavor: Those wound tightest are first to unravel.

name: Hour of Eternity
text: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
flavor: To serve as an Eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.

name: Imaginary Threats
text:
Creatures target opponent controls attack this turn if able. During that player's next untap step, creatures they control don't untap.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Liliana always knew Jace's illusions would come in handy.

name: Jace's Defeat
text: Counter target blue spell. If it was a Jace planeswalker spell, scry 2.
flavor:
"I had hoped for more from you, Jace. But I expected as much."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Kefnet's Last Word
text: Gain control of target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.
flavor: In his final moments, Kefnet reached into the minds of those around him, desperate for logic within the consuming chaos.

name: Ominous Sphinx
text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: The sphinxes began to speak only after the Second Sun aligned. They whispered dire warnings, though no one listened.

name: Proven Combatant
text: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)
flavor: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."

name: Seer of the Last Tomorrow
text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player mills three cards.
flavor: "The truth? It's been here all along. The Hours as we understood them are lies."

name: Spellweaver Eternal
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
flavor:
"They were once our brothers and sisters."
—Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate

name: Striped Riverwinder
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The denizens of the Luxa River woke angry on the currents of blood.

name: Tragic Lesson
text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Though Kefnet's followers feverishly searched his last words for some final riddle, they found only the gurgles of a dying god.

name: Banewhip Punisher
text:
When Banewhip Punisher enters the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{B}, Sacrifice Banewhip Punisher: Destroy target creature that has a -1/-1 counter on it.
flavor: "If I die, it will not be alone."

name: Bontu's Last Reckoning
text: Destroy all creatures. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.
flavor: To the last, Bontu wanted only to be first among the God-Pharaoh's subjects.

name: Doomfall
text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent exiles a creature they control.
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
flavor:
"This place has outlived its usefulness."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Grisly Survivor
text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Grisly Survivor gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: No cartouches to earn. No afterlife to enter. Only the glory of a well-struck blow and the growing pile of felled enemies at her feet.

name: Hour of Glory
text: Exile target creature. If that creature was a God, its controller reveals their hand and exiles all cards from it with the same name as that creature.
flavor: The gods of the trials also faced the opportunity to prove themselves worthy.

name: Khenra Eternal
text: Afflict 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)
flavor: For many years, servant mummies toiled in the mines to extract lazotep. The emergence of the Eternals revealed the sacred substance's true purpose.

name: Lethal Sting
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.
Destroy target creature.
flavor: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible—a sentiment they quickly abandoned.

name: Liliana's Defeat
text: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. If that permanent was a Liliana planeswalker, her controller loses 3 life.
flavor:
"All the power you have gathered for yourself, Liliana, I can take away."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Lurching Rotbeast
text: Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The dead that swept across Naktamun came in all shapes and sizes.

name: Marauding Boneslasher
text: Marauding Boneslasher can't block unless you control another Zombie.
flavor: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.

name: Merciless Eternal
text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Merciless Eternal gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"My work here is complete. The people have done everything required of them."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Moaning Wall
text:
Defender
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Before the monuments, before the first trials, before Naktamun itself, Bolas culled the plane of its adults in order to rebuild it for his own designs.

name: Razaketh, the Foulblooded
text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Liliana insisted on coming to Amonkhet to confront one of the two remaining demons to whom she is bound.

name: Razaketh's Rite
text:
Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "The blood ritual is complete. The end approaches."

name: Ruin Rat
text:
Deathtouch
When Ruin Rat dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor: From every shadow came the dull scratch of teeth on bones.

name: Scrounger of Souls
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: Yell for help, and that may answer.

name: Torment of Hailfire
text: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.
flavor: "Your God-Pharaoh has returned."

name: Torment of Scarabs
text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.
flavor: Like a carpet unrolling for their god, the scarabs poured out from the necropolis.

name: Torment of Venom
text: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. Its controller loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another nonland permanent or discards a card.
flavor: The Scorpion God's sting sends venom strong enough to poison blood, bone, and spirit.

name: Vile Manifestation
text:
Vile Manifestation gets +1/+0 for each card with cycling in your graveyard.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The glyphs writhed and twisted, spewing out dark, vengeful magic.

name: Wretched Camel
text: When Wretched Camel dies, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target player discards a card.
flavor: Perfectly adapted to cross the wastes in life, they bring the wastes with them in death.

name: Blur of Blades
text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.

name: Burning-Fist Minotaur
text:
First strike
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Burning-Fist Minotaur gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "There is no afterlife. Not for me, and not for you. So think again before getting in my way."

name: Chandra's Defeat
text: Chandra's Defeat deals 5 damage to target red creature or red planeswalker. If that permanent is a Chandra planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"Fire? Is that your only trick, Chandra?"
—Nicol Bolas

name: Chaos Maw
text: When Chaos Maw enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each other creature.
flavor: The food chain doesn't end at sandwurms.

name: Crash Through
text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.
flavor:
"We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Defiant Khenra
flavor: There were those who saw the death of the gods and the city's collapse as a final test of worth. Some believed it meant the God-Pharaoh had been killed. Only a few realized they had been deceived.

name: Fervent Paincaster
text:
{T}: Fervent Paincaster deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
{T}, Exert Fervent Paincaster: It deals 1 damage to target creature. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "Everyone here is a honed fighter. We'll respond the only way we know how."

name: Firebrand Archer
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Firebrand Archer deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: A word of vengeance, and her arrows awaken in flame.

name: Frontline Devastator
text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
{1}{R}: Frontline Devastator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.

name: Gilded Cerodon
text: Whenever Gilded Cerodon attacks, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: The plating of its horns is a token of honor from Hazoret, who favors creatures with great hearts.

name: Granitic Titan
text:
Menace
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"That one's not mine. Run!"
—Nissa Revane

name: Hour of Devastation
text: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.
flavor:
"Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Inferno Jet
text:
Inferno Jet deals 6 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "When the whole world is crazy, it's important to find something you can rely on."

name: Khenra Scrapper
text:
Menace
You may exert Khenra Scrapper as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."

name: Magmaroth
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on Magmaroth.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Magmaroth.
flavor: Sand into glass and flesh into ash—such are the markers of its domain.

name: Manticore Eternal
text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
Manticore Eternal attacks each combat if able.
flavor: While most Eternals were initiates who completed the trials, Bolas had plans for some of Amonkhet's other denizens.

name: Neheb, the Eternal
text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.
flavor:
"This is what glory looks like."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Open Fire
text: Open Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.

name: Puncturing Blow
text: Puncturing Blow deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Neither the false God-Pharaoh nor his bugs will decide our fate."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Sand Strangler
text: When Sand Strangler enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you may have Sand Strangler deal 3 damage to target creature.
flavor: The bombardment of sand disorients, chokes, and ultimately tenderizes its prey.

name: Thorned Moloch
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Thorned Moloch has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor: Those who fled the destruction of the city stumbled into the territory of their prickly neighbors.

name: Beneath the Sands
text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Though buried and muffled, nature's whisper still called to Nissa.

name: Bitterbow Sharpshooters
text: Vigilance, reach
flavor:
"Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable."
"I never forgot."

name: Devotee of Strength
text: {4}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: When Rhonas fell, his followers stirred with newfound strength—a final gift from a god they thought indomitable.

name: Dune Diviner
text: {1}, Tap an untapped Desert you control: You gain 1 life.
flavor: The desert had once been a place of endless horror. It was now the last refuge as the city of Naktamun fell.

name: Feral Prowler
text: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.
flavor: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.

name: Frilled Sandwalla
text: {1}{G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: It basks atop the rubble of Rhonas's monument, which still pulses with latent power.

name: Gift of Strength
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor: "What greater testament can there be to Rhonas's lessons?"

name: Harrier Naga
flavor: She trusts that the potent poisons of her darts will reach the enemy before the enemy reaches her.

name: Hope Tender
text:
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.
{1}, {T}, Exert Hope Tender: Untap two target lands. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: Some refused to leave their shattered homes, vowing to rebuild at any cost.

name: Hour of Promise
text: Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control three or more Deserts, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor: With the Hekma breached and its protection removed, the deserts swept in.

name: Life Goes On
text: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.
flavor:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Nissa's Defeat
text: Destroy target Forest, green enchantment, or green planeswalker. If that permanent was a Nissa planeswalker, draw a card.
flavor:
"The soul of this world is gone, Nissa, and I would gladly kill it again."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Oasis Ritualist
text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "It's only the end if we allow it."

name: Quarry Beetle
text: When Quarry Beetle enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"The ruin of the past is the topsoil of the future."
—Sokar, former Nef-crop initiate

name: Rampaging Hippo
text:
Trample
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Respect is earned through deeds—or the capacity to bite someone in half."
—Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate

name: Rhonas's Last Stand
text: Create a 5/4 green Snake creature token. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.
flavor: Rhonas continued to fight until his last breath and even beyond.

name: Rhonas's Stalwart
text: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "Give me some room."

name: Sidewinder Naga
text: As long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, Sidewinder Naga gets +1/+0 and has trample.
flavor:
"Those who embrace the harsh land rather than fight it find they have a powerful ally."
—Nissa Revane

name: Tenacious Hunter
text: As long as a creature has a -1/-1 counter on it, Tenacious Hunter has vigilance and deathtouch.
flavor: The crocodiles of the Broken Lands, long used to feeding on undead flesh, eagerly flooded into Naktamun for a taste of something fresher.

name: Uncage the Menagerie
text: Search your library for up to X creature cards with different names that each have mana value X, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: The destruction of Rhonas's monument released his collection upon the city.

name: Brambleweft Behemoth
text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: Life will find a way, or it will make one.

name: Wasp of the Bitter End
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, you may sacrifice Wasp of the Bitter End. If you do, destroy target creature.
flavor: As the Second Sun glided into its final position in the sky, a chorus of wings sounded to herald the return of Nicol Bolas.

name: Chandra, Gremlin Wrangler
text:
[+1]: Create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.
[−2]: Chandra, Gremlin Wrangler deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of Gremlins you control.
flavor: "Sure, I could set things on fire by myself. But teamwork can be fun, too."

name: Diabolical Salvation
text:
Split second
Create four 4/4 red Devil creature tokens with haste and "When this creature dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with '{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.'" Sacrifice the Devil tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: To succeed, the wizards made a deal with devils.

name: Arctic Foxes
text: Arctic Foxes can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater as long as defending player controls a snow land.
flavor:
"Those Foxes are wily, swift, and ferocious. They are the warriors of the snows."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Battle Cry
text:
Untap all white creatures you control.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"In the thick of battle, you must keep your wits about you. Yelling a lot helps, too."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Cold Snap
text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Cold Snap deals damage to that player equal to the number of snow lands they control.
flavor: Who knows from whence the winter comes?

name: Cooperation
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"The Elves train our healers, and we keep the Orcs at bay. Most Elvish bargains aren't as fair."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Death Ward
text: Regenerate target creature.
flavor:
"Sometimes, a soul is not ready to complete its journey to the next world."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Elvish Healer
text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. If it's a green creature, prevent the next 2 damage instead.
flavor:
"The Kjeldorans keep the Orcs at bay and we train their healers. Most human bargains aren't as fair."
—Laina of the Elvish Council

name: Enduring Renewal
text:
Play with your hand revealed.
If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.
Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.
flavor: That which lasts longest serves best.

name: Formation
text:
Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"I have been a warrior for over four hundred years, and yet each generation of Kjeldorans teaches me new tricks. There can be no better allies."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Hallowed Ground
text: {W}{W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"On this site where Kjeld's blood was spilled, let none raise a fist or deny a beggar."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Kelsinko Ranger
text: {1}{W}: Target green creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"Rangers not trained by the Elves just aren't the same."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Kjeldoran Knight
text:
Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
{1}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{W}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Those who do not ride the wind on Aesthir still command loyalty and respect."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Kjeldoran Phalanx
text: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"There's nothing I like better than watching a street full of soldiers kicking down the doors of the guilty and the impure."
—Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Kjeldoran Skyknight
text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"My Aesthir is my most trusted ally. We fight as one and live as one, and we will die as one."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Kjeldoran Warrior
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"Give me a thousand such Warriors and I could change the world."
—Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Lightning Blow
text:
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"If you do it right, they'll never know what hit them."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Lost Order of Jarkeld
text:
As Lost Order of Jarkeld enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Lost Order of Jarkeld's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of creatures the chosen player controls.
flavor:
"Let us remember brave Jarkeld and his troops, who perished in the Adarkar Wastes so long ago."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Mercenaries
text: {3}: The next time Mercenaries would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor:
"Blasted amateurs! Doesn't the queen think we can fight well enough on our own?"
—Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Prismatic Ward
text:
Enchant creature
As Prismatic Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the chosen color.
flavor:
"These, of all spells, must have common components I can isolate and use."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Rally
text: Blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Stand your ground, troops! This shall be our finest hour!"
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox, last words

name: Snow Hound
text: {1}, {T}: Return Snow Hound and target green or blue creature you control to their owner's hand.
flavor:
"If you're starving, eat your horses, your dead, or yourself—but *never* eat your dog."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Warning
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
flavor:
"The folk of the Karplusan Mountains are impossible to ambush."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Arnjlot's Ascent
text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{1}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"The dreams of a child fulfilled:
the wind on my brow,
the air 'neath my feet."
—Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

name: Balduvian Conjurer
text: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor:
"The very lands of Balduvia are alive."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Breath of Dreams
text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Green creatures have "Cumulative upkeep {1}."
flavor:
"Get up, blast you! They're attacking! Why are you all so slow?"
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Clairvoyance
text:
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"As we followed the ice wall, we had the distinct feeling of being watched. Many of the party wanted to turn back."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Errant Minion
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Errant Minion deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.
flavor: Abandon not your faith when others abandon you.

name: Force Void
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"My mind and spirit are one—a barrier not readily passed."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

name: Illusionary Forces
text:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"This school was founded in secret, operates in secret, and exists for the teaching of secrets. Those who would alter reality must first escape it."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Illusionary Presence
text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a land type. Illusionary Presence gains landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)
flavor:
"We could feel the Shaman's power, as surely as we felt the storm."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Illusionary Terrain
text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
As Illusionary Terrain enters the battlefield, choose two basic land types.
Basic lands of the first chosen type are the second chosen type.
flavor:
"The drawing of maps is fruitless in the west near the ice walls; the very earth is formless."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Illusionary Wall
text:
Defender, flying, first strike
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"Let them see what is not there and feel what does not touch them. When they no longer trust their senses, that is the time to strike."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Infuse
text:
Untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

name: Krovikan Sorcerer
text:
{T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card.
{T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.
flavor:
"These Sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Mesmeric Trance
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Magic overused can freeze the mind. Creativity is more important than power."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Polar Kraken
text:
Trample
Polar Kraken enters the battlefield tapped.
Cumulative upkeep—Sacrifice a land. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"It was big. Really, really, big. No, bigger than that. It was *big!*"
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Ray of Erasure
text:
Target player mills a card.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"What is real can be unreal."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Shyft
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Shyft become the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor:
"Capturing this specimen was not easy. Study it well, that you someday might be as versatile."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Silver Erne
text: Flying, trample
flavor:
"I've seen a larger Erne knock a Giant to the ground and stay airborne. They move not with the wind, but as the wind."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Soldevi Machinist
text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts.
flavor:
"Perhaps this time the power of the artificers shall be used wisely."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Thunder Wall
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
{U}: Thunder Wall gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Lemures had barely taken wing when the sky roared with thunder. The swarm of little beasts wavered, divided, and fell, crashing to the earth."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Word of Undoing
text: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"It was in Urza's journals that I finally found the secret at the core of the summonings."
—Journal, author unknown

name: Flow of Maggots
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Flow of Maggots can't be blocked by non-Wall creatures.
flavor:
"The very earth seemed alive and made a sound like the writhing of the damned."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Gaze of Pain
text: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may choose to have it deal damage equal to its power to a target creature. If you do, it assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: Remove the guardians to ensure your victory.

name: Gravebind
text:
Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: One foot in the grave, firmly planted.

name: Hoar Shade
text: {B}: Hoar Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The creature we fought in the western waste was doubly dangerous: mortally wounded, it rebounded and attacked again."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Icequake
text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.
flavor:
"When the earth shakes, and their animals are swallowed up by the ground, perhaps they will think twice before attacking again."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Infernal Darkness
text:
Cumulative upkeep—Pay {B} and 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type.
flavor:
"I thought the day had brought enough horrors for our ragged band, but the night was far worse."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Lim-Dûl's Cohort
text: Whenever Lim-Dûl's Cohort blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor:
"Join me in the place of power, you risen dead. Join me where the waters weep and the trees have no hearts."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Lim-Dûl's Hex
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each player, Lim-Dûl's Hex deals 1 damage to that player unless they pay {B} or {3}.
flavor:
"The weak shall fall. The strong shall remain."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Mind Whip
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {3}. If they don't, Mind Whip deals 2 damage to that player and you tap that creature.
flavor:
"A mind in agony is a sparrow without wings."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Minion of Tevesh Szat
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Minion of Tevesh Szat deals 2 damage to you unless you pay {B}{B}.
{T}: Target creature gets +3/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"A minion given over to Tevesh Szat is a stronger minion gained."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Moor Fiend
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor:
"Let them close the gates of Krov from dusk until dawn if they so choose. It matters not. My fiends shall yet rend their flesh from their bones."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Seizures
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Seizures deals 3 damage to that creature's controller unless that player pays {3}.
flavor:
"Sheathe your sword, warrior, lest ye fall on it when stricken."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Songs of the Damned
text: Add {B} for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor: Not wind, but the breath of the dead.

name: Spoils of Evil
text: For each artifact or creature card in target opponent's graveyard, add {C} and you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Virtue has its rewards, as does its opposite."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Spoils of War
text:
X is the number of artifact and/or creature cards in an opponent's graveyard as you cast this spell.
Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.
flavor:
"This is the fun part!"
—Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

name: Aggression
text:
Enchant non-Wall creature
Enchanted creature has first strike and trample.
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.
flavor: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

name: Anarchy
text: Destroy all white permanents.
flavor:
"The Shaman waved the staff, and the land itself went mad."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Avalanche
text: Destroy X target snow lands.
flavor:
"The pass was completely blocked by the avalanche; we're forced to turn back. Nevertheless, we've gone farther and seen more than any before us."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Battle Frenzy
text:
Green creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Nongreen creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"One day you, too, shall drink the blood of your foes. It is something to look forward to."
—Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

name: Brand of Ill Omen
text:
Enchant creature
Cumulative upkeep {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Enchanted creature's controller can't cast creature spells.
flavor:
"Let those who bear the brand receive no shelter, no kindness, and no comfort from our people."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Curse of Marit Lage
text:
When Curse of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all Islands.
Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor:
"Our world has not felt her thundering steps in lifetimes, but Marit Lage's presence is still with us."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Dwarven Armory
text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Activate only during any upkeep step.
flavor:
"Few of us left, now. Confounded Yeti have opened all the vents. We'd best hide here with the weapons."
—Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

name: Glacial Crevasses
text: Sacrifice a snow Mountain: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor:
"We were chasing Lim-Dûl when the ridge in front of us suddenly crumbled. I can't believe it was mere coincidence."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Goblin Ski Patrol
text: {1}{R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.
flavor:
"AIIIEEEE!"
—Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

name: Grizzled Wolverine
text: {R}: Grizzled Wolverine gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only during the declare blockers step, only if at least one creature is blocking Grizzled Wolverine, and only once each turn.
flavor:
"Before you release a Wolverine from the trap, make sure it's really dead."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Karplusan Giant
text: Tap an untapped snow land you control: Karplusan Giant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"They aren't the brightest or the quickest of Giants. For that matter, the same holds true if you compare them to rocks."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Karplusan Yeti
text: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.
flavor:
"What's that smell?"
—Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

name: Melting
text: All lands are no longer snow.
flavor:
"Who needs the sun when you've got me around?"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Meteor Shower
text: Meteor Shower deals X plus 1 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor:
"Eenie, meenie, minie, moe . . . oh, why not all of them?"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Orcish Librarian
text: {R}, {T}: Look at the top eight cards of your library. Exile four of them at random, then put the rest on top of your library in any order.
flavor: Us hungry, need food . . . . Lots of books . . . . Hmm . . . .

name: Panic
text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"If you'd been there, you would've run from that deer, too!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Stonehands
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Trust in the power of stone. Stone is strong; stone shatters swords; stone breaks bones. Trust in stone."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Tor Giant
flavor:
"What do you do then? Run. Run very fast. Don't stop until you see the camp—or a bigger Giant."
—Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

name: Wall of Lava
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Lava gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Now *there's* something you don't see every day."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Brown Ouphe
text: {1}{G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor:
"Ouphes love trinkets and love to take them apart. I only wish they wouldn't do so with the magical ones."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Dire Wolves
text: Dire Wolves has banding as long as you control a Plains. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"It's amazing how scared a city kid can get at a dog. Now, of course, I'd cross Terisiare alone, and keep no watch if I had a pack of greys hanging on my flanks as I went."
—Oddveig Ulfsson, caravan scout

name: Earthlore
text:
Enchant land you control
Tap enchanted land: Target blocking creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate only if enchanted land is untapped.
flavor:
"Even the ground is our friend."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Essence Filter
text: Destroy all enchantments or all nonwhite enchantments.
flavor:
"Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Fanatical Fever
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"Let go your fury, and hone your anger. Become the fist of Freyalise!"
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Forgotten Lore
text: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.
flavor: In ashes are the gems of history.

name: Freyalise Supplicant
text: {T}, Sacrifice a red or white creature: Freyalise Supplicant deals damage to any target equal to half the sacrificed creature's power, rounded down.
flavor:
"We have joined with the Druids of the Juniper Order. Our faith is one."
—Laina of the Elvish Council

name: Fyndhorn Pollen
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
All creatures get -1/-0.
{1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I breathed deeply, and suddenly I knew not who or where I was."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Gorilla Pack
text:
Gorilla Pack can't attack unless defending player controls a Forest.
When you control no Forests, sacrifice Gorilla Pack.
flavor:
"We learned this at a dear price: once you cross the great river, get through the Yavimaya forest at top speed."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Hot Springs
text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."
flavor: Warmth is life; heat is peace.

name: Juniper Order Druid
text: {T}: Untap target land.
flavor:
"The filthy towns of Kjeldor are no place for anyone to live. Fyndhorn is our home now."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Maddening Wind
text:
Enchant creature
Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Maddening Wind deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor:
"It is Freyalise, walking on the world."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Pale Bears
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor:
"Daughter, on the day you have killed your Pale Bear, then will I give you your true name."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Pygmy Allosaurus
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor:
"I don't understand the appeal of keeping these things as pets, unless you want your children eaten."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Pyknite
text: When Pyknite enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"Never cross a Pyknite, if you value your scalp."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Rime Dryad
text: Snow forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Forest.)
flavor:
"The Dryads told us to stay, as no new horrors would come when it was so cold. Three of us left anyway. The rest believed their lies, and their skeletons weren't found until the thaw."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Ritual of Subdual
text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
flavor:
"That which does not bend to the will of Freyalise shall surely break."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Thermokarst
text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Trailblazer
text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor:
"Our Elvish Hunter Taaveti led us swiftly along hidden paths through the dense forest. We caught the Orcs from behind, and completely by surprise."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Wall of Pine Needles
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}: Regenerate Wall of Pine Needles.
flavor: The power of the forest takes a hundred forms. Some are more surprising than others.

name: Yavimaya Gnats
text:
Flying
{G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.
flavor:
"It is our third day of travel on the Yavimaya River, and still these creatures plague us. Davin Lansson, our naturalist, has facetiously labeled them 'gnats,' and the name has stuck."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Blade Banish
text: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: The Wanderer walks many paths. Her blade travels only one.

name: Checkpoint Officer
text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: After what he viewed as Lukka's shocking betrayal, General Kudro enacted stringent security measures at every entry point into Drannith.

name: Coordinated Charge
text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Out here we're nothing but our training."
—Ethuk, Coppercoat mage

name: Daysquad Marshal
text: When Daysquad Marshal enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
flavor: "The night emboldens many monsters, but the mightiest will attack in broad daylight."

name: Divine Arrow
text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: Outside Drannith's walls, where collateral damage is of no concern, the Coppercoats are free to use more potent methods.

name: Drannith Healer
text:
Whenever you cycle another card, you gain 1 life.
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "The glowstones shine and dinosaurs roar to the south. Business will be brisk tonight."

name: Drannith Magistrate
text: Your opponents can't cast spells from anywhere other than their hands.
flavor: "Our sanctuaries must be beacons of reason and calm or else they will fall."

name: Flourishing Fox
text:
Whenever you cycle another card, put a +1/+1 counter on Flourishing Fox.
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Day 1: These fox pups have really taken to me.
"Day 4: Big. So big. Need additional security."
—Jonald, mission naturalist, research notes

name: Garrison Cat
text: When Garrison Cat dies, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
flavor: After much arguing, the soldiers decided to keep it, on the grounds that it killed enough mice to count as an honorary monster slayer.

name: Helica Glider
text: Helica Glider enters the battlefield with your choice of a flying counter or a first strike counter on it.
flavor: It could subsist on seeds but its preferred fare is your face.

name: Imposing Vantasaur
text:
Vigilance
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Flying

text:
Flying
When Patagia Tiger enters the battlefield, target Human you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Flying

name: Guard Duty

Enchant creature

Flying

name: Illusory Angel

flavor:
"In a daze, I woke and looked upon the battlefield, where I could swear my dreams were laying waste to the enemy."
—Letter from a soldier

name: Jhessian Thief
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jhessian Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: "Where's the fun in an escape if it's not at least a little daring?"

name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
text:
Flash
At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards.
Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.
flavor: "It is not a goal, but a process—the process of creating the perfect Phyrexia."

name: Riverwheel Aerialists
text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
text:
Flash
Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash.
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
flavor: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.

name: Bladewing's Thrall
text:
Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon.
When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: A shadow of life chasing a husk of glory.

name: Bogbrew Witch
text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: "The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."

name: Dead Reveler
text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: He's the unlife of the party.

name: Festering Newt
text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.
flavor: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

name: Haunting Hymn
text: Target player discards two cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that player discards four cards instead.
flavor: The hymn's melody has persisted since Tourach's time, but the words changed to invoke the phobias of each listener.

name: Ob Nixilis, the Fallen
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose 3 life. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on Ob Nixilis, the Fallen.
flavor: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

name: Rune-Scarred Demon
text:
Flying
When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

name: Ulcerate
text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.
flavor:
"If it were merely lethal, that would be sufficient. The art, however, is in maximizing the suffering it causes."
—Liliana Vess

name: Wrench Mind
text: Target player discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.
flavor: What is the sound of one head snapping?

name: Mark of Mutiny
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

name: Aerial Predation
text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

name: Carven Caryatid
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

name: Channel
text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
flavor: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

name: Greater Basilisk
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

name: Jugan, the Rising Star
text:
Flying
When Jugan, the Rising Star dies, you may distribute five +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.
flavor: The light of the rising star empowers the champions of tomorrow.

name: Lotus Cobra
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, add one mana of any color.
flavor: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

name: Overgrown Battlement
text:
Defender
{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control with defender.
flavor:
"Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Primeval Titan
text:
Trample
Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: When nature calls, *run*.

name: Sultai Flayer
text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.
flavor: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

name: Alabaster Leech
text: White spells you cast cost {W} more to cast.
flavor:
"Its stones seem to serve a healing function, but removing them intact is an exhausting process."
—Tolarian research notes

name: Atalya, Samite Master
text:
{X}, {T}: Choose one —
• Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Spend only white mana on X.
• You gain X life. Spend only white mana on X.
flavor: "Healing is a gift the divine ones have shared with us. It is a sacred trust."

name: Benalish Trapper
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

name: Blinding Light
text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
flavor: An angel's sword impales only the body; her righteousness penetrates the soul.

name: Capashen Unicorn
text: {1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Capashen Unicorn: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: Capashen riders were stern and humorless even before their ancestral home was reduced to rubble.

name: Crimson Acolyte
text:
Protection from red
{W}: Target creature gains protection from red until end of turn.
flavor:
The faithful will walk through streams of fire and emerge unscathed.
—Crimson acolyte creed

name: Crusading Knight
text:
Protection from black
Crusading Knight gets +1/+1 for each Swamp your opponents control.
flavor: "My only dream is to destroy the nightmares of others."

name: Divine Presence
text: If a source would deal 4 or more damage to a permanent or player, that source deals 3 damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor:
"Serra's light isn't easily extinguished."
—Reya Dawnbringer

name: Global Ruin
