name: Bolt Hound
text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Whenever Bolt Hound attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Its spark is worse than its bite.

name: Burn Bright
text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Catalyst Elemental
text: Sacrifice Catalyst Elemental: Add {R}{R}.
flavor: As the hyperstormic generator crept past redline, a being emerged from the arc.

name: Chandra's Magmutt
text: {T}: Chandra's Magmutt deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor:
"Is it purebred? No, but it's pure fire."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Chandra's Pyreling
text: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor:
"I think Chandra just wanted something to blame random scorch marks on."
—Jace Beleren

name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor:
"Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."
—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan

name: Chandra's Spitfire
text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "I've lit most everything on fire—trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."

name: Coalhauler Swine
text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
flavor: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

name: Cyclops Electromancer
text: When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Every storm has an eye.

name: Dance with Devils
text: Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: Devils sow chaos and reap panic.

name: Fanatical Firebrand
text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Fiery Conclusion
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

name: Firecannon Blast
text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.
flavor: Goblins' fearlessness and diminutive size make them the perfect cannoneers.

name: Flame Lash
text: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor: "This is just my warm-up."

name: Flames of the Firebrand
text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Goblin Artillery
text: {T}: Goblin Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
flavor: Most goblins get their turn firing the catapult, but few achieve the coveted title of Ammunition Holder.

name: Goblin Oriflamme
text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor:
"It was difficult to tell whether the piles of gore within their warrens were mere trash heaps, sacred altars, or warnings."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

name: Goblin Psychopath
text: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.
flavor: He never wastes energy distinguishing between friend and foe.

name: Goldhound
text:
First strike
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{T}, Sacrifice Goldhound: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: The staccato clatter of its metal claws on pavement is unmistakable.

name: Grotag Night-Runner
text: Whenever Grotag Night-Runner deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
flavor: Naturally inquisitive and adaptable, goblins can turn their small stature to their advantage as rogues.

name: Immersturm Raider
text: When Immersturm Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: The demons took no captives and claimed no spoils; they sought only to destroy.

name: Impending Doom
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and attacks each combat if able.
When enchanted creature dies, Impending Doom deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: "Feast, for your next meal may be your last!"

name: Irreverent Revelers
text:
When Irreverent Revelers enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Irreverent Revelers gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: To some satyrs, only blasphemy is sacred.

name: Nest Robber
text: Haste
flavor:
"These sailors on our shores are like the dinosaurs that plunder eggs from nests. They live on the labors of others."
—Itzama the Crested

name: Pyre-Sledge Arsonist
text: {1}, {T}: Pyre-Sledge Arsonist deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of permanents you've sacrificed this turn.
flavor: Everything from damaged furniture to inconvenient corpses becomes fuel for Ziatora's ever-burning foundry.

name: Ravenous Giant
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Ravenous Giant deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: The might of an army with the restraint of a child.

name: Reckless Fireweaver
text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

name: Sokenzan Smelter
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1} and sacrifice an artifact. If you do, create a 3/1 red Construct artifact creature token with haste.
flavor: Among the artisans of Sokenzan City, reusing every scrap of metal is a point of pride.

name: Spark of Creativity
text: Choose target creature. Exile the top card of your library. You may have Spark of Creativity deal damage to that creature equal to the exiled card's mana value. If you don't, you may play that card until end of turn.
flavor:
"To invent is to rebel."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Spellgorger Weird
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.
flavor: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.

name: Spiteful Prankster
text:
As long as it's your turn, Spiteful Prankster has first strike.
Whenever another creature dies, Spiteful Prankster deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: The devil appreciated the irony of using doves for ammunition. The townsfolk, not so much.

name: Sudden Breakthrough
text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Rootha created constantly, passionately, in hopes of impressing her greatest critic: herself.

name: Swaggering Corsair
text: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
flavor: "I'm about to make you famous. From the golden city to High and Dry, they'll talk about how fast you died!"

name: Swift Kick
text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
flavor: Shintan sensed the malice in his opponent, but he did not strike until the orc's muscles tensed in preparation to throw the first punch.

name: Vault Robber
text: {1}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: The dwarves believe works of art should be passed down the generations, not buried with the dead.

name: Viashino Pyromancer
text: When Viashino Pyromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

name: Volley Veteran
text: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.
flavor: "Fill the sky with stuff!"

name: War-Name Aspirant
text:
Raid — War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.
flavor: No battle means more to a Mardu warrior than the one that earns her war name.

name: Wildfire Elemental
text: Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Fire is always dancing, leaping and whirling, seeking more fuel. It never rests, so why should I?"
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Canopy Baloth
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Canopy Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"You can almost see it calculating—are we a tasty enough treat to risk the jump?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Challenger Troll
text: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.

name: Declare Dominance
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.
flavor:
"If you think yourself a chief, then prove your might."
—Gar-Tun, Mistvalley silverback

name: Drowsing Tyrannodon
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
As long as you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Drowsing Tyrannodon can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor: What the rangers thought were warning growls turned out to be nothing but monstrous snoring.

name: Drudge Beetle
text: Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.

name: Duskshell Crawler
text:
When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor: They often perch on street lamps, causing the poles to buckle under their weight.

name: Elderleaf Mentor
text: When Elderleaf Mentor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor: "Our ancestors grew complacent in their divinity, allowing their lessers to topple them. Never again."

name: Engulfing Slagwurm
text: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor: Its teeth exist only for decoration.

name: Ferocious Pup
text: When Ferocious Pup enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor: The strongest pack has the fiercest pups.

name: Ghirapur Guide
text: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
flavor: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.

name: Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma
text:
Creature spells you cast with power 4 or greater cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma attacks, each creature you control with power 4 or greater gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: You don't want to know how she got that name.

name: Havenwood Wurm
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Trample
flavor: Time rifts bring tunneling beasts of old into the hard, dry earth of the present. Most die there, trapped, but the mightiest burst through the surface.

name: Hooting Mandrills
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Trample
flavor: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.

name: Hunter's Edge
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor: The hunt ends. Lunch begins.

name: Ilysian Caryatid
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, add two mana of any one color instead.
flavor: Those who die as heroes are permitted to dwell in Ilysia, a protected realm of the Underworld as tranquil and vibrant as the rest is bleak.

name: Iridescent Hornbeetle
text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each +1/+1 counter you've put on creatures under your control this turn.
flavor: The hatchlings will fill the jungles of Murasa in a glittering tide.

name: Master's Rebuke
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
flavor: "You have always been a promising student, but your arrogance far outstrips your prowess."

name: Moonlight Hunt
text: Choose target creature you don't control. Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
flavor: Courage alone won't keep you alive.

name: Nantuko Cultivator
text: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.
flavor: "Every seed holds strength and teaches patience."

name: Nessian Hornbeetle
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Nessian Hornbeetle.
flavor:
"The first rule of politics can be learned from a lowly hornbeetle: it is wise to cultivate powerful friends."
—Pythamon, sage of Meletis

name: Nightpack Ambusher
text:
Flash
Other Wolves and Werewolves you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't cast a spell this turn, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor: A strong leader means a growing pack.

name: Pounce
text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: The drive to hunt and feed is raw instinct for dinosaurs. The trick is simply to channel it in the right direction.

name: Reckless Amplimancer
text: {4}{G}: Double Reckless Amplimancer's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor: "Linear growth? What am I, a first-year?"

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: Calix was patient, steadily following Elspeth until their destined confrontation.

name: Roots of Wisdom
text: Mill three cards, then return a land card or Elf card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor: Though imprisoned in Jaspera trees, the elvish gods known as the Einir still whisper through the ages.

name: Scale the Heights
text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. You gain 2 life. You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Ever onward, ever skyward."

name: Stalking Drone
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}: Stalking Drone gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
flavor: As the Eldrazi adapted to the jungles of Zendikar, some took on the tactics of more familiar predators.

name: Titanic Brawl
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: Whoever wins, the neighborhood loses.

name: Wily Bandar
text: {2}{G}: Wily Bandar gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: Part feline, part primate, all trouble.

name: Wolverine Riders
text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor: "We'll break their lines. The rest of you, follow!"

name: Zendikar's Roil
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.
flavor:
"I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."
—Nissa Revane

name: Thriving Bluff
text:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

name: Gaea's Cradle
text: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.
flavor:
"Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

name: Release the Dogs
text: Create four 1/1 white Dog creature tokens.
flavor: They charge into battle and out for their morning walk with the same exuberance.

name: Steel-Plume Marshal
text:
Flying
Whenever Steel-Plume Marshal attacks, other attacking creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The defenders watched in terror as the flying V split apart into a bristling battle formation.

name: Stone Haven Pilgrim
text: Whenever Stone Haven Pilgrim attacks, if you control an artifact or enchantment, Stone Haven Pilgrim gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: The persistence to overcome obstacles is the most esteemed of kor virtues.

name: Supply Runners
text: When Supply Runners enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor: Good dogs stay by your side until the end. Great dogs leave to bring back aid.

name: Trusty Retriever
text:
When Trusty Retriever enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Trusty Retriever.
• Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Wipe away the slobber and it's as good as new, give or take a few bite marks.

name: Archaeomender
text: When Archaeomender enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Just as a broken relic can be mended, a shattered history can be made whole."

name: Bruvac the Grandiloquent
text: If an opponent would mill one or more cards, they mill twice that many cards instead. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: ". . . and furthermore . . ."

name: Corsair Captain
text:
When Corsair Captain enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Other Pirates you control get +1/+1.
flavor: "Lungs full of sea air and a hold full of loot. Ah, what a life!"

name: Nocturnal Feeder
text:
Flying
When Nocturnal Feeder dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: A living pulse is an irresistible temptation.

name: Tinybones, Trinket Thief
text:
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent discarded a card this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
{4}{B}{B}: Each opponent with no cards in hand loses 10 life.
flavor: Big distractions mean tiny nuisances can slip by unnoticed.

name: Witch of the Moors
text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature and you return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Many hands for many evils.

name: Chained Brute
text:
Chained Brute doesn't untap during your untap step.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Untap Chained Brute. Activate only during your turn.
flavor: A momentary lapse is all it needs to break free.

name: Immolating Gyre
text: Immolating Gyre deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
flavor: "Nice army you had there."

name: Lightning Visionary
text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: "The gods don't speak to mortals with gentle entreaties. They speak with thunder and fury."

name: Branching Evolution
text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
flavor:
"Is it the water? The stars? Whatever it is, something incredible is happening here."
—Eris, zoologist, journal entry

name: Towering Titan
text:
Towering Titan enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total toughness of other creatures you control.
Sacrifice a creature with defender: All creatures gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: "Knock, knock."

name: Aegis of the Heavens
text: Target creature gets +1/+7 until end of turn.
flavor: Inner strength is never seen until it makes all the difference.

name: Aerial Assault
text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
flavor:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

name: Archon of Redemption
text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.
flavor: Until Emeria is freed, he raises his sword in her name.

name: Bulwark Giant
text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
flavor:
"Where did *she* come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Cathar's Companion
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cathar's Companion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor:
"Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels

name: Celestial Mantle
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, double its controller's life total.
flavor: Upon such armor, even a mountain would break.

name: Face of Divinity
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
As long as another Aura is attached to enchanted creature, it has first strike and lifelink.
flavor: Pure souls shine bright as daybreak.

name: Knight of the Tusk
text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor: "Horse? Who needs a horse?"

name: Lena, Selfless Champion
text:
When Lena, Selfless Champion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each nontoken creature you control.
Sacrifice Lena: Creatures you control with power less than Lena's power gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: "Those who do evil and those who do nothing are equally worthy of contempt."

name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
text:
Flying
Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.
flavor: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

name: Rhox Faithmender
text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
flavor: Rhoxes who live long enough to retire from war lend support with their extensive knowledge of combat injuries.

name: Sky Tether
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and loses flying.
flavor:
"If you can't control your mount, I will control it for you."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Chart a Course
text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.
flavor: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.

name: Erratic Visionary
text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

name: Essence Flux
text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If it's a Spirit, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: A spirit is both fettered and free—bound in some ways to its previous existence, yet able to transcend much of the corporeal.

name: Exclusion Mage
text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

name: Mystic Archaeologist
text: {3}{U}{U}: Draw two cards.
flavor: The delight of discovery drives the pursuit of knowledge.

name: Narcolepsy
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
flavor:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Rishadan Airship
text:
Flying
Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: The view is truly spectacular—as long as you don't look at Rishada itself.

name: Sweep Away
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If that creature is attacking, you may put it on top of its owner's library instead.
flavor: The Roil takes many forms. It also takes many victims.

name: Thought Collapse
text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.
flavor:
"I can think of no greater punishment than answering your question in full."
—Lazav

name: Towering-Wave Mystic
text: Whenever Towering-Wave Mystic deals damage, target player mills that many cards.
flavor: Thassa's favor followed him to the Underworld. Even the waves of Nerono obeyed his will.

name: Vedalken Archmage
text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, draw a card.
flavor:
"The Knowledge Pool knows. Memnarch understands."
—Janus, speaker of the synod

name: Vedalken Entrancer
text: {U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
flavor: Their denial reaches far into your future.

name: Voyage's End
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.

name: Wall of Lost Thoughts
text:
Defender
When Wall of Lost Thoughts enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.
flavor: Those who intrude upon the Dimir seldom remember that they have done so.

name: Windreader Sphinx
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.
flavor: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

name: Windstorm Drake
text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.
flavor: Drakes become especially voracious as they prepare for their autumn migration, hunting the city's thoroughfares from dawn to dusk.

name: Winged Words
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.
flavor: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.

name: Agonizing Syphon
text: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

name: Blood Divination
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.
flavor: Predicting the future is a messy business.

name: Blood Host
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Host and you gain 2 life.
flavor: It would be ill-mannered to decline his invitation. It would be ill-advised to accept it.

name: Corpse Hauler
text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut."
—Shelac, necromancer

name: Drainpipe Vermin
text: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.
flavor: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.

name: Eternal Taskmaster
text:
Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren

name: Funeral Rites
text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then mill two cards.
flavor: Funerary masks help the newly dead resist the erosion of memory and identity in the Underworld.

name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
text: {3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

name: Launch Party
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

name: Lawless Broker
text: When Lawless Broker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: Kaladesh's illicit marketplaces are known as "night markets," but if you know who to ask, you can find what you're looking for at any time of the day.

name: Nightshade Stinger
text:
Flying
Nightshade Stinger can't block.
flavor:
"Most faeries are harmless pranksters. Every now and again, though, you get one that crosses over from mischievous to malicious."
—Gaddock Teeg

name: Rise of the Dark Realms
text: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor:
"For every living person there are generations of dead. Which realm would you rather rule?"
—Liliana Vess

name: Tithebearer Giant
text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa

name: Vampire Neonate
text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.

name: Barrage of Expendables
text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition.

name: Blindblast
text:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Borderland Minotaur
flavor:
"You have led us to triumph over the forces of Mogis!" said Brygus the Brave, clapping the Champion on the back. The Champion wiped the sweat and blood from her brow. "I count eight graves," she said. "Too many to call this a victory."
—*The Theriad*

name: Doublecast
text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: First the insult, then the encore.

name: Flames of the Raze-Boar
text: Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Then Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 2 damage to each other creature that player controls if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: "Fire will cure a multitude of ills."

name: Flurry of Horns
text: Create two 2/3 red Minotaur creature tokens with haste.
flavor: A minotaur does not distinguish between human, satyr, and triton. They are all meat.

name: Goblin Commando
text: When Goblin Commando enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor: With a commando around, somebody's gonna get hurt.

name: Goblin Instigator
text: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavor: "We can take 'em. You go first!"

name: Goblin Shortcutter
text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: "I'm not running away! I'm figuring out the best routes."

name: Heartfire
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.

name: Lightning Diadem
text:
Enchant creature
When Lightning Diadem enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor: "I fight for Keranos and for mortals. I see no contradiction."

name: Magma Jet
text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.
flavor: Some Akroans make the dangerous pilgrimage to the volcanic temples of Purphoros, where oracles known as flamespeakers glean omens from lava.

name: Minotaur Skullcleaver
text:
Haste
When Minotaur Skullcleaver enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Their only dreams are of full stomachs."
—Kleon the Iron-Booted

name: Molten Ravager
text: {R}: Molten Ravager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Only the foolhardy would venture into the Akoum Mountains without a lullmage to tame the raging rocks and living fires."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Pyroclastic Elemental
text: {1}{R}{R}: Pyroclastic Elemental deals 1 damage to target player.
flavor:
"Whoever thought of making mobile volcanoes was a genius."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Rageblood Shaman
text:
Trample
Other Minotaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.
flavor:
"I see a spark of pure rage. Soon that spark will spread from the depths of Kragma. Soon its fire will engulf the polis."
—Hira, street oracle

name: Tibalt's Rager
text:
When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Find out whose that is. I like its energy."
—Judith

name: Awakener Druid
text: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.
flavor: The druids of Mazar treat each seedcone with respect for the warrior it will become.

name: Drover of the Mighty
text:
Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "I do not lead. They do not follow. We walk together."

name: Elemental Uprising
text: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor:
"My heart and Zendikar's beat as one. Together we will endure."
—Nissa Revane

name: Feral Invocation
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.

name: Orazca Frillback
flavor: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.

name: Rumbling Baloth
flavor: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

name: Silhana Wayfinder
text: When Silhana Wayfinder enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: "Stay close! It's just a little farther."

name: Sylvan Brushstrider
text: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor: The mournful lowing of brushstriders warns of changing weather and ill winds.

name: Wall of Vines
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

name: Phyrexian Tower
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {B}{B}.
flavor:
"Yawgmoth is dead, and his citadels lie empty. But there will always be some who seek power at any price."
—Karn

name: Aegis of the Gods
text: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: Athreos cares little for the other gods' conflict with mortals. He is concerned only with safe passage for the dead.

name: Akroan Mastiff
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: Even when many of the soldiers who guarded Akros were called away, its safety was never in doubt.

name: Dawnbringer Charioteers
text:
Flying, lifelink
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Dawnbringer Charioteers, put a +1/+1 counter on Dawnbringer Charioteers.
flavor: "Nyx may belong to the gods, but the skies of Theros are ours."

name: Deicide
text: Exile target enchantment. If the exiled card is a God card, search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
flavor:
"It is done."
—Elspeth

name: Eagle of the Watch
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor:
"Even from miles away, I could see our eagles circling. That's when I gave the command to pick up the pace. I knew we were needed at home."
—Kanlos, Akroan captain

name: Font of Vigor
text: {2}{W}, Sacrifice Font of Vigor: You gain 7 life.
flavor: Drink deep, and be restored.

name: Harvestguard Alseids
text: Constellation — Whenever Harvestguard Alseids or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor: Not all shields are forged of iron or bronze.

name: Lagonna-Band Trailblazer
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Lagonna-Band Trailblazer, put a +1/+1 counter on Lagonna-Band Trailblazer.
flavor: Go forth with honor, return with glory.

name: Leonin Iconoclast
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Leonin Iconoclast, destroy target enchantment creature an opponent controls.
flavor: "The stars belong in the night sky. This is our world, and we are our own masters."

name: Oreskos Swiftclaw
flavor:
After the Battle of Pharagax Bridge, the Champion spent many months among the leonin of Oreskos. She found that they were quick to take offense, not because they were thin-skinned, but because they were always eager for a fight.
—*The Theriad*

name: Skyspear Cavalry
text:
Flying
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor: Pray her spear reaches you first. Her griffin is less kind.

name: Stonewise Fortifier
text: {4}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Stonewise Fortifier by target creature this turn.
flavor: Ephara taught some mortals to feel every vein in marble as though it flows with their own blood.

name: Supply-Line Cranes
text:
Flying
When Supply-Line Cranes enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: They are trained from hatching to deliver aid where it is needed most.

name: Tethmos High Priest
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tethmos High Priest, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Death is tyranny. Like all tyranny, it must be opposed."

name: Countermand
text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills four cards.
flavor: The physical pain was nothing compared to the agony in his mind.

name: Dakra Mystic
text: {U}, {T}: Each player reveals the top card of their library. You may put the revealed cards into their owners' graveyards. If you don't, each player draws a card.
flavor: Choices are rarely as simple as they seem.

name: Daring Thief
text: Inspired — Whenever Daring Thief becomes untapped, you may exchange control of target nonland permanent you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares a card type with it.
flavor: Honesty is the first casualty of war.

name: Font of Fortunes
text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Font of Fortunes: Draw two cards.
flavor: Drink deep, and your thoughts will flow freely.

name: Godhunter Octopus
text: Godhunter Octopus can't attack unless defending player controls an enchantment or an enchanted permanent.
flavor:
"I will match Thassa drop for drop and show a god what true power is."
—Kiora

name: Hubris
text: Return target creature and all Auras attached to it to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"You wish to learn of Nyx? Very well."
—Phenax, god of deception

name: Pin to the Earth
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.
flavor:
"Mortal strength, like mortal hope, is so easily crushed."
—Thassa, god of the sea

name: Pull from the Deep
text: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Pull from the Deep.
flavor: Ideas, not stones, form the true foundation of Meletis.

name: Riptide Chimera
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"I want one."
—Kiora

name: Rise of Eagles
text: Create two 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature tokens with flying. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: An offering to the sea brings an insight from the stars.

name: Thassa's Devourer
text: Constellation — Whenever Thassa's Devourer or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
flavor: When mortals claim there are places Thassa cannot reach, the sea god laughs.

name: Thassa's Ire
text: {3}{U}: You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor: The sailor had never seen a god before. Now she had gazed upon Thassa. Shortly she would see Athreos, and then she would meet Erebos.

name: Triton Cavalry
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Cavalry, you may return target enchantment to its owner's hand.
flavor: The tritons broke the surface, and the Nyxborn broke ranks.

name: War-Wing Siren
text:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets War-Wing Siren, put a +1/+1 counter on War-Wing Siren.
flavor: Once she sang sailors to their doom. Now she leads them to glory.

name: Agent of Erebos
text: Constellation — Whenever Agent of Erebos or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile target player's graveyard.
flavor: Erebos's minions hunt the Returned and warn those who consider the same folly.

name: Aspect of Gorgon
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
"My adopted children are loved no less."
—Pharika, god of affliction

name: Cast into Darkness
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0 and can't block.
flavor: In desperation the soldier prayed to Phenax, begging for the power to cheat the gorgon's gaze.

name: Dictate of Erebos
text:
Flash
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "I take no pleasure in your suffering, but it is necessary. Once you accept your fate you'll find eternity more tolerable."

name: Extinguish All Hope
text: Destroy all nonenchantment creatures.
flavor: Phenax offers the hope of life, while Pharika grants the solace of death. Between them stands Erebos, who promises nothing but eternity.

name: Feast of Dreams
text: Destroy target enchanted creature or enchantment creature.
flavor: "We gave the gods the power to war against us. It is time we took that power back."

name: Felhide Petrifier
text:
Deathtouch
Other Minotaur creatures you control have deathtouch.
flavor: It's common practice among minotaurs to collect the heads of their victims as trophies. Sometimes the trophies prove more than ornamental.

name: Font of Return
text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice Font of Return: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Drink deep, and death will recoil from you.

name: Grim Guardian
text: Constellation — Whenever Grim Guardian or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor: Occasionally the living wander to the Rivers, but the wardens of Athreos ensure that only the dead pass.

name: Master of the Feast
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent draws a card.
flavor: Any pleasure, when taken to excess, becomes torment. It's a formula that demons have perfected.

name: Nightmarish End
text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor:
"To think some believe it peaceful to die in one's sleep."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

name: Nyx Infusion
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's an enchantment. Otherwise, it gets -2/-2.
flavor: A balm or a poison depending on how it is administered, and to whom.

name: Pharika's Chosen
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: The serpents' dens built into statues of Pharika serve not only to consecrate her temples, but as a hidden line of defense.

name: Ritual of the Returned
text: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a black Zombie creature token. Its power is equal to that card's power and its toughness is equal to that card's toughness.
flavor: A mask forged to avenge a death forgotten.

name: Rotted Hulk
flavor:
The hulk rose from the sea and loomed over the Champion. Pinned beneath the twisting, rotted planks of wood was the body of Kaliaros, the helmsman of her former crew, and beside him the captain, Photine.
—*The Theriad*

name: Spiteful Blow
text: Destroy target creature and target land.
flavor:
"Only a fool takes Phenax at his word. What do you expect from a god born of lies and betrayal?"
—Verenes, priest of Iroas

name: Thoughtrender Lamia
text: Constellation — Whenever Thoughtrender Lamia or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent discards a card.
flavor: Some predators can sense fear in their prey, but the lamia is drawn to madness.

name: Tormented Thoughts
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor:
"Not all nightmares can be escaped by waking."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

name: Worst Fears
text: You control target player during that player's next turn. Exile Worst Fears. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)
flavor: Elspeth feared that her trespass into Nyx would not go unanswered.

name: Akroan Line Breaker
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Line Breaker, Akroan Line Breaker gets +2/+0 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor: The enemies' shields are the first to shatter, and their battle line is never far behind.

name: Bearer of the Heavens
text: When Bearer of the Heavens dies, destroy all permanents at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: To hold the heavens from the earth is no curse, but a titanic responsibility.

name: Bladetusk Boar
text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor: Deathbellow Canyon is home to minotaurs and many other creatures that share a love for the taste of human flesh.

name: Cyclops of Eternal Fury
text: Creatures you control have haste.
flavor:
"The anger that festers inside this one is contagious."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: Dictate of the Twin Gods
text:
Flash
If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor: Iroas and Mogis are as different in appearance as they are in personality.

name: Font of Ire
text: {3}{R}, Sacrifice Font of Ire: It deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Drink deep, and find your vengeance fulfilled.

name: Forgeborn Oreads
text: Constellation — Whenever Forgeborn Oreads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Forgeborn Oreads deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: Purphoros shaped the oreads out of stray coals from his forge.

name: Gluttonous Cyclops
text: {5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor: The cyclops had learned to never eat a shepherd. Instead he gently flung the "pit" aside to grow a new flock.

name: Knowledge and Power
text: Whenever you scry, you may pay {2}. If you do, Knowledge and Power deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Information is a powerful weapon."
—Cymede, queen of Akros

name: Pensive Minotaur
flavor:
The Champion and her companions marched through the night, but the battle was over before they arrived. In the middle of the carnage sat a solitary minotaur, lost in what seemed to the Champion to be thought.
—*The Theriad*

name: Prophetic Flamespeaker
text:
Double strike, trample
Whenever Prophetic Flamespeaker deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
flavor: Fire to destroy. Fire to create.

name: Rollick of Abandon
text: All creatures get +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Embrace every moment, for it could be your last."
—Xenagos, god of revels

name: Satyr Hoplite
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Satyr Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Satyr Hoplite.
flavor: "Xenagos has become what he once despised: a tyrant and an oppressor."

name: Sigiled Skink
text: Whenever Sigiled Skink attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: The runes seem to come alive as it moves, rippling like slow flames across its scales.

name: Spawn of Thraxes
text:
Flying
When Spawn of Thraxes enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: Sparks from Purphoros's forge fill the belly of every dragon.

name: Starfall
text: Starfall deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature is an enchantment, Starfall deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor:
"The most brilliant stars are not born of Nyx."
—Rhexenor, Akroan flamespeaker

name: Bassara Tower Archer
text: Hexproof, reach
flavor: Setessan warriors of Bassara Tower are known for their guerrilla tactics and skill with the bow. Interlopers into the Nessian Wood do not get far.

name: Desecration Plague
text: Destroy target enchantment or land.
flavor:
"The gods think of us as insects. Perhaps there is wisdom in that."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Dictate of Karametra
text:
Flash
Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.
flavor: "I refuse to let the folly of mortals endanger the home I made for them."

name: Golden Hind
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor:
"It is not yours to hunt, mortal. Be content with its beauty alone."
—Nylea, god of the hunt

name: Goldenhide Ox
text: Constellation — Whenever Goldenhide Ox or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor: The temptation to take the ox's golden hide is as irresistible as it is fatal.

name: Humbler of Mortals
text: Constellation — Whenever Humbler of Mortals or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: The anger of the gods multiplied in Nyx, and the land awoke in dark echoes of their rage.

name: Market Festival
text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional two mana in any combination of colors.
flavor: Commerce is always the basis for peace.

name: Nature's Panoply
text:
Strive — This spell costs {2}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose any number of target creatures. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.
flavor: Nature protects its own.

name: Oakheart Dryads
text: Constellation — Whenever Oakheart Dryads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I do not know if the forest was different after they passed. But I know I was."
—Ianthe, Setessan hunter

name: Pheres-Band Thunderhoof
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Pheres-Band Thunderhoof, put two +1/+1 counters on Pheres-Band Thunderhoof.
flavor: "Flesh and bone or star and shadow. It makes no difference to my club."

name: Pheres-Band Warchief
text:
Vigilance, trample
Other Centaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance and trample.
flavor: The renowned warchiefs of Pheres Band fight with the might of minotaurs and the sagacity of sphinxes.

name: Renowned Weaver
text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Renowned Weaver: Create a 1/3 green Spider enchantment creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "You think your weaving as beautiful as mine? Let me show you the true meaning of the craft."

name: Reviving Melody
text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Listen to my song, and you need never forge a golden mask to return to me."

name: Satyr Grovedancer
text: When Satyr Grovedancer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "Some of my kin dance for themselves, without greater purpose. Nylea gives me purpose, and with it strength."

name: Battlewise Aven
text:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
flavor: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.

name: Border Patrol
text: Vigilance
flavor:
"We have been victims of treachery, of the Cabal, and of our own ambitions. No more."
—Commander Eesha

name: Cagemail
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.
flavor:
"Power often costs too high a price."
—Commander Eesha

name: Commander Eesha
text: Flying, protection from creatures
flavor: "War glides on the simplest updrafts while peace struggles against hurricane winds. It is the way of the world. It must change."

name: Funeral Pyre
text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Its owner creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor:
"Raze the body. Raise the soul."
—Mystic elder

name: Golden Wish
text: You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Golden Wish.
flavor: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.

name: Lead Astray
text: Tap up to two target creatures.
flavor:
"Never underestimate our enemy's strength, brutality, . . . or stupidity."
—Commander Eesha

name: Pulsemage Advocate
text: {T}: Return three target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Our unity revives our hopes."

name: Shieldmage Advocate
text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice.
flavor: "Our unity conquers all fears."

name: Silver Seraph
text:
Flying
Threshold — Other creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.

name: Trained Pronghorn
text: Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.
flavor:
"The desert asked the Ancestor for children, and the antelope were born."
—Nomad myth

name: Valor
text:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
flavor:
"The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."
—*Scroll of Beginnings*

name: Aven Fogbringer
text:
Flying
When Aven Fogbringer enters the battlefield, return target land to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I cover the land with blankets and it sleeps."

name: Cephalid Inkshrouder
text: Discard a card: Cephalid Inkshrouder gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: Cephalids shrink from the harsh glare of scrutiny.

name: Defy Gravity
text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Magical or not, it's still a cloud.

name: Envelop
text: Counter target sorcery spell.
flavor:
"What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Grip of Amnesia
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from their graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Would you abandon your past to save your future?"
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Hapless Researcher
text: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.

name: Laquatus's Disdain
text:
Counter target spell cast from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."

name: Mental Note
text:
Mill two cards.
Draw a card.
flavor: Some minds are more open than others.

name: Telekinetic Bonds
text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor:
"Nature's been fired. The oceans are under new management."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Web of Inertia
text: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, that player may exile a card from their graveyard. If the player doesn't, creatures they control can't attack you this turn.
flavor: Cephalids specialize in lose-lose situations.

name: Wormfang Newt
text:
When Wormfang Newt enters the battlefield, exile a land you control.
When Wormfang Newt leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.

name: Wormfang Turtle
text:
When Wormfang Turtle enters the battlefield, exile a land you control.
When Wormfang Turtle leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor: Chainer's admirers keep his dreams alive.

name: Balthor the Defiled
text:
Minion creatures get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: He remembers enough of his life to weep for what he has lost.

name: Cabal Trainee
text: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck!"
—Cabal instructor

name: Death Wish
text: You may put a card you own from outside the game into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Exile Death Wish.
flavor: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.

name: Earsplitting Rats
text:
When Earsplitting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
Discard a card: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.
flavor: Rats come in one amount: too many.

name: Filth
text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.
flavor:
"As the portal closed, Filth oozed through. The stench of evil followed it in."
—*Scroll of Beginnings*

name: Grave Consequences
text:
Each player may exile any number of cards from their graveyard. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in their graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"You call *that* a nightmare?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Morality Shift
text: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: The mind sings, though at times it sings a dirge.

name: Rats' Feast
text: Exile X target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor:
"That does it—I quit!"
—Cabal grave robber

name: Barbarian Bully
text: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to them. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: "Out of my way!"

name: Book Burning
text: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, target player mills six cards.
flavor: The wizard's spellbook was full of burning questions.

name: Dwarven Bloodboiler
text: Tap an untapped Dwarf you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: His battle cry unleashes an avalanche of dwarves.

name: Dwarven Driller
text: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to them.
flavor:
"Drill the planet, it's no trouble: Mining granite, making rubble."
—Dwarven drilling song

name: Dwarven Scorcher
text: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to them.
flavor: Barbarians invented the blaze of glory. Dwarves perfected it.

name: Ember Shot
text:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to any target.
Draw a card.
flavor: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.

name: Flaring Pain
text:
Damage can't be prevented this turn.
Flashback {R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor:
"I don't rub salt in wounds. I use sulfur."
—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Goretusk Firebeast
text: When Goretusk Firebeast enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: As a youth, Kamahl took one for a pet. His hair has yet to grow back.

name: Jeska, Warrior Adept
text:
First strike, haste
{T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: "My brother and I both come from Balthor's forge. Kamahl has a temper of fire. I have a temper of steel."

name: Liberated Dwarf
text: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: Freed from their chains, these dwarves are bound only by honor.

name: Spellgorger Barbarian
text:
When Spellgorger Barbarian enters the battlefield, discard a card at random.
When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: The epidemic insanity had a lasting effect on certain barbarians—but no one noticed.

name: Swelter
text: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.
flavor: No circle has a beginning, but many have foreseeable ends.

name: Swirling Sandstorm
text: Threshold — Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: As dust swept out, vultures swept in.

name: Anurid Barkripper
text: Threshold — Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: When it croaks, so do you.

name: Anurid Swarmsnapper
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor: Anurids have the problem of airborne invaders licked.

name: Epic Struggle
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.
flavor:
"If our foes will not listen to words, perhaps hooves and claws will make them take notice."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Erhnam Djinn
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: He provides a safe path to nowhere.

name: Exoskeletal Armor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor:
"We use only what we need—but in times of strife, our need becomes great."
—Centaur warrior

name: Forcemage Advocate
text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "Our unity renews our strength."

name: Giant Warthog
text: Trample
flavor:
"When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs."
—Nomad myth

name: Harvester Druid
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.
flavor: "In the end, the same soil lies atop the field, within the mountain, and under the sea."

name: Krosan Wayfarer
text: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor:
"The Krosan Forest lives, and druids are its seeds."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Nantuko Tracer
text: When Nantuko Tracer enters the battlefield, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor:
Your past is a map to where you will go.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Nullmage Advocate
text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Our unity unmasks your deceit."

name: Seedtime
text:
Cast this spell only during your turn.
Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent cast a blue spell this turn.
flavor:
The hippo grows wings to fight the condor.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Serene Sunset
text: Prevent all combat damage X target creatures would deal this turn.
flavor: The armies paused, silent, as the warriors reflected on the sunsets of their youth.

name: Sudden Strength
text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest—and its inhabitants.

name: Thriss, Nantuko Primus
text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
flavor: "When you live for others, you live for yourself."

name: Tunneler Wurm
text: Discard a card: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.
flavor: If an anurid's lucky, it'll find a warm tunnel for bedtime. If a wurm's lucky, it'll find a warm anurid for breakfast.

name: Venomous Vines
text: Destroy target enchanted permanent.
flavor:
"True strength comes from within. The false promise of unnatural power only incurs Krosa's wrath."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Pact of the Serpent
text: Choose a creature type. Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of creatures they control of the chosen type.
flavor: "Our quarrels behind us. Our foes before us. Death or triumph for us all!"

name: Ruthless Winnower
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Elf creature.
flavor: "I count the usurpers with my dagger, one death blow at a time."

name: Serpent's Soul-Jar
text:
Whenever an Elf you control dies, exile it.
{T}, Pay 2 life: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with Serpent's Soul-Jar.
flavor: The coils spiral like time itself, carrying spirits back around from death to reawakening.

name: Bounty of Skemfar
text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and an Elf card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: Even war cannot dull Skemfar's beauty.

name: Crown of Skemfar
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Elf you control and has reach.
{2}{G}: Return Crown of Skemfar from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Lathril, queen of the ancient Eimir, left a powerful legacy for her mortal descendants.

name: Banishing Light
text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.
flavor:
The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand.
—*The Theriad*

name: Prowess of the Fair
text: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor: An elvish duel is a thing of beauty: the warriors' grace, the crash of steel, then the artful spray of blood.

name: Nullmage Shepherd
text: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: The Skelle spent days carving runes and erecting their scorn poles. The herd crushed them to splinters in seconds.

name: Springbloom Druid
text: When Springbloom Druid enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: "New growth applies a healing poultice to wounds long scabbed over."

name: Wirewood Channeler
text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."

name: Axgard Braggart
text: Boast — {1}{W}: Untap Axgard Braggart. Put a +1/+1 counter on it. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor: "Heavy? Ha! The Trollking of Mossrun was heavy, and I tossed him five miles!"

name: Battershield Warrior
text: Boast — {1}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor: "I need no axe to best these weaklings."

name: Battlefield Raptor
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: It wheeled upward, away from the shrieks and thunder. It reached the point where sky met smoke, and, but with a glance at the horizon, aimed itself and dove.

name: Beskir Shieldmate
text: When Beskir Shieldmate dies, create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token.
flavor: "If we fall today, let us fall with honor, defending our realm from the horrors that would defile it. Forward, shieldmates! To Starnheim!"

name: Bound in Gold
text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
flavor:
"Trespassers will be smelted."
—Axgard inscription

name: Clarion Spirit
text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: To the living, the horn sounds faint and mournful, but to the spirits of Istfell, it is a thunderous call that must be obeyed.

name: Codespell Cleric
text:
Vigilance
When Codespell Cleric enters the battlefield, if it was the second spell you cast this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "Today we are not Beskir or Tuskeri. We must fight as one clan, shoulder to shoulder, to defend our rightful home!"

name: Divine Gambit
text: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: There are rules, and then there are gods.

name: Doomskar
text:
Destroy all creatures.
Foretell {1}{W}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: The realms crashed together, with Bretagard at the center of the calamity.

name: Doomskar Oracle
text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you gain 2 life.
Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: "Giants and monsters loom on the horizon, and the elves plan to murder our gods!"

name: Gods' Hall Guardian
text:
Vigilance
Foretell {3}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: Not a single rat has been seen in Istfell since the gods moved in.

name: Goldmaw Champion
text: Boast — {1}{W}: Tap target creature. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor: "That was nothing. I once took down a frost giant with a spoon!"

name: Halvar, God of Battle // Sword of the Realms
flavor: It cuts through the Cosmos itself, carving new Omenpaths between the realms.

name: Iron Verdict
text:
Iron Verdict deals 5 damage to target tapped creature.
Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: "You'll raid nothing but mist in Istfell."

name: Kaya's Onslaught
text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.
Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: "Your trail ends here."

name: Master Skald
text: When Master Skald enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "All my scars have stories to tell."

name: Rally the Ranks
text:
As Rally the Ranks enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
flavor: Halvar united the spirits of all the clans into a single, devastating force.

name: Revitalize
text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor: Esika alone knows how to distill the essence of the World Tree into the Cosmos Elixir, a magical substance which grants the Skoti god-family immortality.

name: Sigrid, God-Favored
text:
Flash
First strike, protection from God creatures
When Sigrid, God-Favored enters the battlefield, exile up to one target attacking or blocking creature until Sigrid leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Never alone, never afraid.

name: Starnheim Courser
text:
Flying
Artifact and enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: Every worthy warrior who arrives in Starnheim is gifted a mount befitting their heroism, a mighty pegasus raised and trained by the valkyries.

name: Story Seeker
text: Lifelink
flavor: Dwarven skalds are the most renowned storytellers in all of Kaldheim. They travel across the realms, seeking out heroic deeds and chronicling them in epic sagas.

name: Usher of the Fallen
text: Boast — {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor: "I have led ten thousand through these mists and never lost the way."

name: Valor of the Worthy
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: "If I am to die, let it be a hero's death!"

name: Warhorn Blast
text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Foretell {2}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: "Mead down! Swords up!"

name: Wings of the Cosmos
text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor: The wolf's startled yelp changed quickly to a howl of elation as she soared over her envious packmates.

name: Alrund, God of the Cosmos // Hakka, Whispering Raven
text:
Flying
Whenever Hakka, Whispering Raven deals combat damage to a player, return it to its owner's hand, then scry 2.
flavor: Alrund's raven soars between realms; no secret is beyond his grasp.

name: Annul
text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
flavor:
"Many giants have tried to crush me with their hammers. You'll never stop me with that little toy."
—Stigur of the Omenseekers

name: Augury Raven
text:
Flying
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: Some ravens collect shiny baubles; others hoard omens and secrets.

name: Behold the Multiverse
text:
Scry 2, then draw two cards.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: Countless worlds unfolded before Niko, every one in need of heroes.

name: Bind the Monster
text:
Enchant creature
When Bind the Monster enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. It deals damage to you equal to its power.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: Sarulf's snarl of rage shook the World Tree.

name: Brinebarrow Intruder
text:
Flash
When Brinebarrow Intruder enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: Locked in the ice of Karfell, the treasures of ancient nobles await in ruins guarded by the dead.

name: Cyclone Summoner
text: When Cyclone Summoner enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, return all permanents to their owners' hands except for Giants, Wizards, and lands.
flavor: Frost giants study for centuries in isolation, honing their ability to harness elemental mayhem.

name: Depart the Realm
text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: "My home calls to me, I must go."

name: Draugr Thought-Thief
text: When Draugr Thought-Thief enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.
flavor: The worst part is that you won't even remember how much he's taken from you.

name: Frost Augur
text: {S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a snow card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor: From the barest crack in the ice, she teases forth a swirling, living map of the Cosmos.

name: Graven Lore
text: Scry X, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell, then draw three cards. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)
flavor: The runes glow beneath the snow, bearing memories of a time when the old gods ruled the realms.

name: Inga Rune-Eyes
text:
When Inga Rune-Eyes enters the battlefield, scry 3.
When Inga Rune-Eyes dies, draw three cards if three or more creatures died this turn.
flavor: Each path ever charted by an Omenseeker is etched into her eyes.

name: Karfell Harbinger
text: {T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to foretell a card from your hand or cast an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor: "This is a realm of the living. King Narfi's legion is coming to change that."

name: Mists of Littjara
text:
Flash
Enchant creature or Vehicle
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor: The Skelle raiders boasted that nothing could stop them, certainly not a bit of fog.

name: Run Ashore
text:
Choose one or both —
• The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Which one of you slug-brained milksops forgot to make an offering to Cosima?"
—Jolkur, navigator

name: Saw It Coming
text:
Counter target spell.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor: "How predictable."

name: Bloodsky Berserker
text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put two +1/+1 counters on Bloodsky Berserker. It gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: "Who's next?!"

name: Deathknell Berserker
