When Chasm Skulker dies, create X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Chasm Skulker. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor: Designed by Mike Neumann

name: Chronostutter
text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
flavor: Timing is everything.

name: Diffusion Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor:
"The hive shimmered, and its walls seemed a living mirror."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Kapsho Kitefins
text:
Flying
Whenever Kapsho Kitefins or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor:
"It's a truly disconcerting sight to see their shadows cast upon the deck."
—Captain Triff

name: Master of Predicaments
text:
Flying
Whenever Master of Predicaments deals combat damage to a player, choose a card in your hand. That player guesses whether the card's mana value is greater than 4. If the player guessed wrong, you may cast the card without paying its mana cost.
flavor: Designed by David Sirlin

name: Mercurial Pretender
text: You may have Mercurial Pretender enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control, except it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand."
flavor: The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.

name: Research Assistant
text: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: There are many words and phrases that can cause an experienced wizard to tremble in fear. Chief among them is "oops."

name: Statute of Denial
text: Counter target spell. If you control a blue creature, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: "Pyrotechnic activity of any sort is strictly prohibited. It is irrelevant that today is a holiday."

name: Void Snare
text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"I've tried so many variations on how to get rid of annoying things that it's hard to decide which one I like best."
—Ashurel, voidmage

name: Carrion Crow
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Carrion Crow enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: When carrion feeds on carrion, dark days approach.

name: Flesh to Dust
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"Pain is temporary. So is life."
—Liliana Vess

name: Leeching Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life.
flavor:
"Seeing one slowly devour one of my party begged the question—do they know what cruelty is?"
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Necrogen Scudder
text:
Flying
When Necrogen Scudder enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor: Contrary to popular belief, it's kept aloft by necrogen gas, not the screaming agony of a thousand murdered souls.

name: Necromancer's Assistant
text: When Necromancer's Assistant enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
flavor: Zombies and necromancers agree: easy access to brains is preferred.

name: Ob Nixilis, Unshackled
text:
Flying, trample
Whenever an opponent searches their library, that player sacrifices a creature and loses 10 life.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Ob Nixilis, Unshackled.
flavor: Designed by Brad Muir

name: Shadowcloak Vampire
text: Pay 2 life: Shadowcloak Vampire gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: "My favorite guilty pleasure? Are there innocent ones?"

name: Unmake the Graves
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "I'm raising an army. Any volunteers?"

name: Witch's Familiar
flavor: Some bog witches practice the strange art of batrachomancy, reading portents in the number, size, and color of warts on a toad's hide.

name: Xathrid Slyblade
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{3}{B}: Until end of turn, Xathrid Slyblade loses hexproof and gains first strike and deathtouch. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Designed by Rob Pardo

name: Zof Shade
text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Shades are drawn to places of power, often rooting themselves in a single area to feed.

name: Aggressive Mining
text:
You can't play lands.
Sacrifice a land: Draw two cards. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: Designed by Markus Persson

name: Belligerent Sliver
text: Sliver creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"The slivers became adept at provoking a fear response in other species."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Blastfire Bolt
text: Blastfire Bolt deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
flavor:
"Encase yourself in the most elaborate armor, and cower behind the heaviest shield. I would hate for you to feel helpless."
—Korig the Ruiner

name: Brood Keeper
text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Brood Keeper, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: "Come, little one. Unfurl your wings, fill your lungs, and release your first fiery breath."

name: Goblin Kaboomist
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a colorless artifact token named Land Mine with "{R}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 2 damage to target attacking creature without flying." Then flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Goblin Kaboomist deals 2 damage to itself.
flavor: Designed by Stone Librande

name: Goblin Roughrider
flavor: Astride the bucking creature, Gribble hurtled down the mountainside while his Grotag brethren cheered. It was at that moment that the legend of the Skrill Tamer was born.

name: Inferno Fist
text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
{R}, Sacrifice Inferno Fist: Inferno Fist deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: "I've never been above throwing the first punch."

name: Krenko's Enforcer
text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor: He just likes to break legs. Collecting the debt is a bonus.

name: Kurkesh, Onakke Ancient
text: Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {R}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: The Onakke were masters of dark arts and artifice. Their creations continue to spread foul magic, paving the way for their return.

name: Might Makes Right
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control each creature on the battlefield with the greatest power, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor: An oath of fealty sworn with a handshake.

name: Miner's Bane
text: {2}{R}: Miner's Bane gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: There are certain stones even dwarves know to leave in the earth.

name: Scrapyard Mongrel
text: As long as you control an artifact, Scrapyard Mongrel gets +2/+0 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: Trespassers are welcome to try.

name: Carnivorous Moss-Beast
text: {5}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carnivorous Moss-Beast.
flavor: Ranger wisdom dictates that when fleeing from a moss-beast, you must stay calm, find your bearings, and run south.

name: Feral Incarnation
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create three 3/3 green Beast creature tokens.
flavor: Nature is itself wild—in all its forms.

name: Genesis Hydra
text:
When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library.
Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: Designed by George Fan

name: Hunter's Ambush
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by nongreen creatures this turn.
flavor: First you lose your enemy's trail. Then you lose all sense of direction. Then you hear the growls . . .

name: Invasive Species
text: When Invasive Species enters the battlefield, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: It's easier to relocate a village that lies in their path than to turn the bugs aside.

name: Life's Legacy
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor: At the instant of death, the mystery of life.

name: Overwhelm
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: The Conclave acts with a single will, expressed by countless warriors.

name: Phytotitan
text: When Phytotitan dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of their next upkeep.
flavor: Its root system spans the entire floor of the jungle, making eradication impossible.

name: Shaman of Spring
text: When Shaman of Spring enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Some shamanic sects advocate the different seasons, each working to preserve nature's cycles.

name: Undergrowth Scavenger
text: Undergrowth Scavenger enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor: It sees a rotting carcass as a good wine which has been aged properly.

name: Venom Sliver
text: Sliver creatures you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
"We attacked with arrows dipped in poison. The slivers that did not die began to change."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Vineweft
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{4}{G}: Return Vineweft from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Fortified by the wilds.

name: Wall of Mulch
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.
flavor: Mulch is the fabric of life in the forest. Plants live in it, they die in it, and then they become part of it, feeding countless generations to come.

name: Yisan, the Wanderer Bard
text: {2}{G}, {T}, Put a verse counter on Yisan, the Wanderer Bard: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to the number of verse counters on Yisan, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: Designed by Brian Fargo

name: Terra Stomper
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: Its footfalls cause violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms.

name: Ajani's Welcome
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "You cannot defend others if your own well-being is neglected."

name: Dwarven Priest
text: When Dwarven Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor: "These storied halls are under my protection."

name: Herald of Faith
text:
Flying
Whenever Herald of Faith attacks, you gain 2 life.
flavor: The clerics prayed for salvation. The soldiers prayed for victory. Both prayers were answered.

name: Hieromancer's Cage
text: When Hieromancer's Cage enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Hieromancer's Cage leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Law protects but also contains.

name: Isolate
text: Exile target permanent with mana value 1.
flavor: Threefold were his crimes, doubled were his pleas, singular was his fate.

name: Knight's Pledge
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor: "As long as my faith persists, so shall I."

name: Leonin Vanguard
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, Leonin Vanguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.
flavor: The best fighters are skilled in both harming and healing.

name: Loxodon Line Breaker
flavor: Loxodons are firm in stature and spirit. No matter the odds, they are always first into battle.

name: Novice Knight
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
As long as Novice Knight is enchanted or equipped, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor: Even the greatest hero begins with nothing.

name: Remorseful Cleric
text:
Flying
Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile target player's graveyard.
flavor: A lifetime of keeping up appearances is not enough to earn an eternity of rest.

name: Rustwing Falcon
text: Flying
flavor: Native to wide prairies and scrublands, falcons occasionally roost in dragon skeletons.

name: Shield Mare
text:
Shield Mare can't be blocked by red creatures.
When Shield Mare enters the battlefield or becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you gain 3 life.
flavor: When it passes, order defeats chaos.

name: Star-Crowned Stag
text: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor: White as starlight on snow, it appears only on the eve of the winter solstice.

name: Valiant Knight
text:
Other Knights you control get +1/+1.
{3}{W}{W}: Knights you control gain double strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Defeat is no reason for retreat. It is a sign we must redouble our efforts to win this fight."

name: Aether Tunnel
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
flavor: If you can't find a doorway, make one.

name: Dwindle
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.
When enchanted creature blocks, destroy it. (The attacking creature remains blocked.)
flavor: The collection didn't have room to expand, so the wizard improvised a solution.

name: Frilled Sea Serpent
text: {5}{U}{U}: Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavor:
"Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"
—Gertrude, deep-sea angler

name: Mistcaller
text: Sacrifice Mistcaller: Until end of turn, if a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
flavor: Hospitality is of little concern to those who do not wish to be disturbed.

name: Patient Rebuilding
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent mills three cards, then you draw a card for each land card put into their graveyard this way.
flavor: Nicol Bolas would not rest until he was restored to his former glory.

name: Psychic Corrosion
text: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent mills two cards.
flavor:
"To break another's mind is to deliver a fate worse than death. It is a terrifying power."
—Jace Beleren

name: Supreme Phantom
text:
Flying
Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.
flavor: A king's knowledge does not vanish when the heart stops beating.

name: Surge Mare
text:
Surge Mare can't be blocked by green creatures.
Whenever Surge Mare deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
{1}{U}: Surge Mare gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: When it passes, waves touch the sky.

name: Uncomfortable Chill
text:
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The cold slowed their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.

name: Abnormal Endurance
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor: Tenacity prevails when hopes die.

name: Bogstomper
flavor:
"They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."
—Vivien Reid

name: Bone Dragon
text:
Flying
{3}{B}{B}, Exile seven other cards from your graveyard: Return Bone Dragon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Its roar is the clatter of a thousand bones.

name: Fraying Omnipotence
text: Each player loses half their life, then discards half the cards in their hand, then sacrifices half the creatures they control. Round up each time.
flavor: The Great Mending that healed the Multiverse also unraveled the threads of Nicol Bolas's power.

name: Graveyard Marshal
text: {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor:
"Rise and shine, my dears. We have work to do."
—Isareth the Awakener

name: Hired Blade
text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."

name: Infernal Reckoning
text: Exile target colorless creature. You gain life equal to its power.
flavor: "When these intruders are gone, Zendikar will be my throne, my palace, my playground."

name: Infernal Scarring
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavor: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

name: Lich's Caress
text: Destroy target creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.

name: Liliana's Contract
text:
When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.
flavor: Immortality is worth any price.

name: Nightmare's Thirst
text: You gain 1 life. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
flavor: That feeling of something on your chest is usually sleep paralysis. Occasionally, it's something else.

name: Open the Graves
text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

name: Plague Mare
text:
Plague Mare can't be blocked by white creatures.
When Plague Mare enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: When it passes, those who sleep dream of sickness and death.

name: Ravenous Harpy
text:
Flying
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Harpy.
flavor: A harpy's hoard is a filthy, bloodstained pile of trinkets and corpses.

name: Skymarch Bloodletter
text:
Flying
When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

name: Sovereign's Bite
text: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
flavor:
"You have given all to your kingdom, dear knight. Serenity shall be your prize."
—Queen Lian

name: Two-Headed Zombie
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"Thread the torsos together with angel hair to ensure they will cooperate in battle."
—*The Stitcher's Tome*

name: Alpine Moon
text:
As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name.
Lands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor:
"A rare and fascinating phenomenon."
—Tamiyo

name: Dismissive Pyromancer
text:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Dismissive Pyromancer: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor: "Burn. Burn. Keep. Burn."

name: Fiery Finish
text: Fiery Finish deals 7 damage to target creature.
flavor: Negotiations reached an abrupt conclusion.

name: Goblin Trashmaster
text:
Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.
Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target artifact.
flavor: "Folks 'round here are too in love with their contraptions. Does them some good if we smash one every so often."

name: Havoc Devils
text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: For devils, burning things is the highest form of comedy, diversion, and artistic expression.

name: Hostile Minotaur
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: The bellow of a minotaur always translates to "charge."

name: Lightning Mare
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Lightning Mare can't be blocked by blue creatures.
{1}{R}: Lightning Mare gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: When it passes, storm clouds bolt across the land.

name: Onakke Ogre
flavor: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

name: Siegebreaker Giant
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: No rampart can withstand the fury of a giant.

name: Thud
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Thud deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor:
"Give 'em a push."
—Mogwin, goblin delinquent

name: Druid of Horns
text: Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets Druid of Horns, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor: No welcome for those who trespass. Only fang and horn and claw.

name: Dryad Greenseeker
text: {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
flavor: "The land already knows its destiny. I simply ask it to share the tale with me."

name: Elvish Clancaller
text:
Other Elves you control get +1/+1.
{4}{G}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Elvish Clancaller, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: No single root feeds the forest.

name: Ghastbark Twins
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Ghastbark Twins can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor: They grow closer with every passing season.

name: Gigantosaurus
flavor:
"Each tooth is the length of a horse, and new ones grow in every sixteen days. Let's get a closer look!"
—Vivien Reid

name: Greenwood Sentinel
text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

name: Prodigious Growth
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +7/+7 and has trample.
flavor:
"Look how cute it is now!"
—Vivien Reid

name: Rhox Oracle
text: When Rhox Oracle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "The further into the future I look, the less certain my vision. Even now, the middle distance is obscured by fire."

name: Root Snare
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor: The only casualties were a snapped spear, a lost helmet, and some bruised egos.

name: Runic Armasaur
text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a creature or land that isn't a mana ability, you may draw a card.
flavor: The Sun Empire's most sacred sites are protected by more than prayers.

name: Scapeshift
text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Whether we like it or not, our arrival has altered the landscape."
—Malcolm, navigator of the *Belligerent*

name: Thornhide Wolves
flavor:
"Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Vigilant Baloth
text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor: Villagers employ watchdogs as guardians and companions. Druids prefer something a little bigger.

name: Vine Mare
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Vine Mare can't be blocked by black creatures.
flavor: When it passes, the dead are displaced by flourishing life.

name: Court Cleric
text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Court Cleric gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Ajani planeswalker.
flavor:
"The healers of Bant are second to none. I owe then a great deal for their tutelage."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Serra's Guardian
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Other creatures you control have vigilance.
flavor: She watches over the city just as Serra watches over all.

name: Silverbeak Griffin
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: A pair of domesticated griffins escaped from captivity a century ago. Now the skies are filled with the songs of their descendants.

name: Riddlemaster Sphinx
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Riddlemaster Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Safe passage requires only a simple answer to a simple question, traveler."

name: Arisen Gorgon
text: Arisen Gorgon has deathtouch as long as you control a Liliana planeswalker. (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
"I'm not picky about what comes up, but the less decay, the better."
—Liliana Vess

name: Sarkhan's Dragonfire
text:
Sarkhan's Dragonfire deals 3 damage to any target.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a red card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: "I am most myself when I am least human."

name: Aggressive Mammoth
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Other creatures you control have trample.
flavor:
"Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it."
—Vivien Reid

name: Skalla Wolf
text: When Skalla Wolf enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a green card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor:
"This imprint was the familiar of a friend."
—Vivien Reid

name: Ursine Champion
text: {5}{G}: Ursine Champion gets +3/+3 and becomes a Bear Berserker until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: "Would you rather feel the edge of blade or the sharpness of my fangs?"

name: Vivien's Jaguar
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{2}{G}: Return Vivien's Jaguar from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you control a Vivien planeswalker.
flavor: Each of Vivien's arrows is an invocation of a species.

name: Nexus of Fate
text:
Take an extra turn after this one.
If Nexus of Fate would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Nexus of Fate and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
flavor: Sarkhan wandered into a tomb and back in time.

name: Sun Sentinel
text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor: Just as the sun rises at dawn and the days lengthen in the summer, the Sun Empire has awakened after long years of quiet.

name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
text: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.
flavor: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.

name: Grasping Scoundrel
text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavor: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

name: Apostle of Purifying Light
text:
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything black.)
{2}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor: Waves of gloom crash in vain against his unyielding light.

name: Battalion Foot Soldier
text: When Battalion Foot Soldier enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Battalion Foot Soldier, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "With me! Break this line and the rest will fall!"

name: Bishop of Wings
text:
Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 4 life.
Whenever an Angel you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: "Within every angel is a spirit of light that will fight as long as there is darkness."

name: Brought Back
text: Choose up to two target permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"As long as your courage remains, your life will not falter."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade

name: Devout Decree
text: Exile target creature or planeswalker that's black or red. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor:
"It is not punishment. I am simply making things as they should be."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade

name: Eternal Isolation
text: Put target creature with power 4 or greater on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor: "Well, at least it's a lovely view."

name: Herald of the Sun
text:
Flying
{3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature with flying.
flavor: "Fear neither clouds nor darkness. The light shall overcome them all."

name: Starfield Mystic
text:
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever an enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Starfield Mystic.
flavor: "The realm of the gods opens before me!"

name: Steadfast Sentry
text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Steadfast Sentry dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: "Get up, slugabeds! We've got company, and they're not dressed for a party!"

name: Yoked Ox
flavor: The courage of those who work the land is born of long days of labor in the hot summer sun and the cold winter wind. It is the courage of the earth itself.

name: Aether Gust
text: Choose target spell or permanent that's red or green. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor: The chill wind extinguishes flame, and frosts the leaf on the branch.

name: Agent of Treachery
text:
When Agent of Treachery enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more permanents you don't own, draw three cards.
flavor: "The more secrets you have, the more easily you become my pawn."

name: Boreal Elemental
text:
Flying
Spells your opponents cast that target Boreal Elemental cost {2} more to cast.
flavor: Winter's breath given form.

name: Captivating Gyre
text: Return up to three target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"That's enough of that."
—Atemsis, All-Seeing

name: Cerulean Drake
text:
Flying
Protection from red (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything red.)
Sacrifice Cerulean Drake: Counter target spell that targets you.
flavor: Dragons avoid the bright colors of its wings.

name: Cloudkin Seer
text:
Flying
When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."

name: Drawn from Dreams
text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor:
"From a sea of infinite possibilities, our choices create the future."
—Mu Yanling

name: Faerie Miscreant
text:
Flying
When Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
flavor: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.

name: Flood of Tears
text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor:
"I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean."
—Mu Yanling

name: Hard Cover
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has "{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card."
flavor: A good book is a refuge, but a great book is a fortress.

name: Moat Piranhas
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor:
"Come on, it's not even that deep!"
—Gorin the Brazen

name: Portal of Sanctuary
text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature you control and each Aura attached to it to their owners' hands. Activate only during your turn.
flavor:
"If you need to disappear for a while, I know a place."
—Bilivus, master archivist

name: Sleep Paralysis
text:
Enchant creature
When Sleep Paralysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor: Sleep doesn't always mean rest.

name: Tale's End
text: Counter target activated ability, triggered ability, or legendary spell.
flavor:
"When you are gone, will anyone remember your story?"
—Unknown

name: Yarok's Wavecrasher
text: When Yarok's Wavecrasher enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Yarok's waters rush and rage
Where armies bled into the sand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 2

name: Audacious Thief
text: Whenever Audacious Thief attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: "Skill, imagination, smarts: none of it matters unless you have the nerve to use it."

name: Blightbeetle
text:
Protection from green (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything green.)
Creatures your opponents control can't have +1/+1 counters put on them.
flavor: Leaf and soul alike wither at its touch.

name: Blood Burglar
text: As long as it's your turn, Blood Burglar has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor:
"You've heard that a vampire can't enter a home without an invitation? A lie meant to help you sleep at night."
—Kerin, watch sergeant

name: Boneclad Necromancer
text: When Boneclad Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: "Living or dead, everyone responds to the proper motivation."

name: Embodiment of Agonies
text:
Flying, deathtouch
Embodiment of Agonies enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each different mana cost among nonland cards in your graveyard. (For example, {2}{B} and {1}{B}{B} are different mana costs.)
flavor: "I feel your pain. It's exquisite."

name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
text: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."

name: Gruesome Scourger
text: When Gruesome Scourger enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor: His whips twist and tremble like living things, moved by the fury of the horde he commands.

name: Legion's End
text: Exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less and all other creatures that player controls with the same name as that creature. Then that player reveals their hand and exiles all cards with that name from their hand and graveyard.
flavor:
"With a single word, they were unmade."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Noxious Grasp
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker that's green or white. You gain 1 life.
flavor:
"The bog doesn't give a stinking bubble about your title, wealth, or piety. It's just hungry."
—Byaras, backwoods guide

name: Rotting Regisaur
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card.
flavor:
"Now, *that's* a zombie!"
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Scheming Symmetry
text: Choose two target players. Each of them searches their library for a card, then shuffles and puts that card on top.
flavor:
"One for you, one for me. What could be more fair?"
—Kethis, the Hidden Hand

name: Sorcerer of the Fang
text: {5}{B}, {T}: Sorcerer of the Fang deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor: "The Great Serpent slumbers now, but all warmbloods will grovel in the dirt at its awakening!"

name: Thought Distortion
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Target opponent reveals their hand. Exile all noncreature, nonland cards from that player's hand and graveyard.
flavor:
"The skull is rigid, but the mind is so deliciously supple."
—Eromena the Mind Render

name: Undead Servant
text: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.
flavor:
"There are always more like you."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Unholy Indenture
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor:
"Don't think of it as selling your soul. It's more like you're bequeathing it to me."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

name: Vampire of the Dire Moon
text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "This place suits me: craven authorities and plentiful prey."

name: Vengeful Warchief
text: Whenever you lose life for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vengeful Warchief. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor: "Try to steal from me and I'll add your skull to my collection."

name: Yarok's Fenlurker
text:
When Yarok's Fenlurker enters the battlefield, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
{2}{B}: Yarok's Fenlurker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Yarok's nightmares lurk and wait
Where dark despair is near at hand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 3

name: Chandra's Embercat
text: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or a Chandra planeswalker spell.
flavor:
"Furballs? Try dealing with fireballs."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Daggersail Aeronaut
text: As long as it's your turn, Daggersail Aeronaut has flying.
flavor: "Coming down is the best part!"

name: Destructive Digger
text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or land: Draw a card.
flavor: "I love digging. It gives me lots of time to think about how much I love digging."

name: Flame Sweep
text: Flame Sweep deals 2 damage to each creature except for creatures you control with flying.
flavor:
"I have calculated that a dragon in flight, in a single strafing run, can cover an area of—"
—Thaedus the Clever, last words

name: Fry
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Fry deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker that's white or blue.
flavor:
"I'm afraid your dinner got a little . . . overcooked."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper

name: Goblin Bird-Grabber
text: {R}: Goblin Bird-Grabber gains flying until end of turn. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.
flavor: "I opens my mouth to catches the bugs!"

name: Goblin Smuggler
text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Another target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "I am but a humble traveler. I have no taste for sneakery nor thiefiness."

name: Infuriate
text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"No shirt, no shoes, no service."
—Marketplace sign

name: Lavakin Brawler
text: Whenever Lavakin Brawler attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.
flavor: She swings with the ease of flowing lava and hits with the force of a meteor.

name: Marauding Raptor
text:
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Marauding Raptor deals 2 damage to it. If a Dinosaur is dealt damage this way, Marauding Raptor gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Stand still and try not to look like prey!"
—Skerk Hobnett, wilderness guide

name: Pack Mastiff
text: {1}{R}: Each creature you control named Pack Mastiff gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Their loyalty is not to any master, but to the pack.

name: Reckless Air Strike
text:
Choose one —
• Reckless Air Strike deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor: "I have a *great* idea!"

name: Reduce to Ashes
text: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Before they can go to their final rest, the wicked must be purified by fire."
—Harra the Adjudicator

name: Repeated Reverberation
text: When you next cast an instant spell, cast a sorcery spell, or activate a loyalty ability this turn, copy that spell or ability twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.
flavor: It's in the nature of fire to grow.

name: Scampering Scorcher
text: When Scampering Scorcher enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens. Elementals you control gain haste until end of turn. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor:
"Keep your flammables out of reach."
—Kerin, watch sergeant

name: Scorch Spitter
text: Whenever Scorch Spitter attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
flavor:
"Yes, she can be a nuisance. But at least my tea never gets cold."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper

name: Unchained Berserker
text:
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything white.)
Unchained Berserker gets +2/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavor: Sathros turned his restraints to revenge.

name: Brightwood Tracker
text: {5}{G}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: "Many have walked here, but there is only one trail I seek."

name: Growth Cycle
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. It gets an additional +2/+2 until end of turn for each card named Growth Cycle in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Shed your faded husk! Emerge sleeker and stronger!"
—Tyris, fauna shaman

name: Healer of the Glade
text: When Healer of the Glade enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Grief and rage and nightmares fade
Where hope and comfort make their stand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 4

name: Howling Giant
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
When Howling Giant enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
flavor: He and his pack sing the same mournful song to the moon.

name: Leafkin Druid
text: {T}: Add {G}. If you control four or more creatures, add {G}{G} instead.
flavor: "I am rooted in the life of all that thrives around me. You cannot move me."

name: Season of Growth
text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.
flavor: "Awake, and lift your faces to the sun."

name: Sedge Scorpion
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave

name: Shared Summons
text: Search your library for up to two creature cards with different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"In times of need, the forest creates its own protectors."
—Vivien Reid

name: Thicket Crasher
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Other Elementals you control have trample.
flavor:
"Tread too hard in the forest and it will tread on you in return."
—Vivien Reid

name: Wakeroot Elemental
text: {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}: Untap target land you control. It becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land. (This effect lasts as long as that land remains on the battlefield.)
flavor:
"When the forest walks, it's too late to run."
—Horent, Khalni druid

name: Celestial Messenger
text:
Flash (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Celestial Messenger gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Yanling planeswalker.
flavor:
"It soars on the winds of dreams."
—Mu Yanling

name: Waterkin Shaman
text: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, Waterkin Shaman gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "They come to drink, to bathe, and—I believe—to play."

name: Savage Gorger
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Savage Gorger. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor: "I have no patience for sipping blood from crystal goblets. I want to bite and tear."

name: Sorin's Guide
text: When Sorin's Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Sorin, Vampire Lord, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor: "My people serve the dragon Kolaghan, but I give my blood for a greater lord."

name: Thirsting Bloodlord
text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.
flavor: "A whole life, full of memories and experience, love and sorrow, drained drop by drop into this bottle. Could any feast be more glorious?"

name: Chandra's Flame Wave
text: Chandra's Flame Wave deals 2 damage to target player and each creature that player controls. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Chandra, Flame's Fury, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor: "It's high tide."

name: Vivien's Crocodile
text: Vivien's Crocodile gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Vivien planeswalker.
flavor:
"Regardless of where they come from, crocs are usually able to find their way home. For this one, home is me."
—Vivien Reid

name: Concordia Pegasus
text: Flying
flavor: In the cloudy skies and dim light of autumn, a flash of white wings is a reminder that better times lie ahead.

name: Haazda Officer
text: When Haazda Officer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"

name: Impassioned Orator
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.

name: Imperial Outrider
flavor: Her mount's hollow crest can produce a trumpeting warning that carries for miles, summoning more knights to her aid.

name: Ironclad Krovod
flavor:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Prowling Caracal
flavor: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.

name: Dark Remedy
text: Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Writhing tendrils of darkness stitched him back together. Though his will and body both were broken, the necromancer's magic would not let him rest."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Vampire Opportunist
text: {6}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: "I think I cracked a fang."

name: Engulfing Eruption
text: Engulfing Eruption deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor:
"Compared to the hunger of the fires within the earth, the appetite of a mere wurm is nothing."
—Phelgis Ojin, Keral Keep acolyte

name: Goblin Assailant
flavor: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.

name: Nimble Birdsticker
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "What goes up must get stuck."

name: Rubblebelt Recluse
text: Rubblebelt Recluse attacks each combat if able.
flavor: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.

name: Woodland Mystic
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: "I sing to the branches, and they reach to the sky. I sing to the leaves, and they open to the sun. I sing to the roots, and they dig their fingers deep. I sing the song that creation sung."

name: Alpine Watchdog
text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor:
"On the eighth day, a blizzard hit. Supplies were lost, and morale plummeted. On the ninth day, Dover found us."
—*To the Summit: A Tale of Survival*

name: Angelic Ascension
text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor: Within her battalion she was known as the Angel of Arkvale. Until now, that was only a metaphor.

name: Anointed Chorister
text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
{4}{W}: Anointed Chorister gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "I sing of benevolence and mercy, of golden wings bringing comfort to the meek and downtrodden."

name: Aven Gagglemaster
text:
Flying
When Aven Gagglemaster enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control with flying.
flavor: An aven's gear is enchanted to avoid weighing them down during aerial maneuvers.

name: Basri's Solidarity
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor:
"The will to fight and act as one is not limited to a single world. Oketra's teachings are universal."
—Basri Ket

name: Celestial Enforcer
text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.
flavor: "I look to the heavens for hope, but you will kneel."

name: Falconer Adept
text: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.
flavor: "My falcons are family, as much as any other member of my clan."

name: Gale Swooper
text:
Flying
When Gale Swooper enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"Be glad the griffin set you back on your feet when it was done with you. My goat wasn't so lucky."
—Arram, goatherd

name: Griffin Aerie
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.
flavor: When griffins started nesting atop the northern tower, the castellan worried they'd be a nuisance. Instead, they took the entire castle under their protection.

name: Legion's Judgment
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

name: Light of Promise
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."
flavor: The light washed over him, and in the wind he heard the roars of all the pridemates who had come before.

name: Makeshift Battalion
text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
flavor: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

name: Pack Leader
text:
Other Dogs you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Pack Leader attacks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn to Dogs you control.
flavor: He will be your loyal champion, and his pack your protectors. All he asks for is a full belly, a spot by the fire, and all the love in your heart.

name: Sanctum of Tranquil Light
text: {5}{W}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each Shrine you control.
flavor:
An untroubled mind
Dwells in perfect harmony
With a peaceful heart.

name: Seasoned Hallowblade
text: Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: "I don't know that I'll win every fight. But I have faith, and that's carried me this far."

name: Secure the Scene
text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
flavor:
"You know it's a great show when the Azorius arrest the props, too!"
—Judith, the Scourge Diva

name: Selfless Savior
text: Sacrifice Selfless Savior: Another target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: She raised him from an orphaned pup and gave him a life of love. With his last act, he thanked her.

name: Speaker of the Heavens
text:
Vigilance, lifelink
{T}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate only if you have at least 7 life more than your starting life total and only as a sorcery.
flavor: "All are welcome in the angels' light."

name: Staunch Shieldmate
flavor: "Gilded with gold from a dragon's trove, it is! And etched with the image of the dragon I slew to take it."

name: Swift Response
text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor:
"There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."
—Adrasteia, Akroan captain

name: Vryn Wingmare
text:
Flying
Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
flavor: It's the favored mount of military commanders as well as anyone with a flair for the dramatic.

name: Warded Battlements
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor: In dire times, even a place of refuge can become a weapon of war.

name: Enthralling Hold
text:
Enchant creature
You can't choose an untapped creature as this spell's target as you cast it.
You control enchanted creature.
flavor:
"I offered to pay him to do the job, but he refused. So I took matters into my own hands."
—Tahim, the Puppetmaster

name: Frantic Inventory
text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Frantic Inventory in your graveyard.
flavor: "Another village, another angry mob. Why do I even bother unpacking?"

name: Keen Glidemaster
text: {2}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Fear is a rational response, but waiting won't make it any easier. Just jump!"

name: Lofty Denial
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with flying, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.
flavor: The mage scowled as yet another bolt splashed harmlessly against seemingly empty air.

name: Miscast
text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor:
"Next time, try something more appropriate for your skill level."
—Barrin, Tolarian archmage

name: Mistral Singer
text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: "I sang of storms, there came a squall. I sang of waves, the seas grew tall. I sang of love, but no voice called."

name: Rain of Revelation
text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor: "As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it."

name: Read the Tides
text:
Choose one —
• Draw three cards.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor: Charts and instruments work fine, but the best navigators aren't above a spell or two to nudge the tides in a more favorable direction.

name: Roaming Ghostlight
text:
Flying
When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: Some who die senseless deaths return as formless spirits, seeking answers where there are none.

name: Rookie Mistake
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.
flavor: "Stop locking your knees as you strike! Now stand up and try again."

name: Rousing Read
text:
Enchant creature
When Rousing Read enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor: Great literature can transport the reader.

name: Sanctum of Calm Waters
text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of Shrines you control. If you do, discard a card.
flavor:
Truth lurks in the depths,
Invisible from the shore.
Knowledge inundates.

name: See the Truth
text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, put each of those cards into your hand instead.
flavor: "What is this that is neither future nor past?"

name: Shacklegeist
text:
Flying
Shacklegeist can block only creatures with flying.
Tap two untapped Spirits you control: Tap target creature you don't control.
flavor: The Blessed Sleep doesn't come easily to a mind chained by regrets.

name: Shipwreck Dowser
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Shipwreck Dowser enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Lost at sea doesn't have to mean lost forever.

name: Teferi's Ageless Insight
text: If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.
flavor:
"Fine, you know more than me. But do you have to be such a show-off about it?"
—Chandra Nalaar, to Teferi

name: Teferi's Tutelage
text:
When Teferi's Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: "Tarassel's sixth law of temporal recursion is easy to understand as long as you know the first seven."

name: Tide Skimmer
text:
Flying
Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.
flavor: Fishing boats often follow hunting drakes to find the largest schools of fish.

name: Waker of Waves
text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
flavor: On the open sea, there is nowhere to hide.

name: Bad Deal
text: You draw two cards and each opponent discards two cards. Each player loses 2 life.
flavor: There are still places where a smile and a handshake are all you need to seal a deal.

name: Blood Glutton
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "Some savor the hunt. I savor the kill."

name: Caged Zombie
text: {1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. Activate only if a creature died this turn.
flavor: "Six consecutive life sentences" takes on a new meaning when necromancy is involved.

name: Crypt Lurker
text: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"Even the rats refuse to set foot inside. I fear to think what might be waiting in there."
—Gravedigger's journal

name: Eliminate
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
flavor:
"Cruelty? No. This is necessity."
—Kaervek

name: Finishing Blow
text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: "In this world, it's kill or be killed. I'd rather not be the latter."

name: Gloom Sower
text: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"First, the darkness fell. Terror came next. After that, only despair remained."
—*The Tragedy of Morein*

name: Grim Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.
flavor: As blood touched the empty page, it formed words that seared themselves into the wizard's mind.

name: Kaervek, the Spiteful
text: Other creatures get -1/-1.
flavor: "Defy me and I will burn the flesh from your bones. Betray me and I will steal the breath from your lungs."

name: Liliana's Devotee
text:
Zombies you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: Liliana inspires horror in many and fanatical admiration in a few.

name: Liliana's Standard Bearer
text:
Flash
When Liliana's Standard Bearer enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.
flavor: The purple banner of the House of Vess is a symbol of death wherever it's flown.

name: Masked Blackguard
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
{2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Her footsteps are whispers, her passage a last breath.

name: Peer into the Abyss
text: Target player draws cards equal to half the number of cards in their library and loses half their life. Round up each time.
flavor:
"Oh, don't be so dramatic. When your eyes bleed, and your brain leaks out your ears, then we'll talk about lost sanity."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Pestilent Haze
text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Remove two loyalty counters from each planeswalker.
flavor:
"Your crops will rot. The air itself will turn against you. You will suffer as I have suffered."
—Karaz, outcast

name: Rise Again
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"I love those who are eager to serve."
—Liliana Vess

name: Sanctum of Stone Fangs
text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of Shrines you control.
flavor:
Renounce all limits,
False chains binding potential.
Power knows no bounds.

name: Sanguine Indulgence
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you've gained 3 or more life this turn.
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Drink from the vein? How provincial."
—Lord Duchorvin

name: Bone Pit Brute
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Bone Pit Brute enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Welcome to the club.

name: Double Vision
text: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: "Your eyes aren't playing tricks on you. I am."

name: Fiery Emancipation
text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor:
"One day the mountain's fire will rise up to burn away our chains and end this age of oppression."
—*The Molten Prophecy*

name: Furious Rise
text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with Furious Rise.
flavor: Klothys set out to mend the destiny of Theros, her fury guiding every stitch.

name: Goblin Wizardry
text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin Wizard creature tokens with prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: "Quiet in the library" soon gave way to larger concerns.

name: Havoc Jester
text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Havoc Jester deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: To the Rakdos, screams of delight and screams of terror are one and the same.

name: Heartfire Immolator
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{R}, Sacrifice Heartfire Immolator: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: "I'd rather go out in a blaze of glory than fade away and be forgotten."

name: Hellkite Punisher
text:
Flying
{R}: Hellkite Punisher gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"We'll pay no more tribute to that tyrannical lizard. A new age starts today!"
—Mayor Kadrim, now deceased

name: Hobblefiend
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hobblefiend.
flavor: Bedbugs aren't the only things you need to worry about biting you at night.

name: Igneous Cur
text: {1}{R}: Igneous Cur gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Some dogs just aren't meant to be indoor pets.

name: Sanctum of Shattered Heights
text: {1}, Discard a land card or Shrine card: Sanctum of Shattered Heights deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of Shrines you control.
flavor:
Rage smolders within,
An all-consuming wildfire
Burning fear to ash

name: Soul Sear
text: Soul Sear deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. That permanent loses indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: There was no witty retort, no confident boast to accompany the attack. There was only pain.

name: Traitorous Greed
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Add two mana of any one color. (The creature can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor:
"Remind me again, what's the going rate for betrayal these days?"
—Captain Rhenmir

name: Transmogrify
text: Exile target creature. That creature's controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into their library.
flavor: "I'd like to introduce you to the new and improved me."

name: Turret Ogre
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

name: Unleash Fury
text: Double the power of target creature until end of turn.
flavor: Might doesn't make right, but it does win the fight.

name: Volcanic Salvo
text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Volcanic Salvo deals 6 damage to each of up to two target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
flavor: Seeing it coming a mile away is little comfort if you can't get out of range in time.

name: Burlfist Oak
text: Whenever you draw a card, Burlfist Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: If a tree fells you in the forest and no one is around to hear it, "does it make a sound" is the last thing you need to worry about.

name: Canopy Stalker
text:
Canopy Stalker must be blocked if able.
When Canopy Stalker dies, you gain 1 life for each creature that died this turn.
flavor: The forest's cover offers shade, shelter, and an increased risk of sudden death.

name: Feline Sovereign
text:
Other Cats you control get +1/+1 and have protection from Dogs.
Whenever one or more Cats you control deal combat damage to a player, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
flavor: Dogs beg. Cats lay claim.

name: Fungal Rebirth
text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If a creature died this turn, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor:
"We're all food for something in the end."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Garruk's Gorehorn
flavor:
"It certainly takes after its master: big and brutish, and you can smell it from a mile away."
—Liliana Vess

name: Invigorating Surge
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.
flavor: For hydras, most problems can be solved with the addition of a few extra heads.

name: Llanowar Visionary
text:
When Llanowar Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor: The elves of Llanowar look to their past to determine the shape of their future.

name: Primal Might
text: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
flavor: The shaman looked at the world through Ghalta's eyes and understood that everything else was his prey.

name: Run Afoul
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature with flying.
flavor:
"What did you catch today, my pet? Ah, it looks like a bit of vampire stuck between your teeth."
—Atla Palani, nest tender

name: Sabertooth Mauler
text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Sabertooth Mauler and untap it.
flavor:
"I hope the idiot who introduced these creatures to the jungle was their first meal."
—Opar, veteran guide

name: Sanctum of Fruitful Harvest
text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Shrines you control.
flavor:
Beneath bright blossoms
Verdant with spring's rich bounty,
The soul blooms in song.

name: Skyway Sniper
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{2}{G}: Skyway Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor: "No sight is more beautiful than a clear sky."

name: Sporeweb Weaver
text:
Reach, hexproof from blue
Whenever Sporeweb Weaver is dealt damage, you gain 1 life and create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor: It spins its web throughout the undercity, strange growths sprouting in its wake.

name: Track Down
text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature or land card, draw a card. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: Scents fade and footprints wash away, but some trails can never be erased.

name: Trufflesnout
text:
When Trufflesnout enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Trufflesnout.
• You gain 4 life.
flavor: Its exploits are the stuff of legends among local chefs and fuel for nightmares among the forest thallids.

name: Warden of the Woods
text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Whenever Warden of the Woods becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw two cards.
flavor: Weak and strong alike seek shelter beneath its branches.

name: Adherent of Hope
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a Basri planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Adherent of Hope.
flavor: "Basri has shown me the way forward, and I will follow."

name: Basri's Aegis
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Basri, Devoted Paladin, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor:
"As long as we survive, we can rebuild."
—Basri Ket

name: Sigiled Contender
text: Sigiled Contender has lifelink as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "All right. Warm-ups are over."

name: Historian of Zhalfir
text: Whenever Historian of Zhalfir attacks, if you control a Teferi planeswalker, draw a card.
flavor: "Come and listen. I'll tell you the story of a nation lost to time, and of the man who caused it."

name: Liliana's Scorn
text: Destroy target creature. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Liliana, Death Mage, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor: "We're done here."

name: Liliana's Scrounger
text: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may put a loyalty counter on a Liliana planeswalker you control.
flavor: "This arm's got plenty of use left in it. Who'd throw such a nice thing away?"

name: Spirit of Malevolence
text: When Spirit of Malevolence dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Great evil weighs on the soul.

name: Keral Keep Disciples
text: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of a Chandra planeswalker, Keral Keep Disciples deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: "You're not setting foot in here. Not on our watch!"

name: Storm Caller
text: When Storm Caller enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor: He became elder shaman when his predecessor was mysteriously struck by lightning on a cloudless day.

name: Predatory Wurm
text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Predatory Wurm gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Garruk planeswalker.
flavor:
"The strong eat. The weak are eaten. That's the way of things."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Wildwood Patrol
text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: If you're lucky, the centaurs will give a single warning to leave their territory before driving a spear into you. If you're unlucky, the spear is the warning.

name: Affa Protector
text: Vigilance
flavor: "Through all the terrors we face, I hold on to the memory of the world before the Eldrazi came. I'd like to see that world again."

name: Angelic Purge
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.
flavor: "We must save you from yourselves."

name: Arrester's Zeal
text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Law is the light of civilization.

name: Aven Battle Priest
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Battle Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: When the shadow of the aven falls across the battlefield, hope rises in the hearts of the soldiers.

name: Devilthorn Fox
flavor: On expeditions through Ashmouth, the hunters of Devilthorn Lodge rely on the cleverness of foxes to counteract the mischief of devils.

name: Empyrial Armor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
flavor:
"An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire."
—"Hymn of Angelfire"

name: Encampment Keeper
text:
First strike
{7}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Encampment Keeper: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Paladins of the Sanctum Seeker order are an adventurous lot, venturing into the wilds with monstrous mastiffs at their side.

name: Enlightened Ascetic
text: When Enlightened Ascetic enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
flavor: "I do not reject the gods. I reject their authority, their pettiness, and their arrogance."

name: Expose Evil
text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor:
"Only the pure stand tall in the light."
—Sigarda

name: Exultant Skymarcher
text: Flying
flavor: "We have come at last to this holiest of holy places. What was stolen from us long ago is ours once again."

name: Eyes in the Skies
text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor:
"What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."
—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

name: Healing Hands
text:
Target player gains 4 life.
Draw a card.
flavor: The ethereal touch brings relief. The physical touch brings peace.

name: Heavy Infantry
text: When Heavy Infantry enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: Doors, walls, skulls . . . it matters not. All barriers will be broken.

name: Inquisitor's Ox
text: Delirium — Inquisitor's Ox gets +1/+0 and has vigilance as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Many fields now lie fallow in Gavony, as the oxen have been confiscated to perform other duties.

name: Isolation Zone
text: When Isolation Zone enters the battlefield, exile target creature or enchantment an opponent controls until Isolation Zone leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)
flavor: When properly aligned, hedrons become powerful tools of binding.

name: Knight of Dawn
text:
First strike
{W}{W}: Knight of Dawn gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor:
Flash like daybreak to the fray.
—Motto of the Knights of Dawn

name: Knight of Sorrows
text:
Knight of Sorrows can block an additional creature each combat.
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor: The helmet reveals no eyes to witness your penance, no mouth to offer absolution.

name: Kor Sky Climber
text: {1}{W}: Kor Sky Climber gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "With rope, I can fly as far as the rope can reach. But with light, the sky is the limit."

name: Looming Altisaur
flavor: Nature can't be tamed, but the Sun Empire believes that humans are made stronger when they test themselves against the wild strength of the dinosaurs.

name: Mana Tithe
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor:
"Those who seek to upset the balance must be taxed for such ambitions."
—Verithain, mesa high priest

name: Martyr's Cause
text: Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: Dying is a soldier's talent.

name: Mirran Crusader
text: Double strike, protection from black and from green
flavor: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.

name: Ondu War Cleric
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: You gain 2 life.
flavor: "I will follow the light of Iona into battle, and I will know no fear."

name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
flavor: Closely linked to the Church of Dusk, the paladins of the Bloodstained order are devout to the point of fanaticism.

name: Pitfall Trap
text:
If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature without flying.
flavor: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

name: Searing Light
text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 2 or less.
flavor:
"Light can lay bare our fears. It can also make them go away."
—Nazra of the Stone Havens

name: Shining Aerosaur
text: Flying
flavor:
"The invaders cloak themselves in the shadows of dusk. Aerosaurs hide in the brilliance of the noonday sun."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Skymarcher Aspirant
text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor: "I was born to glory."

name: Slash of Talons
text: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor:
"The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one."
—Huatli

name: Snubhorn Sentry
text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.

name: Suppression Bonds
