text: Return target creature or Vehicle card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then put two +1/+1 counters on that permanent if you control an artifact and an enchantment.
flavor: "Some fool would rather throw a whole mech away than repair one hydraulic actuator? It must be my lucky day."

name: Reckoner Shakedown
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, put two +1/+1 counters on a creature or Vehicle you control.
flavor:
"That's a start. What else do you have for us?"
—Takumi, Reckoner enforcer

name: Reckoner's Bargain
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed permanent's mana value. Draw two cards.
flavor: Restricted auctions are held once a year at the Dragon's Lair—the sacred, neutral meeting ground of all Reckoner gangs.

name: Return to Action
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor:
"You're hurt? Too bad. You stop fighting when I say, and not a moment sooner."
—Satoru Umezawa

name: Twisted Embrace
text:
Enchant artifact or creature you control
When Twisted Embrace enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1.
flavor: Evil kami are drawn to mortals who share their grim fascinations.

name: Undercity Scrounger
text: {T}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only if a creature died this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "That will pay for another arm extension all by itself! Well, as long as it doesn't explode."

name: Virus Beetle
text: When Virus Beetle enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor:
"They'll be debugging their code for days before they figure out what happened!"
—Eita, Futurist agent

name: You Are Already Dead
text:
Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: So swift and sharp was his blade that the ogre never even felt the cut.

name: Akki Ember-Keeper
text: Whenever a nontoken modified creature you control dies, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: "Follow my lantern, little ones."

name: Akki Ronin
text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"Carry the heat of the furnace in your steel, and never let it fade."
—Keni-Keni, akki smith

name: Akki War Paint
text:
Enchant artifact or creature
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+1.
flavor: Akki paint bright, bold designs on their salvaged Imperial mechs, leaving no doubt as to who they belong to now.

name: Ambitious Assault
text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. If you control a modified creature, draw a card. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: In the clangor and chaos of the akki attack, few even noticed the frogs on their heads.

name: Crackling Emergence
text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land is a 3/3 red Spirit creature with haste. It's still a land.
If enchanted land would be destroyed, instead sacrifice Crackling Emergence and that land gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: The transition from spiritual to material is sometimes as shocking as it is beautiful.

name: Explosive Entry
text: Destroy up to one target artifact. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
flavor: Kaito and Tamiyo charged headlong into Jin-Gitaxias's secret lab, unaware that the praetor was eagerly awaiting their arrival.

name: Fable of the Mirror-Breaker // Reflection of Kiki-Jiki
text: {1}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of another target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Blessed by Keiga, the Tide Star, Kiki-Jiki would one day master the art of duplication.

name: Flame Discharge
text: Flame Discharge deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you controlled a modified creature as you cast this spell, it deals X plus 2 damage instead. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: "What? Why would it need a cooling unit?"

name: Go-Shintai of Ancient Wars
text:
First strike
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}. When you do, Go-Shintai of Ancient Wars deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of Shrines you control.
flavor: It seeks those consumed with rage and offers burning blades.

name: Heiko Yamazaki, the General
text:
Trample
Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may cast target artifact card from your graveyard this turn.
flavor: "I prefer to let my sword do the talking."

name: Ironhoof Boar
text:
Trample, haste
Channel — {1}{R}, Discard Ironhoof Boar: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"I'm glad she can run again, but this might have been a bit much."
—Kenji, Sokenzan artisan

name: Kami of Industry
text: When Kami of Industry enters the battlefield, return target artifact card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: It takes many arms to arm an army.

name: Kami's Flare
text: Kami's Flare deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Kami's Flare also deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller if you control a modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: "The flames are a gift from my companion. They won't hurt me. You, on the other hand..."

name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan // Etching of Kumano
text:
Haste
If a creature dealt damage this turn by a source you controlled would die, exile it instead.
flavor: Many kami came to demand a secret he did not know, and every one of them fell.

name: Peerless Samurai
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.
flavor: "I fear I have run out of worthy opponents."

name: Scrap Welder
text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact with mana value X: Return target artifact card with mana value less than X from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "This big metal guy will make some amazing wind chimes!"

name: Scrapyard Steelbreaker
text: {1}, Sacrifice another artifact: Scrapyard Steelbreaker gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "You've got about three seconds to get out of here before you get a faceful of metal."

name: Seismic Wave
text: Seismic Wave deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to each nonartifact creature target opponent controls.
flavor: "Step carefully, Imperial. Even the earth rises against you."

name: The Shattered States Era // Nameless Conqueror
text: Trample, haste
flavor:
"In the wake of the Kami War, Kamigawa descended into a state of constant warfare. Even with Kyodai's wisdom guiding them, it took the first Imperials decades of work and bloodshed to subdue the clans and bring peace to the land."
—*History of the Empire*

name: Tempered in Solitude
text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
flavor: Many master samurai make pilgrimages deep into the Sokenzan Mountains, where they train and meditate in silence, hoping to commune with a lava kami.

name: Towashi Songshaper
text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Towashi Songshaper gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Most Uprisers augment their bodies for speed, strength, or protection, but a few just want to be one with the music.

name: Twinshot Sniper
text:
Reach
When Twinshot Sniper enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Channel — {1}{R}, Discard Twinshot Sniper: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: "Pierce the heart and pierce the head, even the mightiest fall down dead."

name: Unstoppable Ogre
text: When Unstoppable Ogre enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: Touma never met a door he didn't hate.

name: Upriser Renegade
text: Upriser Renegade gets +2/+0 for each other modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: "My streets, my rules. You picked the wrong neighborhood for a fight."

name: Azusa's Many Journeys // Likeness of the Seeker
text: Whenever Likeness of the Seeker becomes blocked, untap up to three lands you control.
flavor:
"I ask for nothing more than a new journey and a fresh path to greet my feet when I wake each morning."
—Azusa

name: Bamboo Grove Archer
text:
Defender, reach
Channel — {4}{G}, Discard Bamboo Grove Archer: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor: "Do not mistake tranquility for domestication. This land is wild, and will always remain so."

name: Bearer of Memory
text: {5}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target enchantment creature. It gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Members of the Living Historians don't simply chronicle the past; they embody it.

name: Boon of Boseiju
text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest mana value among permanents you control. Untap it.
flavor: She closed her eyes and remembered the smell of the leaves of Jukai Forest. When she opened them, the buildings of Towashi had grown small.

name: Boseiju Reaches Skyward // Branch of Boseiju
text:
Reach
Branch of Boseiju gets +1/+1 for each land you control.
flavor: Though they razed the surrounding forest, the builders of Towashi left Boseiju unscathed, shaping the city around the ancient tree.

name: Commune with Spirits
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: The kami of Jukai Forest accept only the most respectful petitioners.

name: Fang of Shigeki
text: Deathtouch
flavor:
"Let me give you a taste of the poison you've poured into our land."
—Shigeki, founder of the Order of Jukai

name: Favor of Jukai
text:
Enchant artifact or creature
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +3/+3 and has reach.
Channel — {1}{G}, Discard Favor of Jukai: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor: The land chooses its own champions.

name: Generous Visitor
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: It is said that one must modestly refuse a gift three times before accepting it to show humility before the kami.

name: Geothermal Kami
text: When Geothermal Kami enters the battlefield, you may return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you gain 3 life.
flavor: A mysterious kami will sometimes appear to overworked monks and offer them a warm, relaxing bath.

name: Go-Shintai of Boundless Vigor
text:
Trample
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target Shrine for each Shrine you control.
flavor: It seeks those with untamed spirits and offers wild strength.

name: Greater Tanuki
text:
Trample
Channel — {2}{G}, Discard Greater Tanuki: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: The kami permit few mortals to dwell in Jukai Forest, but the clever, playful tanuki are welcomed as friends and guardians.

name: Harmonious Emergence
text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land is a 4/5 green Spirit creature with vigilance and haste. It's still a land.
If enchanted land would be destroyed, instead sacrifice Harmonious Emergence and that land gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: Where the spirit and mortal realms overlap, the laws of reality are rewritten.

name: Heir of the Ancient Fang
text: Heir of the Ancient Fang enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: On the last day of a Jukai agent's training, they are bequeathed a powerful relic blessed by the kami.

name: Invoke the Ancients
text: Create two 4/5 green Spirit creature tokens. For each of them, put your choice of a vigilance counter, a reach counter, or a trample counter on it.
flavor: After large sections were clear-cut to build Towashi, the once-peaceful Jukai Forest grew violently hostile to outsiders.

name: Jukai Preserver
text:
When Jukai Preserver enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Channel — {2}{G}, Discard Jukai Preserver: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures you control.
flavor: "The kami grant you this boon, not I."

name: Jukai Trainee
text: Whenever Jukai Trainee blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The Order of Jukai accepts only the strongest of body and spirit. I will train until I meet their expectations."

name: Orochi Merge-Keeper
text:
{T}: Add {G}.
As long as Orochi Merge-Keeper is modified, it has "{T}: Add {G}{G}." (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor: One day the spirit and mortal realms will be one. Until then, she faithfully guards the sites where they merge.

name: Season of Renewal
text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Pavement ripped like paper as the ancient kami awoke from her long slumber beneath the city.

name: Spinning Wheel Kick
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
flavor: Members of the Order of Jukai commune with kami to enhance their martial prowess.

name: Tales of Master Seshiro // Seshiro's Living Legacy
text: Vigilance, haste
flavor:
"In times of strife, the foolish make a fist while the wise make a friend."
—*First Address of Seshiro the Anointed as Broodmaster of the Orochi Colonies*

name: Tamiyo's Safekeeping
text: Target permanent you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. You gain 2 life. (A permanent with hexproof and indestructible can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: To keep the Reality Chip out of Jin-Gitaxias's hands, the Wanderer entrusted it to Tamiyo.

name: Auriok Survivors
text: When Auriok Survivors enters the battlefield, you may return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you do, you may attach it to Auriok Survivors.
flavor: "We are Mirrodin's children. We will reclaim her—one scrap at a time, if we have to."

name: Due Respect
text:
Permanents enter the battlefield tapped this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"A display of humility is required of those who still possess such frailties."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Exclusion Ritual
text:
Imprint — When Exclusion Ritual enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent.
Players can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.
flavor:
"Your desires have become our discretion."
—Izathel, priest of the Annex

name: Inquisitor Exarch
text:
When Inquisitor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• You gain 2 life.
• Target opponent loses 2 life.
flavor:
"Skin is the prison of the blessed and the stronghold of the heretic."
—Argent Etchings, plate 64, passage 17

name: Lost Leonin
text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor: Mirrans were broken down and rebuilt, made to be loyal servants of the force they had fought.

name: Loxodon Convert
flavor: Just one drop of the glistening oil can eventually stain even a soul as stalwart as a loxodon's beyond redemption.

name: Marrow Shards
text:
({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Marrow Shards deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor:
"We are a single entity. Dissenters must be sutured into the Orthodoxy."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Porcelain Legionnaire
text:
({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
First strike
flavor:
"My new design has lightweight plating specially cultivated from heretics' spare tissues."
—Izathel, priest of the Annex

name: Shriek Raptor
text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor:
"That's no glint hawk. The skies have changed for the worse."
—Ria Ivor, White Sun partisan

name: War Report
text: You gain life equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield plus the number of artifacts on the battlefield.
flavor: Underling Ethu's 263rd report read simply "Yes, my lord. Overwhelmingly, my lord." This marked the end of the Mirran-Phyrexian War.

name: Argent Mutation
text:
Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"My world is corrupted beyond cleansing. I must prevent this from happening to others."
—Karn

name: Arm with Aether
text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand."
flavor: "Anything we can do to hurt the Phyrexian invaders is worth dying for."

name: Corrupted Resolve
text: Counter target spell if its controller is poisoned.
flavor:
"Flesh is a sickness that infects Phyrexia."
—Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

name: Defensive Stance
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/+1.
flavor:
"It isn't for fighting. It's for when the fighting's gone bad."
—Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

name: Impaler Shrike
text:
Flying
Whenever Impaler Shrike deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor:
"Interrogation is an unnecessary step for acquiring information."
—Politus, Gitaxian morphologist

name: Mental Misstep
text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Counter target spell with mana value 1.
flavor:
"Your first mistake was thinking I would let you live long enough to make a second."
—Sarnvax, Gitaxian sective

name: Mindculling
text: You draw two cards and target opponent discards two cards.
flavor:
"Why infiltrate their strongholds when what we seek resides in such a poorly guarded safe?"
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Psychic Barrier
text: Counter target creature spell. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor:
"I tolerate Phyrexians because the dragon requires it. But I have no patience for uninvited guests."
—Tezzeret

name: Spined Thopter
text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Flying
flavor:
"I appreciate the depravity of noble designs turned to devious ends."
—Tezzeret

name: Xenograft
text:
As Xenograft enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Each creature you control is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
flavor:
"I despise Vorinclex and his slobberings about 'evolution.' Only I know true progress."
—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

name: Caress of Phyrexia
text: Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.
flavor: "I am weak. Make . . . me . . . ideal."

name: Dementia Bat
text:
Flying
{4}{B}, Sacrifice Dementia Bat: Target player discards two cards.
flavor:
"When terror outweighs all other thoughts, they will understand that I am the true Father of Machines."
—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

name: Enslave
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.
flavor: Phyrexia extended its command until there was nothing left to take.

name: Evil Presence
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
flavor:
"The Accorders would lament the transformation of their cherished lands, had they lived to see it."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Geth's Verdict
text: Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life.
flavor:
"Everyone should owe you something."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Ichor Explosion
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor: The first explosion that didn't excite goblins.

name: Life's Finale
text: Destroy all creatures, then search target opponent's library for up to three creature cards and put them into their graveyard. Then that player shuffles.
flavor: The feeble resistance of the flesh is over. Phyrexia spreads its shadow over all.

name: Pith Driller
text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
When Pith Driller enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor: After boring up through the crust of Mirrodin, it turned its expertise upon the surface dwellers.

name: Praetor's Grasp
text: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it face down. Then that player shuffles. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled.
flavor: Sheoldred weaves every thread of information into a noose to hang her enemies.

name: Toxic Nim
text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: Regenerate Toxic Nim.
flavor: The nim have become roving killers marshaled by whichever thane holds tenuous leadership.

name: Artillerize
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Artillerize deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor: Phyrexian or Mirran, most goblins stick to the job they know best.

name: Flameborn Viron
flavor:
"Large or small, all will toil for the Great Work."
—Decree of Urabrask

name: Furnace Scamp
text: Whenever Furnace Scamp deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, Furnace Scamp deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor: Born of the core, and dying to stoke it.

name: Geosurge
text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact or creature spells.
flavor:
"The mountains have been corrupted. Otherwise, they would not lend me their fire so easily."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Moltensteel Dragon
text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Flying
{R/P}: Moltensteel Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: An apocalypse in dragon form.

name: Priest of Urabrask
text: When Priest of Urabrask enters the battlefield, add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor: Even in New Phyrexia, red mana sparks glimmers of individualism, passion, and freedom.

name: Rage Extractor
text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Whenever you cast a spell with {P} in its mana cost, Rage Extractor deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target.
flavor: New Phyrexia is an engine that both consumes and creates malice.

name: Razor Swine
text:
First strike
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor:
"They aren't helping the forges. Send them to the surface."
—Furnace boss, sector 12

name: Ruthless Invasion
text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Nonartifact creatures can't block this turn.
flavor:
"For the survival of our people, every conflict must now end in retreat."
—Pythor, Mirran resistance

name: Scrapyard Salvo
text: Scrapyard Salvo deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Squealstokers! Build me a glorious pile of Mirran metal. Then add yourselves to the pile."
—Furnace boss, sector 11

name: Slag Fiend
text: Slag Fiend's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifact cards in all graveyards.
flavor:
"Seal the furnace vents. Admit no others. We'll tend our forges without their tainted ways."
—Decree of Urabrask

name: Slash Panther
text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Haste
flavor: It runs an endless circuit along the ruined roads of the soon-to-be-forgotten Mirran civilization.

name: Tormentor Exarch
text:
When Tormentor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Tend the molten slag, or be the molten slag."
—Urabrask's enforcer

name: Victorious Destruction
text: Destroy target artifact or land. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor:
"The refugees look at these structures with hope. We must relieve them of this burden."
—Juex, tormentor exarch

name: Vulshok Refugee
text: Protection from red
flavor: "I will carve my people's vengeance on the face of Phyrexia."

name: Corrosive Gale
text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Corrosive Gale deals X damage to each creature with flying.
flavor:
"Wipe Sheoldred's spies from the sky. She'll see the result of our vision soon enough."
—Glissa

name: Glissa's Scorn
text: Destroy target artifact. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor:
"If it were fit to survive, it wouldn't have been so easily put down."
—Glissa

name: Greenhilt Trainee
text: {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate only if Greenhilt Trainee's power is 4 or greater.
flavor: "Our ancestors adapted to this world of metal. Just as they did, we will adapt to this world of evil."

name: Leeching Bite
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: A substantial portion of Vorinclex's forces became fuel for the rest.

name: Melira, Sylvok Outcast
text:
You can't get poison counters.
Creatures you control can't have -1/-1 counters put on them.
Creatures your opponents control lose infect.
flavor: Once a pariah, now Mirrodin's greatest hope.

name: Mycosynth Fiend
text: Mycosynth Fiend gets +1/+1 for each poison counter your opponents have.
flavor:
"I wish I could take credit for it, but nature progresses on its own, just the way it should."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Noxious Revival
text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner's library.
flavor:
"Dead or alive, my creations are stronger than Jin-Gitaxias's septic minions."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Rotted Hystrix
flavor: Vorinclex had no grand plan. The oil did its own work, evolving creatures into worthy predators.

name: Thundering Tanadon
text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Trample
flavor:
"We do not need beakers and vials to test our predators."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Viridian Betrayers
text: Viridian Betrayers has infect as long as an opponent is poisoned. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor: To secure a place in Phyrexia's ranks, they hunted their surviving kin.

name: Viridian Harvest
text:
Enchant artifact
When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, you gain 6 life.
flavor:
"In the midst of horror beyond imagining, I still see things that lift my heart."
—Ezuri

name: Hex Parasite
text: {X}{B/P}: Remove up to X counters from target permanent. For each counter removed this way, Hex Parasite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
flavor: Drawn by power, fueled by conquest.

name: Immolating Souleater
text: {R/P}: Immolating Souleater gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
flavor:
"We thank the souleaters for melting the sinful that we may be reminded of our own insignificance."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Insatiable Souleater
text: {G/P}: Insatiable Souleater gains trample until end of turn. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
flavor:
"We thank the souleaters for culling our sick so that the strong may earn their triumphs."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Trespassing Souleater
text: {U/P}: Trespassing Souleater can't be blocked this turn. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
flavor:
"We thank the souleaters for surveilling our lives that we may be preserved from our own ignorance."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Animal Boneyard
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness."
flavor:
"The animal spirits are the Ancestor's grandchildren. Remember them."
—Mystic elder

name: Aven Archer
text:
Flying
{2}{W}, {T}: Aven Archer deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: Aimed by the eyes of eagles, their arrows never miss the mark.

name: Beloved Chaplain
text: Protection from creatures
flavor: Nomad and Nantuko, eagle and elephant; all the birds and beasts are charmed by his quiet dignity.

name: Cease-Fire
text:
Target player can't cast creature spells this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: When the crimson fades from the magical embers, a final wisp of smoke will rise. Soon after, hostilities will begin anew.

name: Confessor
text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: "There will be gains for our losses. There will be rights for our wrongs."

name: Dedicated Martyr
text: {W}, Sacrifice Dedicated Martyr: You gain 3 life.
flavor:
"If he's so willing to suffer for his cause, then by all means, let us oblige him."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Devoted Caretaker
text: {W}, {T}: Target permanent you control gains protection from instant spells and from sorcery spells until end of turn.
flavor: Her eyes blaze with the strength of twenty shields. Every glance is a salvation.

name: Dogged Hunter
text: {T}: Destroy target creature token.
flavor: The relationship between hunter and hunted knows nothing of alliances.

name: Earnest Fellowship
text: Each creature has protection from its colors.
flavor:
"The world has enough strife as it is. Where would we be if we turned against each other?"
—Pianna, nomad captain

name: Gallantry
text:
Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The courageous accomplish more in a single moment than the cowardly do in a lifetime.

name: Life Burst
text: Target player gains 4 life, then gains 4 life for each card named Life Burst in each graveyard.
flavor: As uplifting as a mystic's dreams.

name: Luminous Guardian
text:
{W}: Luminous Guardian gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{2}: Luminous Guardian can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor: "There is no victory without virtue."

name: Master Apothecary
text: Tap an untapped Cleric you control: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor: It takes a remarkable cleric to turn a group of healers into a hospital.

name: Mystic Visionary
text: Threshold — Mystic Visionary has flying as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: "The aven are heralds of divinity. The greatest glory is to join them in the sky."

name: Patrol Hound
text: Discard a card: Patrol Hound gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: To the camp, it was a fierce and loyal protector. To the sentry's youngest daughter, it would always be her "Wuv Muffin."

name: Pianna, Nomad Captain
text: Whenever Pianna, Nomad Captain attacks, attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Some find inspiration in their swords. Others find it in their leaders.

name: Pilgrim of Justice
text:
Protection from red
{W}, Sacrifice Pilgrim of Justice: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: "I would die a thousand deaths before I let you harm another."

name: Pilgrim of Virtue
text:
Protection from black
{W}, Sacrifice Pilgrim of Virtue: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: "A life is measured by the lives it saves."

name: Resilient Wanderer
text:
First strike
Discard a card: Resilient Wanderer gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Nomads understand many cultures and therefore travel without fear.

name: Sphere of Duty
text: If a green source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.
flavor: Duty subdues instinct.

name: Sphere of Grace
text: If a black source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.
flavor: Grace repels darkness.

name: Sphere of Law
text: If a red source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.
flavor: Law smothers anarchy.

name: Sphere of Reason
text: If a blue source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.
flavor: Reason exposes deception.

name: Sphere of Truth
text: If a white source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.
flavor: Truth tempers fanaticism.

name: Spiritualize
text:
Until end of turn, whenever target creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"There is purity in all things. Even hatred."
—Lieutenant Kirtar

name: Testament of Faith
text: {X}: Testament of Faith becomes an X/X Wall creature with defender in addition to its other types until end of turn.
flavor:
"Belief in the Ancestor is admirable, but our enemies often demand something more . . . tangible."
—Pianna, nomad captain

name: Tireless Tribe
text: Discard a card: Tireless Tribe gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
flavor: "We've survived starvation, dwarf attacks, and heatstroke. Why should a little sandstorm bother us?"

name: Aboshan, Cephalid Emperor
text:
Tap an untapped Cephalid you control: Tap target permanent.
{U}{U}{U}: Tap all creatures without flying.
flavor: "No one can fight the tide forever."

name: Aether Burst
text: Return up to X target creatures to their owners' hands, where X is one plus the number of cards named Aether Burst in all graveyards as you cast this spell.
flavor: As fleeting as a cephalid's promise.

name: Amugaba
text:
Flying
{2}{U}, Discard a card: Return Amugaba to its owner's hand.
flavor: The aven claim it feeds on thunder and rainbows.

name: Aven Smokeweaver
text: Flying, protection from red
flavor: In a world still pained from burns, some are born already scarred.

name: Balshan Griffin
text:
Flying
{1}{U}, Discard a card: Return Balshan Griffin to its owner's hand.
flavor: It helps to have an extra direction in which to run.

name: Careful Study
text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
flavor: Books are like crops—they must be thinned for best yield.

name: Cephalid Looter
text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
flavor: "Amazing, isn't it, what humans will throw away when they're drowning?"

name: Cephalid Retainer
text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor: Cephalids whisper flattery in your ear, put jewels in your hand, spin dreams in your head, and stick knives in your back.

name: Cephalid Scout
text:
Flying
{2}{U}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.
flavor: The more they survey the dreadful dry expanses, the more the cephalids thirst to tame them.

name: Chamber of Manipulation
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Gain control of target creature until end of turn."
flavor: Politics is just a subtle form of mind control—and cephalids are master politicians.

name: Divert
text: Change the target of target spell with a single target unless that spell's controller pays {2}.
flavor: "What's the fun of being a wizard if you can't mess with people's heads?"

name: Escape Artist
text:
Escape Artist can't be blocked.
{U}, Discard a card: Return Escape Artist to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Not even my shadow knows where I am."

name: Extract
text: Search target player's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles.
flavor: To say Nixar had a splitting headache would be a bit of an understatement.

name: Laquatus's Creativity
text: Target player draws cards equal to the number of cards in their hand, then discards that many cards.
flavor: One never knows when inspiration will bubble up.

name: Patron Wizard
text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "The best way to teach is by example."

name: Pedantic Learning
text: Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from your library, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: Even the trivial can inspire.

name: Phantom Whelp
text: When Phantom Whelp attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
flavor: It lurks in the mist, waiting for stragglers to fall behind. When the fog clears, nothing remains but footprints.

name: Psionic Gift
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: For sale: Complete wizard's library. Rare scrolls, grimoires, and works of ancient spellcrafting! Slightly abridged.

name: Repel
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor:
"I have a hunch we'll be seeing that one again soon."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Standstill
text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.
flavor: "Take your time."

name: Think Tank
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor: Cephalids seek knowledge not to better themselves, but to best others.

name: Thought Devourer
text:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by four.
flavor: Thinking is hard.

name: Thought Eater
text:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by three.
flavor: The first memory it sucks out of its host is how to get rid of it.

name: Thought Nibbler
text:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.
flavor: Balshan wizards have long used them to gnaw away the memories they wish to forget.

name: Touch of Invisibility
text:
Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: Cephalids specialize in things unseen, be they politics, betrayal, or themselves.

name: Treetop Sentinel
text: Flying, protection from green
flavor: Crian's patrols afford him plenty of opportunity to take potshots at the "dirtwalkers" far below.

name: Unifying Theory
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may pay {2}. If the player does, they draw a card.
flavor: Scribbles of a lunatic and formulas of a genius are often indistinguishable.

name: Words of Wisdom
text: You draw two cards, then each other player draws a card.
flavor: Knowledge can't be kept in a bottle or sealed in a box. It yearns to be spread and shared.

name: Cursed Monstrosity
text:
Flying
Whenever Cursed Monstrosity becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.
flavor:
"Run away! It's an . . . um . . . run away!"
—Nomad sentry

name: Face of Fear
text: {2}{B}, Discard a card: Face of Fear gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor:
"It's only frightened five people to death. Not my best work."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Famished Ghoul
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Famished Ghoul: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor: Memories have distinct tastes. Its favorites are the sickly sweetness of lost love and the bitter smokiness of cruel murder.

name: Filthy Cur
text: Whenever Filthy Cur is dealt damage, you lose that much life.
flavor: Some things even fleas won't bite.

name: Fledgling Imp
text: {B}, Discard a card: Fledgling Imp gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Imps aren't born knowing how to fly—just how to annoy.

name: Hint of Insanity
text: Target player reveals their hand. That player discards all nonland cards with the same name as another card in their hand.
flavor: "Practice makes perfect, but obsession makes better."

name: Malevolent Awakening
text: {1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The most popular pit fighters are brought back for encore performances.

name: Mind Burst
text: Target player discards X cards, where X is one plus the number of cards named Mind Burst in all graveyards.
flavor: As haunting as a zombie's curse.

name: Rotting Giant
text: Whenever Rotting Giant attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard.
flavor: Wracked with rot, it wrecks and ruins.

name: Screams of the Damned
text: {1}{B}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Screams of the Damned deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: It's important to face your inner demons . . . unless they're the kind of demons that can kill you.

name: Stalking Bloodsucker
text:
Flying
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Stalking Bloodsucker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The pits feed both its thirst for combat and its thirst for blood.

name: Tombfire
text: Target player exiles all cards with flashback from their graveyard.
flavor: The fondest memories burn brightest. As they're lost forever, the flames grow hotter still.

name: Whispering Shade
text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{B}: Whispering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: It glides through the shadows until it reaches yours.

name: Zombie Assassin
text: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard and Zombie Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"Zombies don't kill. They recruit."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Zombie Cannibal
text: Whenever Zombie Cannibal deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target card from that player's graveyard.
flavor: Nothing is sacred to the undead—not even their own kind.

name: Ashen Firebeast
text: {1}{R}: Ashen Firebeast deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor:
"I'm not sure which impresses me most, its thoroughness or its intensity."
—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Barbarian Lunatic
text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Lunatic: It deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor:
"I once saw a single barbarian charge a band of twenty nomads. I've seen some crazy ones, too."
—Nomad sentry

name: Battle Strain
text: Whenever a creature blocks, Battle Strain deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: The pits swallow the weak as predators swallow prey.

name: Burning Sands
text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.
flavor:
"Pain teaches lessons no scholar can."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

name: Dwarven Grunt
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor:
Hard as stone and twice as stubborn.
—Dwarven compliment

name: Dwarven Strike Force
text: Discard a card at random: Dwarven Strike Force gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavor: Any given foothill may hide dozens of dwarves waiting to spill from their tunnels like fire ants.

name: Epicenter
text:
Target player sacrifices a land.
Threshold — Each player sacrifices all lands they control instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: Sometimes destruction is Dominaria's way of rebuilding. Sometimes it's not.

name: Flame Burst
text: Flame Burst deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Flame Burst in all graveyards.
flavor: As hot as a dwarf's rage.

name: Frenetic Ogre
text: {R}, Discard a card at random: Frenetic Ogre gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The best thing about ogres is that they never try to sneak up on you.

name: Halberdier
text: First strike
flavor: His reputation precedes him—and so does his weapon.

name: Lava Blister
text: Destroy target nonbasic land unless its controller has Lava Blister deal 6 damage to them.
flavor:
To treat flesh wounds, use earth. To treat earth wounds, use flesh.
—Barbarian saying

name: Liquid Fire
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, choose a number between 0 and 5.
Liquid Fire deals X damage to target creature and 5 minus X damage to that creature's controller, where X is the chosen number.
flavor: There's no such thing as a little bit of lava.

name: Mad Dog
text: At the beginning of your end step, if Mad Dog didn't attack or come under your control this turn, sacrifice it.
flavor: The bones it buries may be yours.

name: Magma Vein
text: {R}, Sacrifice a land: Magma Vein deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor:
Standing near a volcano
—Barbarian expression meaning "asking for it"

name: Minotaur Explorer
text: When Minotaur Explorer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
flavor: After the invasion devastated the Talruum and Hurloon tribes, the survivors began to search for other minotaurs.

name: Molten Influence
text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller has Molten Influence deal 4 damage to them.
flavor: Lavamancers make simple requests: obey or die.

name: Mudhole
text: Target player exiles all land cards from their graveyard.
flavor: "Doing okay back there, Tarv? Tarv?"

name: Need for Speed
text: Sacrifice a land: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: His feet buckled the ground, his hands cut the wind to ribbons, and he was gone.

name: Obstinate Familiar
text: If you would draw a card, you may skip that draw instead.
flavor:
"Lizards make excellent familiars. They never know when they've lost."
—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Pardic Firecat
text:
Haste
If Pardic Firecat is in a graveyard, effects from spells named Flame Burst count it as a card named Flame Burst.
flavor:
"I've heard of putting the cat out, but this isn't what I had in mind."
—Nomad sentry

name: Pardic Miner
text: Sacrifice Pardic Miner: Target player can't play lands this turn.
flavor: "Punch and drag, Toss the slag, Sift the soil, Leave the spoil."

name: Pardic Swordsmith
text: {R}, Discard a card at random: Pardic Swordsmith gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: A finely crafted blade will never meet as many blows on the battlefield as it did on the anvil.

name: Price of Glory
text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, if it's not that player's turn, destroy that land.
flavor:
"True strength lies in action. Let the weak react to me."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

name: Spark Mage
text: Whenever Spark Mage deals combat damage to a player, you may have Spark Mage deal 1 damage to target creature that player controls.
flavor: The Pardic Mountains are known for their spicy cuisine.

name: Tremble
text: Each player sacrifices a land.
flavor: Otaria's frequent tremors are the last stages of Dominaria's recovery from the Phyrexian war.

name: Whipkeeper
text: {T}: Whipkeeper deals damage to target creature equal to the damage already dealt to it this turn.
flavor: "If you don't hit your adversaries while they're down, they might get up again."

name: Bearscape
text: {1}{G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.
flavor:
"Nature is the endless dance between life and death."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Druid Lyrist
text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Druid Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: The druids and the forest are in perfect harmony. They sing the same songs.

name: Druid's Call
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, its controller creates that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.
flavor: Suffer the little creatures, for they may yet rise up and beat you senseless.

name: Gorilla Titan
text:
Trample
Gorilla Titan gets +4/+4 as long as there are no cards in your graveyard.
flavor: "I want a banana *this* big!"

name: Krosan Avenger
text:
Trample
Threshold — {1}{G}: Regenerate Krosan Avenger. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: She'd have a fearsome reputation if she left any survivors.

name: Krosan Beast
text: Threshold — Krosan Beast gets +7/+7 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: Those who see the squirrels go underground in the winter aren't ready for what emerges in the spring.

name: Leaf Dancer
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: A leaf dancer sweeps through the forest like a spring breeze, evading even the sharpest eyes and ears.

name: Metamorphic Wurm
text: Threshold — Metamorphic Wurm gets +4/+4 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: Only a handful have seen it transform. Or, from the wurm's perspective, only a mouthful.

name: Muscle Burst
text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 3 plus the number of cards named Muscle Burst in all graveyards.
flavor: As strong as a centaur's will.

name: Nantuko Elder
text: {T}: Add {C}{G}.
flavor:
Plant a field with wishes, and you will grow more wishes.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Nantuko Mentor
text: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.
flavor:
That which grows without roots cannot be uprooted.
—Nantuko teaching

name: New Frontiers
text: Each player may search their library for up to X basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles.
flavor: Spreading a blanket of growth to warm a weary world.

name: Piper's Melody
text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Those who follow nature's path eventually walk in a circle.

name: Primal Frenzy
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample.
flavor:
"Don't dismiss its anger as mindless fury. I assure you, it has purpose."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Rabid Elephant
text: Whenever Rabid Elephant becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor: When in doubt, stomp.

name: Refresh
text:
Regenerate target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor:
Death is a moth that dances toward our inner flame. The brightest fire can singe its wings.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Seton, Krosan Protector
text: Tap an untapped Druid you control: Add {G}.
flavor: "Survival of the fittest is not only the law of the pits, it is the law of nature. That is why I fight."

name: Simplify
text: Each player sacrifices an enchantment.
flavor:
A blossom's petals close inward to shut out the frost.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Spellbane Centaur
text: Creatures you control can't be the targets of blue spells or abilities from blue sources.
flavor: "No mage's deception can harm those who keep nature balanced."

name: Springing Tiger
text: Threshold — Springing Tiger gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: The ground trembled in a violent purr.

name: Still Life
text: {G}{G}: Still Life becomes a 4/3 Centaur creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
flavor: The centaurs' simple magic can undo a basilisk's gaze, but only for a short time.

name: Twigwalker
text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Twigwalker: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Break one in half and you'll get a decent—if gooey—pair of weapons."
—Centaur warrior

name: Vivify
text:
Target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
Draw a card.
flavor: Near the Krosan border, farmers keep watch over their fields lest the sod get up and wander away.

name: Woodland Druid
flavor: What is a tree? Slow hard thought. What is a flower? Swift soft flesh. What is a druid? Both.

name: Zoologist
text: {3}{G}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: "With friends like these, who needs people?"

name: Allied Reinforcements
text: Create two 2/2 white Knight Ally creature tokens.
flavor: "Our formation was scattered after Sea Gate fell. If you're fighting the Eldrazi, consider us your newest recruits."

name: Call the Gatewatch
text: Search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"I've heard it said that a Planeswalker is someone who can always run from danger. But Gideon's right: we're also the ones who can choose to stay."
—Jace Beleren

name: Dazzling Reflection
text: You gain life equal to target creature's power. The next time that creature would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor:
"The light of a felidar's horns can give even an Eldrazi pause."
—Zarra, lullmage

name: Immolating Glare
text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor:
"The sun can warm your skin or blister it, nurture your crops or wither them, light your path or blind you. She is a fickle friend, but a far worse enemy."
—Nazra of the Stone Havens

name: Iona's Blessing
text:
Enchant creature

flavor:
"Walk now in my light. When the rest of the world closes its eyes, you will still see."
—Iona

name: Kor Scythemaster

name: Makindi Aeronaut
text: Flying
flavor: "The Eldrazi have surprised us before. It's my job to make sure that never happens again."

name: Munda's Vanguard
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

name: Oath of Gideon
text:
When Oath of Gideon enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Kor Ally creature tokens.
Each planeswalker you control enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on it.
flavor: "For justice and peace, I will keep watch."

name: Spawnbinder Mage
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Tap target creature.
flavor: "Follow me. Step lightly. And resist the urge to kick them."

name: Stone Haven Outfitter
text:
Equipped creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever an equipped creature you control dies, draw a card.

name: Stoneforge Acolyte
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Equipment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Blinding Drone
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}, {T}: Tap target creature. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

"Zendikar's true gods have risen. Whether in reverence or agony, all the world will kneel."
—Ayli, high priest of the Eternal Pilgrims

name: Prophet of Distortion
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{3}{C}: Draw a card. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Draw a card.

name: Thought Harvester
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, target opponent exiles the top card of their library.

—Trinda, Hada spy patrol

name: Void Shatter
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

Surge {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Target player draws two cards.

—Jace Beleren

text:
Flying
When Cyclone Sire dies, you may put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. If you do, that land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste that's still a land.

name: Gift of Tusks

name: Oath of Jace
text:
When Oath of Jace enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards.
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry X, where X is the number of planeswalkers you control.

name: Roiling Waters
text: Return up to two target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Target player draws two cards.
flavor:
"The Roil may be unpredictable, but it is not uncontrollable."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage

name: Sphinx of the Final Word
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying, hexproof
Instant and sorcery spells you control can't be countered.

name: Umara Entangler
text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Unity of Purpose
text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Untap each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Dread Defiler
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{3}{C}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses life equal to the exiled card's power. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
flavor: It left behind an echoing emptiness more horrible than the grave.

name: Essence Depleter
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}{C}: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
flavor: When Kozilek emerged at Sea Gate, his brood lineage swarmed to the surface.

name: Havoc Sower
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}{C}: Havoc Sower gets +2/+1 until end of turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
When Inverter of Truth enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your library face down, then shuffle all cards from your graveyard into your library.

name: Kozilek's Shrieker
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}: Kozilek's Shrieker gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. {C} represents colorless mana.)

name: Kozilek's Translator
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Pay 1 life: Add {C}. Activate only once each turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
flavor: From nothingness, sustenance.

name: Oblivion Strike
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature.
flavor: It's bad enough to be torn to pieces. It's worse by far to be torn from the world itself.

name: Reaver Drone
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless you control another colorless creature.

name: Sky Scourer
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Sky Scourer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Eldrazi are nothing if not thorough."
—Jace Beleren

name: Slaughter Drone
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}: Slaughter Drone gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. {C} represents colorless mana.)

name: Unnatural Endurance
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it.
flavor:
"Eldrazi don't die easy. Sometimes they don't die at all."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Witness the End
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand and loses 2 life.
flavor:
"Ulamog stood before us at Sea Gate, ready to succumb . . . and then Kozilek arose. Whatever hope I had for our world died."
—Vandri, Kalastria emissary

name: Drana's Chosen
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: "Drana commands me. I command my nulls. And so her bidding is done."

name: Malakir Soothsayer
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Remorseless Punishment
text: Target opponent loses 5 life unless that player discards two cards or sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Repeat this process once.
flavor:
"I have suffered a thousand lifetimes of agony on this wretched world. I've far less time to share with you, but I assure you, no less pain."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Consuming Sinkhole
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)

—Ayli, high priest of the Eternal Pilgrims

name: Eldrazi Aggressor
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)

"They employ a foul sort of teamwork."
—General Tazri, allied commander

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{2}{C}: Each creature with toughness greater than its power can't block this turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}: Maw of Kozilek gets +2/-2 until end of turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
flavor:
"The Eldrazi make worse than ruins—they make a world where not even ruins stand."
—Gideon Jura

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)

name: Akoum Flameseeker
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
Devour in Flames deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

name: Fall of the Titans
text:
Surge {X}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Fall of the Titans deals X damage to each of up to two targets.
flavor: As Gideon kept the brood lineages at bay, Chandra incinerated the bound Eldrazi titans.

name: Goblin Freerunner
text:
Surge {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: There are old goblins and ambitious goblins, but very few old, ambitious goblins.

name: Oath of Chandra
text:
When Oath of Chandra enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
At the beginning of each end step, if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Oath of Chandra deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor: "If it means that people can live in freedom, yeah, I'll keep watch."

name: Pyromancer's Assault
text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Pyromancer's Assault deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: Never ask a pyromancer if that's the best she's got.

name: Tears of Valakut
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Tears of Valakut deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor: When Kozilek destroyed Sea Gate, distant Valakut could not contain its grief.

name: Baloth Pup
text: Baloth Pup has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: A young baloth channels its energy into playful destructiveness. Over time, it becomes less playful but no less destructive.

name: Bonds of Mortality
text:
When Bonds of Mortality enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{G}: Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor: Jace discovered the leyline pattern needed to anchor Ulamog and Kozilek to reality, but it was Nissa who could trace it on her world.

name: Canopy Gorger
flavor: The settlement's defenders were glad to have such a massive, ferocious creature join the fight—but less glad to see it flatten their homes along the way.

name: Harvester Troll
text: When Harvester Troll enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or land. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Harvester Troll.
flavor: Having no interest in the greater conflict, the trolls continue to prey upon whatever wanders into their domain.

name: Loam Larva
text: When Loam Larva enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor: The forest floor of Murasa is home to life as diverse and vibrant as that of the canopy above.

name: Natural State
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less.
flavor:
"Killing the Eldrazi is not enough. We must erase all memory of them from this world."
—Greenweaver Mina

name: Oath of Nissa
text:
When Oath of Nissa enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.
flavor: "For the life of every plane, I will keep watch."

name: Seed Guardian
text:
Reach
When Seed Guardian dies, create an X/X green Elemental creature token, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: It is a reminder that spring will always follow winter.

name: Squirrel Farm
text: {1}{G}: Reveal a card in your hand, covering the artist credit. Target opponent guesses the artist. If they guess wrong, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
flavor:
"And the ignorant shall fall to the squirrels."
—*Chip 2:54*

name: Meditate
text: Draw four cards. You skip your next turn.
flavor:
"Part of me believes that Barrin taught me meditation simply to shut me up."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Abeyance
text:
Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"I'm too modest a wizard to reveal the full extent of my abilities."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Sylvan Library
text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.
flavor: 2021 Legacy Champion

name: Blue Sun's Twilight
text: Gain control of target creature with mana value X or less. If X is 5 or more, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

"Where once there was ignorance, Jin-Gitaxias brought knoweldge, and an age of progress dawned."
—Monument inscription

name: Slobad, Iron Goblin
text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add an amount of {R} equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

name: Akroma's Blessing
text:
Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Ancestor's Prophet
text: Tap five untapped Clerics you control: You gain 10 life.

name: Aura Extraction
text:
Put target enchantment on top of its owner's library.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Aven Brigadier
text:
Flying
Other Bird creatures get +1/+1.

name: Aven Soulgazer
text:
Flying
{2}{W}: Look at target face-down creature.

name: Battlefield Medic
text: {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.

name: Catapult Squad
text: Tap two untapped Soldiers you control: Catapult Squad deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: Together they could hit anything between the heavens and the horizon.

name: Convalescent Care
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

name: Crowd Favorites
text:
{3}{W}: Tap target creature.
{3}{W}: Crowd Favorites gets +0/+5 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The rabble likes them. Make sure they win, then book them for tomorrow."
—Cabal Patriarch

text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.

name: Crude Rampart
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Success is one part inspiration, nine parts desperation.

name: Daru Lancer
text:
First strike
Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Although the Order frowned upon his preparations for the pits, behind closed doors most saw the fights as a necessary evil.

name: Daunting Defender
text: If a source would deal damage to a Cleric creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage.
flavor: "I will wield the stone of my homeland as though it were the fists of the Ancestor."

name: Defensive Maneuvers
text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +0/+4 until end of turn.
flavor: "Only on the battlefield can we repay all the Order has given us."

name: Disciple of Grace
text:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Dread was as foreign to her as the landscape ahead.

name: Dive Bomber
text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Dive Bomber: It deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: "Your graves will lie beneath my final nest."

name: Doubtless One
text:
Doubtless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
Whenever Doubtless One deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: "Share your devotion with me."

name: Foothill Guide
text:
Protection from Goblins
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Grassland Crusader
text: {T}: Target Elf or Soldier creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Everyone deserves a chance to live. My job is to make sure they get it."

name: Gustcloak Runner
text: Whenever Gustcloak Runner becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

name: Harsh Mercy
text: Each player chooses a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of a type chosen this way. They can't be regenerated.

"There is no greater burden than choosing who to save."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

name: Nova Cleric
text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Nova Cleric: Destroy all enchantments.

name: Sandskin
text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Shared Triumph
text:
As Shared Triumph enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
flavor: "Win together, die alone."

name: Shieldmage Elder
text:
Tap two untapped Clerics you control: Prevent all damage target creature would deal this turn.
Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Prevent all damage target spell would deal this turn.

name: Sigil of the New Dawn
text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to your hand.

"We lay our dead to rest in a beautiful bed, in hopes that the Ancestor will think it a fit cradle for the next life."
—Mystic elder

name: Unified Strike
text: Exile target attacking creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of Soldiers on the battlefield.
flavor: The tall, reedy grass of the Daru Plains rustles loudly in the winds, a perfect cover for any ambush.

name: Words of Worship
text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, you gain 5 life instead.
flavor:
"The faithful don't succumb to terror, nor are they ruled by passion. They adhere to order, for order is life."
—*Volume I, The Book of Faith*

name: Airborne Aid
text: Draw a card for each Bird on the battlefield.
flavor:
"We help our Southern Order comrades as much as we can. But the Cabal's insidious influence spreads, dividing our forces and leaving new arrivals to fend for themselves."
—Commander Eesha

name: Aphetto Alchemist
text:
{T}: Untap target artifact or creature.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Aphetto Grifter
text: Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Tap target permanent.
flavor: Aphetto con artists started working in pairs to make it less likely they'd be the victims of con artists.

name: Backslide
text:
Turn target creature with a morph ability face down.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Some things are better left unknown.

name: Crown of Ascension
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Sacrifice Crown of Ascension: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Wisdom, clear my eyes."

name: Dispersing Orb
text: {3}{U}, Sacrifice a permanent: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Like the seas, the Æther is fickle and ever-changing. If we can control one, we can master the other."
—Riptide Project director

name: Disruptive Pitmage
text:
{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Essence Fracture
text:
Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"Shaping reality is simply a matter of knowing where to apply pressure."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor

name: Fleeting Aven
text:
Flying
Whenever a player cycles a card, return Fleeting Aven to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Don't become so enthralled with magic that you forget you can fly without it."

name: Graxiplon
text: Graxiplon can't be blocked unless defending player controls three or more creatures that share a creature type.
flavor:
"Attempts to revive this ancient species have not been entirely successful, but results indicate potential for future development."
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Imagecrafter
text: {T}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor: When Otarians learned not to trust wizards, the wizards learned to adapt.

name: Information Dealer
text: {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Wizards on the battlefield, then put them back in any order.
flavor:
"One wizard is a suspect. Two wizards are a conspiracy."
—Elvish refugee

name: Ixidor, Reality Sculptor
text:
Face-down creatures get +1/+1.
{2}{U}: Turn target face-down creature face up.
flavor: "Reality has exiled me. I am no longer bound by its laws."

name: Ixidor's Will
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} for each Wizard on the battlefield.
flavor: "Some dreams should not come to be."

name: Mage's Guile
text:
Target creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "Next time, don't bother."

name: Mistform Dreamer
text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Dreamer becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Devotion, the second myth of reality: The faithful are most hurt by the objects of their faith.

name: Mistform Mask
text:
Enchant creature
{1}: Enchanted creature becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Trust, the fifth myth of reality: Every truth holds the seed of betrayal.

name: Mistform Mutant
text: {1}{U}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor: Familiarity, the first myth of reality: What you know the best, you observe the least.

name: Mistform Skyreaver
text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Skyreaver becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Conviction, the third myth of reality: Only those who seek the truth can be deceived.

name: Mistform Wall
text:
Mistform Wall has defender as long as it's a Wall.
{1}: Mistform Wall becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: Fellowship, the fourth myth of reality: As the tides of war shift, so do loyalties.

name: Nameless One
text:
Nameless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Wizards on the battlefield.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "Open your mind to me."

name: Psychic Trance
text: Until end of turn, Wizards you control gain "{T}: Counter target spell."
flavor: The Riptide Project was perhaps the only school devoted to preventing the spread of knowledge.

name: Riptide Biologist
text:
Protection from Beasts
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "I gave it two choices: life in the lab or death in the hunt."

name: Riptide Chronologist
text: {U}, Sacrifice Riptide Chronologist: Untap all creatures of the creature type of your choice.
flavor: The wizard consulted the Riptide Project about how to further his research. He wasn't prepared for what they told him.

name: Rummaging Wizard
text: {2}{U}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor: "I've got everything you'd ever need right here. Just give me some time to find it."

name: Sage Aven
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Sage Aven enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor: From their mountain aeries, aven scholars see far more than the distant horizon.

name: Standardize
text: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Each creature becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor: At that point, the wizards' argument got a lot uglier.

name: Supreme Inquisitor
text: Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Search target player's library for up to five cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
flavor: "It's hard to fight on an empty mind."

name: Words of Wind
text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand instead.
flavor:
"Be logical in all things. Do not allow instinct or passion to cloud your mind."
—*Volume II, The Book of Insight*

name: Accursed Centaur
text: When Accursed Centaur enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
flavor:
"The Cabal mocks the natural order. For its minions, death is just a pause between duties."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

name: Anurid Murkdiver
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: Aphetto's swamps are alive with the dead.

name: Boneknitter
text:
{1}{B}: Regenerate target Zombie.
Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Nothing comes together as easily as it comes apart.

name: Cabal Archon
text: {B}, Sacrifice a Cleric: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: "You are weak. I am strong. The protocol is obvious."

name: Cabal Slaver
text: Whenever a Goblin deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor: "In its natural habitat, the goblin is stupid, yet devious. Now it's stupid, devious, and powerful."

name: Crown of Suspicion
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Sacrifice Crown of Suspicion: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +2/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Darkness, hide my fear."

name: Death Match
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have target creature of their choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: The Cabal breeds many things for the pit fights, but it never breeds compassion.

name: Disciple of Malice
text:
Protection from white
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The lantern he carried did not light his way—it signaled his approach.

name: Fade from Memory
text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Proper burial is a luxury Otarians can no longer afford.

name: Fallen Cleric
text:
Protection from Clerics
Morph {4}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: The most terrifying zombies are those with just a hint of their old selves left.

name: False Cure
text: Until end of turn, whenever a player gains life, that player loses 2 life for each 1 life they gained.
flavor:
"I do unto others as others have done unto me."
—Phage the Untouchable

name: Feeding Frenzy
text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies on the battlefield.
flavor: It wasn't as much a strategy as a dim instinct to drown their prey.

name: Gangrenous Goliath
text: Tap three untapped Clerics you control: Return Gangrenous Goliath from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Cabal clerics don't heal the sick—they heal the dead.

name: Grinning Demon
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
Morph {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: It's drawn to the scent of screaming.

name: Profane Prayers
text: Profane Prayers deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
flavor: "We have ways to make you talk, but you have nothing interesting to say."

name: Shade's Breath
text: Until end of turn, each creature you control becomes a black Shade and gains "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor: The grim business of the Coliseum casts long shadows.

name: Spined Basher
