text: Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor:
"How cute. Does it do any other tricks?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Strongarm Tactics
text: Each player discards a card. Then each player who didn't discard a creature card this way loses 4 life.
flavor: "If you can't pay your gambling debts, you just might be tomorrow's main attraction at the Grand Coliseum."

name: Swat
text:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Few who cross Phage have the chance to repeat the mistake.

name: Thrashing Mudspawn
text:
Whenever Thrashing Mudspawn is dealt damage, you lose that much life.
Morph {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: It just obeys you. It doesn't *like* you.

name: Walking Desecration
text: {B}, {T}: Creatures of the creature type of your choice attack this turn if able.
flavor: Such sacrilege turns blinding grief into blinding rage.

name: Words of Waste
text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each opponent discards a card instead.
flavor:
"Terror corrupts order and paralyzes instinct."
—*Volume III, The Book of Decay*

name: Aether Charge
text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it deal 4 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor: "Is it just me, or does that meteor have teeth?"

name: Airdrop Condor
text:
Flying
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin creature: Airdrop Condor deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor: It has two kinds of droppings, neither of which is particularly pleasant.

name: Break Open
text: Turn target face-down creature an opponent controls face up.
flavor: There are two ways to resolve puzzling situations: thoughtful contemplation or force. After thoughtful contemplation, most barbarians choose force.

name: Brightstone Ritual
text: Add {R} for each Goblin on the battlefield.
flavor: Wizards fought over the stone to exploit its power. Goblins fight over it because it's shiny.

name: Butcher Orgg
text: You may assign Butcher Orgg's combat damage divided as you choose among defending player and/or any number of creatures they control.
flavor: It can kill you with three arms tied behind its back.

name: Charging Slateback
text:
Charging Slateback can't block.
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Goblins prize its hide for building rock sled runners.

name: Crown of Fury
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Sacrifice Crown of Fury: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Passion, fire my heart."

name: Custody Battle
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent gains control of this creature unless you sacrifice a land."
flavor: Goblins resolve disputes by splitting everything straight down the middle.

name: Dwarven Blastminer
text:
{2}{R}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land.
Morph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "Life is too short for something like a hunk of rock to get in my way."

name: Goblin Piledriver
text:
Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.)
Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.
flavor: Throw enough goblins at any problem and it should go away. At the very least, there'll be fewer goblins.

name: Goblin Pyromancer
text:
When Goblin Pyromancer enters the battlefield, Goblin creatures get +3/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of the end step, destroy all Goblins.
flavor: "The good news is, we figured out how the wand works. The bad news is, we figured out how the wand works."

name: Goblin Taskmaster
text:
{1}{R}: Target Goblin creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: For some reason, goblin fighting school isn't as crowded on day two.

name: Grand Melee
text:
All creatures attack each combat if able.
All creatures block each combat if able.
flavor: Hot blood washes away cold reason.

name: Lay Waste
text:
Destroy target land.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Skirk Ridge had survived earthquakes, mudslides, and meteor showers. Then the goblins moved in.

name: Nosy Goblin
text: {T}, Sacrifice Nosy Goblin: Destroy target face-down creature.
flavor: To his surprise, Furt discovered that the strange creatures were not at all like bugs.

name: Pinpoint Avalanche
text: Pinpoint Avalanche deals 4 damage to target creature. The damage can't be prevented.
flavor:
"Some solve problems by thinking and talking. Others use rocks."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

name: Searing Flesh
text: Searing Flesh deals 7 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor: Zemoo found out the hard way that "inflammable" and "flammable" mean the same thing.

name: Shaleskin Bruiser
text:
Trample
Whenever Shaleskin Bruiser attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Beast.
flavor: Its only predators are the elements.

name: Spitfire Handler
text:
Spitfire Handler can't block creatures with power greater than Spitfire Handler's power.
{R}: Spitfire Handler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Wait 'til Toggo sees this!"

name: Spurred Wolverine
text: Tap two untapped Beasts you control: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: After a few painful experiences, goblins learned not to pick their noses around the beasts.

name: Thoughtbound Primoc
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more Wizards than each other player, the player who controls the most Wizards gains control of Thoughtbound Primoc.
flavor: Efforts to use them as spies failed when they kept reporting to the enemy.

name: Wave of Indifference
text: X target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Darius?"
"Yeah?"
"There's a goblin sneaking up on you."
"So?"
"Just sayin'."

name: Words of War
text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, Words of War deals 2 damage to any target instead.
flavor:
"Passions can't be shackled by laws or mastered with logic. The choice is freedom or death."
—*Volume IV, The Book of Fire*

name: Barkhide Mauler
text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Anywhere else they would be hunted for their skins, but in Wirewood, they are safe.

name: Bloodline Shaman
text: {T}: Choose a creature type. Reveal the top card of your library. If that card is a creature card of the chosen type, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: Every creature of the forest has a name, and she knows them all.

name: Crown of Vigor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Crown of Vigor: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Life, be my shield."

name: Elvish Guidance
text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G} for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor: "Old home never forgotten, new home ours forever."

name: Elvish Pathcutter
text: {2}{G}: Target Elf creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: In harsh times, the strongest currency is cooperation.

name: Kamahl's Summons
text: Each player may reveal any number of creature cards from their hand. Then each player creates a 2/2 green Bear creature token for each card they revealed this way.
flavor: As Krosa unleashed the peace in Kamahl, he unleashed the fury in Krosa.

name: Krosan Groundshaker
text: {G}: Target Beast creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: You know it's coming when you hear the distant thunder. You know where it's been when you see the path of broken trees.

name: Leery Fogbeast
text: Whenever Leery Fogbeast becomes blocked, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor: It emerges from the mists only to feed.

name: Mythic Proportions
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +8/+8 and has trample.
flavor: The blood of Krosa turns rational beings into primal forces.

name: Overwhelming Instinct
text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, draw a card.
flavor: The biggest difference between a victory and a massacre is which side you're on.

name: Run Wild
text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and "{G}: Regenerate this creature."
flavor: Wirewood's beasts didn't seem to mind when the elves moved in. In fact, they hardly noticed them underfoot.

name: Snarling Undorak
text:
{2}{G}: Target Beast creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Most creatures in the Krosan Forest feared the Mirari's power. A few fed upon it.

name: Stag Beetle
text: Stag Beetle enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
flavor: Its voice crackles with the hum of a thousand wings beating at once.

name: Steely Resolve
text:
As Steely Resolve enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: No one in Wirewood understands what is happening. They just know it's unnatural—and coming from Krosa.

name: Symbiotic Elf
text: When Symbiotic Elf dies, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
flavor: The elves arriving in Wirewood had no homes, let alone weapons, but they knew that the forest would always provide.

name: Towering Baloth
text: Morph {6}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: The Mirari twisted all that lived in the Krosan Forest into gross mockeries of their former selves.

name: Treespring Lorian
text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: No matter your strength, the Krosan Forest is stronger. No matter your speed, the Wirewood Forest is faster.

name: Wirewood Elf
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."

name: Words of Wilding
text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, create a 2/2 green Bear creature token instead.
flavor:
"Instinct is undaunted by terror, unchained by logic. It is the path from which all other paths diverge."
—*Volume V, The Book of Life*

name: Akroan Jailer
text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: He ensures escape attempts are just that—attempts.

name: Ampryn Tactician
text: When Ampryn Tactician enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "It's all a game. You shouldn't get too attached to the pieces."

name: Enshrouding Mist
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it's renowned, untap it.
flavor: True faith is letting the blade fall without parry. True cunning is using that moment to strike a deadly blow.

name: Hallowed Moonlight
text:
Until end of turn, if a creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
Draw a card.
flavor: Creatures of darkness instinctively hide from the light.

name: Knight of the Pilgrim's Road
text: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor: "To be a knight, Gideon, is to be the shield for the meek against the cruel."

name: Kytheon's Tactics
text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures also gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
flavor: "Seal the gate. This is our fight now."

name: Sentinel of the Eternal Watch
text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.
flavor: The portcullis is superfluous.

name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: It is hunted, but not for the kill. The magic within draws others to its presence.

name: War Oracle
text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor: "When you are felled by my mace, you shall know it was divine fate."

name: Deep-Sea Terror
text: Deep-Sea Terror can't attack unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.
flavor: After stripping the sunken ships, it rises to the surface for another helping.

name: Displacement Wave
text: Return all nonland permanents with mana value X or less to their owners' hands.
flavor: The sea respects no boundaries, least of all the coast.

name: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy // Jace, Telepath Unbound
text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
flavor: "People's thoughts just come to me. Sometimes I don't know if it's them or me thinking."

name: Mizzium Meddler
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Mizzium Meddler enters the battlefield, you may change a target of target spell or ability to Mizzium Meddler.
flavor: Energy surges in Izzet labs are opportunities for experimentation.

name: Psychic Rebuttal
text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell that targets you.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may copy the spell countered this way. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: "I know what you're thinking," Jace whispered in the mage's mind. "It's not going to work."

name: Separatist Voidmage
text: When Separatist Voidmage enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"As long as each side thinks it can win, the balance holds, and the mage-rings stand."
—Alhammarret

name: Willbreaker
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, gain control of that creature for as long as you control Willbreaker.
flavor: "Master your mind, or I shall master it for you."

name: Malakir Cullblade
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Malakir Cullblade.
flavor: Each cut stains his blade with fresh blood that he samples to increase his strength.

name: Nightsnare
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, that player discards two cards.
flavor: Ravnica would be safer if mere coin was all the Dimir could steal.

name: Tainted Remedy
text: If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.
flavor:
"Drink this, brother. It will bring you rest."
—Liliana Vess

name: Unholy Hunger
text:
Destroy target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
flavor: Liliana viewed the attention of the angels as a testament to her power. Even so, they were an annoyance.

name: Avaricious Dragon
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.
flavor: Waste follows want.

name: Chandra's Ignition
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.
flavor: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.

name: Exquisite Firecraft
text:
Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to any target.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this spell can't be countered.
flavor: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.

name: Fiery Impulse
text:
Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage instead.
flavor: "Well, this got out of hand."

name: Ghirapur Aether Grid
text: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Ghirapur Aether Grid deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.

name: Mage-Ring Bully
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Mage-Ring Bully attacks each combat if able.
flavor: "Don't be rude, Beleren. We just want to enjoy the view with you."

name: Magmatic Insight
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a land card.
Draw two cards.
flavor: Chief among the tenets of Purphoros is that one must destroy in order to create.

name: Molten Vortex
text: {R}, Discard a land card: Molten Vortex deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: If you can't take the heat . . . well, that's going to be a problem.

name: Ravaging Blaze
text:
Ravaging Blaze deals X damage to target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ravaging Blaze also deals X damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: In time, not even the fire monks could keep up with Chandra.

name: Volcanic Rambler
text: {2}{R}: Volcanic Rambler deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: It moves through lava with the force of an erupting volcano.

name: Aerial Volley
text: Aerial Volley deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures with flying.
flavor: Drakes can swerve to avoid a single arrow, but they can't dodge the whole sky.

name: Joraga Invocation
text: Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor:
"A single tree does not a forest make. We are stronger when we stand together."
—Numa, Joraga chieftain

name: Skysnare Spider
text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: The only thing more ill-tempered than a griffin in a web is the spider that must subdue it.

name: Vine Snare
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 4 or less.
flavor: Nissa found that the vines of the marsh could ensnare just as well as forest vines could—maybe even better.

name: Wild Instincts
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: Nissa had only the space of a heartbeat to react, her instincts steering her blade.

name: Timetwister
text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. (Then put Timetwister into its owner's graveyard.)
flavor: 2004 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Ancestral Recall
text: Target player draws three cards.
flavor: 2005 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Mox Pearl
text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor: 2006 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Mox Jet
text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor: 2007 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Mox Ruby
text: {T}: Add {R}.
flavor: 2008 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Mox Emerald
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor: 2009 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Mox Sapphire
text: {T}: Add {U}.
flavor: 2010 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Time Walk
text: Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor: 2011 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Tolarian Academy
text: {T}: Add {U} for each artifact you control.
flavor: 2020 Vintage Champion

name: Alaborn Grenadier
text: Vigilance
flavor:
"Ever proud, ever vigilant."
—Grenadier motto

name: Bargain
text:
Target opponent draws a card.
You gain 7 life.
flavor: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

name: Festival of Trokin
text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
flavor: Everyone loves a good sale.

name: Temple Elder
text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor:
"Give us breath. Give us life. Prepare us for the day we make."
—The Alaborn "Rite of Battle"

name: Town Sentry
text: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"So he gots a sword. Big deal."
"Yeah, it's a big deal—it's a big sword!"
—Two goblins outside the gates of Trokin

name: Trokin High Guard
flavor: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

name: Volunteer Militia
flavor: People fight hardest on their own soil.

name: Armored Galleon
text: Armored Galleon can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor:
"Information equals profits. Our merchants sell it, or our pirates use it."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Déjà Vu
text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: History is the study of repetition.

name: Piracy
text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.
flavor: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

name: Steam Frigate
text: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor:
"Is it merchants or is it pirates?"
"It's Talas—there's no difference."

name: Talas Air Ship
text: Flying
flavor:
"Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Talas Merchant
flavor: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.

name: Talas Scout
text: Flying
flavor:
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Talas Warrior
text: Talas Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor: The sea is in their blood. Literally.

name: Touch of Brilliance
text: Draw two cards.
flavor: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I *do* have."

name: Wind Sail
text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: It pays to be at home both on the sea *and* in the sky.

name: Bloodcurdling Scream
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I have all the weapons my enemies have—and far deeper rage."
—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Chorus of Woe
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

name: Dakmor Bat
text: Flying
flavor: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

name: Dakmor Scorpion
flavor: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe *around* your boot, but not *in* it.

name: Dark Offering
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Hand of Death
text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor: The touch of death is never gentle.

name: Kiss of Death
text: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. You gain 4 life.
flavor:
"I'd sooner lock lips with a viper. At least I might walk away from *that*."
—Elvish scout

name: Lurking Nightstalker
text: Whenever Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The shadows know.

name: Moaning Spirit
text: Flying
flavor: The dead sing their own lullabies.

name: Muck Rats
flavor:
"Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."
—Alaborn soldier

name: Nightstalker Engine
text: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Part metal, part bone, and all death.

name: Raiding Nightstalker
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor:
"Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Goblin War Cry
text: Target opponent chooses a creature they control. Other creatures they control can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Goblins cry, soldiers fly.
Stones fly, soldiers die!"

name: Obsidian Giant
flavor: After a while, ships stopped sailing within his reach.

name: Ogre Berserker
text: Haste
flavor: The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.

name: Ogre Warrior
flavor: Assault and battery included.

name: Barbtooth Wurm
flavor: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

name: Golden Bear
flavor: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.

name: Lynx
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

name: Norwood Archers
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."
—Elvish scout

name: Norwood Riders
text: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: "Trade my moose? Sure—when I find a *horse* that can spear ten goblins at a time!"

name: Norwood Warrior
text: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The woods hold peace for those who desire it, but those who seek battle will find me."

name: Plated Wurm
flavor:
"I'd hate to see the bird that could get *this* wurm!"
—Alaborn soldier

name: Razorclaw Bear
text: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
One razorclaw is three bears too many.
—Elvish saying

name: Renewing Touch
text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Death just encourages life the more.

name: Salvage
text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor:
"What was taken shall be restored."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Sylvan Yeti
text: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

name: Greater Auramancy
text:
Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
flavor: "The wonders of Nyx do not belong solely to the gods."

name: Training Grounds
text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.
flavor: "Practice alone will not bring perfection. The practice itself must be perfect. Again!"

name: Growing Rites of Itlimoc // Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun
text:
(Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.)
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.
flavor:
"The true treasures of our world are found ni the wild places, where Ixalli's light shines brightest."
—Huatli

name: Richard Garfield, Ph.D.
text: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)
flavor: And yea he doth spake: "Let there be Magic."

name: Kor Haven
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
flavor:
"Find shelter where none but the angels can reach you."
—Kor saying

name: Dauthi Slayer
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able.
flavor:
"A wisp of life remains in the undergloom of Death: a visible form, though no heart beats within it."
—Homer, *The Iliad*, trans. Fitzgerald

name: Mise
text: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.
flavor: Statistically mind-staggering as it might seem, the term "mise" was in fact coined simultaneously by over one thousand Magic players.

name: Booster Tutor
text: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)
flavor: Make your judgment wisely: The right pack will let you defeat your nemesis, but a poor choice can only end in torment. And *Homelands*.

name: Goblin Mime
text: When you speak, sacrifice Goblin Mime.
flavor: Mung noticed a few clouds gathering in the sky. Perhaps today he could perform his "walking against the wind" routine.

name: Granny's Payback
text: You gain life equal to your age.
flavor: Few remember the exploits of Dakkon's grandmother, Eunice Blackblade.

name: Okina Nightwatch
text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Okina Nightwatch gets +3/+3.
flavor: Only the most skilled budoka could protect the Okina Shrine. Only the best of these protectors took the night watch.

name: Pouncing Jaguar
text: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor: One pounce, she's hungry—you die quickly. Two, she's teaching her cubs—you're in for a long day.

name: Armored Griffin
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: When an order for griffin barding comes in, blacksmiths prepare their forges for months of exacting work. They know griffins always detect imperfections and never haggle.

name: Three Dreams
text: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them."
—Miotri, auratouched mage

name: See Beyond
text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.
flavor: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

name: Boar Umbra
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)
flavor: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."

name: Bramble Elemental
text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor: In abandoned corners of Ravnica, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

name: Dowsing Shaman
text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

name: Dreampod Druid
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if Dreampod Druid is enchanted, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor: "Don't mistake my creations for mere vegetation. They are my children, loyal and fierce."

name: Splendid Genesis
text: Shuffle all cards in the game together and deal them into three decks. The game continues with a new player.
flavor:
She discovered with great delight that one does not love one's children because they are one's children but because of the friendship formed while raising them.
Gabriel Garciá Márquez

name: Fraternal Exaltation
text: Sneak into your parents' closet to get a deck. Your new brother is joining the game.
flavor:
... and when you want to go explore, the number you should have is four.
—Sandra Boynton

name: Phoenix Heart
text: Koni and Richard continue the game and play all games as partners forever.
flavor:
"The minute I heard my first love story,
I started looking for you, not knowing
how blind that was.
Lovers don't finally meet somewhere.
They're in each other all along."
—Rumi

name: Aura Fracture
text: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

name: Blessed Wind
text: Target player's life total becomes 20.
flavor:
"The fourth wind of ascension is Anointer, deifying the worthy."
—*Keld Triumphant*

name: Entangler
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.
flavor: "Tell me again," said Latulla, raising her fist, "how just one woman held back an entire Keldon platoon."

name: Excise
text: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor:
"Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Flowering Field
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."
flavor: Some lands are soothing, and their peace can be felt in the soul.

name: Jeweled Spirit
text:
Flying
Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: As he knows all the world completely, the world refuses him harm.

name: Mageta the Lion
text: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.
flavor: In the jungle of war there is always a Lion.

name: Mageta's Boon
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor:
When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger.
—Kipamu saying

name: Mercenary Informer
text:
Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources.
{2}{W}: Put target nontoken Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor: The problem with rebels is that they so quickly reject authority.

name: Mine Bearer
text: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor: "The Keldons may have explosive tempers, but *I* have explosives."

name: Mirror Strike
text: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target unblocked creature is dealt to its controller instead.
flavor:
"Enemies can be your weapons or your shields. Simply show them which they are."
—*The Teachings of Zho*

name: Reveille Squad
text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.
flavor: "To arms! To arms! The Lion roars!"

name: Rhystic Circle
text: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: The circle buys time—an important commodity in battle.

name: Rhystic Shield
text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor: A shield for one is good. A shield for everyone is even better.

name: Samite Sanctuary
text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor:
Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it.
—Samite creed

name: Sheltering Prayers
text: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: "It matters not if the gods hear my prayers. Jamuraa does."

name: Shield Dancer
text: {2}{W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.
flavor: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

name: Soul Charmer
text: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.
flavor: She seeks the warmth of the living.

name: Trenching Steed
text: Sacrifice a land: Trenching Steed gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: The Keldons took several of the steeds as trophies of war. They'd never seen such a light beast stand so firm.

name: Troubled Healer
text: Sacrifice a land: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor: "Which is worse: nothing to defend, or no one to defend it?"

name: Alexi, Zephyr Mage
text: {X}{U}, {T}, Discard two cards: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor: The Keldons didn't know her name, but they still cursed her in battle.

name: Alexi's Cloak
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"Doesn't look like much, does it?"
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Denying Wind
text: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
flavor:
"The third wind of ascension is Eliminator, clearing Keld's path to victory."
—*Keld Triumphant*

name: Excavation
text: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor:
"There are secrets out there begging to be rediscovered. We just need to look in the right places."
—Teferi, planeswalker

name: Gulf Squid
text: When Gulf Squid enters the battlefield, tap all lands target player controls.
flavor: If it could capture the power it wastes, it would be invincible.

name: Hazy Homunculus
text: Hazy Homunculus can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an untapped land.
flavor: They hide in dreams and whispers and faraway thoughts.

name: Heightened Awareness
text:
As Heightened Awareness enters the battlefield, discard your hand.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
flavor:
"It startles me how alive one feels on the edge of death."
—Barrin, master wizard

name: Mana Vapors
text: Lands target player controls don't untap during their next untap step.
flavor: The scent of magic can rob you of your senses, blinding you to the world.

name: Overburden
text: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land they control to its owner's hand.
flavor: The Kipamu League knew what Keld refused to acknowledge: the land could support no more.

name: Quicksilver Wall
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{4}: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: "Ogg hit wall. Ogg no kill wall. Ogg hate wall!"

name: Rethink
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its mana value.
flavor: "Are you *sure* you want to do that?"

name: Rhystic Deluge
text: {U}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor:
"I'll rain down on you with the power of magic itself. Then we'll see who prevails."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Rhystic Scrying
text: Draw three cards. Then if any player pays {2}, discard three cards.
flavor:
"The trick is to ask when no one's listening."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Ribbon Snake
text:
Flying
{2}: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: All snakes slither. Only this one soars.

name: Shrouded Serpent
text: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay {4}. If that player doesn't, Shrouded Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Many travelers have wandered into a fog only to find that it had teeth, claws, and an appetite.

name: Spiketail Drake
text:
Flying
Sacrifice Spiketail Drake: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: "The spell will have to wait," said Alexi, pointing up. "Drakes."

name: Stormwatch Eagle
text:
Flying
Sacrifice a land: Return Stormwatch Eagle to its owner's hand.
flavor: When eagles leave the sky, sailors leave the sea.

name: Sunken Field
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}."
flavor: The land is heavy with promise, the harvest ripe with betrayal.

name: Troublesome Spirit
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, tap all lands you control.
flavor: As erratic and turbulent as a summer squall.

name: Windscouter
text:
Flying
When Windscouter attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
flavor: These nimble ships were designed for hit-and-run tactics.

name: Withdraw
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "We outnumber them! Charge! Charge! Hey, where'd you guys go? Retreat! Retreat!"

name: Agent of Shauku
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Go ahead. Take it. You'll be so very powerful . . . and what harm can it do?"

name: Bog Elemental
text:
Protection from white
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.
flavor:
"When the bog walks, the wise run."
—Erissa, bog witch

name: Chilling Apparition
text:
{B}: Regenerate Chilling Apparition.
Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor: Mortal minds shrivel at its touch.

name: Coffin Puppets
text: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep and only if you control a Swamp.
flavor: The ground won't accept them.

name: Death Charmer
text: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.
flavor: It vents the chill of the grave.

name: Despoil
text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor: Nothing could grow where the vile smoke had been, and no one could breathe it and live.

name: Endbringer's Revel
text: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability but only as a sorcery.
flavor: First death. Then Shauku.

name: Fen Stalker
text: Fen Stalker has fear as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor: As silent as a shadow, and just as hard to flee.

name: Flay
text: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless they pay {1}.
flavor: The Keldons would never admit it, but Greel unsettles them, too.

name: Greel, Mind Raker
text: {X}{B}, {T}, Discard two cards: Target player discards X cards at random.
flavor: "You're Latulla's gift to me, and I always play with my presents."

name: Greel's Caress
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor: Greel's grin is far less loathsome than his touch.

name: Nakaya Shade
text: {B}: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor: Made strong by reckless magic. Made horrid by reckless strife.

name: Noxious Field
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."
flavor: Ultimately, it became a three-way battle: the land attacked both armies.

name: Outbreak
text:
You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: This plague chooses its victims.

name: Plague Fiend
text: Whenever Plague Fiend deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor: As the strange plague ravaged Jamuraa, the fiends multiplied.

name: Rebel Informer
text:
Rebel Informer can't be the target of white spells or abilities from white sources.
{3}: Put target nontoken Rebel on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor: The problem with mercenaries is that if you can buy their loyalty, others can too.

name: Rhystic Syphon
text: Unless target player pays {3}, that player loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.
flavor: Jamuraan wizards are linked together by magic, a bond that only the wicked dare exploit.

name: Rhystic Tutor
text: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Any lock can be undone, any secret revealed.

name: Soul Strings
text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.
flavor: Everyone is manipulated. It's just more obvious with the dead.

name: Steal Strength
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: With each grunt of pain from Haddad, Greel's grin widened.

name: Wall of Vipers
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Destroy Wall of Vipers and target creature it's blocking. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor:
What wall can never be climbed, but is always scaled?
—Nakaya riddle

name: Whipstitched Zombie
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whipstitched Zombie unless you pay {B}.
flavor: Pity the tailor.

name: Barbed Field
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor: Wherever they went, the Keldons transformed the land into a weapon.

name: Branded Brawlers
text:
Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
flavor:
"The sword or the lash. Choose."
—Akul, Keldon whip sergeant

name: Brutal Suppression
text: Activated abilities of nontoken Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to activate.
flavor:
"They no longer care about their own suffering. Show them something worse."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Citadel of Pain
text: At the beginning of each player's end step, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands they control.
flavor:
"Battle is our religion. This fortress is our temple."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Devastate
text: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor:
"You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Fault Riders
text: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: They turn geological upheaval into tactical advantage.

name: Fickle Efreet
text: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.
flavor: Flame chooses its own course.

name: Keldon Arsonist
text: {1}, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.
flavor:
"Fields can be replanted. Settlements can be rebuilt. Burn it all."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Keldon Berserker
text: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: They fight beyond thought, beyond fear, and beyond mercy.

name: Keldon Firebombers
text: When Keldon Firebombers enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices all lands they control except for three.
flavor:
"If there isn't enough of Jamuraa left to stand on, I will still claim it for Keld."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Latulla, Keldon Overseer
text: {X}{R}, {T}, Discard two cards: Latulla, Keldon Overseer deals X damage to any target.
flavor:
"Everything around her suffers."
—Haddad, Kipamu soldier

name: Scoria Cat
text: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.
flavor: Like a volcano, it too can erupt without warning.

name: Search for Survivors
text: Reorder your graveyard at random. An opponent chooses a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, exile it.
flavor: There's no rest for a Keldon.

name: Spur Grappler
text: Spur Grappler gets +2/+1 as long as you control no untapped lands.
flavor: Grapplers hunt in packs, driving their victims over steep mountain cliffs.

name: Veteran Brawlers
text:
Veteran Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Veteran Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
flavor: Death awaits them on both fronts.

name: Zerapa Minotaur
text:
First strike
{2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: There's no difference between bone and crystal when it's piercing your throat.

name: Calming Verse
text: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.
flavor: The chattering forest fell silent as the otherworldly song began.

name: Darba
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay {G}{G}.
flavor: Legend has it the darba gave up its wings in return for an extra stomach.

name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
text: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
flavor: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

name: Jolrael's Favor
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
{1}{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor:
"War destroys; nature renews."
—Jolrael, empress of beasts

name: Marsh Boa
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: Though a powerful constrictor, it prefers simply to drown its prey.

name: Mungha Wurm
text: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.
flavor: Cities have crumbled under its weight.

name: Pygmy Razorback
text: Trample
flavor: As a rite of passage, Kipamu youths taunt razorbacks with long sticks . . . then flee.

name: Rib Cage Spider
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Everything it sees it considers food—and with that many eyes, it's not liable to miss much.

name: Root Cage
text: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor: The Vintara Forest welcomes its enemies with a crushing embrace.

name: Silt Crawler
text: When Silt Crawler enters the battlefield, tap all lands you control.
flavor: If they could replenish the land instead of draining it, Jamuraa would be teeming with them.

name: Thresher Beast
text: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land.
flavor: It destroys everything in its path, including the path itself.

name: Verdant Field
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor: Jolrael tends the land so that the land will tend the beasts.

name: Vintara Elephant
text:
Trample
{3}: Vintara Elephant loses trample until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: Trained with the aid of rhystic magic, they become uneasy in its absence.

name: Vintara Snapper
text: Vintara Snapper has shroud as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"The snapper is still when all else moves
And strikes when all are dozing."
—*Tales of the Vintara Forest*

name: Vitalizing Wind
text: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The fifth wind of ascension is Exalter, fulfilling Keld's destiny."
—*Keld Triumphant*

name: Wild Might
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. That creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor: The hunted can become the fiercest hunters.

name: Wing Storm
text: Wing Storm deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.
flavor: A thousand wings beating as one can choke the sky itself.

name: Sickening Dreams
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: The Patriarch dreams of vile plague.

name: Nalathni Dragon
text:
Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
{R}: Nalathni Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Nalathni Dragon at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor:
These small but intelligent Dragons and their Olesian allies held back the tide of Pashalik Mons's hordes of Goblin Raiders.
*DragonCon 1994*

name: Long-Term Plans
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card third from the top.
flavor: "Wait, it'll come to me in a minute."

name: Windseeker Centaur
text: Vigilance
flavor: Loyal and passionate in battle, the Windseeker tribe roams the Green Lands near the Honeyed Sea.

name: Ogre Arsonist
text: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
flavor:
"All of Ravnica's looking for you, Dack, from the Wojek on down."
—Maytov

name: Whirling Dervish
text:
Protection from black
At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Amid this whirling hurricane of blades, there is no calm eye in which the hapless can find shelter.

name: Crovax, Ascendant Hero
text:
Other white creatures get +1/+1.
Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1.
Pay 2 life: Return Crovax, Ascendant Hero to its owner's hand.
flavor: Crovax was destined for an angel's curse, but one warped timeline saw the noble redeemed.

name: Ghost Tactician
text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Its ethereal hand confers a lifetime of experience with combat and steel.

name: Magus of the Tabernacle
text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."
flavor: The Tabernacle's disciples channel the emanations from Pendrell Vale, spreading its paradoxical demand to be both worshipped and left alone.

name: Poultice Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, {T}: Regenerate target Sliver." (The next time that Sliver would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
flavor:
"Its broad claw suggests a chitinous shield, but in fact it conceals glands that secrete a remarkably swift healing agent."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Rebuff the Wicked
text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor:
"I cannot teach you their brand of magic, but I can teach you how to defend against it."
—Tavalus, priest of Korlis

name: Retether
text: Return each Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Only creatures can be enchanted this way. (Aura cards that can't enchant a creature on the battlefield remain in your graveyard.)
flavor: The rifts reach into infinite time streams, bringing the divergent products of alternate pasts into the present.

name: Malach of the Dawn
text:
Flying
{W}{W}{W}: Regenerate Malach of the Dawn.
flavor:
"The sun rises, but the world still feels dark. Pray for the arrival of the malachim—they'll bring Dawn to the world and to our hearts."
—Sister Betje, *Miracles of the Saints*

name: Revered Dead
text: {W}: Regenerate Revered Dead.
flavor:
"The mists coalesced into silent warriors. We charged them and broke through their lines, only to see them swirl and re-form behind us."
—Golas Mahr, black knight

name: Auramancer's Guise
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it and has vigilance.
flavor: "Consider not what the mask hides, but what it can reveal."

name: Dismal Failure
text: Counter target spell. Its controller discards a card.
flavor:
"Two magi could trade spells all day and never crown a victor. The real battle is not one of power but of will. If your confidence breaks, so too shall you."
—Venser

name: Dreamscape Artist
text: {2}{U}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: He's mastered the art of sleight of land.

name: Magus of the Bazaar
text: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.
flavor: "Some trade in goods, some in secrets. My soul has walked the futures, and I offer the rare coin of possibility."

name: Synchronous Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have vigilance.
flavor:
"With a twitch of its muscles, its timeline forks. Then, just as quickly, its two selves reintegrate. Causality, strangely, seems not to mind."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Venarian Glimmer
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card with mana value X or less from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: Dream of nothing, and wake to a dream come true.

name: Wistful Thinking
text: Target player draws two cards, then discards four cards.
flavor: "To probe the wonders of the multiverse, to gaze upon worlds unspoiled by blade or spell . . . it's enough to make one weep for the possibilities denied."

name: Gossamer Phantasm
text:
Flying
When Gossamer Phantasm becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor:
"Belief matters more than truth. Every moment, belief in imaginary things alters lives while truth sits unnoticed and waits."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Merfolk Thaumaturgist
text: {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor:
"Blasted fishtails! It's not enough that they meddle with my head, but they twist my body as well."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Brain Gorgers
text:
When you cast this spell, any player may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, counter Brain Gorgers.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: In spite of their hunger, they're slow eaters.

name: Cradle to Grave
text: Destroy target nonblack creature that entered the battlefield this turn.
flavor:
"As the fell soil's appetite grows, it gulps down passersby upon their first footfall."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

name: Dash Hopes
text:
When you cast this spell, any player may pay 5 life. If a player does, counter Dash Hopes.
Counter target spell.
flavor:
"Focus an enemy's mind on what's already gone, and it's easier to take away more."
—Holux, stronghold racketeer

name: Imp's Mischief
text: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's mana value.
flavor:
"Do the innocent pay for the crimes of the guilty? Of course they do. That's the fate of the weak."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Mirri the Cursed
text:
Flying, first strike, haste
Whenever Mirri the Cursed deals combat damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirri the Cursed.
flavor: A hero fails, a martyr falls. Time twists and destinies interchange.

name: Ridged Kusite
text: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"It offers but a taste of the power that the shadows have to offer. But even that is a heady wine indeed."
—Ratadrabik of Urborg

name: Spitting Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have first strike.
flavor:
"Our lances' reach had been our saving grace in our fight against the hive. Now even that advantage is taken from us."
—Adom Capashen, Benalish knight

name: Temporal Extortion
text:
When you cast this spell, any player may pay half their life, rounded up. If a player does, counter Temporal Extortion.
Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor:
"The scythe of time or my blade at your throat—the choice is yours."
—Holux, stronghold racketeer

name: Bog Serpent
text:
Bog Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a Swamp.
When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Bog Serpent.
flavor:
"We thought it was a fallen tree trunk. Then it ate Snod."
—Sneed, goblin barkwright

name: Dunerider Outlaw
text:
Protection from green
At the beginning of each end step, if Dunerider Outlaw dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Tales of the outlaw's cruelty and might grew more embellished with each crime.

name: Kor Dirge
text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor: Rath's new evincar eliminated the brutish moggs and took a new slave race, one more reminiscent of her own feline grace.

name: Null Profusion
text:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
Your maximum hand size is two.
flavor:
"Some say that time is cyclical and that history inevitably repeats. My will is my own. I won't bow to fate."
—Volrath

name: Vampiric Link
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: The familiar's fangs deliver the master's bite.

name: Battering Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have trample.
flavor: Covered with hard shell-like plates, these slivers burrow through solid rock to carve out new nests for their hives.

name: Dust Corona
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
flavor:
"They infiltrated deep into the enemy camp under cover of darkness . . . and dirt."
—Corus, viashino warrior

name: Fatal Frenzy
text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+0, where X is its power. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor:
"I hope to have such a death—lying in triumph upon the broken bodies of those who slew me."
—Radha, Keldon warlord

name: Firefright Mage
text: {1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't be blocked this turn except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
flavor: After millennia of advancement in goblin military theory, Toggo VI realized that almost everyone is afraid of fire.

name: Needlepeak Spider
text: Reach
flavor:
"It's a testament to the forests' devastation that giant spiders now make their homes amid Dominaria's barren spires."
—Aznaph, greenseeker

name: Timecrafting
text:
Choose one —
• Remove X time counters from target permanent or suspended card.
• Put X time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card.
flavor: Oddly, an unstable time stream makes wizards want to tinker with it even more.

name: Blood Knight
text: First strike, protection from white
flavor: His is the fury of the wildfire, the boiling blood of the volcano. He fights you not because you've wronged him, but because you're there.

name: Shivan Wumpus
text:
Trample
When Shivan Wumpus enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice a land. If a player does, put Shivan Wumpus on top of its owner's library.
flavor: It's easier to move the village than to divert the wumpus.

name: Life and Limb
text: All Forests and all Saprolings are 1/1 green Saproling creatures and Forest lands in addition to their other types. (They're affected by summoning sickness.)
flavor:
"It was a sight of pain and awe—a twisted forest, migrating across the salt plain in search of richer soil."
—Edahlis, greenseeker

name: Magus of the Library
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.
flavor: The ancient books slowly crumbled, their secrets turning to dust. But their every word sings within the magus's head.

name: Mire Boa
text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{G}: Regenerate Mire Boa. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
flavor: Mire slime courses through its veins in place of blood. No sooner does it bleed than it opens its mouth to replace the loss.

name: Reflex Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have haste.
flavor:
"This sliver comes into the world a perfect predator. It's ready to hunt and devour its first meal within seconds of hatching."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Sophic Centaur
text: {2}{G}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
flavor: He endures the pain of remembering Krosa as it once was and hopes that a future generation will have need of his memories.

name: Timbermare
text:
Haste
Echo {5}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Timbermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.
flavor: Only nature wreaks such lovely havoc.

name: Utopia Vow
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor: "I'll guard this fruit and its seedling until the land is healed. My life now belongs to Dominaria."

name: Groundbreaker
text:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Groundbreaker.
flavor: The earth's memory is long, its retribution brief.

name: Healing Leaves
text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor: The elves of Llanowar don't trust in alchemy. They rely instead on pure herbs harvested from the forest's sacred heart.

name: Keen Sense
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor: Crovax sensed that Mirri wasn't ready for the curse taking hold of her. Weeping in his heart, he fled.

name: Kazandu Blademaster
text:
First strike, vigilance
Whenever Kazandu Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Kazandu Blademaster.
flavor: "If you hire a sell-sword, you'd better watch your back. Hire me, and I'll watch it for you."

name: Soltari Monk
text:
Protection from black
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor:
"Prayer rarely explains."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Jwari Shapeshifter
text: You may have Jwari Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any Ally creature on the battlefield.
flavor: "The best expedition would be an entire team of me."

name: Vodalian Illusionist
text: {U}{U}, {T}: Target creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor:
"Torahn gore these shifty fishtails! You can't even get close to one."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Brink of Madness
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, sacrifice Brink of Madness and target opponent discards their hand.
flavor:
"The fools thought me dead. But I built an empire inside my tomb."
—Kerrick, sleeper agent

name: Cruel Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.
flavor: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

name: Extinction
text: Destroy all creatures of the creature type of your choice.
flavor:
"I once had an entire race killed just to listen to the rattling of their dried bones as I waded through them."
—Volrath

name: Kalastria Highborn
text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: Each of Malakir's great families boasts a contingent of nulls appropriate to its rank in society.

name: Tortured Existence
text: {B}, Discard a creature card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"There are terrors lurking in the unseen corners of us all."
—Crovax

name: Boggart Arsonists
text:
Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Boggart Arsonists: Destroy target Scarecrow or Plains.
flavor: The Aurora transformed Nibb and Gyik from mischief-makers into feral marauders. They still don't know much about tool safety.

name: Hammer of Purphoros
text:
Creatures you control have haste.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem enchantment artifact creature token.
flavor: All the world is Purphoros's anvil.

name: Alpha Kavu
text: {1}{G}: Target Kavu creature gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Kavu leaders instinctively protect their herds from harm.

name: Awakening
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all creatures and lands.
flavor:
"There are times when destiny calls forth a people and demands an action. *Now* is the time. *We* are the people. *This* is our action. Charge!"
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Cradle Guard
text:
Trample
Echo {1}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor: Mother, sleep / Dream our lives Our roots your soul / Our leaves your bed.

name: Khalni Hydra
text:
This spell costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control.
Trample
flavor:
"In ages past, bargains were struck and promises were made. Now we must collect on our debt. Begin the hymns."
—Moruul, Khalni druid

name: Willow Dryad
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: Some think that dryads are the dreams of trees.

name: Yavimaya Scion
text: Protection from artifacts
flavor: Each time the saw blade bit, the tree spat it out.

name: Venerated Teacher
text: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.
flavor: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."

name: Deeproot Champion
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.
flavor: "No good will come from what you seek. Turn back now or suffer an ignoble death far from your home."

name: Warriors' Lesson
text: Until end of turn, up to two target creatures you control each gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."
flavor:
"Let each challenge make you a better warrior."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: Reduce to Memory
text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor:
"Do not flinch from studying the horrors of the past. History's most important lessons are cloaked in terror and tragedy."
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Dungeon Shade
text:
Flying
{B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

name: Expose to Daylight
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.
flavor:
"Lies cannot long withstand the harsh light of day."
—Lavinia

name: Moonlace
text: Target spell or permanent becomes colorless.
flavor: Once a vision of constancy in the sky, the moon had long been hidden from view by the haze that chokes the heavens. The very sight of it had become a sign that change was in the air.

name: Bleak Coven Vampires
text: Metalcraft — When Bleak Coven Vampires enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.

name: Mindmoil
text: Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
flavor:
"My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

name: Sanguine Sacrament
text: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor: "As the sun sets to make way for dawn, so we turn to darkness to bring about the coming salvation."

name: Vampiric Feast
text: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.
flavor: It's not always gold the thief is after.

name: Boiling Blood
text:
Target creature attacks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor:
Your father has no horns!
Your mother wears a bell!
You drink the milk of goats!
—Talruum taunts

name: Cult of the Waxing Moon
text: Whenever a permanent you control transforms into a non-Human creature, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor: In times of madness, people cling to the familiar, monstrous though it may be.

name: Confront the Past
text:
Choose one —
• Return target planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.
flavor: "Why, Gideon? Of all people, why save me?"

name: Starke of Rath
text: {T}: Destroy target artifact or creature. That permanent's controller gains control of Starke of Rath. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor:
"I know to whom I owe the most loyalty, and I see him in the mirror every day."
—Starke

name: Endless Wurm
text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Endless Wurm unless you sacrifice an enchantment.
flavor: Ages ago, a party of elves took cover to let one pass. They're still waiting.

name: Spectral Force
text:
Trample
Whenever Spectral Force attacks, if defending player controls no black permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
flavor:
"The spirits of old have not left us unguarded."
—Uros, Pendelhaven elder

name: Vulpine Goliath
text: Trample
flavor:
"With a diet of hydras, giants, and massive serpents, anything would get that big."
—Corisande, Setessan hunter

name: Archway Angel
text:
Flying
When Archway Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each Gate you control.
flavor: A ray of hope breaks through the shroud of rain.

name: Loxodon Gatekeeper
text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor: The gatekeepers are so fastidious that even the winds must wait to pass.

name: Aura Thief
text:
Flying
When Aura Thief dies, you gain control of all enchantments. (You don't get to move Auras.)
flavor: Illusion steals reality from the unwise.

name: Sunder
text: Return all lands to their owners' hands.
flavor: The flow of time was disrupted; like a flooding river it rose from its banks. Tolaria was drowned in an instant that stretched toward infinity.

name: Pitiless Plunderer
text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "Shame to let good gold go to the grave."

name: Repay in Kind
text: Each player's life total becomes the lowest life total among all players.
flavor: Sorin has gathered grudges for centuries, patiently awaiting the day he can exact the perfect vengeance.

name: Thundering Sparkmage
text: When Thundering Sparkmage enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Stay away from my friends!"

name: Benalish Infantry
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor:
"My favorite part of getting into the infantry was getting out again."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Planar Collapse
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Planar Collapse and destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
flavor: With heavy heart, Urza doused one world's light to rekindle another's.

name: Metathran Elite
text: Metathran Elite can't be blocked as long as it's enchanted.
flavor: If the eyes are windows to the soul, their souls are not of this world.

name: Teferi's Veil
text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)
flavor:
"I don't like to speak ill of 'walkers . . . but just what did Teferi think he was doing?"
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Invasion Plans
text:
All creatures block each combat if able.
The attacking player chooses how each creature blocks each combat.
flavor: Gerrard studied the globe as Mirri kept watch. Suddenly, his eyes widened. "This is Dominaria!"

name: Viashino Heretic
text: {1}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. Viashino Heretic deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the artifact's mana value.
flavor: "The past is buried for good reason."

name: Wake of Destruction
text: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.
flavor: Land charred black, rivers boiled, Crops and wells alike despoiled, Mountains leveled, forests felled— Footprints of the beasts of Keld.

name: Wall of Granite
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor: The wisest man builds his house *behind* the rock.

name: Elephant Grass
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Black creatures can't attack you.
Nonblack creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
flavor:
"How have I angered nature that she would imprison me in a labyrinth of grass?"
—Kasib ibn Naji, Letters

name: Argivian Find
text: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"We often bury our pasts, and then someone comes along and digs them up."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Dark Suspicions
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player loses X life, where X is the number of cards in that player's hand minus the number of cards in your hand.
flavor:
"After four thousand years, you learn to plan for betrayal."
—Urza

name: Acidic Soil
text: Acidic Soil deals damage to each player equal to the number of lands they control.
flavor: Phyrexia had tried to take Urza's soul. He was relieved that Shiv tried to claim only his soles.

name: Brand
text:
Gain control of all permanents you own. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"By this glyph I affirm your role."
—Urza, to Karn

name: Citanul Hierophants
text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Add {G}."
flavor: From deep in the caves beneath the forest, the hierophants planned the druids' raids against the enemy.

name: Gaea's Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor: The forest rose to the battle, not to save the people but to save itself.

name: Retaliation
text: Creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes blocked by a creature, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor: A foul, metallic stench clogged Urza's senses. It was then he knew his brother was no more.

name: Aura Blast
text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Draw a card.
flavor: "None of your history books mention me?" laughed Daria. "They will now."

name: Aurora Griffin
text:
Flying
{W}: Target permanent becomes white until end of turn.
flavor: Though a fierce fighter, its true value is that it inspires beleaguered forces.

name: Guard Dogs
text: {2}{W}, {T}: Choose a permanent you control. Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn if it shares a color with that permanent.
flavor:
"A good guard is alert. A great guard is also loyal."
—Benalish kennelmaster

name: Heroic Defiance
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 unless it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.
flavor:
"Wear courage as your armor. Wield honor as your blade."
—Gerrard

name: Honorable Scout
text: When Honorable Scout enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each black and/or red creature target opponent controls.
flavor: "I've faced your kind before. This time I'm ready for you."

name: Planeswalker's Mirth
text: {3}{W}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. You gain life equal to that card's mana value.
flavor:
"I enjoy a good joke as much as the next guy."
—Commodore Guff

name: Sunscape Familiar
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Green spells and blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
