flavor: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

name: Reroute
text:
Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.
flavor: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
text:
Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.
flavor: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

name: Seismic Spike
text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R}.
flavor: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all the time.

name: Sell-Sword Brute
text: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.
flavor: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

name: Stoneshaker Shaman
text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
flavor: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

name: Surge of Zeal
text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry."
—Savra

name: Torpid Moloch
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.
flavor: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

name: Viashino Fangtail
text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger."
—Simic research notes

name: Viashino Slasher
text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

name: War-Torch Goblin
text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: It deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
flavor:
"In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other."
—Agrus Kos

name: Wojek Embermage
text: Radiance — {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
flavor: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."

name: Goliath Spider
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: The glittering strands of its complex web catch everything from a buzzing gnat to a passing bloatdrake.

name: Ivy Dancer
text: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: Her ivy locks are a remnant of the wooded wilds now lost to Ravnica forever.

name: Perilous Forays
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor:
"*This* is the place? This map has got to be wrong . . . ."
—Svania Trul, wayfinder novice, last words

name: Stone-Seeder Hierophant
text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant.
{T}: Untap target land.
flavor: Her touch brings to bare stone what water and sun bring to rich soil.

name: Ursapine
text: {G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: A friendly ursapine means a constant supply of sharp spears. An unfriendly one means a constant supply of small holes.

name: Blazing Hope
text: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.
flavor:
"No shadow remains for you to hide in."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Cleansing Ray
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Vampire.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor:
"The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Famished Paladin
text:
Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.
flavor: Loyal to his queen, slave to his thirst.

name: Imperial Ceratops
text: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies."
—Huatli

name: Legion Conquistador
text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

name: Majestic Heliopterus
text:
Flying
Whenever Majestic Heliopterus attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"Its rise is like the sun's, a beautiful beginning. Its descent is like the sun's, a frightful ending."
—Huatli

name: Martyr of Dusk
text: When Martyr of Dusk dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
flavor: "Should I fall, take up our standard and carry on. The Legion must always prevail."

name: Sanguine Glorifier
text: When Sanguine Glorifier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.
flavor: For the Legion of Dusk, the Immortal Sun is a source of eternal life. When they reclaim it, they will no longer be forced to subsist on the blood of the wicked.

name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
text:
Flying
Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.
flavor:
"Pterodons tolerate no intrusion into their skies. Even the clouds must ask permission."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
text: Raid — When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Up you go, you soggy rat."

name: Hornswoggle
text: Counter target creature spell. You create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Being a merciful pirate, she saved the vampire's gold from falling overboard.

name: Sea Legs
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 as long as it's a Pirate. Otherwise, it gets -2/-0.
flavor: "When the waves pick up, either you find your feet or you lose your lunch."

name: Siren Reaver
text:
Raid — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked this turn.
Flying
flavor: "Prepare to be boarded."

name: Slippery Scoundrel
text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As long as you have the city's blessing, Slippery Scoundrel has hexproof and can't be blocked.
flavor: "I'd rather be caught red-handed than leave empty-handed!"

name: Soul of the Rapids
text:
Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: With Kumena in control of the Immortal Sun, the rapids rose from their riverbeds and the waterfalls took flight.

name: Sworn Guardian
flavor: For the River Heralds, the Immortal Sun is an object of terror and devastation. The idea that anyone would retrieve it for their own use is utterly abhorrent.

name: Arterial Flow
text: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: "It is impious to admit, but I do enjoy pirate blood. Something in the salty tang of it, the spice of rebellion."

name: Canal Monitor
flavor: The first goblin tried to swim the canal. The second built a raft. The last and craftiest goblin launched herself from a firecannon and soared over the canal, trailing smoke. All were eaten, but only one was cooked.

name: Dark Inquiry
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: "Your mind is no longer yours to waste."

name: Fathom Fleet Boarder
text: When Fathom Fleet Boarder enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life unless you control another Pirate.
flavor: Without frequent raids, orcs sometimes get bored and plunder their own ships.

name: Impale
text: Destroy target creature.
flavor: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.

name: Reaver Ambush
text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor: Onora knew with sudden, grim certainty he would never see the Great River again.

name: Sadistic Skymarcher
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Vampire card from your hand or pay {1}.
Flying, lifelink
flavor: "I will catch you, child of the sun. I will drink your life and leave you a husk, discarded in the shadows."

name: Vampire Revenant
text: Flying
flavor:
"A thick fog obscures the port of Leor, but it's not thick enough to muffle the screams."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Voracious Vampire
text:
Menace
When Voracious Vampire enters the battlefield, target Vampire you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
flavor: The purest devotion isn't the Blood Fast itself, but the craving that follows.

name: Buccaneer's Bravado
text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• Target Pirate gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor: Never underestimate the power of panache.

name: Charging Tuskodon
text:
Trample
If Charging Tuskodon would deal combat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
flavor: It doesn't hold grudges. It runs them down and impales them.

name: Daring Buccaneer
text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.
flavor: No ancient lore ties the pirates of the Brazen Coalition to the Immortal Sun. But it's a powerful ancient artifact in a city of gold—what's not to covet?

name: Needletooth Raptor
text: Enrage — Whenever Needletooth Raptor is dealt damage, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: It hatches with its ferocity fully grown.

name: Orazca Raptor
flavor:
"If you come across a raptor in the city, stay perfectly still. At least then you'll be well rested when you die."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Reckless Rage
text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.
flavor: "Hard to starboard! Starb— Abandon ship! Abandon ship!"

name: Shake the Foundations
text:
Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
Draw a card.
flavor: A threefold calamity with a single will.

name: Stampeding Horncrest
text: Stampeding Horncrest has haste as long as you control another Dinosaur.
flavor: When the golden city opened, the dinosaurs inside were eager to greet the new visitors.

name: Storm Fleet Swashbuckler
text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Storm Fleet Swashbuckler has double strike as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor: "A bolt to the eye, a blade to the neck. That's the way to clear the deck!"

name: Sun-Collared Raptor
text:
Trample
{2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"With Tilonalli's gifts, even the smallest of us can become great."
—Huatli

name: Cacophodon
text: Enrage — Whenever Cacophodon is dealt damage, untap target permanent.
flavor: When a cacophodon is angry, the whole jungle knows.

name: Cherished Hatchling
text: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."
flavor: Despite its appearance, it's anything but defenseless.

name: Giltgrove Stalker
text: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor: "The only gold I need is the sheltering shimmer of the trees."

name: Jade Bearer
text: When Jade Bearer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Merfolk you control.
flavor: "Sisora wore this, who defeated the tyrant of Azcanta, and before her Natena of Vuhana's band. May it bring you their strength."

name: Jadecraft Artisan
text: When Jadecraft Artisan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "A blade is not fully forged until it is given."

name: Jungleborn Pioneer
text: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: "We fought so long to hide this place. Let us be first to learn its wonders!"

name: Knight of the Stampede
text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: "My whisper becomes a thousand roars."

name: Swift Warden
text:
Flash
When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: A warning shout would take too long.

name: Vraska's Conquistador
text: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: Abandoning both queen and church, he chose to follow power.

name: Angrath's Ambusher
text: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.
flavor: Orcs have been enemies of the Legion of Dusk since it was formed, and the entire race has been declared anathema.

name: Swab Goblin
flavor: Though small, goblins can hold their own in a fight. Foolhardy confidence goes a long way.

name: Angelic Exaltation
text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
flavor:
"If we cannot have peace, we will have justice."
—Aurelia

name: Civic Stalwart
text: When Civic Stalwart enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "These are your streets. Defend them! This is your neighborhood. Honor it! This is your city. Save it!"

name: Ministrant of Obligation
text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor: When the price of your sins comes due, the Church of Deals is there to collect.

name: Rally to Battle
text: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.
flavor: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.

name: Resolute Watchdog
text:
Defender
{1}, Sacrifice Resolute Watchdog: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: A friend in good times, a guardian in bad times, and a savior when all else fails.

name: Spirit of the Spires
text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1.
flavor: She breathes fair winds to tired griffins and lifts songbirds beyond the reach of stalking cats.

name: Summary Judgment
text:
Summary Judgment deals 3 damage to target tapped creature.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, it deals 5 damage instead.
flavor: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.

name: Syndicate Messenger
text:
Flying
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor:
"Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings."
—Lavinia

name: Tenth District Veteran
text:
Vigilance
Whenever Tenth District Veteran attacks, untap another target creature you control.
flavor: "I keep reminding myself we do this because others can't, because we love this city. If we don't save it, no one will."

name: Watchful Giant
text: When Watchful Giant enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor: Loitering is not only illegal but unwise, since those who stay too long in one place are apt to be stepped on.

name: Arrester's Admonition
text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.
flavor: Law is the voice of reason.

name: Coral Commando
flavor: Few Ravnicans are aware of the vast reefs in their world's hidden ocean. Far beneath the great sinkholes, where the light is blue and dim, merfolk tend the coral labyrinths that feed the benthic ecosystem.

name: Eyes Everywhere
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
{5}{U}: Exchange control of Eyes Everywhere and target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "They've got eyes inside my head!"

name: Faerie Duelist
text:
Flash
Flying
When Faerie Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: Faeries are easily offended and quick to exact a quirky revenge.

name: Gateway Sneak
text:
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, Gateway Sneak can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Gateway Sneak deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: "I've been through every guildgate in this city, and no one sees me come or go."

name: Quench
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp."

name: Shimmer of Possibility
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor:
"There's something peculiar about the rain today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker

name: Skatewing Spy
text:
{5}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
flavor:
"A better Ravnica begins with a better Simic."
—Vannifar

name: Slimebind
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -4/-0.
flavor:
"Relax. It's quite harmless. And it will dissolve completely in a month or two."
—Navona, Simic field tester

name: Swirling Torrent
text:
Choose one or both —
• Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Oops!"
—Grupgrup, sluiceway technician

name: Verity Circle
text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.
{4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor:
"Here, there is only truth."
—Barvisa, Azorius emissary

name: Bankrupt in Blood
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.
Draw three cards.
flavor: "Your spirits can rest in peace, for your debts are paid."

name: Bloodmist Infiltrator
text: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Blood seeks blood, and nothing shall hold back its hunger.

name: Clear the Stage
text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"

name: Cry of the Carnarium
text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.

name: Dead Revels
text:
Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: You're only as dead as you feel.

name: Debtors' Transport
text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.

name: Drill Bit
text:
Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: Never boring.

name: Grotesque Demise
text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor:
"A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans."
—Ubea, Orzhov ministrant

name: Noxious Groodion
text: Deathtouch
flavor:
"Behold the groodion! Ichor-slurper, oozing fiend. Foulest wonder underground. Grandest vermin of them all!"
—Zalin the Gutter Bard

name: Orzhov Enforcer
text:
Deathtouch
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."

name: Orzhov Racketeers
text:
Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor: "Looks like you need protection."

name: Pestilent Spirit
text:
Menace, deathtouch
Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: Its stench corrodes steel. Its miasma sickens angels. Its finality ends hope.

name: Spire Mangler
text:
Flash
Flying
When Spire Mangler enters the battlefield, target creature with flying you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Its mandibles can leave a rider in the clouds astride a headless griffin.

name: Thirsting Shade
text:
Lifelink
{2}{B}: Thirsting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Your life is a blinding light, your breath a gale, your pulse a deafening drum. Be still. Be still."
—Dahlya Trul, "Irbitov Lament"

name: Undercity Scavenger
text: When Undercity Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Undercity Scavenger, then scry 2.
flavor:
"We grow strong by feasting on failure."
—Izoni

name: Vindictive Vampire
text: Whenever another creature you control dies, Vindictive Vampire deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
flavor: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.

name: Burning-Tree Vandal
text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.

name: Cavalcade of Calamity
text: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Cavalcade of Calamity deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
flavor: Let the Dimir worry about witnesses. For the Rakdos, screams count as applause.

name: Clamor Shaman
text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Clamor Shaman attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Little goblin. Big noise."
—Ruric Thar

name: Dagger Caster
text: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
flavor: "Keep coming. I have knives enough for everyone."

name: Deface
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature with defender.
flavor:
"Leave no stone unturned."
—Ruric Thar

name: Feral Maaka
flavor:
"Lost are the lush meadows and verdant forests, where maaka prowled and lammasu soared. Lost are the wilds, where our hearts were free."
—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

name: Gates Ablaze
text: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.
flavor: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.

name: Ghor-Clan Wrecker
text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: "Today the Rubblebelt is a bit larger. That's a good day's work."

name: Goblin Gathering
text: Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to two plus the number of cards named Goblin Gathering in your graveyard.
flavor: Two's a party. Three's a felony.

name: Rubble Reading
text: Destroy target land. Scry 2.
flavor: Gruul oracles see omens in all forms of destruction: the entrails of a maaka's prey, the flight of vultures over a battlefield, the scattering of toppled stone.

name: Rumbling Ruin
text: When Rumbling Ruin enters the battlefield, count the number of +1/+1 counters on creatures you control. Creatures your opponents control with power less than or equal to that number can't block this turn.
flavor: The Rubblebelt grows restless.

name: Scorchmark
text: Scorchmark deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: "Have you seen your face? Trust me, this will be an improvement."

name: Skewer the Critics
text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: Going to a Rakdos show is dangerous. Trying to leave early can be fatal.

name: Smelt-Ward Ignus
text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Smelt-Ward Ignus: Gain control of target creature with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "Come in, yes? Is warm!"

name: Spikewheel Acrobat
text: Spectacle {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
flavor: "Every street's a stage, and every screaming bystander's an audience."

name: Storm Strike
text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor: "My shout is thunder and my fist is lightning!"

name: Tin Street Dodger
text:
Haste
{R}: Tin Street Dodger can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with defender.
flavor: "That giant didn't even see me, let alone catch me! And I was close enough to smell him! Of course, that's not saying much."

name: Axebane Beast
flavor:
"Imagine a gigantic pine cone that's extremely territorial and always in a foul mood."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

name: Enraged Ceratok
text: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor: "There's no time to calm it down! Run!"

name: Gatebreaker Ram
text:
Gatebreaker Ram gets +1/+1 for each Gate you control.
As long as you control two or more Gates, Gatebreaker Ram has vigilance and trample.
flavor: So-called "battering rams" pale in comparison to the real thing.

name: Open the Gates
text: Search your library for a basic land card or Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"If you don't have a destination in mind, the route is all that matters."
—Tamina, district guide

name: Rampaging Rendhorn
text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
flavor: Tumult is its natural habitat.

name: Regenesis
text: Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"When you get right down to it, the difference between death and life is just a membrane-enclosed environment maintained by a metabolic process."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

name: Sagittars' Volley
text: Destroy target creature with flying. Sagittars' Volley deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control.
flavor:
"My bowstring hums in tune with the song of the Worldsoul."
—Alcarus, Selesnya sagittar

name: Saruli Caretaker
text:
Defender
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "I hold the seed of our new beginning."

name: Sauroform Hybrid
text: {4}{G}{G}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor:
"Within each of us, the potential for great power waits to be released."
—Zija, Simic mutationist

name: Stony Strength
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Untap that creature.
flavor: "What you build, we will destroy . . . and bury you in the rubble!"

name: Territorial Boar
text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Boar gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor:
"The presence of the strong will make you stronger."
—Yeva, Nature's Herald

name: Trollbred Guardian
text:
{2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor: His favorite food is kraul.

name: Wrecking Beast
text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample
flavor:
"The best construction makes the most satisfying destruction."
—Domri Rade

name: Ragefire
text: Ragefire deals 3 damage to target creature.
flavor: "Your precious laws can't save you now!"

name: The Haunt of Hightower
text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever The Haunt of Hightower attacks, defending player discards a card.
Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on The Haunt of Hightower.
flavor: It drains vitality from those it touches.

name: Deathless Angel
text:
Flying
{W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor:
"I should have died that day, but I suffered not a scratch. I awoke in a lake of blood, none of it apparently my own."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Harmless Assault
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by attacking creatures.
flavor: After encasing it in a paralyzing beam of light, the angel studied the Eldrazi as a child would study a bug, curiously and without fear.

name: Kor Line-Slinger
text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor:
"I tried to tell her to stay behind, that this fight was too dangerous. I spent the next hour tied to the rafters."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

name: Lightmine Field
text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, Lightmine Field deals damage to each of those creatures equal to the number of attacking creatures.
flavor: If you want to kill a lot of goblins, just make sure your defenses look like fun.

name: Luminous Wake
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you gain 4 life.
flavor:
"If destiny's champions have arisen to fight the Ancient Ones, then let me, too, do my part."
—Ravuel of Graypelt

name: Near-Death Experience
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.
flavor: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.

name: Puncturing Light
text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.
flavor:
"The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric

name: Soulbound Guardians
text: Defender, flying
flavor: The kor's most righteous dead are given the greatest reward: an eternity tied to the land they so cherish.

name: Stalwart Shield-Bearers
text:
Defender
Other creatures you control with defender get +0/+2.
flavor:
"Hold fast the line! Either we stop them here or we wake up in their guts!"
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

name: Time of Heroes
text: Each creature you control with a level counter on it gets +2/+2.
flavor: No one spoke. There was no need. The threat of the Eldrazi presented a simple choice: lay down your weapons and die for nothing, or hold them fast and die for something.

name: Umbra Mystic
text: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor. (If an enchanted permanent you control would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy an Aura attached to it.)
flavor: "I have found the courage to face death—twice, if I must."

name: Aura Finesse
text:
Attach target Aura you control to target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Although armor and auras can be similar, the brains required to use them are worlds apart."
—Zilan, Makindi auramancer

name: Champion's Drake
text:
Flying
Champion's Drake gets +3/+3 as long as you control a creature with three or more level counters on it.
flavor:
"'Fraid of heights? Ride a horse. 'Fraid of missing out? Rein up a drake."
—Trinda, Hada spy patrol

name: Deprive
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
Counter target spell.
flavor:
"That would have brought shame to you as a mage. Tell you what—I'll keep your secret."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Frostwind Invoker
text:
Flying
{8}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Gravitational Shift
text:
Creatures with flying get +2/+0.
Creatures without flying get -2/-0.
flavor: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.

name: Jwari Scuttler
flavor:
"Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

name: Lay Bare
text: Counter target spell. Look at its controller's hand.
flavor:
"It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others."
—Jace Beleren

name: Merfolk Observer
text: When Merfolk Observer enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.
flavor: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."

name: Phantasmal Abomination
text:
Defender
When Phantasmal Abomination becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor: Create an illusion so strong that it becomes another's reality, and you can become the master of all.

name: Reality Spasm
text:
Choose one —
• Tap X target permanents.
• Untap X target permanents.
flavor: From the moment the first Eldrazi spawn squirmed free, everything on Zendikar took on an adjusted meaning, a new slant toward or away from the waking giants.

name: Renegade Doppelganger
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Renegade Doppelganger become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)
flavor: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.

name: Shared Discovery
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap four untapped creatures you control.
Draw three cards.
flavor: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.

name: Unified Will
text: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.
flavor:
"We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure."
—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

name: Arrogant Bloodlord
text: Whenever Arrogant Bloodlord blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy Arrogant Bloodlord at end of combat.
flavor: "I would rather take my own head than be thwarted by a presumptuous wretch with a shield and a dream."

name: Baneful Omen
text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.
flavor: "Ah, again it does not bode well for you."

name: Death Cultist
text: Sacrifice Death Cultist: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.

name: Demonic Appetite
text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
flavor:
"Morality is just shorthand for the constraints of being powerless."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Escaped Null
text:
Lifelink
Whenever Escaped Null blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Left masterless by Kozilek, it wandered the wilds, raving in its ceaseless hunger.

name: Essence Feed
text: Target player loses 3 life. You gain 3 life and create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: Eldrazi grow wherever something else dies.

name: Gloomhunter
text: Flying
flavor: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.

name: Nighthaze
text:
Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Draw a card.
flavor:
"To evade the brood lineages, one must be made dark to all the senses."
—Traga, Zulaport runner

name: Perish the Thought
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player shuffles that card into their library.
flavor: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.

name: Skeletal Wurm
text: {B}: Regenerate Skeletal Wurm.
flavor: Necromancers are judged by the most powerful undead they've ever created. There are those who have animated just a single being, yet are considered the pinnacle of their dark craft.

name: Akoum Boulderfoot
text: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
"If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Devastating Summons
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X lands.
Create two X/X red Elemental creature tokens.
flavor: Things born in magma are always angry.

name: Grotag Siege-Runner
text: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor:
"I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Lagac Lizard
flavor: Tracing their ancestry back to Zendikar's earliest forms of life, lagac lizards have seen the comings and goings of planeswalkers and the Eldrazi, and the rise of the vampire clans, none of which has changed them one bit.

name: Lavafume Invoker
text: {8}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Then the ancient masters themselves, towers of rapacity, rose and began their calamitous feast."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Rage Nimbus
text:
Defender, flying
{1}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
flavor: The settlement knew there was something strange about the cloud when the old priest Mandli suddenly grabbed an axe and ran screaming into the hills.

name: Raid Bombardment
text: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
flavor: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

name: Soulsurge Elemental
text:
First strike
Soulsurge Elemental's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor: It draws its strength from those around it, but the pleasure of destruction is all its own.

name: Spawning Breath
text: Spawning Breath deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.

name: Valakut Fireboar
text: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor:
"Just move very slowly, and for the love of Ula, do not get it mad."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Bramblesnap
text:
Trample
Tap an untapped creature you control: Bramblesnap gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: A bramblesnap is formed by grafting together thirteen different plants that already hunger for meat.

name: Broodwarden
text: Eldrazi Spawn creatures you control get +2/+1.
flavor:
"The least of gods shall tower over the mightiest of mortals, and death shall reign over all."
—Crypt of Agadeem inscription

name: Gigantomancer
text: {1}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.
flavor: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."

name: Gravity Well
text: Whenever a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn.
flavor: Storms spread throughout Oran-Rief, ripping the skies with wind and rain. Airborne creatures sought shelter where they could.

name: Haze Frog
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Haze Frog enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.
flavor: Its breath leaves its prey too drowsy to struggle.

name: Leaf Arrow
text: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor:
"Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken."
—Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru

name: Living Destiny
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
You gain life equal to the revealed card's mana value.
flavor: "That our enemies are great only brings us greater hope."

name: Nema Siltlurker
flavor: In one gargantuan bite, it will swallow not only you but also the riverbank you were standing on.

name: Stomper Cub
text: Trample
flavor:
"This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Tajuru Preserver
text: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.
flavor: "No more blood shall be spilled to satisfy another's deluded lust for power."

name: Avenging Arrow
text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
flavor:
"Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

name: Azorius Arrester
text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

name: Bazaar Krovod
text: Whenever Bazaar Krovod attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor: The Hauler's Collective wields great influence over the Ravnican merchant class. Without it, little moves in the city.

name: Keening Apparition
text: Sacrifice Keening Apparition: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

name: Martial Law
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor:
"The good of society matters much more than the inconvenience of a few."
—Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

name: Palisade Giant
text: All damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control is dealt to Palisade Giant instead.
flavor: Refusing guild allegiances, she fights for those who can't protect themselves.

name: Sunspire Griffin
text: Flying
flavor:
"For each griffin wounded by an arrow, there's a corpse with a bow nearby."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Aquus Steed
text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: In water, it's as graceful as a dolphin. On land, it darts and jerks so unpredictably that few can ride it for long.

name: Chronic Flooding
text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller mills three cards.
flavor: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.

name: Conjured Currency
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.
flavor: A bargain in Keyhole Downs is always too good to be true.

name: Inaction Injunction
text:
Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Draw a card.
flavor:
"To prevent action is to prevent transgression."
—Azorius Arrester motto

name: Paralyzing Grasp
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor:
"Obviously, the Firemind's mission is worth more than a few goblins."
—Pelener, chamberlain of Niv-Mizzet

name: Psychic Spiral
text: Shuffle all cards from your graveyard into your library. Target player mills that many cards.
flavor: An elocutor forces criminals to confess to the laws they merely intended to break.

name: Runewing
text:
Flying
When Runewing dies, draw a card.
flavor: In the hands of the open-minded, a runewing quill writes wisdom of its own.

name: Skyline Predator
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor:
"It will dodge your first arrow and flatten you before there's a second."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

name: Sphinx of the Chimes
text:
Flying
Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.
flavor: "I've dreamt of the future, Isperia. Danger is on the horizon. You must heed my warning."

name: Voidwielder
text: When Voidwielder enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"He makes up his own laws, and that's dangerous to all who love peace and prosperity. Kill him on sight."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Dark Revenant
text:
Flying
When Dark Revenant dies, put it on top of its owner's library.
flavor: The murderer faced justice in the Azorius courts, but his soul was set free on a technicality.

name: Destroy the Evidence
text: Destroy target land. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.
flavor: Everyone knew the Dimir had done the damage. Everyone suspected the Izzet had hired them.

name: Grim Roustabout
text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.
flavor: He'll point you to your death row seats.

name: Perilous Shadow
text: {1}{B}: Perilous Shadow gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: There are some shadows that even the Dimir fear.

name: Shrieking Affliction
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 3 life.
flavor: A gargoyle's voice reaches pitches that will shatter glass and warp bone.

name: Terrus Wurm
text: Scavenge {6}{B} ({6}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor:
"We follow it through its tunnels, and where it dies, we farm."
—Mihas, spore druid

name: Annihilating Fire
text: Annihilating Fire deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"The most impressive performances can be done only once."
—Mote, Rakdos madcap

name: Ash Zealot
text:
First strike, haste
Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, Ash Zealot deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor: "Smarter than death? Let's see you outsmart my mace, necromancer!"

name: Batterhorn
text: When Batterhorn enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
flavor: Novice shopkeeps spend hours deciding how best to display their wares. Veterans focus on portability.

name: Bloodfray Giant
text:
Trample
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: The star performer of the Juri Revue, his shows have fans and blood spilling into the street.

name: Explosive Impact
text: Explosive Impact deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Such boorish noise is what passes for subtlety among the Boros."
—Vraska

name: Gore-House Chainwalker
text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: If the pig's blood drips on you, you're next on the chain.

name: Lobber Crew
text:
Defender
{T}: Lobber Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, untap Lobber Crew.
flavor: It's easier to just aim at everything.

name: Minotaur Aggressor
text: First strike, haste
flavor: The smelting district is home to many who see the guilds as not for them.

name: Pyroconvergence
text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Pyroconvergence deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor:
"The Izzet are an equation that turns lunacy into explosions."
—Leonos, Azorius arbiter

name: Racecourse Fury
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn."
flavor: Close finishes are settled by who can dismount and get to weapons first.

name: Survey the Wreckage
text: Destroy target land. Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavor: Goblins and architects seldom get along.

name: Tenement Crasher
text: Haste
flavor: Nothing was going to stop it—not the narrow alleys, not the Boros garrison, and certainly not the four-story Orzhov cathedral.

name: Viashino Racketeer
text: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: "You may call me a fool, selling this stuff on Orzhov turf. Well, you need to be a little reckless to survive."

name: Archweaver
text: Reach, trample
flavor: The silk of the archweavers adds structural integrity to otherwise unstable Izzet building sites.

name: Axebane Guardian
text:
Defender
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
flavor: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.

name: Axebane Stag
flavor:
"When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds."
—Kirce, Axebane guardian

name: Centaur's Herald
text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Centaur's Herald: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
flavor: The farther they go from Vitu-Ghazi, the less willing the crowd is to part for them.

name: Chorus of Might
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
flavor:
"In each of us is the strength of all of us."
—Trostani

name: Gobbling Ooze
text: {G}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Gobbling Ooze.
flavor: The furious citizens blamed the Simic for releasing it in their district. The Simic pointed out that rats were no longer a problem.

name: Horncaller's Chant
text: Create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor:
"The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?"
—Teysa, to Isperia

name: Oak Street Innkeeper
text: As long as it's not your turn, tapped creatures you control have hexproof.
flavor: The city is vast and perilous, but there are places where a weary traveler can feel very much at home.

name: Rubbleback Rhino
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: The trouble started when a street urchin bet a goblin he could ride one until the clock on Shilbo's Tower struck thirteen.

name: Savage Surge
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor: Gruul warriors never need to be stirred to battle. They need only to be shown where the battle is.

name: Towering Indrik
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.

name: Urban Burgeoning
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."
flavor: The ruins of Old Prahv became a wildspace, although all birdsong was silenced by lingering Azorius magic.

name: Royal Falcon
text: Flying
flavor: Hunter by instinct, weapon by training.

name: Willow Elf
flavor: The forest lives in the elf as the elf lives in the forest.

name: Devout Monk
text: When Devout Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor: Discipline wears many robes.

name: Dakmor Ghoul
text: When Dakmor Ghoul enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"Cursed be the sickly forms that err from honest Nature's rule!"
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Locksley Hall"

name: Goblin Settler
text: When Goblin Settler enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
flavor: Be it ever so crumbled, there's no place like home.

name: Hulking Ogre
text: Hulking Ogre can't block.
flavor: Once they realized the ogre had more size than speed, the soldiers simply went around it.

name: Rally of Wings
text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.

name: Rootborn Defenses
text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor: "No harm can come to me while the Worldsoul shelters me."

name: Lazotep Reaver
text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

name: Vengeful Dead
text: Whenever Vengeful Dead or another Zombie dies, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor: Those who don't learn from their deaths are destined to repeat them.

name: Vizier of the Scorpion
text:
When Vizier of the Scorpion enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have deathtouch.
flavor: His blessing is a curse.

name: Aven Farseer
text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Farseer.
flavor: His enemies' trickery and deceit only fuel his righteous anger.

name: Daru Spiritualist
text: Whenever a Cleric creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: He lifts the spirits of his people so they may descend in wrath upon their foes.

name: Daru Warchief
text:
Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Soldier creatures you control get +1/+2.
flavor: His victories speak for him.

name: Dawn Elemental
text:
Flying
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Dawn Elemental.
flavor: It was midnight on the Daru Plains, yet it seemed the sun was rising.

name: Dragonstalker
text: Flying, protection from Dragons
flavor:
"When the skies are filled with flames, the brave shall step forward to quench them."
—Order prophecy

name: Exiled Doomsayer
text: All morph costs cost {2} more. (This doesn't affect the cost to cast creature spells face down.)
flavor: He's desperate to hold back the future because he has seen it.

name: Guilty Conscience
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.
flavor:
Those who most feel guilt don't need to, while those who most need to feel guilt never do.
—Order proverb

name: Recuperate
text:
Choose one —
• You gain 6 life.
• Prevent the next 6 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor:
"Rise once more, so you may continue to destroy our enemies."
—Karona, false god

name: Reward the Faithful
text: Any number of target players each gain life equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor: "When you have drunk your fill, pass the cup to others who thirst."

name: Wipe Clean
text:
Exile target enchantment.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "The light of the Ancestor will scour the taint of darkness from the land."

name: Aphetto Runecaster
text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, you may draw a card.
flavor: "The ignorant fear change; the wise use it as a weapon."

name: Coast Watcher
text: Flying, protection from green
flavor: The aven came to fear the forest's clawing branches, but the watchers quickly renewed their courage.

name: Dispersal Shield
text: Counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor: "Maybe next time."

name: Faces of the Past
text: Whenever a creature dies, tap all untapped creatures that share a creature type with it or untap all tapped creatures that share a creature type with it.
flavor: The ties that bind can also strangle.

name: Metamorphose
text: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: If it's not one thing, it's another.

name: Raven Guild Initiate
text: Morph—Return a Bird you control to its owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: The Raven Guild soars on winds of unease.

name: Scornful Egotist
text: Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "Once I was human. Now I am far more."

name: Thundercloud Elemental
text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Tap all creatures with toughness 2 or less.
{3}{U}: All other creatures lose flying until end of turn.
flavor: Some days it's better to stay inside.

name: Cabal Conditioning
text: Any number of target players each discard a number of cards equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor:
"Hear only the Cabal's voice.
See only the Cabal's way.
Speak only the Cabal's word."
—Cabal mantra

name: Clutch of Undeath
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.
flavor: The hand of death recognizes its own.

name: Consumptive Goo
text: {2}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on Consumptive Goo.
flavor: Silent as fog and relentless as plague, it is wet, creeping death.

name: Fatal Mutation
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"You wear that shell as a mask. Now it's your coffin."
—Cabal cleric

name: Lethal Vapors
text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy it.
{0}: Destroy Lethal Vapors. You skip your next turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: The vapors infiltrate every crevice, poison every lung, and snuff out every life.

name: Lingering Death
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature.
flavor:
"Looks bad. I don't know if he'll make it through the night."
—Cabal cleric

name: Putrid Raptor
text: Morph—Discard a Zombie card. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: It eagerly gobbles up bits of its own rotting flesh as they fall to the swampy ground.

name: Skulltap
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor:
"Finally, a use for that head of yours."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Unspeakable Symbol
text: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: The symbols are spread throughout Aphetto, marking sites where minions of the Raven Guild and the Cabal can seek refuge.

name: Zombie Cutthroat
text: Morph—Pay 5 life. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: The single-mindedness of a zombie, the cunning of an assassin.

name: Bonethorn Valesk
text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, Bonethorn Valesk deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: Barbarians weave its spurs into ceremonial charms to proclaim their hardiness in battle.

name: Extra Arms
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor:
"Perhaps extra heads would have served them better."
—Foothill guide

name: Goblin War Strike
text: Goblin War Strike deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Goblins you control.
flavor: "Fire, aim, ready!"

name: Grip of Chaos
text: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random. (Select from among all legal targets.)
flavor: When the world is consumed by chaos, the skilled and the foolish are on equal footing.

name: Misguided Rage
text: Target player sacrifices a permanent.
flavor: Only when the anger passed did Varv realize he had burned down his home, destroyed his weapons, and killed his friend Furt.

name: Rock Jockey
text:
You can't cast this spell if you've played a land this turn.
You can't play lands if you've cast Rock Jockey this turn.
flavor: Goblins don't know much about physics, but they know lots about falling and rocks.

name: Torrent of Fire
text: Torrent of Fire deals damage to any target equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor: Dragon fire melts any instrument designed to measure it.

name: Uncontrolled Infestation
text:
Enchant nonbasic land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
flavor: The grounds of the Riptide Project are now populated only by slivers, broken beakers, and the lonely screeching of gulls.

name: Accelerated Mutation
text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor: Its food just got a lot smaller and its stomach a lot bigger.

name: Alpha Status
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares a creature type with it.
flavor: The best leaders are made by their followers.

name: Ancient Ooze
text: Ancient Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to the total mana value of other creatures you control.
flavor: The ooze has always been. The ooze will always be.

name: Claws of Wirewood
text:
Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.

name: Divergent Growth
text: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor: Nature has forgotten its own rules.

name: Krosan Drover
text: Creature spells you cast with mana value 6 or greater cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: "Sit."

name: Kurgadon
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 6 or greater, put three +1/+1 counters on Kurgadon.
flavor: When it walks through Krosa, trees step aside, leaves take wing, and the ground shudders.

name: Primitive Etchings
text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a creature card this way, draw a card.
flavor: Ancient carvings in the trees of Krosa glow with power once again.

name: Titanic Bulvox
text:
Trample
Morph {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: With natural laws abandoned, excess thrives.

name: Treetop Scout
text: Treetop Scout can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor: At home among the swaying, supple branches of the treetops, some scouts live their entire lives never touching ground.

name: Wirewood Guardian
text: Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor: Tall as a tree and probably related.

name: Apothecary Initiate
text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor: Kithkin jealously hoard their knowledge of poultices and remedies so that no outside threat can benefit from their wisdom.

name: Barrenton Medic
text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Barrenton Medic: Untap Barrenton Medic.
flavor: His dreams are filled with noxious powders and clinking vials.

name: Inquisitor's Snare
text: Prevent all damage target attacking or blocking creature would deal this turn. If that creature is black or red, destroy it.
flavor: Driven by their paranoia, kithkin inflict on their foes all the agonies they believe would have been inflicted on them.

name: Kithkin Rabble
text:
Vigilance
Kithkin Rabble's power and toughness are each equal to the number of white permanents you control.
flavor: If even the slightest hint of panic enters the thoughtweft, bakers, potters, and even medics drop their spoons and salves to take up arms.

name: Kithkin Shielddare
text: {W}, {T}: Target blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The nova glyph is a potent symbol. A shield embossed with it can resist the force of even the most determined giant.

name: Niveous Wisps
text:
Target creature becomes white until end of turn. Tap that creature.
Draw a card.
flavor: In a world devoid of sun, illumination comes from cheerless fires or the wandering spirits of the dead.

name: Pale Wayfarer
text: {2}{W}{W}, {Q}: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor: As it wandered Shadowmoor, it did not remember its crime—only its shame.

name: Prison Term
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may attach Prison Term to that creature.
flavor: Clear out the cell. Bring in the next prisoner.

name: Resplendent Mentor
text: White creatures you control have "{T}: You gain 1 life."
flavor: Thoughtweft gives new meaning to the phrase "common knowledge."

name: Safehold Sentry
text: {2}{W}, {Q}: Safehold Sentry gets +0/+2 until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor: "These bracers were worn by my father and by his mother before him. Boggart fangs have shattered on them. Cinder flames have withered at their touch. While I wear them, the safehold will not fall."

name: Strip Bare
text: Destroy all Auras and Equipment attached to target creature.
flavor:
"All glamers lifted, all lies revealed, all flesh exposed."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Windbrisk Raptor
text:
Flying
Attacking creatures you control have lifelink.
flavor: It awakened to gloom-fouled skies and responded with a righteous rage that shook the heavens.

name: Woeleecher
text: {W}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature. If you do, you gain 2 life.
flavor: One head senses the curse. The second loosens it from the soul. The third drinks it as an invigorating mist.

name: Biting Tether
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor: A chain of lies as strong as steel.

name: Briarberry Cohort
text:
Flying
Briarberry Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another blue creature.
flavor: A clique can cause far more mischief than one faerie on its own.

name: Cerulean Wisps
text:
Target creature becomes blue until end of turn. Untap that creature.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"If you see ghostly lights by the river, eat three twigs of marshroot to ward off kelpies."
—Kithkin superstition

name: Consign to Dream
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent is red or green, put it on top of its owner's library instead.
flavor:
"Dreams are fleeting. Reality even more so."
—Oona, queen of the fae

name: Deepchannel Mentor
text: Blue creatures you control can't be blocked.
flavor: The rivers can no longer provide safe passage for travelers and commerce. They serve only as highways for raiders and channels for blood and woe.

name: Drowner Initiate
text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player mills two cards.
flavor: Nothing satisfies a merrow as much as drowning what it cannot have.

name: Faerie Swarm
text:
Flying
Faerie Swarm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of blue permanents you control.
flavor: Untouched by the Aurora, Oona's faeries greeted the night like any other day.

name: Ghastly Discovery
text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)
flavor: Korrigans, spirits bound to sources of water, shriek when they come upon their own drowned corpses.

name: Isleback Spawn
text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Isleback Spawn gets +4/+8 as long as a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.
flavor: The more deadly the lake monster, the shorter the tale.

name: Kinscaer Harpoonist
text:
Flying
Whenever Kinscaer Harpoonist attacks, you may have target creature lose flying until end of turn.
flavor: The suspicious kithkin of Kinscaer patrol the skies, their eyes attuned to the shapes of outsiders.

name: Knacksaw Clique
text:
Flying
{1}{U}, {Q}: Target opponent exiles the top card of their library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor: Most of the Knacksaw clique's skills were hewn from the minds of others.

name: Leech Bonder
text:
Leech Bonder enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{U}, {Q}: Move a counter from target creature onto a second target creature. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor: Some don't know his face, but his pets are a dead giveaway.

name: Merrow Wavebreakers
text: {1}{U}, {Q}: Merrow Wavebreakers gains flying until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor: The merrows' prey have retreated from the shore, so they have learned to follow.

name: Prismwake Merrow
text:
Flash
When Prismwake Merrow enters the battlefield, target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "Seeing is believing" is a fact the merrows ruthlessly exploit in their dealings with the other residents of Shadowmoor.

name: Put Away
text: Counter target spell. You may shuffle up to one target card from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Kithkin spellbottlers spend half their time preserving old memories and the other half punishing the new.

name: Savor the Moment
text: Take an extra turn after this one. Skip the untap step of that turn.
flavor: The merrow took a moment for herself. She never gave it back.

name: Spell Syphon
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each blue permanent you control.
flavor: Warrik Brutehexer felt betrayed that his aura favored the depths of the Wanderbrine River over its rightful place, hovering around him.

name: Whimwader
text: Whimwader can't attack unless defending player controls a blue permanent.
flavor:
"Thought? Deceit? Progress? Now you're just making it hungry."
—Abral, kithkin alchemist

name: Aphotic Wisps
text:
Target creature becomes black and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Draw a card.
flavor: Merrows skulk the silty bogs around the Wanderbrine, their very thoughts stained with evil.

name: Ashenmoor Cohort
text: Ashenmoor Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another black creature.
flavor:
"None will concede a place for us in this world. If it is not for us, neither shall it be for them. We rest not until they choke in its cold ashes."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Blowfly Infestation
text: Whenever a creature dies, if it had a -1/-1 counter on it, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor: When the giant Tollek Worldslayer fell, a corruption erupted from his corpse to carry on his name.

name: Cinderbones
text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Cinderbones.
flavor: Not all coals lie quietly in their beds of cold ash.

name: Cinderhaze Wretch
text:
{T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Cinderhaze Wretch: Untap Cinderhaze Wretch.
flavor: Thick smoke billows and twists to form disturbing faces that cackle and click their teeth to the popping embers.

name: Corrosive Mentor
text: Black creatures you control have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor: Guttering cinders stoke their dying flames by snuffing out the lights of others.

name: Dusk Urchins
text:
Whenever Dusk Urchins attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
When Dusk Urchins dies, draw a card for each -1/-1 counter on it.
flavor: They spawn from shadow, wreaking chaos until shadow claims them again.

name: Gloomlance
text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was green or white, its controller discards a card.
flavor: Death stings the victim only once, but those left behind feel the pain of loss with every passing memory.

name: Hollowborn Barghest
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, each opponent loses 2 life.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, they lose 2 life.
flavor: It leaves a trail of crumpled trees and dashed dreams.

name: Hollowsage
text: Whenever Hollowsage becomes untapped, you may have target player discard a card.
flavor: Dreams of dark nights to come are said to stir in the minds of scheming hollowsages.

name: Polluted Bonds
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: The mystic bond between spellcasters and the land is just as vulnerable to attack as the casters themselves.

name: Smolder Initiate
text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life.
flavor: "Life is a circle. Death is a vicious circle."

name: Splitting Headache
text:
Choose one —
• Target player discards two cards.
• Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: All faeries delve for dreams. But not all wait for their victims to fall asleep.

name: Bloodshed Fever
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.
flavor: Cinder mages enjoy seeing their victims in the throes of bloodlust—and seeing the regret that inevitably follows.

name: Crimson Wisps
text:
Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The whispers are incomprehensible, yet cinders always hear a message of urgency.

name: Deep-Slumber Titan
text:
Deep-Slumber Titan enters the battlefield tapped.
Deep-Slumber Titan doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever Deep-Slumber Titan is dealt damage, untap it.
flavor: Do not disturb.

name: Ember Gale
text: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. Ember Gale deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.
flavor:
"Terrible wind. It whipped sparks into our skin, then stoked them even hotter!"
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Horde of Boggarts
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Horde of Boggarts's power and toughness are each equal to the number of red permanents you control.
flavor: Strategies don't come easily to the boggarts' feral minds, but full-on assault hasn't failed them yet.

name: Inescapable Brute
text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Inescapable Brute must be blocked if able.
flavor: If you think you made it past him alive, he's just teasing you.

name: Intimidator Initiate
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: Don't stand in his way, for his way is full of pointy things and fire.

name: Knollspine Invocation
text: {X}, Discard a card with mana value X: Knollspine Invocation deals X damage to any target.
flavor: Witches tempted by the power of flame gathered to study in the ruins of Spinerock Knoll.

name: Mudbrawler Cohort
text:
Haste
Mudbrawler Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another red creature.
flavor: Before a raid, the members of Wort's gang egg each other on with tales of their hunger and what they'll do to sate it, each outdoing the last.

name: Puncture Bolt
text: Puncture Bolt deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.
flavor: Cinder pyromancers measure their success by counting their enemies' smoking holes.

name: Rustrazor Butcher
text:
First strike
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor: A Bloodwort's blade is salted with blood and peppered with rust, seasoning and slaughtering in a single swipe.

name: Slinking Giant
text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Whenever Slinking Giant blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: "I need a better hiding place."

name: Wild Swing
text: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.
flavor: Though the shaman rarely got what she wanted, she was never disappointed in the result.

name: Crabapple Cohort
text: Crabapple Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another green creature.
flavor: Seven wives made seven pies from seven apples, each plucked from its branches. Now bare and bitter, it comes to exact its price: one apple, one bone.

name: Dramatic Entrance
text: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: Some things aren't worth waiting for.

name: Flourishing Defenses
text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor: Many horrors take the bait of brave elf volunteers walking alone, only to fall to the blades of rescuers lurking nearby.

name: Gloomwidow's Feast
text: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Each night, gloomwidows cull fresh prey for their ravenous hatchlings.

name: Juvenile Gloomwidow
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor: Gloomwidow venom is particularly virulent during the spider's first years, when it does most of its hunting near the forest floor.

name: Nurturer Initiate
text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: The elves alone preserve the few shreds of beauty left. There is no one else who cares.

name: Prismatic Omen
text: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
flavor: In times of portent, the land sculpts itself in accordance with the sigils burned on the sky.

name: Raking Canopy
text: Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, Raking Canopy deals 4 damage to it.
flavor:
"Raven's Run has awoken, and ravens will no longer cry in its branches."
—Roon Ghastbark

name: Roughshod Mentor
text: Green creatures you control have trample.
flavor: He didn't hear the cries of the treefolk whose branches he snapped or of the elves caught underfoot. He had eyes only for the path ahead.

name: Toil to Renown
text: You gain 1 life for each tapped artifact, creature, and land you control.
