text: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor: Phyrexia's machines take inspiration from nature. Twisted, disturbing inspiration.

name: Vulshok Replica
text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: It deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: All the fury of the Vulshok with only a trace of their recklessness.

name: Wall of Tanglecord
text:
Defender
{G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Rootlike fibers travel far from Mirrodin's metallic forests, emerging from the crust to drink in the mana-infused sunlight.

name: Gift of Estates
text: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor:
"We asked for a home and received the world."
—*Scroll of Nine Blessings*

name: Whirlwind Denial
text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor:
"If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."
—*Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft*

name: Agonizing Remorse
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
flavor:
"Guilt is not absolution. Regret is not justice. But it is right that you suffer."
—Extus Narr

name: Contemplation
text: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"How fascinating it is to watch the machinations of one's own mind play themselves out."
—Volrath

name: Hidden Retreat
text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by target instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor: After an hour in the hidey-hole, Squee seriously pondered the advantages of danger over boredom.

name: Lancers en-Kor
text:
Trample
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Lancers en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: Nearly all sets of Kor twins are trained as lancers.

name: Nomads en-Kor
text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Samite Blessing
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage."
flavor:
Knit bone, darn flesh, Stitch skin, weave breath.
—Samite healing ritual

name: Scapegoat
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Return any number of target creatures you control to their owner's hand.
flavor: "Enjoy your deception, Vuel," Gerrard said as Volrath's features melted from the dead shapeshifter. "I'll count this one as practice."

name: Spirit en-Kor
text:
Flying
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor:
Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth.
—Kor requiem

name: Temper
text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor:
"I don't need a plan, just a goal. The rest will follow on its own."
—Gerrard

name: Warrior en-Kor
text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: Only a matter as vital as destroying Volrath could bring together the reclusive Kor people.

name: Warrior Angel
text:
Flying
Whenever Warrior Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: She represents not hope, but hope's desperate fury.

name: Cloud Spirit
text:
Flying
Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
flavor:
Clouds are the soil, dreams are the crop.
—Kor saying

name: Contempt
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature attacks, return it and Contempt to their owners' hands at end of combat.
flavor:
"Predictable little man. In all these years you taught me so much yet learned so little."
—Volrath, to Starke

name: Dream Halls
text: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.
flavor: Within without.

name: Hammerhead Shark
text: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

name: Hesitation
text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Hesitation and counter that spell.
flavor: Gerrard hesitated, looking up at the enemy ship. The future hesitated with him, changed forever by the pause.

name: Leap
text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: Mirri leapt quickly and silently. The guard died likewise.

name: Rebound
text: Change the target of target spell that targets only a player. The new target must be a player.
flavor: Insult, like an arrow, is beyond control once loosed.

name: Spindrift Drake
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Spindrift Drake unless you pay {U}.
flavor: Sea brine for blood, washing foam for laughter.

name: Walking Dream
text:
Walking Dream can't be blocked.
Walking Dream doesn't untap during your untap step if an opponent controls two or more creatures.
flavor: Dreams, by definition, live shorter lives than those who dream them.

name: Wall of Tears
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Tears blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.
flavor:
"Many have been lost to pity."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Bottomless Pit
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card at random.
flavor:
"I'm sure it came with the place. I don't think you build one on purpose."
—Gerrard

name: Cannibalize
text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.
flavor: "Mine."

name: Dauthi Trapper
text: {T}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: Merfolk tell their young of Dandân, humans of Rag Man. Dal tell tales of the Dauthi, and they are far worse.

name: Morgue Thrull
text: Sacrifice Morgue Thrull: Mill three cards.
flavor: It's so hard to find good help these days.

name: Mortuary
text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put that card on top of your library.
flavor:
"Think of them not as failures but as works in progress."
—Volrath

name: Rabid Rats
text: {T}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Every sentence in Volrath's prisons ends the same way.

name: Stronghold Taskmaster
text: Other black creatures get -1/-1.
flavor:
"With the completion of each joyous task, we are closer to Yawgmoth's divine vision."
—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Torment
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor:
"Volrath has killed me. All that remains of me is the scar!"
—Tahngarth

name: Wall of Souls
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor:
"It is the nature of evil to turn you against yourself."
—Starke

name: Amok
text: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: Crovax's rage was horrifying. Within moments only blood and shreds of flesh remained of the shapeshifter.

name: Flowstone Hellion
text:
Haste
{0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Volrath leaves no stone untrained.

name: Flowstone Mauler
text:
Trample
{R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.

name: Furnace Spirit
text:
Haste
{R}: Furnace Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: If it can survive the Furnace, you don't want it near you.

name: Heat of Battle
text: Whenever a creature blocks, Heat of Battle deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: "Takara, it's me!" shouted Starke. It was no use—she obeyed Volrath.

name: Mob Justice
text: Mob Justice deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor: A single stone can start an avalanche.

name: Mogg Bombers
text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Mogg Bombers and it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Behind every great mogg bomber is another mogg with a shovel and a basket.

name: Mogg Maniac
text: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor: Stand clear if he gets an itch.

name: Wall of Razors
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
flavor:
"In this blessed structure let the very walls baptize themselves in the blood of intruders."
—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Carnassid
text:
Trample
{1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.
flavor: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

name: Crossbow Ambush
text: Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
There is no drake that flies faster than a crossbow bolt.
—Vec saying

name: Elven Rite
text: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.
flavor: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

name: Endangered Armodon
text: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.
flavor: These are its last days. Its doom to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

name: Lowland Basilisk
text: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.

name: Skyshroud Archer
text: {T}: Target creature with flying gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: In Rath, arrows are guided not by virtue but by necessity.

name: Skyshroud Troopers
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor:
"We were not made for war. Like flowstone, Volrath shaped us to it."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Volrath's Gardens
text: {2}, Tap an untapped creature you control: You gain 2 life. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "Watch yourself," warned Starke. "These plants aren't nice when they're hungry."

name: Volrath's Stronghold
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: The seed of a world's evil.

name: Ageless Guardian
flavor: Ancient ruins dot the world of Arcavios, most older than Strixhaven itself and many still guarded by soldiers from the Blood Age, centuries after their deaths.

name: Beaming Defiance
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor:
"I've lived too long in my father's shadow. It's time to find my own light."
—Killian, Silverquill mage-student

name: Clever Lumimancer
text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Clever Lumimancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "You're too dim to realize it, but you've already lost."

name: Defend the Campus
text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: Professors scrambled to push the mage hunters back, leaving the heart of Strixhaven undefended.

name: Eager First-Year
text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Eager First-Year gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Today, she learns the basics. She'll knock out advanced theory later this week.

name: Expel
text: Exile target tapped creature.
flavor: Quintorius was a daydreamer, far happier digging through history books than practicing battle tactics. He agreed with the military academy on only one thing: he did not belong in their ranks.

name: Guiding Voice
text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: When honormancers work together, their compliments are complementary.

name: Professor of Symbology
text: When Professor of Symbology enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: "A language isn't dead until we stop learning from it."

name: Secret Rendezvous
text: You and target opponent each draw three cards.
flavor: Strixhaven's five colleges encourage natural rivalries among the students, but some bonds transcend all barriers.

name: Star Pupil
text:
Star Pupil enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Star Pupil dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor: "When I'm done here, they'll name entire buildings after me."

name: Stonebinder's Familiar
text: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Stonebinder's Familiar. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor:
"Hey, my great-great-grandfather had a dog just like that!"
—Dradiel, Lorehold mage-student

name: Stonerise Spirit
text:
Flying
{4}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: The carved cliffs of Pillardrop thrum with the sounds of ancient spirits rising from the past.

name: Study Break
text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: "You've been cramming all night. You're taking a nap whether you like it or not."

name: Arcane Subtraction
text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: The class learned little that day.

name: Burrog Befuddler
text:
Flash
When Burrog Befuddler enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: Students who seek river herbs in Doradur quickly find themselves slightly damp and thoroughly surrounded.

name: Divide by Zero
text:
Return target spell or permanent with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: "Misery. Inadequacy. Failure. The common denominator is you."

name: Frost Trickster
text:
Flying
When Frost Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: The most important skill in a Mage Tower match is keeping one's cool.

name: Kelpie Guide
text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent you control.
{T}: Tap target permanent. Activate only if you control eight or more lands.
flavor: Kelpies are drawn to paradoxes, making them ideal companions for Quandrix mages.

name: Mentor's Guidance
text:
When you cast this spell, copy it if you control a planeswalker, Cleric, Druid, Shaman, Warlock, or Wizard.
Scry 1, then draw a card.
flavor: Kasmina had encouraged the twins to apply. Strixhaven would test not only their magical potential, but also their character.

name: A-Mentor's Guidance
text:
When you cast this spell, copy it if you control a planeswalker, Cleric, Druid, Shaman, Warlock, or Wizard.
Scry 1, then draw a card.
flavor: Kasmina had encouraged the twins to apply. Strixhaven would test not only their magical potential, but also their character.

name: Mercurial Transformation
text: Until end of turn, target nonland permanent loses all abilities and becomes your choice of a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1 or a blue Octopus creature with base power and toughness 4/4.
flavor: "For sun's sake, I just want a crab!"

name: Pop Quiz
text:
Draw a card.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: "Today is hydromancy? I thought it was amplimancy! I studied for amplimancy!"

name: Reject
text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {3}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor:
"Grux, for the last time, you have to do more than simply shout 'Apply!' at the administrators."
—Pavil, admissions officer

name: Resculpt
text: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
flavor: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.

name: Serpentine Curve
text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Math bites."
—Bim, Lorehold mage-student

name: Snow Day
text:
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor:
"Advanced Elemental Manifestations is canceled until all students have thawed."
—Prismari dormitory notice

name: Soothsayer Adept
text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: One of the first lessons divination students learn is how to recognize the difference between a portent and a simple surface ripple.

name: Symmetry Sage
text:
Flying
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control has base power 2 until end of turn.
flavor: "By my calculations, I should be able to achieve true enlightenment before graduation."

name: Vortex Runner
text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Vortex Runner gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
flavor: "By using the vortex, I can study for at least fifteen extra minutes between every class. I wasn't being reckless, Dean Imbraham. I was being efficient."

name: Waterfall Aerialist
text:
Flying
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavor: Form and function in perfect unity.

name: Wormhole Serpent
text: {3}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: After drownings, devourings, and one highly unpleasant algae infestation, unsupervised portal use on campus was banned.

name: Arrogant Poet
text: Whenever Arrogant Poet attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "I would be kinder to my peers, Professor, but I simply don't have any."

name: Brackish Trudge
text:
Brackish Trudge enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Brackish Trudge from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you gained life this turn.
flavor: Most trudges are covered with decaying plant matter, making them ideal breeding grounds for fungal spores.

name: Crushing Disappointment
text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.
flavor: Most students could barely endure Dean Embrose's scrutiny for a semester or two; Killian lived with it his entire life.

name: Essence Infusion
text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: "I'd say it's still a fair fight—now my friend is about the size of your ego."

name: Eyetwitch
text:
Flying
When Eyetwitch dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: Oculomancers see the ideal potion ingredient. The bats don't see it that way.

name: Flunk
text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 7 minus the number of cards in that creature's controller's hand.
flavor:
"I assure you, no one fails my course more than once."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Go Blank
text: Target player discards two cards. Then exile that player's graveyard.
flavor: The only feeling worse than not knowing the answer is the certainty that you once did.

name: Lash of Malice
text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The strongest shadow spells come from disdain for someone else, not frustration with yourself."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Leech Fanatic
text: As long as it's your turn, Leech Fanatic has lifelink.
flavor: "Everyone thinks that leeches maintain a strictly sanguivorous diet, but in fact, most freshwater leeches are carnivores. Wait, where are you going?"

name: Mage Hunter
text: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
flavor: One of the Oriq's most powerful tools is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.

name: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
flavor: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.

name: Necrotic Fumes
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature you control.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: When live specimens aren't readily available, Witherbloom mages make creative use of ragged spirits clinging to long-dead bodies.

name: Novice Dissector
text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the . . . meeping organ?"

name: Plumb the Forbidden
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice one or more creatures. When you do, copy this spell for each creature sacrificed this way.
You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: Strixhaven forbade all magic from the Blood Age, so that is where Extus began his research.

name: Professor's Warning
text:
Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: Professor Onyx urged the twins to prepare for the dark mage Extus, sounding very much like someone familiar with the rise of tyrants.

name: Promising Duskmage
text: When Promising Duskmage dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
flavor: "Your technique is sloppy, but there is talent there. Do it again, and keep your right arm in position this time."

name: Specter of the Fens
text:
Flying
{5}{B}: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: Foul specters hunt down those who try to back out of a deal with a daemogoth.

name: Tenured Inkcaster
text:
When Tenured Inkcaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Ah, another future archmage for my collection."

name: Umbral Juke
text:
Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
• Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
flavor: The sport of Mage Tower was conceived as a playful testing ground for young spellcasters.

name: Unwilling Ingredient
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Exile Unwilling Ingredient from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor:
"Don't look at me like that. It was either this or being eaten by a groff."
—Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

name: Academic Dispute
text:
Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have it gain reach until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: "I'll show you original research, you hack!"

name: Ardent Dustspeaker
text: Whenever Ardent Dustspeaker attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
flavor: "The Founder Dragons weren't even hatched when this scroll was written!"

name: Blood Age General
text: {T}: Attacking Spirits get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: His troops took the Fortress of Caerdoon centuries ago, yet he fights on.

name: Enthusiastic Study
text:
Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: "If the pen is mightier than the sword, just think what a giant tome could do!"

name: Explosive Welcome
text: Explosive Welcome deals 5 damage to any target and 3 damage to any other target. Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor: Rowan and Will were a natural fit in Prismari College, the school of outrageous elemental arts.

name: Fuming Effigy
text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, Fuming Effigy deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor: Some spirits share ancient wisdom. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.

name: Hall Monitor
text:
Haste
{1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: "No unauthorized summoning. No writing in the library books. And absolutely no indoor dueling!"

name: Heated Debate
text:
This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)
Heated Debate deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: "While you were wasting time with abstract equations, I mastered ancient Oggyar fire magic. Your move."

name: Igneous Inspiration
text:
Igneous Inspiration deals 3 damage to any target.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.

name: Illustrious Historian
text: {5}, Exile Illustrious Historian from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor: The most distinguished Lorehold professors are eligible to receive extended tenure, even beyond the limits of their own mortality.

name: Mascot Interception
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature token.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: Far from the trappings of royalty, Rowan and Will found inspiration from the most popular sport on campus, Mage Tower.

name: Pigment Storm
text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
flavor: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else runs for cover.

name: Pillardrop Warden
text:
Reach
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pillardrop Warden: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.

name: Start from Scratch
text:
Choose one —
• Start from Scratch deals 1 damage to any target.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor: "I don't care what they think!" Rootha snapped. "I know I can do better."

name: Storm-Kiln Artist
text:
Storm-Kiln Artist gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.
flavor: A captured elemental makes for a potent, albeit unstable, power source.

name: Tome Shredder
text:
Haste
{T}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on Tome Shredder.
flavor:
"Quintorius, would you care to explain why you didn't complete your homework?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Twinscroll Shaman
text: Double strike
flavor: "May your wretched name never grace the annals of history, you ignorant buffoon!"

name: Bayou Groff
text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.
flavor:
"Groffs are great for tracking pests through the muck, but securing the pests before the groff devours them is a dicey endeavor."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean

name: Big Play
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor:
"Quandrix is running out of time. If they're going to capture the Witherbloom mascot, they need something big here."
—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

name: Bookwurm
text:
Trample
When Bookwurm enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
{2}{G}: Put Bookwurm from your graveyard into your library third from the top.
flavor: It takes "devouring a book in one sitting" to a frightening extreme.

name: Charge Through
text:
Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"What a move! Lorehold gets caught flat-footed, and Witherbloom barrels ahead."
—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

name: Containment Breach
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If its mana value is 2 or less, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor: For pest keepers, there's no sound more disheartening than breaking glass.

name: Devouring Tendrils
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. When the permanent you don't control dies this turn, you gain 2 life.
flavor: Witherbloom spells often take on the appearance—and personality—of their components.

name: Fortifying Draught
text: You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
flavor: "If a seedling can push through solid stone, there's no limit to what I could do."

name: Honor Troll
text:
Vigilance
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Honor Troll gets +2/+1 as long as you have 25 or more life.
flavor: First in his clan to attend Strixhaven, and now first in his class.

name: Karok Wrangler
text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor:
"She showed up to class on a what?"
—Valentin, Witherbloom Dean

name: Leyline Invocation
text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of lands you control.
flavor:
"Do you still believe my work is nothing but dry, boring equations?"
—Cairu, Quandrix mage-student

name: Mage Duel
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn.
Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Then it fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: "Remember the rules. No spells to the face!"

name: Master Symmetrist
text:
Reach
Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Tondo lost his very first duel and has spent his entire life trying to get even.

name: Professor of Zoomancy
text: When Professor of Zoomancy enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor: She's brilliant, if a bit overbearing.

name: Scurrid Colony
text:
Reach
Scurrid Colony gets +2/+2 as long as you control eight or more lands.
flavor: Scurrid teeth evolved to crack open nuts, but they work just as well for crushing bones if the nest is threatened.

name: Spined Karok
flavor:
"The bogs are deeper than you realize. Most of the space beneath the surface is taken up by these enormous karoks. You might think your feet are touching the bottom. They're probably not."
—Gyome, Witherbloom chef

name: Springmane Cervin
text: When Springmane Cervin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor: Cervins feed on the mana-rich plants around the star arches, imbuing their bodies with extraordinary grace and vitality.

name: Tangletrap
text:
Choose one —
• Tangletrap deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor:
"It's like that old saying: what goes up . . . feeds the arboretum."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean

name: Serra Avenger
text:
You can't cast this spell during your first, second, or third turns of the game.
Flying, vigilance
flavor:
"Those who endure in the face of suffering, those whose faith shines long in evil days, they shall see salvation."
—*Song of All*, canto 904

name: Flagstones of Trokair
text:
{T}: Add {W}.
When Flagstones of Trokair is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Dust-spiked winds eroded the stones, but the ground where they had stood still holds power.

name: Keldon Vandals
text:
Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Vandals enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
flavor: Keldons divide all their spoils into two groups: trophies and catapult ammunition.

name: Rootbreaker Wurm
text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

name: Archon of Falling Stars
text:
Flying
When Archon of Falling Stars dies, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"The archon fell like a star from the sky, meeting the rising sun at the horizon's edge."
—*The Cosmogony*

name: Commanding Presence
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has first strike and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token."
flavor: "In every one of you I see a hero's heart."

name: Dawn Evangel
text: Whenever a creature dies, if an Aura you controlled was attached to it, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Is there a greater promise than the glory of the sunrise?

name: Hero of the Pride
text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of the Pride, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Leonin fight for neither god nor polis; their loyalty is to their pride.

name: Hero of the Winds
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of the Winds, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: To tame a griffin is to ride into legend.

name: Lagonna-Band Storyteller
text: When Lagonna-Band Storyteller enters the battlefield, you may put target enchantment card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, you gain life equal to its mana value.
flavor: "Our stories are full of ancient wisdom; they tell us who we are."

name: Leonin of the Lost Pride
text: When Leonin of the Lost Pride dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor: Leonin band together in the Underworld, taking solace in their strength until, at last, both pride and self are forgotten.

name: Nyxborn Courser
flavor:
"Storms drove them westward to Ketaphos; wide plains shimmered in starlight.
Centaurs greeted them, offering gold-hued apples and grain-cakes."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Omen of the Sun
text:
Flash
When Omen of the Sun enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens and you gain 2 life.
{2}{W}, Sacrifice Omen of the Sun: Scry 2.
flavor: "My time will come, when every soul will bask in my glory and obey my law."

name: Reverent Hoplite
text: When Reverent Hoplite enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
flavor: "Zeal is the sharpest blade, and piety the strongest shield."

name: Rumbling Sentry
text: When Rumbling Sentry enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor:
"To provoke the mountain is to invite the avalanche."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Sunmane Pegasus
text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Sunmane Pegasus gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: Chosen by Heliod, Daxos approached the pegasus without fear, and rode it without saddle or reins.

name: Triumphant Surge
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. You gain 3 life.
flavor: Not even death can quench a hero's inner fire.

name: Alirios, Enraptured
text:
Alirios, Enraptured enters the battlefield tapped.
Alirios doesn't untap during your untap step if you control a Reflection.
When Alirios enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 blue Reflection creature token.
flavor: "Why would I ever want to look away?"

name: Brine Giant
text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each enchantment you control.
flavor: The oracles of Meletis foresaw neither its rise from the depths nor the destruction it would leave in its wake.

name: Chain to Memory
text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Scry 2.
flavor: Those who do not learn from their mistakes are bound to relive them.

name: Deny the Divine
text: Counter target creature or enchantment spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor:
"A great wave crashed, and a mighty wind blew out the stars."
—*The Cosmogony*

name: Eidolon of Philosophy
text: {6}{U}, Sacrifice Eidolon of Philosophy: Draw three cards.
flavor: "And what did Erekastos teach us is the nature of the soul?"

name: Glimpse of Freedom
text:
Draw a card.
Escape—{2}{U}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor:
"Freedom lies in accepting a single path."
—Nyklos, Meletian philosopher

name: Ichthyomorphosis
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Fish with base power and toughness 0/1.
flavor: Tycthis's military career was a flop.

name: Memory Drain
text: Counter target spell. Scry 2.
flavor: Alythos sat and stared blankly out over the glassy oceans of Nerono, trying in vain to remember what he knew he had forgotten.

name: Naiad of Hidden Coves
text: As long as it's not your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor:
"Wave-borne, he watches over secrets of the shore."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Nyxborn Seaguard
flavor:
"Storm-tossed and broken, Callaphe cried out to deep-dwelling Thassa.
Tritons came swiftly to save her, bringing her north to the Lindus."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Omen of the Sea
text:
Flash
When Omen of the Sea enters the battlefield, scry 2, then draw a card.
{2}{U}, Sacrifice Omen of the Sea: Scry 2.
flavor: "My time will come, when the rising tide will surge above the tallest mountain."

name: One with the Stars
text:
Enchant creature or enchantment
Enchanted permanent is an enchantment and loses all other card types. (It still has its abilities, but it's no longer a creature.)
flavor:
"Take your place among the stars."
—Kruphix, god of horizons

name: Riptide Turtle
text:
Flash
Defender
flavor:
"As the storm waves crushed my sailors, I cried out to Thassa. The next time I saw them, hard shells encased them, and they swam away to safety."
—Siona, captain of the *Pyleas*

name: Sage of Mysteries
text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
flavor: "I see destruction, suffering, and one tormented glimmer of hope."

name: Sea God's Scorn
text: Return up to three target creatures and/or enchantments to their owners' hands.
flavor: Instead of performing their daily devotions, Heliod's acolytes spent the morning picking strands of kelp off the altar.

name: Shimmerwing Chimera
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return up to one other target enchantment you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: It swims upon the winds and soars through the waves.

name: Shoal Kraken
text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: It eats the things that eat the things that are drawn to the light.

name: Sleep of the Dead
text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Escape—{2}{U}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: Normally, a cerberus sleeps one head at a time.

name: Stern Dismissal
text: Return target creature or enchantment an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: Cities offer tribute to Ephara and carve her image into their walls, imploring her to protect them from the dangers of the wild.

name: Sweet Oblivion
text:
Target player mills four cards.
Escape—{3}{U}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: When memory is torment, oblivion is bliss.

name: Thirst for Meaning
text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an enchantment card.
flavor: A sip of recollection, an ocean of regrets.

name: Triton Waverider
text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Triton Waverider gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "You can no more stop me than you can halt the tide."

name: Vexing Gull
text:
Flash
Flying
flavor:
"May the skies be clear of gales and gulls."
—Meletian prayer

name: Witness of Tomorrows
text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Scry 1.
flavor: "As the future slips its way into the present, it ceases to be my concern."

name: Aspect of Lamprey
text:
Enchant creature you control
When Aspect of Lamprey enters the battlefield, target opponent discards two cards.
Enchanted creature has lifelink.
flavor: "Some aspire to be mighty like the lion or the hydra. I am the parasite that feeds on them all."

name: Blight-Breath Catoblepas
text: When Blight-Breath Catoblepas enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
flavor: Wherever it walks, famine follows behind.

name: Cling to Dust
text:
Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, you gain 3 life. Otherwise, you draw a card.
Escape—{3}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: In bleak Tizerus, all hope crumbles in your grasp.

name: Discordant Piper
text: When Discordant Piper dies, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
flavor: The death of the party.

name: Drag to the Underworld
text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
Destroy target creature.
flavor: The more you struggle against death, the tighter its grip becomes.

name: Enemy of Enlightenment
text:
Flying
Enemy of Enlightenment gets -1/-1 for each card in your opponents' hands.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.
flavor:
"Evil flourishes where ignorance thrives."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Final Death
text: Exile target creature.
flavor: The Underworld erodes memory, identity, and eventually the physical form, leaving only crumbling statues called misera—hollow monuments to mortal futility.

name: Fruit of Tizerus
text:
Target player loses 2 life.
Escape—{3}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: One spiny tree with bitter fruit grows in the realm of Tizerus, outside the palace of Erebos.

name: Grim Physician
text: When Grim Physician dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: The Returned retain no memory of their identities, but sometimes they mindlessly attempt familiar tasks.

name: Hateful Eidolon
text:
Lifelink
Whenever an enchanted creature dies, draw a card for each Aura you controlled that was attached to it.
flavor: From the echoes of a violent life, a terrible foe is born.

name: Inevitable End
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."
flavor:
"How many more will die before you accept your fate?"
—Erebos, god of the dead

name: Lampad of Death's Vigil
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"Grief-struck, she weeps for each mortal's final death."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Minion's Return
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: As a mortal, Phenax was the first to escape the Underworld. As a god, he brings his pawns along the same dark path.

name: Mire's Grasp
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-3.
flavor: Those caught attempting to escape the Underworld spend the rest of their existence trapped in the Mire of Punishment.

name: Mogis's Favor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Escape—{2}{B}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: Rage-crowned Mogis swiftly rewards the virtue of brutality.

name: Nyxborn Marauder
flavor:
"Callaphe guided them into the
darkness of Hetos, the bleak mire;
Blood-horned minotaurs circled them,
axes aglimmer in shadow."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Omen of the Dead
text:
Flash
When Omen of the Dead enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Omen of the Dead: Scry 2.
flavor: "My time will come, when life's frantic striving will fade into the boundless quiet of death."

name: Pharika's Libation
text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent sacrifices an enchantment.
flavor: "If you will not pour your drink out for me, I shall pour mine out for you."

name: Rage-Scarred Berserker
text: When Rage-Scarred Berserker enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: The fury of the slaughter god Mogis burns within him.

name: Scavenging Harpy
text:
Flying
When Scavenging Harpy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor: Desecrating the dead is a convenient way for harpies to expand their foul collections.

name: Soulreaper of Mogis
text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
flavor: "We offer to Mogis the blood of the weak, and in return he makes us strong."

name: Temple Thief
text: Temple Thief can't be blocked by enchanted creatures or enchantment creatures.
flavor: "I don't know if the gods watch over their temples, but I figure it's best to be stealthy just in case."

name: Venomous Hierophant
text:
Deathtouch
When Venomous Hierophant enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
flavor: "Many have sought snake-twined Pharika's panacea. Do you wish to share their fate?"

name: Arena Trickster
text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arena Trickster.
flavor: "It's not enough to surprise your opponent. You have to delight the crowd as well."

name: Careless Celebrant
text: When Careless Celebrant dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
flavor:
"Renata was mesmerized by the satyr's dance of gleeful indifference, of reckless grace and bright disaster."
—Luphea of Setessa, *Histories*

name: Dreamstalker Manticore
text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, Dreamstalker Manticore deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: Purphoros forged the manticore's tail from bronze, its teeth from silver, and its heart from hate.

name: Escape Velocity
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Escape—{1}{R}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: "Not even death can catch me now!"

name: Fateful End
text: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.
flavor:
"Everything will be put back in its proper place."
—Klothys, god of destiny

name: Final Flare
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Final Flare deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor: Those who fought without honor in life are taken to Agonas and doomed to fight forever in its arenas.

name: Flummoxed Cyclops
text:
Reach
Whenever two or more creatures your opponents control attack, Flummoxed Cyclops can't block this combat.
flavor:
"A cyclops thinks slowly but strikes quickly. Try to keep it thinking."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis

name: Heroes of the Revel
text:
When Heroes of the Revel enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Satyr creature token with "This creature can't block."
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Heroes of the Revel, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Brashness is close enough to bravery.

name: Incendiary Oracle
text:
{1}{R}: Incendiary Oracle gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
If a creature dealt damage by Incendiary Oracle this turn would die, exile it instead.
flavor: The flamespeakers of Akros live passionately, devoted to Purphoros and the cycle of destructive creation.

name: Iroas's Blessing
text:
Enchant creature you control
When Iroas's Blessing enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
flavor: The blessing is not the strength itself, but the knowledge of how to use it.

name: Nyxborn Brute
flavor:
"One-eyed and frightful, the cyclops
lifted a boulder and hurled it
seaward from cliff's edge, shattering
masts and scattering sailors."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Omen of the Forge
text:
Flash
When Omen of the Forge enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Omen of the Forge: Scry 2.
flavor: "My time will come, when all the world will be reforged in the fires of my invention."

name: Oread of Mountain's Blaze
text: {2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Flame-wrapped, she dances a burning swath amid the clouds."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Portent of Betrayal
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Mogis can fan a small flame of resentment into an inferno of madness.

name: Satyr's Cunning
text:
Create a 1/1 red Satyr creature token with "This creature can't block."
Escape—{2}{R}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor: It's hard to keep a satyr down, even in the Underworld.

name: Skophos Warleader
text: {R}, Sacrifice another creature or an enchantment: Skophos Warleader gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: The minotaur polis of Skophos boasts grand temples to the god of slaughter.

name: Stampede Rider
text:
Trample
At the beginning of each combat, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Stampede Rider gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: To a satyr, a stampede is just another kind of revelry.

name: Underworld Fires
text: Underworld Fires deals 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: The Underworld is anything but a resting place.

name: Hyrax Tower Scout
text: When Hyrax Tower Scout enters the battlefield, untap target creature.
flavor: The scouts of Hyrax Tower keep watch at the edge of Setessan territory, protecting the polis from inhuman monsters and enemy armies.

name: Inspire Awe
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn except combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creatures and enchantment creatures. Scry 2.
flavor: Nylea appeared amid the howl of a hundred beasts.

name: Klothys's Design
text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
flavor: The god of destiny grants her followers vision deeper than sight.

name: Loathsome Chimera
text:
Escape—{4}{G}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Loathsome Chimera escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor:
"I see... elk? And lion? And... teeth! A lot of teeth!"
—Teraklos of Meletis

name: Moss Viper
text: Deathtouch
flavor: Nylea watches over all the creatures of the forest except for the snakes. Blessed by Pharika, they can take care of themselves.

name: Mystic Repeal
text: Put target enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor:
"No power is too great to be undone."
—Karametra, god of harvests

name: Nexus Wardens
text:
Reach
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.
flavor: The Summer Nexus is a holy grove in Setessa where the starfields of Nyx glitter in the shadows.

name: Nylea's Forerunner
text:
Trample
Other creatures you control have trample.
flavor: Where its feet tread, the thunder of many others will follow.

name: Nylea's Huntmaster
text: When Nylea's Huntmaster enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
flavor: Nature is stillness and savagery in equal measure.

name: Nyx Herald
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target enchanted creature or enchantment creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"A piercing call, bright as the stars, rang out across the valley, calling the Pheres band to war, to blood and savagery."
—Luphea of Setessa, *Histories*

name: Nyxborn Colossus
Omen of the Hunt
text:
Flash
When Omen of the Hunt enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{2}{G}, Sacrifice Omen of the Hunt: Scry 2.
flavor: "My time will come, when no road will divide the endless verdure of the trees."

name: Setessan Petitioner
text: When Setessan Petitioner enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
flavor: "Cypress leaves for family, larkspur for protection, amaranth for a bountiful harvest."

name: Setessan Skirmisher
text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Setessan Skirmisher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Bassara, the tower of the fox, houses the elite skirmishers who guard the Nessian Wood against trespassers.

name: Setessan Training
text:
Enchant creature you control
When Setessan Training enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor: In the heart of Setessa, the warriors of Leina Tower defend the polis and train its daughters.

name: Skola Grovedancer
text:
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you gain 1 life.
{2}{G}: Mill a card.
flavor: "From the ashes of last night's revel, I bring the dawn on new growth."

name: Voracious Typhon
text:
Escape—{5}{G}{G}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Voracious Typhon escapes with three +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: A typhon's escape from the Underworld makes armies flee and kingdoms fall.

name: Eidolon of Inspiration
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Agios was felled by a minotaur's blade, but I swear I have seen him since—in the midst of battle, wherever help is needed most."
—Phrokos, soldier of Akros

name: Elspeth's Devotee
text: When Elspeth's Devotee enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Elspeth, Undaunted Hero, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor: "For her, I would gladly die again."

name: Sunlit Hoplite
text:
As long as it's your turn, Sunlit Hoplite has first strike.
Sunlit Hoplite gets +1/+0 as long as you control an Elspeth planeswalker.
flavor: "Even in her absence, the light Elspeth kindled in our hearts never faltered."

name: Swimmer in Nightmares
text:
Swimmer in Nightmares gets +3/+0 as long as there are ten or more cards in a single graveyard.
Swimmer in Nightmares can't be blocked as long as you control an Ashiok planeswalker.
flavor: Ashiok's minions plumb the depths of the ocean and the psyche.

name: Mindwrack Harpy
text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player mills three cards.
flavor: Harpies are among the most detested creatures in all of Theros... and they thoroughly deserve it.

name: Grasping Giant
text:
Vigilance
Whenever Grasping Giant becomes blocked by a creature, exile that creature until Grasping Giant leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Mirinthes thought death was seconds away when the giant's fist closed around him. Two days later, he was praying for death's release.

name: Sphinx Mindbreaker
text:
Flying
When Sphinx Mindbreaker enters the battlefield, each opponent mills ten cards.
flavor: Riddles draw you in, paradoxes hold you fast, and answers shatter your perceptions.

name: Serpent of Yawning Depths
text: Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents you control can't be blocked except by Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.
flavor:
"Gleams like moonlight on water drew us through the storm and toward our doom."
—Siona, captain of the *Pyleas*

name: Underworld Sentinel
text:
Whenever Underworld Sentinel attacks, exile target creature card from your graveyard.
When Underworld Sentinel dies, put all cards exiled with it onto the battlefield.
flavor: Deathless soldiers called phylaskia guard the borders of the Underworld.

name: Deathbellow War Cry
text: Search your library for up to four Minotaur creature cards with different names, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor: Deathbellow Canyon echoes with the roars of minotaurs calling each other to battle.

name: Ironscale Hydra
text: If a creature would deal combat damage to Ironscale Hydra, prevent that damage and put a +1/+1 counter on Ironscale Hydra.
flavor:
"Put down your bows, you fools! Arrows only make it angry!"
—Callia, Hyrax Tower scout

name: Battlewise Valor
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: It's never good to walk into an ambush, but with the right spell you might walk out again.

name: Chosen by Heliod
text:
Enchant creature
When Chosen by Heliod enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
flavor:
"Training and studies aid a soldier in meager amounts. The gods do the rest."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis

name: Decorated Griffin
text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
flavor: The awards and medals of polis-dwellers mean nothing to griffins, but they repay acts of generosity.

name: Ephara's Warden
text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor: "When you threaten the sanctity of the polis, you insult Ephara herself. If she doesn't smite you, I will."

name: Fabled Hero
text:
Double strike
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fabled Hero, put a +1/+1 counter on Fabled Hero.
flavor: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."

name: Glare of Heresy
text: Exile target white permanent.
flavor: No foe is more hated than the former friend.

name: Lagonna-Band Elder
text: When Lagonna-Band Elder enters the battlefield, if you control an enchantment, you gain 3 life.
flavor: "The best lessons are not the ones I teach. They are the ones the pupils realize for themselves."

name: Phalanx Leader
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Phalanx Leader, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor: His soldiers etch his words on the insides of their shields, their inspiration always in sight during battle.

name: Ray of Dissolution
text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor: The works of one god last only as long as the patience of another.

name: Setessan Battle Priest
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Battle Priest, you gain 2 life.
flavor: "Your god teaches you only how to kill. Karametra teaches me to defend what I hold dear. That is why I will prevail."

name: Silent Artisan
flavor:
On the fourth day they passed through a forest of immense stacked stones. Althemone, youngest of the companions, called these pillars the work of a god, but the Champion knew better. She quickened her pace.
—*The Theriad*

name: Soldier of the Pantheon
text:
Protection from multicolored
Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "I hear the gods' voices in my dreams each night, and I offer bloody trophies on their altars each day."

name: Spear of Heliod
text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
flavor: Legend speaks of the Sun Spear, the mighty weapon that can strike any point in Theros, even the depths of the Underworld.

name: Traveling Philosopher
flavor:
The Champion and the philosopher Olexa returned from the opposing camp at dusk. Behind them, the enemy raised sail and departed, breaking the siege. When asked what the two had done, the Champion replied, "We spoke to them."
—*The Theriad*

name: Breaching Hippocamp
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Breaching Hippocamp enters the battlefield, untap another target creature you control.
flavor: Don't try to ride this steed unless you've got gills too.

name: Fate Foretold
text:
Enchant creature
When Fate Foretold enters the battlefield, draw a card.
When enchanted creature dies, its controller draws a card.
flavor: The tale of her life was already written, but that didn't mean she could predict the ending.

name: Lost in a Labyrinth
text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Even those who leave the labyrinth never escape it, forever dreaming of their time trapped within.

name: Meletis Charlatan
text: {2}{U}, {T}: The controller of target instant or sorcery spell copies it. That player may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: "Every object has an echo in the Æther beyond the world. Every idea has a shadow that can be brought to light."

name: Sea God's Revenge
text: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor:
"What has neither mouth nor throat, yet swallows captain, crew, and boat?"
—Sphinx's riddle

name: Stymied Hopes
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.

name: Thassa's Bounty
text: Draw three cards. Target player mills three cards.
flavor:
"Was this gift cast adrift for any to find, or did Thassa guide the currents to bring it to me alone?"
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa

name: Triton Fortune Hunter
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Fortune Hunter, draw a card.
flavor: "Thassa has blessed me with power and insight. I am careful not to disappoint her."

name: Triton Shorethief
flavor:
At sunrise, the Champion and her companions awoke to find their supplies gone and Brygus, their sentry, dead. Carefully arranged piles of ornamental shells gave a clear warning: go no further.
—*The Theriad*

name: Agent of the Fates
text:
Deathtouch
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent of the Fates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "You are breathing borrowed air."

name: Asphodel Wanderer
text: {2}{B}: Regenerate Asphodel Wanderer.
flavor: He killed out of hate, so now only hate sustains him. He sought immortality, so the gods gave it to him.

name: Boon of Erebos
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it. You lose 2 life.
flavor:
"Death is not a certainty. Erebos determines when a mortal's time is up."
—Iadorna, death priest of Erebos

name: Cutthroat Maneuver
text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: "Our ambition drives us forward. Together we will claim what is ours, no matter who holds it."

name: Dark Betrayal
text: Destroy target black creature.
flavor:
"You're just like me: ruthless, cunning, and ambitious. Obviously you're a threat."
—Basarios the Blade

name: Felhide Minotaur
flavor:
With spear held high, the Champion came to meet Thyrogog of the Ashlands, who wore the old king's skin as a cloak and fed on the flesh of innocents. The foul minotaur raised the great axe called Goremaster and charged.
—*The Theriad*

name: Fleshmad Steed
text: Whenever another creature dies, tap Fleshmad Steed.
flavor: More disturbing than the unknown is a distortion of the familiar.

name: Insatiable Harpy
text: Flying, lifelink
flavor: Gold coin, battered helmet, broken wrist bone—all have the same value in the eyes of a harpy.

name: Lash of the Whip
text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor:
"No matter who their fickle hearts worship, all mortals belong to one god in the end."
—Iadorna, death priest of Erebos

name: March of the Returned
text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The Returned have no memory of the Underworld or of their former lives. The golden masks they wear are the last gifts of the selves they left behind.

name: Pharika's Cure
text: Pharika's Cure deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"The venom cleanses the sickness from your body, but it will not be pleasant, and you may not survive. Pharika's blessings are fickle."
—Solon, acolyte of Pharika

name: Scourgemark
text:
Enchant creature
When Scourgemark enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
flavor: To members of the cult of Erebos, gold-infused tattoos symbolize the inevitable grasp of the god of death.

name: Sip of Hemlock
text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor: Conspirators poisoned the oracle not because her visions were wrong, but because they were right.

name: Viper's Kiss
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor:
"I could heal a snakebite. Looks like you got bitten by a constellation."
—Aescalos, healer of Pharika

name: Akroan Crusader
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.
flavor: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

name: Arena Athlete
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
flavor: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.

name: Boulderfall
text: Boulderfall deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor:
"Defeating the Meletians was not so difficult. I needed only to move a mountain."
—Eocles, oracle of Purphoros

name: Firedrinker Satyr
text:
Whenever Firedrinker Satyr is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
{1}{R}: Firedrinker Satyr gets +1/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: Attending a satyr revel requires a high tolerance for pain.

name: Flamespeaker Adept
text: Whenever you scry, Flamespeaker Adept gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "I see your future, mantled in ash."

name: Messenger's Speed
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample and haste.
flavor:
"He outran arrows. He outran even the archers' insults."
—Bayma, storyteller of Lagonna Band

name: Peak Eruption
text: Destroy target Mountain. Peak Eruption deals 3 damage to that land's controller.
flavor:
"Early olive buds? A good omen. Flock of crows? Not so good. Mountain exploding? Bad. Very, very bad."
—Hira, street oracle

name: Satyr Rambler
text: Trample
flavor: A satyr is bound by nothing—not home, not family, not loyalty.

name: Spark Jolt
text: Spark Jolt deals 1 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.

name: Two-Headed Cerberus
text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor: The left head keeps the right head starved as motivation to track new prey.

name: Artisan's Sorrow
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: Some seers read bones or entrails. Others just like to break things.

name: Defend the Hearth
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.
flavor: The defenders said not a word. Their shields, spears, and stances were warning enough.

name: Hunt the Hunter
text: Target green creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target green creature an opponent controls.
flavor:
"A grudge is a tattoo worn on the inside."
—Setessan warrior saying

name: Nessian Courser
flavor:
Khestes the Adamant, the Champion's closest ally among the centaurs, took one stone to his shoulder and another to his flank. He held his stride and his aim, and let fly the arrow that killed the giant Grinthax.
—*The Theriad*

name: Pheres-Band Centaurs
flavor:
"Poets speak of your unrivaled speed," the Champion said to the assembled centaurs, "but it is plain to see that your true strength lies in your unwavering loyalty to one another."
—*The Theriad*

name: Satyr Piper
text: {3}{G}: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor:
"When I asked my commander the reward for killing that prancing nuisance, he told me, 'None! I want to kill him myself!'"
—Phrogas, soldier of Akros

name: Shredding Winds
text: Shredding Winds deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor:
"Enemies of the wood! Your presence here is a slap in Nylea's face. Do not be surprised if she slaps back."
—Telphe, druid of Nylea

name: Staunch-Hearted Warrior
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.
flavor: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.

name: Auratog
text: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

name: Clergy en-Vec
text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor:
"Faith's shield is hammered out by the blows of unbelievers."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
text: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

name: Hanna's Custody
text: All artifacts have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"I protect the Legacy with my life if necessary, for its purpose is far more important than my own."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Humility
text: All creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor:
"One cannot cleanse the wounds of failure."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Orim's Prayer
text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
flavor:
"As usual, there will be time for prayer only *after* the worst happens."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Orim, Samite Healer
text: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor:
"The silkworm spins itself a new existence. So the healer weaves the threads of life."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Pegasus Refuge
text: {2}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.
flavor:
The first Rath-born pegasus was so offended by the sky that it hid its eyes in the earth.
—Vec lore

name: Repentance
text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
flavor: "The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati. "I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."

name: Safeguard
text: {2}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
flavor:
"I'm amused by wasted effort when it's not my own."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Serene Offering
text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain life equal to its mana value.
flavor:
"A sacrifice made in peace is worth a dozen made in panic."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Soltari Crusader
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{1}{W}: Soltari Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Carry war to the Dauthi, no matter the way, no matter the world."
—Soltari battle chant

name: Soltari Emissary
text: {W}: Soltari Emissary gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: Alone at the portal, Ertai began his meditation. He realized immediately that he was not alone.

name: Soltari Lancer
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Soltari Lancer has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor:
"In times of war the victors rarely save their best for last."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Soltari Trooper
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Dauthi blood is Soltari wine."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Talon Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have first strike.
flavor: "Keep them at sword's length!" Gerrard's order fell flat as each sliver's talon suddenly grew longer. "Hold on—break out the polearms!"

name: Legerdemain
text: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. 'Glok,' he mumbled, and hid.

name: Mana Severance
text: Search your library for any number of land cards, exile them, then shuffle.
flavor:
"And when this land is wasted, where will we go?"
—Thalakos lament

name: Mnemonic Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."
flavor:
"A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Precognition
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of target opponent's library. If you do, you may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
flavor: A gleam like struggling sunlight penetrated Selenia's dark thoughts.

name: Rootwater Diver
text: {T}, Sacrifice Rootwater Diver: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Drop a dagger into the murky deep and the merfolk will cut your throat with it."
—Skyshroud saying

name: Rootwater Shaman
text: You may cast Aura spells with enchant creature as though they had flash.
flavor:
"Ugh! When did orcs and fish start having kids?"
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Skyshroud Condor
text:
Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.
Flying
flavor:
Condor's flight augurs sleepless night.
—Skyshroud proverb

name: Steal Enchantment
text:
Enchant enchantment
You control enchanted enchantment.
flavor:
"Why should I flatter another with imitation when I can satisfy myself through possession?"
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Thalakos Mistfolk
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{U}: Put Thalakos Mistfolk on top of its owner's library.
flavor:
"They are 'between' in every way."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Thalakos Seer
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor:
"You see our world when you shut your eyes so tightly that tiny shapes float before them."
—Lyna, to Ertai

name: Thalakos Sentry
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor:
"Ill luck and poor geography caught the Thalakos between us and the Dauthi."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Unstable Shapeshifter
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Unstable Shapeshifter becomes a copy of that creature, except it has this ability.
flavor:
"In a world of untruths, the living lie rules."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Whispers of the Muse
text:
Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Draw a card.
flavor:
"I followed her song only to find it was a dirge."
—Crovax

name: Abandon Hope
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
flavor: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.

name: Bounty Hunter
text:
{T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonblack creature.
{T}: Destroy target creature with a bounty counter on it.
flavor: "Once they've marked you," Starke said, "the world is made of glass."

name: Commander Greven il-Vec
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
flavor:
"Rage is the only freedom left me."
—Greven *il*-Vec

name: Darkling Stalker
text:
{B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker.
{B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"In this dark place, yes, I *am* afraid of my own shadow."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Dauthi Embrace
text: {B}{B}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor:
"The Dauthi army grows by screams and bounds."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Dauthi Marauder
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor:
"The Dauthi came from beneath the Ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Dauthi Mercenary
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Dauthi believe they dignify murder by paying for it."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Endless Scream
text:
Enchant creature
Endless Scream enters the battlefield with X scream counters on it.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each scream counter on Endless Scream.
flavor:
"I have made Crovax weep; now I will make him scream. The pain will not end, but will bind him to me."
—Volrath

name: Fevered Convulsions
text: {2}{B}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor:
"Tell me again why you failed to capture Gerrard, you worthless pile of spine."
