text: Roll a six-sided die. Assemble a number of Contraptions equal to the result. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
flavor: Goblins only have two speeds: hard loaf and full-on hammer freak-out.

name: Target Minotaur
text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor: "Not again!"

name: Work a Double
text: Assemble two Contraptions. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets. Then repeat this process.)
flavor: Ig and Burf discovered the technique by accident when Burf reached for his hammer and missed.

name: Wrench-Rigger
text: When Wrench-Rigger enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
flavor: Goblin innovator, goblin corpse. Tomayto, tomahto.

name: Beast in Show
text: Trample
flavor: "A stunning example of the breed! Flawless plating, ruthlessly efficient death stroke, and an excellent drool shimmer."

name: Chittering Doom
text: Whenever you roll a 4 or higher on a die, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
flavor: One fateful night, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed, they rose.

name: Clever Combo
text: Search your library for a host card or a card with augment, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: At Crossbreed Labs, "heads or tails" has nothing to do with coins.

name: Druid of the Sacred Beaker
text: {T}: Add {G} for each Crossbreed Labs watermark among permanents you control.
flavor: Others try to be the best in their class. She strives to be the best in her phylum.

name: First Pick
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
flavor: Picking hammers is dangerous, but it's still safer than harvesting saw bushes.

name: Ground Pounder
text:
{3}{G}: Roll a six-sided die. Ground Pounder gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the result.
Whenever you roll a 5 or higher on a die, Ground Pounder gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: People came from miles away just to see the head of the hammer.

name: Joyride Rigger
text: When Joyride Rigger enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
flavor: chitty-chitty-BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG!

name: Really Epic Punch
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 if it's a host or has augment. Then it fights target creature you don't control.
flavor: It smarts more than the average bear.

name: Selfie Preservation
text: Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. If there's a tree in its art, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
flavor: "Be sure to get the tree in the picture."

name: Squirrel Dealer
text: When Squirrel Dealer enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game "Do you like Squirrels?" If they do, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
flavor: "You see that sheen on the fur? The glint in their eyes? Top quality. These are the real deal."

name: Steamflogger Service Rep
text: Whenever another Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, Steamflogger Service Rep assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
flavor: It's more like a hard day of lunch with a work break between shifts.

name: Gossamer Chains
text: Return Gossamer Chains to its owner's hand: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target unblocked creature this turn.
flavor:
"Harah swung his sword mightily, but still the air held him fast."
—Azeworai, "Kenechi's Dream"

name: Parapet
text:
You may cast Parapet as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
flavor: There is no wall that can't be improved by making it taller.

name: Relic Ward
text:
You may cast Relic Ward as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: Asmira's prayers alone should have freed Mangara from the amber prison . . .

name: Retribution of the Meek
text: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. They can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"Tread upon the meek, and they shall wound your feet and make you crawl."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Zhalfirin Crusader
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zhalfirin Crusader this turn is dealt to any target instead.
flavor:
"War is the crucible of leadership."
—Rashida Scalebane

name: Betrayal
text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, you draw a card.
flavor:
"Sometimes a burden can be borne only on the shoulders of a willing enemy."
—Suq'Ata aphorism

name: Breezekeeper
text:
Flying
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor:
"He blows a gust across the cliff to vanish in a breath of wind."
—"Song of the Wind Being"

name: Chronatog
text: {0}: Chronatog gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You skip your next turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: For the chronatog, there is no meal like the present.

name: Flooded Shoreline
text: {U}{U}, Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Some say the sea is jealous of the land and wishes to climb its heights to meet the sky."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Knight of the Mists
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
When Knight of the Mists enters the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you don't, destroy target Knight and it can't be regenerated.
flavor: Fear the mists, for they are armed.

name: Mystic Veil
text:
You may cast Mystic Veil as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"Magic is my thread, my will the needle. I weave over you as if you never were."
—Poetics of Hanan

name: Rainbow Efreet
text:
Flying
{U}{U}: Rainbow Efreet phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)
flavor:
"A beauty made more so by its fleeting visitations."
—Teferi

name: Shimmering Efreet
text:
Flying
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
Whenever Shimmering Efreet phases in, target creature phases out. (It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor:
Life or death: which is the illusion?"
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Teferi's Realm
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses artifact, creature, land, or non-Aura enchantment. All nontoken permanents of that type phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor:
"Fire is dead. Water has killed him."
—From *The Stories of Nature*

name: Time and Tide
text: Simultaneously, all phased-out creatures phase in and all creatures with phasing phase out.
flavor:
"Time may heal all wounds, but what heals time?"
—Teferi

name: Undo
text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor:
"Oft have I wished to undo past deeds, but never did I imagine they would be undone for me."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Vanishing
text:
Enchant creature
{U}{U}: Enchanted creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor:
"Careless, like a child with fire, so was I with time."
—Teferi

name: Aku Djinn
text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature each opponent controls.
flavor:
"Your arrogance amazes me, Kaervek. Did you not know the price you would pay?"
—Mangara

name: Blanket of Night
text: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.
flavor:
"Kaervek imprisoned Mangara out of jealousy, but he taints Jamuraa simply out of spite."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Brood of Cockroaches
text: When Brood of Cockroaches is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of the next end step, you lose 1 life and return Brood of Cockroaches to your hand.
flavor:
"It's like waking on a bed of a thousand olives during an earthquake of subtle force."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Death Watch
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses life equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor:
"Watch death wait / Wait, death, watch / Steal breath swiftly / but steal life slowly."
—Suq'Ata dirge

name: Desolation
text: At the beginning of each end step, each player who tapped a land for mana this turn sacrifices a land. Desolation deals 2 damage to each player who sacrificed a Plains this way.
flavor:
"Kill a creature, destroy the present. Kill the land, destroy the future."
—Kaervek

name: Fallen Askari
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
Fallen Askari can't block.
flavor: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.

name: Infernal Harvest
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return X Swamps you control to their owner's hand.
Infernal Harvest deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
flavor:
"I offered you eternal life; I just didn't say *where*."
—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Kaervek's Spite
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all permanents you control and discard your hand.
Target player loses 5 life.
flavor:
"The end justifies the means. What do I care if I rule over the dead rather than over the living? The dead ask fewer questions."
—Kaervek

name: Pillar Tombs of Aku
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may sacrifice a creature. If that player doesn't, they lose 5 life and you sacrifice Pillar Tombs of Aku.
flavor:
"Aku, City of Hidden Graves / Aku, City of Lost Kings / Aku, welcome me."
—Pillar tomb inscription

name: Dwarven Vigilantes
text: Whenever Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: Some dwarves can only be pushed so far.

name: Goblin Swine-Rider
text: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.
flavor:
"May you get the mount you deserve."
—Suq'Ata curse

name: Keeper of Kookus
text: {R}: Keeper of Kookus gains protection from red until end of turn.
flavor: Wanted: Thick-skinned goblin for guarding mean ol' Kookus. Must like fires. Must heal quickly.

name: Lightning Cloud
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {R}. If you do, Lightning Cloud deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor:
The mightiest clouds sit upon spires of fire.
—Femeref adage

name: Mob Mentality
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample.
Whenever all non-Wall creatures you control attack, enchanted creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor:
"Why is loud stupidity so infectious?"
—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

name: Ogre Enforcer
text: Ogre Enforcer can't be destroyed by lethal damage unless lethal damage dealt by a single source is marked on it.
flavor:
"Ate up all of his siblings in the first week. A good beginning for one destined to command."
—Suka, ogre matron

name: Raging Gorilla
text: Whenever Raging Gorilla blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Every temper tantrum makes another angry gorilla."
—Femeref children's myth

name: Rock Slide
text: Rock Slide deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures without flying.
flavor:
"Good ol' rock. Nothing beats rock."
—Rhirhok, goblin archer

name: Solfatara
text:
Target player can't play lands this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"A burst of hot air tossed the moon into the air, and the moon liked it up there so much it never needed the ground again."
—Azeworai, "Glitter Moon"

name: Song of Blood
text: Mill four cards. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.
flavor: Purraj sang slaughter and danced death.

name: Talruum Champion
text:
First strike
Whenever Talruum Champion blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature loses first strike until end of turn.
flavor: In the Talruum language, there is no word for "surprised."

name: Talruum Piper
text: All creatures with flying able to block Talruum Piper do so.
flavor: When the Talruum began to play, the dragons fell from the sky to squash the obnoxious noise.

name: City of Solitude
text: Players can cast spells and activate abilities only during their own turns.
flavor:
"My horizon was the arcing petals, my new home resplendent with spires of weeds and pillows of fragrant pollen."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Feral Instinct
text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor:
"If a rhino's head is lower than its shoulders, trust me—it is *not* praying."
—Mwani, Mtenda herder

name: Giant Caterpillar
text: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor:
"'I've seen hornworms big as a man's fist,' the traveler said, and nodded soberly when our jaws went slack at his ignorance."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Katabatic Winds
text:
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
Creatures with flying can't attack or block, and their activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.
flavor: Wind will win, whatever we wish.

name: Mortal Wound
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
flavor:
"Their tears spill over Jamuraa. Mixed with blood, they wash everything red."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Quirion Druid
text: {G}, {T}: Target land becomes a 2/2 green creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor:
"The land has been gracious enough to let you tread upon her for years. That privilege is about to end."
—Liefellen, Quirion exarch

name: Wind Shear
text: Attacking creatures with flying get -2/-2 and lose flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"As the winds abated, there was a shower of dragonscales, then nothing more."
—Azeworai, "The Unruly Wind"

name: Fledgling Djinn
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
flavor:
"The young can be quite dangerous. Trust me, I should know."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Donal, Herald of Wings
text: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)
flavor: He sees a flicker of Avacyn's grace in every wingbeat.

name: Haunted Library
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor: The library of Moormanor had been open to all before the Travails, and it continues to attract curious visitors.

name: Priest of the Blessed Graf
text: At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.
flavor: The honored dead who lie in blessed grafs are not easily stirred, but the threat of eternal night called many from their rest.

name: Storm of Souls
text: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.
flavor: Devotion does not end with death.

name: Breath of the Sleepless
text:
You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.
Whenever you cast a creature spell during an opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature.
flavor: Worse than the obscuring mists are the ghastly faces that appear in the glow of spectral lanterns.

name: Occult Epiphany
text: Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.
flavor: In a single unending moment, a hundred lifetimes of knowledge coursed through his unraveling mind.

name: Crossway Troublemakers
text:
Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink.
Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: "Lady Anje said no violence at the wedding. She never said anything about the journey there!"

name: Olivia's Wrath
text: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
flavor:
"These worthless cattle think they can sneak unnoticed into my wedding? Dispose of them."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Imposing Grandeur
text: Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.
flavor: The wedding's lavish decorations paled in comparison to the opulence of its elite guests.

name: Midnight Arsonist
text: When Midnight Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy up to X target artifacts without mana abilities, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
flavor: Killing the slayers was self-preservation. The fire was just for fun.

name: Hollowhenge Overlord
text:
Flash
At the beginning of your upkeep, for each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor: The ruins of the town were a notable upgrade from the wolves' forest den.

name: A-Cobbled Lancer
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
{1}{U}, Exile Cobbled Lancer from your graveyard: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Don't worry everyone—I hear hoofbeats! The Gavony Riders are coming to save us!"
—Adin, Moorland villager

name: Bond of Discipline
text: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: "We agree that order benefits everyone, but not until you enforce it."

name: Charmed Stray
text:
Lifelink
When Charmed Stray enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Charmed Stray.
flavor:
"There's something peculiar about the cats today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker

name: Enforcer Griffin
text: Flying
flavor:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
—Tajic

name: Gideon's Sacrifice
text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).
flavor: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.

name: Gideon's Triumph
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.
flavor: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.

name: Loxodon Sergeant
text:
Vigilance
When Loxodon Sergeant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

name: Martyr for the Cause
text: When Martyr for the Cause dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."

name: Prison Realm
text:
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Prison Realm leaves the battlefield.
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor: After millennia to craft victory, Bolas had eternity to contemplate defeat.

name: Rising Populace
text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.
flavor: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

name: Sunblade Angel
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
flavor: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the *Parhelion II*, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.

name: Teyo's Lightshield
text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: Teyo gifted his shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.

name: Trusted Pegasus
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Would you give your life to save this world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.

name: Wanderer's Strike
text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia

name: War Screecher
text:
Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.

name: Ashiok's Skulker
text: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.
flavor:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok

name: Aven Eternal
text:
Flying
When Aven Eternal enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
—Tajic

name: Bond of Insight
text: Each player mills four cards. Return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Bond of Insight.
flavor: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."

name: Callous Dismissal
text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor:
"They make it clear we are nothing to them."
—Lavinia

name: Contentious Plan
text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.
flavor: Niv-Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.

name: Flux Channeler
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."

name: Jace's Triumph
text: Draw two cards. If you control a Jace planeswalker, draw three cards instead.
flavor: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.

name: Naga Eternal
flavor:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
—Samut

name: Relentless Advance
text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.

name: Rescuer Sphinx
text:
Flying
As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."

name: Sky Theater Strix
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.

name: Spellkeeper Weird
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.

name: Stealth Mission
text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
—Lazav

name: Tamiyo's Epiphany
text: Scry 4, then draw two cards.
flavor: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.

name: Teferi's Time Twist
text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: "The safest place for you is not now."

name: Wall of Runes
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia

name: Banehound
text: Lifelink, haste
flavor:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

name: Bond of Revival
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until your next turn.
flavor: "Today we throw off the yoke of death. Either this is an affirmation of the eternal cyclical nature of life, or it's just hilarious—depends on which of us you ask."

name: Charity Extractor
text: Lifelink
flavor: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."

name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.

name: Dreadmalkin
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or planeswalker: Put two +1/+1 counters on Dreadmalkin.
flavor: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.

name: Duskmantle Operative
text: Duskmantle Operative can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
flavor: Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?" The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."

name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

name: Kaya's Ghostform
text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker you control
When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.

name: Price of Betrayal
text: Remove up to five counters from target artifact, creature, planeswalker, or opponent.
flavor: The moment Liliana defied Nicol Bolas, her contract was broken, and her life was forfeit. But she was free to choose her fate, and she decided it was worth the price.

name: Shriekdiver
text:
Flying
{1}: Shriekdiver gains haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
—Shauntal, Boros legionnaire

name: Ahn-Crop Invader
text:
As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath

name: Bolt Bend
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.
flavor:
"Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't."
—Ral Zarek

name: Bond of Passion
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Bond of Passion deals 2 damage to any other target.
flavor: "Why don't we fight for what's right and let bureaucrats argue over details?"

name: Burning Prophet
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.
flavor: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."

name: Chainwhip Cyclops
text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

name: Chandra's Triumph
text: Chandra's Triumph deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Chandra's Triumph deals 5 damage instead if you control a Chandra planeswalker.
flavor: Her triumph came not from achieving her ideal self, but from rejecting the idea of perfection.

name: Devouring Hellion
text: As Devouring Hellion enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures and/or planeswalkers. If you do, it enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: There's no crisis a hellion can't make worse.

name: Goblin Assault Team
text:
Haste
When Goblin Assault Team dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.

name: Grim Initiate
text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.

name: Honor the God-Pharaoh
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.

name: Invading Manticore
text: When Invading Manticore enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor:
"Fall back! You are no match for this."
—Samut

name: Jaya's Greeting
text: Jaya's Greeting deals 3 damage to target creature. Scry 1.
flavor: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."

name: Nahiri's Stoneblades
text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.

name: Raging Kronch
text: Raging Kronch can't attack alone.
flavor:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler

name: Sarkhan's Catharsis
text: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."

name: Arboreal Grazer
text:
Reach
When Arboreal Grazer enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid

name: Arlinn's Wolf
text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord

name: Bloom Hulk
text: When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor:
"Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril."
—Emmara

name: Bond of Flourishing
text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You gain 3 life.
flavor: "We agree that life should flourish. We disagree on the optimal number of limbs."

name: Centaur Nurturer
text:
When Centaur Nurturer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: "I call upon the vigor of the grasses, the hopes of the flowers, and the dreams of the trees."

name: Courage in Crisis
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."

name: Forced Landing
text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.

name: Kraul Stinger
text: Deathtouch
flavor: He listens to the sounds of battle filtering down from above, waiting for silence, waiting for his time to claim the streets.

name: Kronch Wrangler
text:
Trample
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.
flavor: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

name: Mowu, Loyal Companion
text:
Vigilance, trample
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
flavor: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows—sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.

name: Nissa's Triumph
text: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, instead search your library for up to three land cards. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Her triumph came not from destroying the unnatural, but from fostering life.

name: Steady Aim
text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.

name: Storm the Citadel
text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls."
flavor:
"If we die, we die. But we cannot let him win."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Thundering Ceratok
text:
Trample
When Thundering Ceratok enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"I thought this was a civilized plane. How are there so many feral beasts?"
—Dovin Baan

name: Wardscale Crocodile
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor:
"The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trials. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica."
—Jace Beleren

name: Desperate Lunge
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.

name: Gideon's Battle Cry
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"

name: Gideon's Company
text:
Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Gideon's Company.
{3}{W}: Put a loyalty counter on target Gideon planeswalker.
flavor: "For the Legion! For Ravnica!"

name: Guildpact Informant
text:
Flying
Whenever Guildpact Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor: "Of course you're being followed!"

name: Jace's Projection
text:
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection.
{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.
flavor: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."

name: Jace's Ruse
text: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Jace, Arcane Strategist, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
flavor: "The Eternals can recognize faces. They just think I look like a blue minotaur."

name: Necratog
text: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Necratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The necratog can always dig up a meal.

name: Harvest Wurm
text: When Harvest Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
The wurm's weave
—Elvish expression meaning "plowed fields"

name: Rogue Elephant
text: When Rogue Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.
flavor:
"When are trees like grass?"
—*The One Thousand Questions*

name: Firestorm
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Firestorm deals X damage to each of X targets.
flavor:
"Glok loved storms! He'd sit an' watch an' laugh through the whole thing. I miss him."
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Orcish Settlers
text: {X}{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orcish Settlers: Destroy X target lands.
flavor: They wouldn't know their house from a charred hole in the ground.

name: Alms
text: {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor:
"Helping people is mostly a matter of teaching them to help themselves."
—Sisay, journal

name: Benalish Missionary
text: {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.
flavor:
"These horn-haters say no gods but theirs exist. I say let him find out for himself—right now!"
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Debt of Loyalty
text: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way.
flavor: "I killed him because I had to," Starke lied to Gerrard. "But now I pledge my loyalty to you."

name: Duskrider Falcon
text: Flying, protection from black
flavor:
"Seaborne ships have their dolphins to dance in their wakes; I have my duskriders."
—Sisay, journal

name: Foriysian Brigade
text: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor:
"A double-edged sword lets you cut down your enemies with the backswing as well."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Inner Sanctum
text:
Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.
flavor: "Save me from Maraxus," Starke pleaded, "or condemn me to his wrath. Either way, do not ignore me!"

name: Master of Arms
text:
First strike
{1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms.
flavor:
"Being the best usually means proving it to everyone."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Peacekeeper
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}.
Creatures can't attack.
flavor:
"I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise."
—Sisay, journal

name: Revered Unicorn
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Revered Unicorn leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the number of age counters on it.
flavor:
"I felt unworthy even to dream of it."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Soul Shepherd
text: {W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 1 life.
flavor:
"The sidar who raised me had a saying: 'The first step into death is the hardest.'"
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Abjure
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a blue permanent.
Counter target spell.
flavor: Mirri's hackles rose as Ertai continued expounding his virtues. "If that arrogant brat doesn't shut up soon," she growled to herself, "I'm going to have to kill him."

name: Avizoa
text:
Flying
{0}: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You skip your next untap step. Activate only once each turn.
flavor: "Maybe we can trap them with bait," thought Tahngarth, eyeing Squee.

name: Flux
text:
Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Every spell has the potential to be worthless."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Mana Chains
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"The Lord of the Wastes must be destroyed; I am bound to this destiny by the chains of fate. If only Gerrard would see his part."
—Sisay, journal

name: Merfolk Traders
text: When Merfolk Traders enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor:
"As much as I hate water, I *do* love fish . . . ."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Paradigm Shift
text: Exile all cards from your library. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.
flavor:
"Barrin always said that reality is relative. 'The world,' he cautioned, 'is but pieces of one's perception.'"
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Pendrell Mists
text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."
flavor: As insubstantial—and as insistent—as appetite.

name: Psychic Vortex
text:
Cumulative upkeep—Draw a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.
flavor:
"Tolaria floats upon a wheel of fortune."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Tolarian Drake
text:
Flying
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor: Many have been lost just in staring at its wings. What's seen differs from account to account, but madness is always part of the story.

name: Tolarian Entrancer
text: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.
flavor:
"Why should I boast? The bards will do it for me—and with music."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Tolarian Serpent
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill seven cards.
flavor:
"When the fishtails' threats of magic didn't move me, they set their pet on us."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Barrow Ghoul
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Barrow Ghoul unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.
flavor:
"They killed my family to deny me a future. They fed on my ancestors to deny me a past."
—Crovax

name: Coils of the Medusa
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/-1.
Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.
flavor: Serpentine locks shape ornate rocks.

name: Gallowbraid
text:
Trample
Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"If its skin looks like stone, it is only to match its heart."
—Crovax

name: Haunting Misery
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X creature cards from your graveyard.
Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor:
"I am condemned without end."
—Crovax

name: Infernal Tribute
text: {2}, Sacrifice a nontoken permanent: Draw a card.
flavor:
"I would not barter my soul for any of the filth that they called power. So they took it from me and damned me to solitude."
—Crovax

name: Morinfen
text:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"I looked into its eyes, and its soul was so empty I saw no reflection, no light there."
—Crovax

name: Odylic Wraith
text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Whenever Odylic Wraith deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor: By the time you've seen it, you won't remember that you did.

name: Shadow Rider
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor: In its world of complete darkness, it has no shadows to fear.

name: Shattered Crypt
text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You lose X life.
flavor:
"You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the *Weatherlight*. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept."
—Crovax

name: Tendrils of Despair
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target opponent discards two cards.
flavor:
"Because I am incapable of tears does not mean I have no need to shed them."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Urborg Justice
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
flavor:
"It is a narrow line between justice and vengeance."
—Crovax

name: Urborg Stalker
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a nonblack, nonland permanent, Urborg Stalker deals 1 damage to that player.
flavor:
"May you be a stalker's dream."
—Urborg curse

name: Wave of Terror
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your draw step, destroy each creature with mana value equal to the number of age counters on Wave of Terror. They can't be regenerated.
flavor: The sea of fear has endless depths.

name: Zombie Scavengers
text: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Regenerate Zombie Scavengers.
flavor:
"Pick a shell upon my shore and put it to your ear. That sound isn't the sea, but the whispers of the fallen."
—Crovax

name: Cinder Giant
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Cinder Giant deals 2 damage to each other creature you control.
flavor:
"The giant wept tears of embers for the deaths of his allies."
—Azeworai, "The Lonely Giant"

name: Cone of Flame
text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.
flavor:
"Mine is not the warmth of compassion."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Dwarven Berserker
text: Whenever Dwarven Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: "I may be small, but I can kick *your* butt."

name: Goblin Grenadiers
text: Whenever Goblin Grenadiers attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature and target land.
flavor: For once, Squee realized, *he* wasn't the dumb one.

name: Heat Stroke
text: At end of combat, destroy each creature that blocked or was blocked this turn.
flavor:
"Stroke of heat or stroke of blade. Choose your fate, traitor."
—Maraxus of Keld, to Starke

name: Hurloon Shaman
text: When Hurloon Shaman dies, each player sacrifices a land.
flavor:
"I believe it when they say they're connected to the land—looks like somebody plowed her face."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Lava Hounds
text:
Haste
When Lava Hounds enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to you.
flavor:
What cats bury, dogs eat.
—Urborg aphorism

name: Lava Storm
text: Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature or Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each blocking creature.
flavor: They say lava conquers all.

name: Maraxus of Keld
text: Maraxus of Keld's power and toughness are each equal to the number of untapped artifacts, creatures, and lands you control.
flavor:
"I have no master. I am chaos."
—Maraxus of Keld

name: Sawtooth Ogre
text: Whenever Sawtooth Ogre blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Sawtooth Ogre deals 1 damage to that creature at end of combat.
flavor: "You will sharpen your teeth on my enemies' bones," Maraxus promised them, and his ogres cheered.

name: Aboroth
text: Cumulative upkeep—Put a -1/-1 counter on Aboroth. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor: The *Weatherlight* banked sharply as the colossal beast rose up to crush the lone rider. "My bet's on the dirt," Gerrard said flatly.

name: Arctic Wolves
text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Arctic Wolves enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor:
"No matter where we cat warriors go in the world, those stupid slobberers find us."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Blossoming Wreath
text: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"I place this wreath for you, my kin. Even in death, you give me strength to avenge you."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Briar Shield
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: In all its forms, the forest is the elves' best protector.

name: Fallow Wurm
text: When Fallow Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.
flavor:
The wurm's wake
—Elvish expression meaning "ruined crops"

name: Fungus Elemental
text: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Put a +2/+2 counter on Fungus Elemental. Activate only if Fungus Elemental entered the battlefield this turn.
flavor:
I rot growth and grow rot. What am I?
—Elvish riddle

name: Llanowar Druid
text: {T}, Sacrifice Llanowar Druid: Untap all Forests.
flavor:
"This forest means more to the druids than their own kin. The loss of a tree is like the loss of a child."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Mwonvuli Ooze
text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay {2} for each age counter on it.)
Mwonvuli Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus twice the number of age counters on it.
flavor: "Ewww!"

name: Nature's Kiss
text:
Enchant creature
{1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
I cradle my rage even as the earth cradles my dead kin.
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Striped Bears
text: When Striped Bears enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor:
"The bear is never cautious—which is why it wasn't born a human."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Tranquil Grove
text: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.
flavor:
"Even the fiercest storm has a peaceful eye."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Uktabi Efreet
text: Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor:
"The Uktabi efreet and I have something in common: both of our mothers wanted to give us back."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Battle Hurda
text: First strike
flavor:
"Murasan hurdas were too aggressive to tolerate a harness, so we put them on guard duty. Now the bandits can't get within spitting distance of us."
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Fledgling Griffin
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"We're making progress, but its desire to explore still far exceeds its ability."
—Amadi, Halimar griffin-master

name: Hada Freeblade
text: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.
flavor: "I toiled in Kazuul's mines when I was eight. I think I'm tough enough for a little hiking."

name: Join the Ranks
text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier Ally creature tokens.
flavor: Expeditionary houses are notorious for their rivalries. But when adventurers meet in the wilderness, the instinct for mutual survival outweighs petty grudges.

name: Marsh Threader
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: "Give me a sturdy rope over the advice of any so-called expert. I can thread the dark wilds better than anyone."

name: Perimeter Captain
text:
Defender
Whenever a creature you control with defender blocks, you may gain 2 life.
flavor: "We stand between the jaws of chaos and the mantle of order."

name: Rest for the Weary
text:
Target player gains 4 life.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.
flavor: Zendikar is a brutal taskmaster, but sometimes it offers unexpected solace.

name: Ruin Ghost
text: {W}, {T}: Exile target land you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: The Forsaken Ones haunt the ruins that flicker in and out of the spirit realm. Such sites are hard to find and even harder to loot.

name: Talus Paladin
text: Whenever Talus Paladin or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Allies you control gain lifelink until end of turn, and you may put a +1/+1 counter on Talus Paladin.
flavor: "Why fill pockets with gold when you can fill hearts with conviction?"

name: Terra Eternal
text: All lands have indestructible.
flavor:
"If this world could make a wish, it would be to survive the parasites who loot its treasures and threaten its life force."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Goliath Sphinx
text: Flying
flavor: He makes his home on the tallest mountain in Sejiri, where the vista is as endless as his patience.

name: Horizon Drake
text: Flying, protection from lands
flavor: Using thermal updrafts and gravity currents, drakes eat and sleep in the air. Some never touch the ground from birth until death.

name: Mysteries of the Deep
text:
Draw two cards.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.
flavor:
"The Roil is destructive, but not random. It's Zendikar's way of revealing secrets."
—Ilori, merfolk falconer

name: Selective Memory
text: Search your library for any number of nonland cards, exile them, then shuffle.
flavor:
"I of all people know that memory is not a safe place to hide valuables."
—Jace Beleren

name: Tideforce Elemental
text:
{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Tideforce Elemental.
flavor: Ebb and flow, high tide and low, quick as sand and just as slow.

name: Bojuka Brigand
text:
Bojuka Brigand can't block.
Whenever Bojuka Brigand or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bojuka Brigand.
flavor: "I don't do tactics. I don't do guard duty. I do damage. Take it or leave it."

name: Caustic Crawler
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Novice explorers can mistake the acid-carved stone lairs for ancient ruins. They rarely survive to learn better.

name: Dead Reckoning
text: You may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, Dead Reckoning deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.
flavor: Many venture out to hunt for treasures. Others lie in wait to hunt the hunters.

name: Jagwasp Swarm
text: Flying
flavor:
"You know how to tell a sapling explorer from an old hardhead? See which one mistakes a swarm of jagwasps for the setting sun."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Shoreline Salvager
text: Whenever Shoreline Salvager deals combat damage to a player, if you control an Island, you may draw a card.
flavor:
"They search for treasures that wash up from the depths. Tracking one could lead you to riches. Or in circles."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Bazaar Trader
text: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.
flavor: "No need for a hurda? How about these maps to recently discovered tombs? Or these vials of invisible potion? Very fancy . . ."

name: Bull Rush
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "It's gone mad! Loose the chains and save what you can!"

name: Grotag Thrasher
text: Whenever Grotag Thrasher attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: The goblin fancied himself a rider. The lizard was happy with its new flail.

name: Quest for the Goblin Lord
text:
Whenever a Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Goblin Lord.
As long as Quest for the Goblin Lord has five or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +2/+0.
flavor: A shrine to unchecked desire.

name: Ricochet Trap
text:
If an opponent cast a blue spell this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Change the target of target spell with a single target.
flavor: In his last seconds, Remhas regretted using his most powerful spell.

name: Roiling Terrain
text: Destroy target land, then Roiling Terrain deals damage to that land's controller equal to the number of land cards in that player's graveyard.
flavor:
"The trembling lands ruptured, leaving an open door for things from below to emerge."
—Screed of the Mul Daya

name: Rumbling Aftershocks
text: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, you may have Rumbling Aftershocks deal damage to any target equal to the number of times that spell was kicked.
flavor:
"I like it here. You always get a little more for your mana."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Feral Contest
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.
flavor: The instinct for survival makes enemies of all.

name: Grappler Spider
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Creatures of the air wisely avoid the darkest regions of Guul Draz—which is why grappler spiders inhabit the few places touched by the sun's rays.

name: Harabaz Druid
text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Allies you control.
flavor: "I care nothing for treasure. The land beckons me, and I cannot rest until my feet have touched every inch of it."

name: Slingbow Trap
text:
If a black creature with flying is attacking, you may pay {G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature with flying.
flavor: The Tajuru elves devised ways to let the forest defend itself.

name: Snapping Creeper
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Creeper gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: Its vast network of roots and vines keeps it aware of distant dangers.

name: Summit Apes
text: As long as you control a Mountain, Summit Apes has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor:
"If you climb Skyfang Peak, avoid the pass. Generations of apes made that trail, and they don't tolerate trespassers."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Vastwood Animist
text: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.
flavor: He calls on the forests for counsel and summons the earth to his cause.

name: Bellowing Aegisaur
text: Enrage — Whenever Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor: Its roaring challenge is punctuated by the slam of its tail on the earth, rousing the herds of the plains.

name: Bishop's Soldier
text: Lifelink
flavor: Vampires, the noble class of old Torrezon, are guided by their dual loyalties to church and crown.

name: Duskborne Skymarcher
text:
Flying
{W}, {T}: Target attacking Vampire gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The hour of Dusk is come."

name: Glorifier of Dusk
text:
Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains flying until end of turn.
Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: "The blood of the enemy is a sacrament. The strength it gives is proof that our cause is just."

name: Imperial Lancer
text: Imperial Lancer has double strike as long as you control a Dinosaur.
flavor: "Together my mount and I are stronger than either of us apart."

name: Ixalan's Binding
text:
When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.
flavor: Jace awoke to the certainty that he was lost.

name: Kinjalli's Caller
text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Kinjalli is the Wakening Sun, who created humans from clay and baked them in the sun's warmth.

name: Pious Interdiction
text:
Enchant creature
When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor: "Ours is the true and righteous path. You will bow before our might."

name: Pterodon Knight
text: Pterodon Knight has flying as long as you control a Dinosaur.
flavor: "To rise like the sun—there is no greater feeling."

name: Queen's Commission
text: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor:
"Let the blood of the impure flow through you. Only the blessings of the golden city will purge its acrid taste from your mouth."
—High Marshal Arguel

name: Rallying Roar
text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.
flavor:
"The sun's strength sings in our hearts! I have never been more proud of my home and my people."
—Huatli

name: Ritual of Rejuvenation
text:
You gain 4 life.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Nothing is more sacred than the gift of blood. Blessed are the vein that empties and the heart that is renewed."

name: Sheltering Light
text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)
flavor: Those who wield the power of the sun protect the Empire from darkness.

name: Skyblade of the Legion
text: Flying
flavor: Vampires call the gift of flight "exultation." For their enemies, it brings only sorrow.

name: Steadfast Armasaur
text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Steadfast Armasaur deals damage equal to its toughness to target creature blocking or blocked by it.
flavor:
"Like the mighty armasaur, we will defend against all who invade our shores."
—Itzama the Crested

name: Vampire's Zeal
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: The Feast of Blood sends new life essence flowing through the vampire who partakes, manifesting as even greater strength and speed.

name: Deadeye Quartermaster
text: When Deadeye Quartermaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "Welcome aboard, mate! You're going to need this."

name: Deeproot Waters
text: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: A visit to the Deeproot Tree and its ancient spring replenishes a merfolk's connection to nature.

name: Depths of Desire
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Pockets full of gold, lungs full of brine.

name: Dive Down
text: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: "Seeing the river is not the same as seeing the fish."

name: Headwater Sentries
flavor: "The elders say that if the intruders discovered the secret of the golden city, it would mean an end to our people."

name: Navigator's Ruin
text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent mills four cards.
flavor: "You won't be needing this. Or this. Or these . . ."

name: Pirate's Prize
text: Draw two cards. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Nothing warms the heart like plunder.

name: Run Aground
text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor:
"That's the first time I've seen the ground do the running."
—Captain Brinely Rage

name: Shore Keeper
text: {7}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Shore Keeper: Draw three cards.
flavor: Over their long life spans, the larger trilobites accumulate vast treasure troves in their guts.

name: Siren's Ruse
text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.
flavor: Deception and misdirection are the heart of the pirate's arsenal.

name: Storm Fleet Aerialist
text:
Flying
Raid — Storm Fleet Aerialist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
flavor: "Only one thing beats the freedom of the sea: the freedom of the sky."

name: Storm Fleet Spy
text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Spy enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, draw a card.
flavor: "They're searching in the same direction we are. And for the same thing, I'll wager."

name: Tempest Caller
text: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.
flavor: "I *am* the storm."

name: Anointed Deacon
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Vampire get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Inspiration is red as rubies, flowing like honeyed wine.

name: Bishop of the Bloodstained
text: When Bishop of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life for each Vampire you control.
flavor: "They shall give us all they have as penance for their resistance. Their ships. Their goods. Their rebellious blood."

name: Contract Killing
text: Destroy target creature. Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: For a price, the floating city of High and Dry offers all the amenities a pirate could want: rest, recreation, and revenge.

name: Dark Nourishment
text: Dark Nourishment deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.
flavor: Demons lurk in the shadows of ancient ruins, spreading plague and corruption across the land.

name: Deathless Ancient
text:
Flying
Tap three untapped Vampires you control: Return Deathless Ancient from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Ancient one, we have reached the promised shore. The Immortal Sun is near. Drink and awake."

name: Grim Captain's Call
text: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.
flavor: When the battle is over, the bitterest foes at last find common ground.

name: Lurking Chupacabra
text: Whenever a creature you control explores, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Shadow birthed it. The moon gave it eyes, and the jungle gave it teeth. But it was Death that taught it cruelty."
—Huatli

name: Queen's Bay Soldier
flavor: The soldiers of the Legion of Dusk have come to the colonies at Queen's Bay in search of glory and riches. They are veterans of centuries of warfare, and they thirst for conquest.

name: Raiders' Wake
text:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.
flavor: One was spared to tell the gruesome tale.

name: Ruthless Knave
text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.
flavor: "This scum is barely worth the trouble."

name: Skittering Heartstopper
text: {B}: Skittering Heartstopper gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor: It flows like water over the forest floor, as deadly as the swiftest current.

name: Skulduggery
text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.
flavor: "They're so much more willing to parley once they're hanging from a boom by the ankle!"

name: Vanquish the Weak
text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor: The clerics known as condemners punish those who do not recognize the righteous authority of the church.

name: Vicious Conquistador
text: Whenever Vicious Conquistador attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor:
"He is ambitious. Tireless. And utterly ruthless. Ideal for the frontier."
—Viceroy Elia Sotonores, report to the queen

name: Wanted Scoundrels
text: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: "Trust me. The reward's not worth it."

name: Bonded Horncrest
text: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.
flavor:
"You don't tame a horncrest. You convince it that it's easier to destroy something else."
—Amautl, knight of Atzocan

name: Dinosaur Stampede
text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. Dinosaurs you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: If you're in the way of a ceratops charge and you're made of mere flesh and bone, then you're not really in the way.

name: Fathom Fleet Firebrand
text: {1}{R}: Fathom Fleet Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: As she charges into battle, her arcane tattoos stir and crawl like fiery serpents.

name: Fire Shrine Keeper
text:
Menace
{7}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Shrine Keeper: It deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
flavor: Though grimed with the dust of centuries, the ancient shrine was not unguarded.

name: Headstrong Brute
text:
Headstrong Brute can't block.
Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.
flavor:
"Watch your backs, keep your blades at hand, and let the orc go first!"
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Otepec Huntmaster
text:
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "Forward! Let the Burning Sun's light guide you to deserving prey!"

name: Raptor Hatchling
text: Enrage — Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
flavor:
"Every little hatchling has a parent's claws to guard it."
—Sun Empire saying

name: Storm Fleet Arsonist
text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Arsonist enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent sacrifices a permanent.
flavor: "Go ahead, build another. I'll burn that down as well."

name: Thrash of Raptors
text: As long as you control another Dinosaur, Thrash of Raptors gets +2/+0 and has trample.
flavor: They glide through the undergrowth, drawn to sounds of disturbance. They attack in unison and all share in the kill. And then they move on.

name: Tilonalli's Knight
text: Whenever Tilonalli's Knight attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, Tilonalli's Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Tilonalli is the Burning Sun, associated with ferocity, fire, and passion.

name: Unfriendly Fire
text: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor: Disputes within the Brazen Coalition can escalate from insult to broadside in the blink of an eye.

name: Wily Goblin
text: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor: Goblins climb and swing with ease, whether through a pirate ship's rigging or a tree's branches.

name: Atzocan Archer
text:
Reach
When Atzocan Archer enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor: His arrows are fletched with feathers from the greatest of the winged dinosaurs.

name: Blinding Fog
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: "I see you, shiny soldiers, but you won't see me."

name: Crash the Ramparts
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The Legion's conquistadors could endure Ixalan's sun. Their forts could withstand a charging ceratops. But nothing can stop a ceratops strengthened by the sun.

name: Deeproot Warrior
text: Whenever Deeproot Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"We breathe from our soul and bones to give strength to the jungle. The jungle breathes from its roots and rivers to give strength to us."
—Shaper Falani

name: Emergent Growth
text: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor: "By accepting my smallness I am vast."

name: Ixalli's Keeper
text: {7}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Ixalli's Keeper: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Ixalli is the Verdant Sun, who fosters growth in all things.

name: Jade Guardian
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
When Jade Guardian enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.
flavor: The River Heralds believe that jade gives weight to their magic.

name: Kumena's Speaker
text: Kumena's Speaker gets +1/+1 as long as you control another Merfolk or an Island.
flavor: "The same power that drives the river ever onward flows through the roots and branches—to me."

name: Ravenous Daggertooth
text: Enrage — Whenever Ravenous Daggertooth is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.
flavor: A daggertooth's triumphant roar makes all the sounds of jungle life fall silent.

name: River Heralds' Boon
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.
flavor: "We are kin to the trees, and their strength is our own."

name: Spike-Tailed Ceratops
text: Spike-Tailed Ceratops can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor: The conquistadors surrounded the dinosaur only to find that it had outflanked them.

name: Tishana's Wayfinder
text: When Tishana's Wayfinder enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: "There is always another way."

name: Verdant Rebirth
text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand."
Draw a card.
flavor: The dryads of the forest have no stake in Ixalan's conflict, but they hate to see any living being suffer.

name: Vineshaper Mystic
text: When Vineshaper Mystic enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target Merfolk you control.
flavor: She has never touched a loom, yet the tapestries she weaves are vast and beautiful.

name: Wildgrowth Walker
text: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.
flavor:
"Hear me, stone, root, branch: be the fist of this land. Turn back those who trample upon your domain."
—Song of the Shaper

name: Jace's Sentinel
text: As long as you control a Jace planeswalker, Jace's Sentinel gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
flavor: "We drove the Sun Empire out of the forest long ago, and we will not let them return."

name: Huatli's Snubhorn
text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor: Don't make the mistake of thinking blunt horns can't kill.

name: Huatli's Spurring
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you control a Huatli planeswalker, that creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn instead.
flavor: "Run like the wind, fierce one. The hunt has begun."

name: Armament Master
text: Other Kor creatures you control get +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to Armament Master.
flavor: "We prepare for the known with daggers, rations, rope, and pitons. But we also prepare for the unknown with billycat tails, pikku roots, hedron chips . . ."

name: Caravan Hurda
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor:
"Not too bright, but good enough for the job required—carrying and walking in a straight line."
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Cliff Threader
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor: "The crossing demands singular focus. Your life consists of these ropes, these hooks, and these rocky crags. Your past is miles below."

name: Devout Lightcaster
text:
Protection from black
When Devout Lightcaster enters the battlefield, exile target black permanent.
flavor:
"Goddess, grant us light to banish the world's shadows."
—Prayer to Kamsa

name: Landbind Ritual
text: You gain 2 life for each Plains you control.
flavor:
"Honor this place, for our children's children will stand here and speak these same words again."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

name: Makindi Shieldmate
text:
Defender
Whenever Makindi Shieldmate or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Makindi Shieldmate.
flavor: The more who rely on him, the more resolute he becomes.

name: Nimbus Wings
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has flying.
