flavor: Explorers may find ways into the Sky Ruin, but they find its secrets well protected by shifting hedrons and Roil winds.

name: Noble Vestige
text:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target player or planeswalker this turn.
flavor: Most spirits are chained to this world by their despair, but he remains tethered by his hope for better days.

name: Ondu Cleric
text: Whenever Ondu Cleric or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to the number of Allies you control.
flavor: A cleric's true balm is the confidence he inspires in his compatriots.

name: Shieldmate's Blessing
text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor:
"Even land dwellers may call for Emeria's grace in times of need."
—Emeria's Creed

name: World Queller
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a card type. If you do, each player sacrifices a permanent of that type.
flavor:
"Why fight the world when you know who will win?"
—Nissa Revane

name: Cosi's Trickster
text: Whenever an opponent shuffles their library, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Cosi's Trickster.
flavor: She watches the chaos created by the Roil, seeking strength in the patterns of anarchy.

name: Lethargy Trap
text:
If three or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Attacking creatures get -3/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: Suddenly, Zurdi didn't care about treasure, glory, food . . . or the drakes circling above.

name: Living Tsunami
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Living Tsunami unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: At low tide it slumbers. At high tide it devours.

name: Lullmage Mentor
text:
Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token.
Tap seven untapped Merfolk you control: Counter target spell.
flavor: "Many voices are needed to quiet this land."

name: Merfolk Seastalkers
text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{2}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor:
"Do they seek knowledge or wealth? Are they bandits or benefactors? It depends on who is chanting the tale."
—Nikou, Joraga bard

name: Mindbreak Trap
text:
If an opponent cast three or more spells this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile any number of target spells.
flavor:
"Life is a maze. This is one of its dead ends."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Roil Elemental
text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain control of target creature for as long as you control Roil Elemental.
flavor: A vortex that devours everything—even the souls of the living.

name: Sea Gate Loremaster
text: {T}: Draw a card for each Ally you control.
flavor:
"He's a living library. He remembers everything our band of explorers has seen, and we can use that to our advantage."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

name: Seascape Aerialist
text: Whenever Seascape Aerialist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: "The sky is like another sea. It teems with currents, life, and endless possibility."

name: Shoal Serpent
text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Shoal Serpent loses defender until end of turn.
flavor:
"It's like a reef that runs aground on ships."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

name: Sky Ruin Drake
text: Flying
flavor:
"Hold up your spears. And try not to look like food."
—Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword

name: Sphinx of Jwar Isle
text:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
flavor:
"Even if the sphinxes do know the location of every relic, getting one to talk is harder than just searching yourself."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Spreading Seas
text:
Enchant land
When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land is an Island.
flavor: Most inhabitants of Zendikar have given up on the idea of an accurate map.

name: Trapfinder's Trick
text: Target player reveals their hand and discards all Trap cards.
flavor:
"At some point, every trapfinder will lose a hunk of flesh. It's just a question of how much—and whether it'll grow back."
—Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

name: Trapmaker's Snare
text: Search your library for a Trap card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: "Trapmaking is an art. The trap is a corporeal riddle, a battle of wits between its creator and whatever it lures inside."

name: Umara Raptor
text:
Flying
Whenever Umara Raptor or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Umara Raptor.
flavor: Messenger, weapon, friend.

name: Bog Tatters
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: A wraith is a tale of brutal slaying told anew whenever it finds a victim.

name: Crypt Ripper
text:
Haste
{B}: Crypt Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: The tender light of the living quickens the pulse of the dead.

name: Desecrated Earth
text: Destroy target land. Its controller discards a card.
flavor:
"The land is swollen with mana, cursed relics, and secrets. If you puncture it, you never know what will burst out."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Guul Draz Vampire
text: As long as an opponent has 10 or less life, Guul Draz Vampire gets +2/+1 and has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor: "A creature's bloodscent is a beacon that cannot be disguised."

name: Hagra Crocodile
text:
Hagra Crocodile can't block.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hagra Crocodile gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The creatures of Zendikar are opportunists, eating whatever is available to them. Like goblins. Or boats.

name: Hagra Diabolist
text: Whenever Hagra Diabolist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Allies you control.
flavor: "When exploring the darkest regions, wickedness can be the best accomplice of all."

name: Halo Hunter
text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
When Halo Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target Angel.
flavor: Hanging on the walls of his lair, the fallen halos cast his depravity in everlasting light.

name: Mindless Null
text: Mindless Null can't block unless you control a Vampire.
flavor: Only a bloodchief can create vampires. The rest sire nulls, who become mindless beasts in their former bodies.

name: Needlebite Trap
text:
If an opponent gained life this turn, you may pay {B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target player loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.
flavor: The traps around the vampire city of Malakir hint at the thirst of its inhabitants.

name: Nimana Sell-Sword
text: Whenever Nimana Sell-Sword or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Nimana Sell-Sword.
flavor:
"He asked if I had work for him. No wasn't the right answer."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Electropotence
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor: Where life and force collide.

name: Highland Berserker
text: Whenever Highland Berserker or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor: He gets paid by the axe.

name: Kazuul Warlord
text: Whenever Kazuul Warlord or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Ally creature you control.
flavor: On expeditions, minotaurs are worth their weight in gold. Fortunately for their paymasters, most minotaurs don't know how much they weigh.

name: Magma Rift
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Magma Rift deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor:
"Lighting a fire needs kindling and heat. You be the kindling. I'll bring the heat."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Murasa Pyromancer
text: Whenever Murasa Pyromancer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Murasa Pyromancer deal damage to target creature equal to the number of Allies you control.
flavor: "Fire is my accomplice. For enough coin, it can be yours as well."

name: Ruinous Minotaur
text: Whenever Ruinous Minotaur deals damage to an opponent, sacrifice a land.
flavor: Not every intelligent being is interested in treasure and lost knowledge . . . or even the basics of speech.

name: Seismic Shudder
text: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor:
"The land here seems to go out of its way to kill you."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Shatterskull Giant
flavor:
"Now I know why they call it Shatterskull Pass. Rocks fell all night like hammers smashing an anvil. It's no wonder the giants are angry all the time."
—Mitra, Bala Ged missionary

name: Tuktuk Grunts
text:
Haste
Whenever Tuktuk Grunts or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Tuktuk Grunts.
flavor: Goblins are more aggressive with a crowd to cheer them on.

name: Unstable Footing
text:
Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Damage can't be prevented this turn. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: A long way down is shorter than you think.

name: Oran-Rief Survivalist
text: Whenever Oran-Rief Survivalist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Survivalist.
flavor: "I'm strong enough to survive alone. I'm smart enough to want companions at my side."

name: Primal Bellow
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.
flavor:
"A might spell can be handy against baloths, giants, kraken, the Roil—or if you lose your bearings in the woods."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Savage Silhouette
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature."
flavor: Some elves believe that their survival instincts are born of many cycles of reincarnation.

name: Scythe Tiger
text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
When Scythe Tiger enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a land.
flavor: Instead of adapting to its environment, it adapts its environment to itself.

name: Tanglesap
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures without trample.
flavor:
"The blood of the forest is beholden to no one."
—Nissa Revane

name: Timbermaw Larva
text: Whenever Timbermaw Larva attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.
flavor:
"You can't trust your eyes. A tree might look healthy, but its insides tell a different tale."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

name: Turntimber Ranger
text: Whenever Turntimber Ranger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Turntimber Ranger.
flavor: The lone wolf dies alone.

name: Zendikar Farguide
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: Expeditions follow the paths it leaves in its wake.

name: Allied Assault
text: Up to two target creatures each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: A common foe is the death of old hatreds.

name: Angelheart Protector
text: When Angelheart Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: "We shall persevere."

name: Canyon Jerboa
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Move, you wretched thing! You're scaring the hurdas!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Cliffhaven Sell-Sword
flavor: "I swing a sword. It's a simple life. A lot of adventurers just see me as some cheap muscle, but if my steel lets them return home with their lives and limbs intact, then I've done my job."

name: Emeria Captain
text:
Flying, vigilance
When Emeria Captain enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "The gifts of the past must find their way into deserving hands."

name: Expedition Healer
text:
Vigilance
Expedition Healer has lifelink as long as you control another Cleric.
flavor: In any adventuring party, the cleric is the heart: healing wounds, inspiring courage, and raising morale.

name: Farsight Adept
text: When Farsight Adept enters the battlefield, you and target opponent each draw a card.
flavor: "I've walked every one of the Teetering Peaks and never set a foot wrong. I can get you to safety."

name: Fearless Fledgling
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fearless Fledgling. It gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Griffins nest in precarious places, so fledglings often find themselves taking their first flights at surprising moments.

name: Kabira Outrider
text: When Kabira Outrider enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: Ondu moas make wildly uncomfortable mounts, but for determined warriors, their speed is enough to make up for it.

name: Kabira Takedown // Kabira Plateau
text: Kabira Takedown deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor:
"Down below's where things go to die."
—Kreq of Sunder Bay

name: Kitesail Cleric
text:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Kitesail Cleric enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap up to two target creatures.
flavor: Too flashy to ignore. Too fast to catch.

name: Kor Blademaster
text:
Double strike
Equipped Warriors you control have double strike.
flavor: Every kor blade is imbued with the skill of a thousand generations.

name: Kor Celebrant
text: Whenever Kor Celebrant or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "The landbind ritual connects us to our sacred sites. More importantly, it binds us with every other kor who has visited here, through countless generations."

name: Makindi Ox
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor:
"May bloodflies empty your veins and turn you into a dried leather sack, cow!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Makindi Stampede // Makindi Mesas
text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"They say the wind carved out these canyon walls. But the floor was hammered flat by hooves."
—Kreq of Sunder Bay

name: Nahiri's Binding
text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor: "This is my world, Jace, down to its very bones."

name: Paired Tactician
text: Whenever Paired Tactician and at least one other Warrior attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Paired Tactician.
flavor: "If we fight as one, nothing can stand in our way!"

name: Practiced Tactics
text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Practiced Tactics deals damage to that creature equal to twice the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: Each individual has their own crucial role to play.

name: Resolute Strike
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Warrior, you may attach an Equipment you control to it.
flavor:
"If you practice something often enough, it becomes part of you. That's why we train, and that's why we survive."
—Tasha, Graypelt veteran

name: Sea Gate Banneret
text: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: The Sea Gate Expeditionary House was founded after the discovery of the Skyclave over Tazeem. Now its banners fly over every corner of Zendikar.

name: Sejiri Shelter // Sejiri Glacier
text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor:
"It blocks the windswept salt and frigid air, but the loneliness of Sejiri remains."
—Enwor, Sea Gate Expeditionary House

name: Shepherd of Heroes
text:
Flying
When Shepherd of Heroes enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Rest, friends. I will protect you."

name: Skyclave Cleric // Skyclave Basilica
text: When Skyclave Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor:
"Well, she can jump farther than I can."
—Aelah, expedition cleric

name: Tazeem Raptor
text:
Flying
When Tazeem Raptor enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"It's good to see the eagles circling the Lighthouse once again."
—Tazri

name: Anticognition
text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {2}. If an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, instead counter that spell, then scry 2.
flavor:
"I think not."
—Flekon the Mindcensor

name: Beyeen Veil // Beyeen Coast
text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"All you minnows in the murk, come to my light."
—Jejenar, Silundi lullmage

name: Cascade Seer
text: When Cascade Seer enters the battlefield, scry X, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Perhaps you can't see the path, but that doesn't mean it isn't there."

name: Cleric of Chill Depths
text: Whenever Cleric of Chill Depths blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: "Before my people turned to false gods, we built a glittering city beneath the northern sea ice. The magic of ancient Benthidrix lives in me!"

name: Concerted Defense
text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1} plus an additional {1} for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!"

name: Cunning Geysermage
text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Cunning Geysermage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Come on, Skitch, we'll lose them in the geyserfield."

name: Deliberate
text: Scry 2, then draw a card.
flavor: "I can't see all that the future holds, but I can keep us one step ahead of death."

name: Expedition Diviner
text:
Flying
As long as you control another Wizard, Expedition Diviner has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavor: Wizards' spells twist the fabric of reality to channel elemental energies, peer into the future, and even calm the Roil.

name: Field Research
text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Draw two cards. If this spell was kicked, draw three cards instead.
flavor: "In the field, speed-reading is a survival skill."

name: Jwari Disruption // Jwari Ruins
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor:
"You worry too much."
—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder

name: Living Tempest
text:
Flash
Flying
flavor:
"If you don't like the weather, just wait a few minutes and it'll change ... probably for the worse."
—Amandi, kitesail expert

name: Lullmage's Domination
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature whose controller has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
Gain control of target creature with mana value X.
flavor: "One spell to quiet the Roil, one to quash the will. The principle is the same."

name: Merfolk Falconer
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a kicked spell, scry 2.
flavor: "For generations, we have bred and trained falcons for expeditions into Emeria. Now more sky ruins open themselves to those with the means to reach the heights!"

name: Risen Riptide
text: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, Risen Riptide has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Most days the sea is my friend. But only most days."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Ruin Crab
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: To an explorer, a priceless treasure. To the crab, a rock to call home.

name: Seafloor Stalker
text: {4}{U}: Seafloor Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Sunken ruins? My specialty."

name: Silundi Vision // Silundi Isle
text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor:
"Feel the current? Rough waters lie ahead."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Skyclave Squid
text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Squid can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor: An ancient sea monster dragged the Murasa Skyclave under the waves, then smaller sea monsters moved in.

name: Sure-Footed Infiltrator
text:
Tap another untapped Rogue you control: Sure-Footed Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Sure-Footed Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: "I've yet to discover the ruin that can keep me out."

name: Tazeem Roilmage
text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
When Tazeem Roilmage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "The Roil can be directed. Observe."

name: Umara Wizard // Umara Skyfalls
text: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, Umara Wizard gains flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"You see a waterfall. I see a way up."
—Ko Dari, expedition wizard

name: Windrider Wizard
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: "It's an ideal method for exploring sky ruins. The drakes sniff me briefly but then lose interest."

name: Blackbloom Rogue // Blackbloom Bog
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Blackbloom Rogue gets +3/+0 as long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
flavor:
"If you ever want to get back up, do what I say."
—Exena, expedition rogue

name: Bloodchief's Thirst
text:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, instead destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: "We are free. It is our duty to live well."

name: Deadly Alliance
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: "He could handle any one of us, but he's no match for all of us!"

name: Drana's Silencer
text: When Drana's Silencer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Hush."

name: Dreadwurm
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Dreadwurm gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor: Its silent slithering belies its bulk.

name: Expedition Skulker
text: Expedition Skulker has deathtouch as long as you control another Rogue.
flavor: Rogues bring an array of useful skills to the work of an adventuring party: stealth, agility, the ability to locate and disarm traps, and a subtle, deadly fighting style.

name: Ghastly Gloomhunter
text:
Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Flying, lifelink
If Ghastly Gloomhunter was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: Stinking, silent death.

name: Guul Draz Mucklord
text: When Guul Draz Mucklord dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: Death comes in many forms on Guul Draz, most of them slow, subtle, and agonizing. At least a monstrous crocodile offers a swift death.

name: Highborn Vampire
flavor: With the bloodchiefs annihilated in the fight between the free and enthralled, the swamps around Malakir are full of dangerous, young vampires eager to make their marks.

name: Lithoform Blight
text:
Enchant land
When Lithoform Blight enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land loses all land types and abilities and has "{T}: Add {C}" and "{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color."
flavor: Heedless of Nissa's warnings, Nahiri repeated history.

name: Malakir Rebirth // Malakir Mire
text: Choose target creature. You lose 2 life. Until end of turn, that creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor:
"Those who fail to escape Malakir become part of the city's defense."
—Doros, expedition guide

name: Mind Drain
text: Target opponent discards two cards, mills a card, and loses 1 life. You gain 1 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: "The meal was exquisite. The conversation, less so."

name: Nimana Skitter-Sneak
text: As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Nimana Skitter-Sneak gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: "When navigating dangerous terrain, one hundred legs are better than two."

name: Nimana Skydancer
text:
Flash
Flying
When Nimana Skydancer enters the battlefield, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: The Free City of Nimana is a great place to recruit adventurers with shady skill sets.

name: Oblivion's Hunger
text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Draw a card if that creature has a +1/+1 counter on it. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)
flavor:
"Indulge the void. Become the void. Consume all you touch."
—Drana, the last bloodchief

name: Pelakka Predation // Pelakka Caverns
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with mana value 3 or greater. That player discards that card.
flavor:
"I knew we shouldn't have come this way."
—Sneeflebrix, expedition rogue

name: Scion of the Swarm
text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Scion of the Swarm.
flavor: Vampires are now masters of their own fates, commanders of their own legions.

name: Skyclave Shadowcat
text:
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Skyclave Shadowcat.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
flavor:
"Perhaps its distant ancestors were radiant felidars, but no hint of their nobility remains."
—Akiri, kor line-slinger

name: Zof Consumption // Zof Bloodbog
text: Each opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor:
"Annihilation surrounds us. Our call is to embrace its ceaseless hunger."
—Voshk, oblivion priest

name: Akoum Hellhound
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellhound gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Hellhound packs roam the Spikefields, basking in the harsh sunlight and lighting the night with their flames.

name: Akoum Warrior // Akoum Teeth
text: Trample
flavor:
"I'm not cruel, but I have no patience for your mistakes."
—Tyrux, expedition warrior

name: Ardent Electromancer
text: When Ardent Electromancer enters the battlefield, add {R} for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Trust me, we won't need torches."

name: Cinderclasm
text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Cinderclasm deals 1 damage to each creature. If it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to each creature instead.
flavor: Every inferno begins with a spark.

name: Cleansing Wildfire
text:
Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor: Every rebirth looks like a death.

name: Expedition Champion
text: Expedition Champion gets +2/+0 as long as you control another Warrior.
flavor: Warriors are combat specialists who bring their deadly skills to bear against the many foes that adventurers face in the course of their journeys.

name: Fireblade Charger
text:
As long as Fireblade Charger is equipped, it has haste.
When Fireblade Charger dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor: "Down in flames" isn't a destination, but a journey.

name: Fissure Wizard
text: When Fissure Wizard enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: He might call up a burst of lava or a raging hellion from Akoum's volcanic depths. Or he might just fall in.

name: Goma Fada Vanguard
text: Whenever Goma Fada Vanguard attacks, target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of Warriors you control can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Her weapon's impressive, sure. But you should see her wield it."
—Gred, expedition warrior

name: A-Goma Fada Vanguard
text: Whenever Goma Fada Vanguard attacks, target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of Warriors and Equipment you control can't block this turn.
flavor:
"Her weapon's impressive, sure. But you should see her wield it."
—Gred, expedition warrior

name: Grotag Bug-Catcher
text:
Trample
Whenever Grotag Bug-Catcher attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Everybody grab a leg!"

name: Inordinate Rage
text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor:
"In my years wandering this land I've seen a veritable menagerie of fantastic creatures, but one that has eluded me thus far is the fabled 'easygoing minotaur.'"
—Ko, expedition wizard

name: Kazuul's Fury // Kazuul's Cliffs
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Kazuul's Fury deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor:
"The toll is steep, but the cliffs are steeper."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Molten Blast
text:
Choose one —
• Molten Blast deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor: Life among the sudden tremors and violent eruptions of Akoum demands a healthy fear of both.

name: Pyroclastic Hellion
text: When Pyroclastic Hellion enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand. When you do, Pyroclastic Hellion deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor:
"The difference between a hellion and a volcano is that volcanoes don't get hungry."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Rockslide Sorcerer
text: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, Rockslide Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: "You can cower from the crushing shards or embrace the danger of Akoum. I've made my choice."

name: Roil Eruption
text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Roil Eruption deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage instead.
flavor:
"Our feeble villages and tiny encampments stand only at the whim of the Roil."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Scorch Rider
text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
When Scorch Rider enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "Lava flows where it pleases. I'm just happy to be along for the ride!"

name: Shatterskull Minotaur
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Haste
flavor:
"We just pay him and point him at problems."
—Aro, Sea Gate adventurer

name: Sizzling Barrage
text: Sizzling Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature that blocked this turn.
flavor:
"A thousand sparks can burn through your defenses just as quickly as one massive blaze."
—Attikar, Akoum elementalist

name: Skyclave Geopede
text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Wrenched from the ground like a dirt-caked rock, the ancient Skyclave wriggled with life.

name: Sneaking Guide
text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "I swear, it's a shortcut."

name: Song-Mad Treachery // Song-Mad Ruins
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"I'm not proud of the things I did. But all I could think about at the time was how to make the noise stop."
—Yavotz, Sea Gate Expeditionary House

name: Spikefield Hazard // Spikefield Cave
text: Spikefield Hazard deals 1 damage to any target. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Stop screaming! You'll only bring down more spikes."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Spitfire Lagac
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Spitfire Lagac deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor:
"If you hear a choking sort of cough, it's about to get really hot."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Synchronized Spellcraft
text: Synchronized Spellcraft deals 4 damage to target creature and X damage to that creature's controller, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "Ready? One... two..."

name: Teeterpeak Ambusher
text: {2}{R}: Teeterpeak Ambusher gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Goblins from the Makindi Trenches of Ondu make surprisingly skilled climbing guides due to their habit of scaling the cliffs to drop onto unsuspecting foes.

name: Thundering Rebuke
text: Thundering Rebuke deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor:
"Fire is too imprecise for my tastes. I'd rather rely on a single, well-placed bolt of lightning."
—Lyrus, Sea Gate wizard

name: Tuktuk Rubblefort
text:
Defender, reach
Creatures you control have haste.
flavor: As with everything else, goblins believe fortifications benefit from as many spiky bits as possible.

name: Adventure Awaits
text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, draw a card.
flavor: "Good, we're all here. Let's get started!"

name: Bala Ged Recovery // Bala Ged Sanctuary
text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Always have a backup plan."
—Doral, Bala Ged guide

name: Dauntless Survivor
text: When Dauntless Survivor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "I've got a little surprise for you, beasties! Come and get it!"

name: Gnarlid Colony
text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
If Gnarlid Colony was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.

name: Kazandu Nectarpot
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor:
"The scythe-like forelegs are crucial for its survival, because it tastes really good and every inhabitant of Murasa knows it."
—Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

name: Kazandu Stomper
text:
Trample
When Kazandu Stomper enters the battlefield, return up to two lands you control to their owner's hand.
flavor: Elves revere cycles of renewal, but they prefer cycles that don't involve their homes getting smashed.

name: Khalni Ambush // Khalni Territory
text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor:
"The difference between life and death in Ora Ondar is about three seconds of startled screaming."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Might of Murasa
text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
flavor: The continent of Murasa is defined by irrepressible growth, both natural and otherwise.

name: Murasa Brute
flavor: Some adventuring parties are made up of old friends, their common bonds bolstering them in the face of peril. Other parties simply hire the biggest, meanest muscle they can find.

name: Murasa Sproutling
text:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Murasa Sproutling enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target card with a kicker ability from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The seeds of memory grow eternal.

name: Roiling Regrowth
text: Sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor:
"Roots find their way through rock, and even mountains must give way to new growth."
—Nissa Revane

name: Skyclave Pick-Axe
flavor: For use on cliffs and other faces.

name: Springmantle Cleric
text: Springmantle Cleric enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
flavor: Hope and courage bloom in her wake.

name: Strength of Solidarity
text: Choose target creature you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor: "This expedition doesn't succeed unless we all succeed!"

name: Tajuru Blightblade
text: Deathtouch
flavor: Ora Ondar, the Khalni Garden, is a lush tangle of growth in the harsh lands of Akoum. Its plant growth is marvelously diverse: a brilliant spectrum of vibrant life . . . and speedy death.

name: Tajuru Snarecaster
text: Reach
flavor: Elves of the Tajuru Nation spend their lives in the ancient jaddi trees' expansive canopy, some living and dying without ever touching the ground.

name: Taunting Arbormage
text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
When Taunting Arbormage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, all creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor: "Eyes on me!"

name: Territorial Scythecat
text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Territorial Scythecat.
flavor: Standing between a scythecat and its prey makes you the appetizer.

name: Turntimber Ascetic
text: When Turntimber Ascetic enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: "For so long, this land cried out in pain. Now, as the flow returns to its balance point, a new harmony echoes in the trees."

name: Vastwood Fortification // Vastwood Thicket
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor:
"When you understand nature's ways, you're never unarmed."
—Eyza, Joraga guide

name: Veteran Adventurer
text:
Veteran Adventurer is also a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party.
Vigilance
flavor: "How can I be of assistance?"

name: Vine Gecko
text:
The first kicked spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a kicked spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Vine Gecko.
flavor:
"It's cute now, but those things tend to get a lot bigger when you're not looking."
—Fahar, expedition wizard
